name: Blank
desc: No info.

name: Dirt
desc: Yep, it's dirt.

name: Lava
desc: DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Main Door
desc: No info.

name: Bedrock
desc: No info.

name: Rock
desc: I don't feel like I should have to explain what a rock is to you.

name: Door
desc: These magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Cave Background
desc: Technically, this is also Dirt, it's just dirt that's farther away.

name: Grass
desc: I love the smell of freshly punched grass in the morning!

name: Fist
desc: Nothing can stand against the power of the FIST.

name: Sign
desc: Write stuff on it to tell your friends! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Daisy
desc: Bellis Perennis, the common European daisy.

name: Pointy Sign
desc: This sign includes a bit of added information - an arrow! The arrow points whichever direction you are facing when you place the sign.

name: Crappy Sign
desc: This is not the greatest sign, but it'll do in a pinch.

name: Danger Sign
desc: Use this sign to warn your friends of terrible space monkeys.

name: Dungeon Door
desc: This works like a regular door, but it looks much more medieval.

name: Wrench
desc: The amazing tool that can modify Doors, Signs, Time-Space Ruptures and more. You can't lose it!

name: Shades
desc: The future's so bright, you need these.

name: Green Shirt
desc: Your basic green shirt.

name: Tuxedo
desc: Look like a penguin!

name: Brown Shoes
desc: Standard loafers. They're actually the wrong size, but what're you gonna do?

name: Boots
desc: For when you have serious work to do.

name: Red Hair
desc: A big red pompadour.

name: Baseball Cap
desc: Support your favorite team! As long as your favorite team is team B!

name: Jeans
desc: Denim is the strongest fiber known to man.

name: Sexy Boxers
desc: Ooh la la.

name: Wooden Background
desc: Tons of planks. A plank ton.

name: Window
desc: A piece of glass with a frame.

name: Glass Pane
desc: Just your basic piece of glass.

name: Wooden Window
desc: You can see out of it, except for the wooden parts.

name: Portcullis
desc: Lock out the ruffians with this medieval gateway.

name: Boombox
desc: If you had a piece of cardboard, you could breakdance in front of it. Cardboard and bendable limbs.

name: Olde Timey Radio
desc: When this song is over, we can listen to the latest serial adventures!

name: Top Hat
desc: You can wear it on your head, but contains no rabbits.

name: Brown Hair
desc: Brown hair comes in many styles, and this is one of them.

name: Spikey Hair
desc: You blonde rebel.

name: Afro
desc: Extra poofy!

name: Ski Cap
desc: Keeps your head warm!

name: Black Pants
desc: Matches any clothing!

name: Patent Leather Shoes
desc: Shiny!

name: Ruby Slippers
desc: There's no place like Growtopia!

name: Green Skirt
desc: Exactly long enough to be appropriate for all occasions.

name: Green Blouse
desc: An ordinary blouse in kelly green.

name: Purple Thong
desc: Extremely scandalous!

name: Purple Bikini Top
desc: Scandalous!

name: Blonde Bombshell
desc: Gorgeous blonde locks tumbling over your sensual shoulders and around your square head.

name: Briefcase
desc: Contains nuclear launch codes, but you don't know the combination to open it.

name: Sword
desc: Razor-sharp, and yet you kindly choose not to cut anything with it.

name: Just One Boxing Glove

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: You only get one, but it still lets you punch people harder!

name: Pickaxe

func.add: You can smash bricks more quickly.

desc: Smash through bricks slightly faster!

name: Wood Block
desc: A solid chunk of Bolivian Manzanita, polished to a mirror sheen.

name: Wooden Platform
desc: The great thing about these is that you can jump up through them!

name: Rock Background
desc: Rock n' roll, brother.

name: Toilet
desc: Punch to flush!

name: Painting: Yerfdog
desc: Monet's lost masterpiece.

name: Painting: Dink Duck
desc: An oil painting commissioned to commemorate the 15th anniversary of Dink Smallwood!

name: Disco Ball
desc: Disco will never die.

name: Bricks
desc: Your basic building material.

name: Brick Background
desc: These bricks are slightly farther away than the other Bricks.

name: Mystery Block
desc: What could possibly be inside this block!?!? Gems, that's what.

name: Red Riding Hood
desc: The perfect hood for when you're riding something red.

name: Red Coat
desc: Protects you from the rain. Less effective against disguised wolves.

name: Devil Horns
desc: Use this on somebody who's been evil!

name: Golden Halo
desc: Use this on somebody who's been good!

name: Hot Head
desc: YOUR HEAD IS ON FIRE!

name: Brainwave Capacitor
desc: Any medical benefits of the Brainwave Capacitor have not been verified by the FDA.

name: TV Head
desc: Wait, is that TV still on?

name: Fairy Crown
desc: You're the Queen of the Fairies!

name: Cyclopean Visor

func.add: Blast blocks from farther away! But weaker than punch.

desc: With this visor on, you can zap things instead of punching. It does slightly less damage, but has longer range.

name: Biker Stache
desc: Looks tough.

name: Shallot Mustache
desc: Just the mustache you need to review movies with!

name: X-Ray Specs
desc: These allow your character to see through the other characters' clothes. It does NOT allow you, the player, to do so.

name: Gold-Rimmed Glasses
desc: More expensive than most glasses.

name: Big Glasses
desc: Make sure you get the right prescription.

name: Fairy Dress
desc: Fairly dressy.

name: Fairy Skirt
desc: For that Tinkerbell style.

name: Fairy Slippers
desc: Sparkly shoes!

name: Fairy Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: With a pair of wings, you can double-jump!

name: Fairy Wand
desc: Unfortunately, all the magic in this wand is used up.

name: Jetpack

func.add: You can fly! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: It doesn't have enough thrust to actually fly, but it does let you jump really high!

name: Death Spikes
desc: The deadliest kind of spikes available. DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Grey Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Black Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: White Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colours!

name: Red Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Orange Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Yellow Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Green Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Aqua Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Blue Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Purple Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Brown Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Steel Block
desc: The sturdiest of blocks.

name: Poppy
desc: Pretty orange flowers.

name: Rose
desc: Every one of these has its thorn.

name: Bush
desc: Nicely landscaped!

name: Mushroom
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Blueberry

func.add: A blueberry slides down your throat!
func.rem: The effects of the blueberry have worn off.

desc: Careful with these, they'll stain! Throw it at a player to turn him blue for an hour.

name: Flowery Wallpaper
desc: If you don't like it, you can always steam it off later.

name: Stripey Wallpaper
desc: Modern and stylish.

name: Small Lock
desc: Locks 10 tiles around itself.

name: Big Lock
desc: Locks 48 tiles around itself.

name: Huge Lock
desc: Locks 200 tiles around itself.

name: Burglar Mask
desc: Nobody will recognize you if you cover an inch of skin around your eyes!

name: Referee Shirt
desc: Referees and burglars have similar fashion sense.

name: Froghat
desc: It's like a frog ate your head.

name: Flashlight
desc: It takes D Batteries, and nobody ever has any D Batteries! (Note: No batteries are actually used)

name: Rooster Hat
desc: Cock-a-doodle-doo!

name: Wooden Chair
desc: Legs getting tired? Have a seat!

name: Note Block
desc: Rockin' 8-bit tunes.

name: Wooden Table
desc: Stack a bunch of these in a row to make a table as long as you want!

name: House Entrance
desc: It's like a wall, except your friends can come in!

name: Signal Jammer
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this prevents your world from being listed on the World Select screen.

name: Grow Spray Fertilizer
desc: Spray a tree to grow it an hour faster.

name: Bathtub
desc: Punch it to take a very quick shower!

name: White Beard
desc: Does this make me look old?

name: Santa Hat
desc: Ho ho ho!

name: Santa Pants
desc: Does anybody else wear red pants with white cuffs?

name: Santa Vest
desc: Celebrate the holidays in style.

name: Sack O' Joy
desc: Share your joy! Wearing this makes you scatter your gems around as you move.

name: World Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. If you have 100 World Locks, you can tap them in your inventory to combine them into a Diamond Lock. It does the same thing, but it's shinier.

name: Music Box
desc: Guaranteed to put you to sleep.

name: Evil Bricks
desc: Do not look directly at Evil Bricks.

name: Asbestos Boots

func.add: Fire walk with me! Fire does 50% damage.
func.rem: Your feet are no longer safe.

desc: Protects you from lava, reducing the damage by 50%.

name: Cuzco Wall Mount
desc: Cuzco was a good goat.

name: Robot Wants Dubstep
desc: Robot sure is greedy. Punch him to provide the Dubstep he seeks.

name: Saturday Night Vest
desc: Chest hair, gold chains, white vest. Disco lives.

name: White Bellbottoms
desc: Hello, sailor!

name: Golden Block
desc: Just think how valuable this would be in real life.

name: Crystal Block
desc: The mysterious rarity 100 item!

name: Picket Fence
desc: Put it around your house, and live out the American Dream!

name: Long Black Hair
desc: Stylish, yes?

name: Purple Mohawk
desc: Cool.

name: Messy Brown Hair
desc: If there was a Comb item, you wouldn't be stuck with this.

name: Long Brown Hair
desc: Hair, both brown and long.

name: Freeze Wand
desc: Use this on someone to freeze them solid for 10 seconds.

name: Fire Wand
desc: Use this on someone to MURDER THEM.

name: Curse Wand

func.add: You've been cursed to (the world) hell!
func.rem: You are no longer bound to the netherworld, you're free to go.

desc: You're on the HIGHWAY TO HELL!! (For 10 minutes)

name: Bed
desc: Is this even big enough to hold a Growtopian? Doesn't matter since you can't lay down!

name: Polka Dot Block
desc: Everybody loves polka dots!

name: Checker Wallpaper
desc: It's black, it's white, yeah yeah yeah.

name: Fireplace
desc: Stay warm on those cold Growtopia nights. You can punch this to turn it on or off.

name: Snorkel
desc: The trick is putting liquid soap inside the snorkel!

name: Ninja Mask
desc: The essence of the shadows lurks within this mask. Put it on to cloak your entire body.

name: Ninja Tights
desc: Blend in the darkness with Ninja Tights!

name: Ninja Vest
desc: Shadows cloak your form as you slip behind the walls.

name: Ninja Slippers
desc: Ninjas know how to stay comfortable while assasinating people.

name: The Darkness
desc: I'm attacking the Darkness with my Magic Missile!

name: Rubber Ducky
desc: Makes bathtime lots of fun! Punch it to make it quack.

name: Checkered Pajamas
desc: Don't be embarrassed to play Growtopia in your pajamas. Other players are wearing Fairy Wings.

name: Tie Dyed Shirt
desc: You filthy hippy!

name: Rainbow Wig
desc: Be the life of the party!

name: Rainbow Block
desc: For when you can't choose just one color block!

name: Monocle
desc: The very pinnacle of class is having good vision in only one eye.

name: Pirate Hat
desc: Avast ye, mateys.

name: Eyepatch
desc: It's reversible! Swap it from eye to eye by pressing left or right.

name: Peg Leg
desc: Nothing is quite as piratey as amputated limbs!

name: Diamond Ring
desc: The perfect gift to ask that special someone if they'll marry you.

name: Cannon
desc: Punch this to fire it. Don't worry, it's loaded with blanks.

name: High Tech Wall
desc: Well, it looks pretty advanced!

name: High Tech Block
desc: This block can hold 4.6 petabytes of data, but has no ports of any kind to access it.

name: Magic Bacon Wallpaper
desc: We had some leftover Magic Bacon, so we made it into wallpaper!

name: Bubble Wrap
desc: Everybody loves to pop Bubble Wrap! Just walk in front of it to pop it. Unlike the real thing, this will un-pop in 10 seconds.

name: Cactus
desc: A dangerously sharp plant. Do not touch.

name: Sandstone
desc: Your basic building block.

name: Art Wall
desc: It doesn't look like much alone, but it changes colour when you punch it. Draw stuff!

name: Stone Wall
desc: Classic fieldstone wall, stylish and sturdy.

name: Das Red Balloon
desc: Everyone's a Captain Kirk. Use this to make somebody float up in the air briefly!

name: Chandelier
desc: The classiest way to light a room!

name: Lovely Pink Dress
desc: Isn't it lovely?

name: Fishnet Stockings
desc: Do you really have legs for these?

name: Monster Feet
desc: Not made from the feet of actual monsters, these are just rubber.

name: Hoop Earrings
desc: They're like rings, but for your ears!

name: Heroman Cape
desc: HEROMAN HO!

name: Lollipop
desc: You found this on the ground, so it's best just not to lick it.

name: Viking Helmet
desc: There is no evidence that Vikings ever wore helmets with horns.They would have if they had thought of it, though!

name: Pigtails
desc: Marcia! Marcia! Marcia!

name: Cloudstone Block
desc: Cloudstone is very rare, because it tends to fall out of the sky and just become Stonestone.

name: Dreamstone Block
desc: Forged from the dreams of children on Christmas Eve. And marble. Like 90% marble.

name: Angel Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Better than a [[Golden Halo|Halo]], these will actually let you double jump!

name: Diaper
desc: If you find yourself lost in a world without any Toilet Seeds, you'll be glad you have this.

name: Heartbow

func.add: Blast blocks from farther away! Weaker damage than punch though.

desc: Once used by Cupid himself, this bow shoots hearts! You can yank other players towards you with it.

name: Mud Glob
desc: Splat somebody with this to slow them down!

name: Cargo Shorts
desc: The pockets even have pockets in them!

name: Stinky Socks
desc: Will you ever wash these?

name: Tan Shirt
desc: Your basic tan shirt.

name: Super Crate Box
desc: What's in the box!? WHAT'S IN THE BOX?!

name: Amber Glass
desc: Tinted glass for then the plain stuff just won't do.

name: Lava Rock
desc: Not quite hot enough to hurt anybody, but it sure looks cool.

name: Time-Space Rupture
desc: Nobody knows where you will emerge when you fall into one of these! Except whoever set the destination using the wrench.

name: Valentine
desc: Use this on somebody to make them your Valentine for an hour! They'll appreciate it greatly.

name: Candy Heart
desc: Chalky goodness emblazoned with an incomprehensible slogan you can't help but shout.

name: Perfume
desc: Spray this on someone to make them smell... distinctive.

name: Heartstone Block
desc: This isn't actually solid Heartstone, it's Heartstone-plated. Kind of a letdown, really.

name: Heartstone
desc: Smash it for Valentine's goodies! Every year the Golden Heart Crystal is locked in time and remains constant, appearing at the same frequency throughout the ages, while new items change and fade with the passage of time.

name: Ultra Trophy 3000
desc: The best of all possible trophies.

name: Ultra Trophy 3001
desc: One better than the Ultra Trophy 3000.

name: Stove
desc: Is that turkey ever going to be finished cooking?

name: Spatula
desc: Spatula city, spatula city, SPATULA CITY!

name: Apron
desc: Kiss the chef.

name: Chef Hat
desc: It's been signed by Gordon Ramsay!

name: Blueberry Pie
desc: The most delicious incarnation of the humble blueberry.

name: Duct Tape

func.add: Duct tape has covered your mouth!

desc: SHUT UP ALREADY.

name: Checkpoint
desc: If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched!

name: Sheet Music: Blank
desc: This doesn't really do much by itself!

name: Sheet Music: Bass Note
desc: If you aren't in range of a Boombox, this will play a bass note for you. Put it in different places for different pitches.

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Bass
desc: This plays a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Bass Note.

name: Sheet Music: Flat Bass
desc: This plays a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Bass Note.

name: Sheet Music: Piano Note
desc: If you aren't in range of a Boombox, this will play a piano note for you. Put it in different places for different pitches.

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Piano
desc: This plays a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Piano Note.

name: Sheet Music: Flat Piano
desc: This plays a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Piano Note.

name: Sheet Music: Drums
desc: There are 7 different drums, place this at different positions vertically to hear different ones!

name: Race Start Flag
desc: Starts a race timer. Get to a Race End Flag to record your time!

name: Race End Flag
desc: A player touching this will finish a race started at a Race Start Flag, and their time will be annouced.

name: Blue Star Wallpaper
desc: Vaguely inspired by Vincent Van Gogh!

name: Sandstone Wall
desc: Lovely beige bricks.

name: Wall Like An Egyptian
desc: Unfortunately, nobody knows the correct translation of these ancient symbols.

name: Plumbing
desc: Standard steel pipes, slightly too small for you to climb into.

name: Ice
desc: Slippery, yet strangely not melting.

name: Sand
desc: Is it a desert or a beach? You decide!

name: Fishbowl
desc: If there's a fish here, he's hiding in the castle.

name: Poodle Skirt
desc: Just the thing to wear to the sock hop!

name: Backpack
desc: No, it doesn't increase your carrying capacity.

name: Space Helmet
desc: Did you just stick a fishbowl on your head?

name: Plate Mail
desc: Protect yourself from harm!

name: Venus Guytrap
desc: This is what happens when you give a flower a taste for magic bacon!

name: Dice Block
desc: Punch it to roll a random number!

name: Dresser
desc: This would be the great place to store your clothes! Too bad the drawers are stuck.

name: Table Lamp
desc: You don't actually need light in this game, but you can get it anyway!

name: Fedora
desc: You look sharp, kid! Sponsored by i20HH.

name: Dame's Fedora
desc: You're a real firecracker, I tells ya! You're one feisty dame!

name: Pinstripe Suit
desc: There's a hanky in the pocket in case you /cry on the auspicious occasion of your daughter's wedding.

name: Pinstripe Pants
desc: Beautifully tailored with a sleek, slim leg, this pinstripe pant is utterly flattering and entirely appropriate for workday, weekend or wherever the evening takes you.

name: Cigar
desc: Surgeon General's Warning: Secondhand smoke can make you go :P.

name: Tommygun

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: Fully automatic firepower to give them coppers what-for!

name: Flapper Headband
desc: You'll be the star of the speakeasy in this getup.

name: Flapper Dress
desc: Dance the night away in this short dress that is clearly the bee's knees.

name: Art Deco Block
desc: I don't know what this looks like actually, but it kind of looks nice, doesn't it? You'll find a place to use it!

name: Victrola
desc: When Olde Timey Radio is too modern, try a classic Victrola for some jazzy tunes!

name: Big Old Sideways Arrow
desc: It points the way to whatever you want it to!

name: Big Old Up Arrow
desc: It points the way to stuff above you!

name: Big Old Down Arrow
desc: It points the way to stuff below you!

name: Blue Wristband
desc: This serves some sort of exercise purpose.

name: Blue Headband
desc: Keep the sweat out of your eyes!

name: Red Sportsball Jersey
desc: Now you are ready to play for the home team! Or the away team! Go team!

name: Red Sweatpants
desc: Good for both joggers and mobsters.

name: Air Robinsons
desc: Special air pockets and coils in the soles of these shoes make them... cost more. But they do make you run faster!

name: Hippie Sandals
desc: Leave only footprints.

name: Pastel Pants
desc: It's like springtime all up your business!

name: Pastel Suit
desc: The finest in televangelist culture.

name: Bunny Mask

func.add: You are very pale and fuzzy.

desc: You're not much of a bunny without big ears, but it's a start.

name: Bunny Ears
desc: Any hearing improvements imparted by this hat are negated by the fact that it covers your actual ears.

name: Wicker Basket
desc: This basket is filled with plastic grass for some reason.

name: Pastel Pink Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Orange Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Yellow Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Green Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Aqua Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Blue Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Pastel Purple Block
desc: A paler shade of awesome.

name: Bunny Tail
desc: I'm concerned about how you're holding this in place.

name: Pinball Bumper
desc: Bouncy bouncy bounce!

name: Lucky Clover
desc: Stick this in your ear to become super lucky and partially deaf!

name: Orange Beard
desc: Like Santa Claus, but with more Vitamin C!

name: Leprechaun Hat
desc: There's a four-leaf clover jammed in the band! But all the luck in it has been used up already.

name: Green Pants
desc: I used to wear green jeans myself, until somebody made fun of them. Never again!

name: Leprechaun Suit
desc: You don't have to be a leprechaun to wear a green suit with gold trim - don't believe the hype!

name: Leprechaun Shoes
desc: These are very hard on your toes.

name: Green Beer
desc: The green dye used in this beer was outlawed in 43 states. Take a drink and find out why!

name: Pot O' Gold
desc: An entire pot filled with gold!!

name: Orange Portal
desc: You monster!

name: Blue Portal
desc: Step through it. There is cake on the other side.

name: Glass Block
desc: People inside this should not throw stones.

name: Bookcase
desc: Someone glued all the books down!

name: Secret Passage
desc: Looks like a Wood Block, but your friends can come in!

name: Ladder
desc: This is a specially designed one-way ladder - you can only climb up, not down.

name: Grey Wallpaper
desc: It's a Grey Block squashed flat!

name: Red Wallpaper
desc: It's a Red Block squashed flat!

name: Orange Wallpaper
desc: It's an Orange Block squashed flat!

name: Yellow Wallpaper
desc: It's a Yellow Block squashed flat!

name: Green Wallpaper
desc: It's a Green Block squashed flat!

name: Aqua Wallpaper
desc: It's an Aqua Block squashed flat!

name: Blue Wallpaper
desc: It's a blue block squashed flat!

name: Purple Wallpaper
desc: It's a Purple Block squashed flat!

name: Phonecats Hat
desc: The one and only!

name: Turtle Hat
desc: Turtle Hat would definitely never sue anybody, because he's totally original.

name: Baneful Mask
desc: Express your wrath with this evil mask. Sponsored by i20HH.

name: Rollback Plaque
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. Feb 2013

name: Happy Joy Plaque
desc: It's much happier, but much less rare, than a Rollback Plaque.

name: Wizard Hat
desc: Wizard Hats come in 5 classic styles, collect them all!

name: Witch Hat
desc: Wizard Hats come in 5 classic styles, collect them all!

name: Merlin Hat
desc: Wizard's Hats come in 5 classic styles, collect them all! This one is an officially licensed copy of the one Merlin himself wore (it's not signed or anything, though).

name: Funk Wizard Hat
desc: Wizard Hats comes in 5 classic styles, collect them all!

name: Cursed Wizard Hat

func.add: Ye art accursed by evil magicks.

desc: Wizard Hats come in 5 classic styles, collect them all! Too bad this style is CURSED!!

name: Tiny Horsie
desc: It's possible this is actually a dachshund, but you can still ride it! It's faster than walking.

name: Elvish Longbow
desc: This is the very weapon used once by Aeldrinn Zindeltwarp to defeat the Slaarn Hordes in the battle of Fizzletree Gulch!

name: Treasure Chest
desc: Store your treasures inside by dropping them! When it's closed, the items are hidden. Punch to open it.

name: Dragon Gate
desc: Punch the door to open or shut it. Anyone unlucky enough to be caught inside when it closes becomes dragon food.

name: Wizard's Robe
desc: These are usually only worn by the highest rank of wizards. For you, we'll make an exception.

name: GrowBeats Headphones
desc: There's some serious kickin' beats going on in there, but you can't hear it, because they're headphones. Sponsored by JakeShore, ADMex1, and RovSpy.

name: Golden Sword
desc: This ancient blade is forged of purest gold. Which means it's really really dull, and quite easy to bend.

name: Barrel
desc: An excellent place to shoot fish.

name: Tavern Sign
desc: It's a sign that sticks to walls or ceilings! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Lattice Background
desc: Perfect for building gazebos.

name: Rotten Egg
desc: Throw it at somebody to make them stink!

name: Cuddly Bunny
desc: Toss one to someone you love. Who wouldn't love a cuddly rabbit?

name: Psychotic Bunny
desc: It's got a vicious streak a mile wide! Share it with your.. friends?

name: Copper Plumbing
desc: This copper piping is both smaller and farther away than the green [[Plumbing]].

name: Steel Girder
desc: This is the best place to superglue a hardhat.

name: Pinball Sproinger
desc: SPROOOOOOOING

name: Chalkboard
desc: You could take roll on this, except that somebody glued the chalk to the tray.

name: School Desk
desc: So uncomfortable you refuse to even sit in it!

name: Red Bricks
desc: Your basic old school building material.

name: Mailbox
desc: You've got mail! People can write you private messages with this.

name: Bulletin Board
desc: Lets people communicate by leaving messages to each other.

name: Letter
desc: Who needs email? The old ways are best!

name: Baseball Bat
desc: It's peanut butter jelly time!

name: Swiss Cheese Block
desc: It's holier than thou.

name: Granite Block
desc: The classy way to decorate with a rock!

name: Marble Block
desc: The MOST classy way to decorate with rock!

name: Pencil
desc: It's too big to write with!

name: Growtopia Lunchbox
desc: Hey, it's the guy from the game icon! Carry your lunch inside.

name: Grey Hair Bun
desc: Makes you look like a librarian.

name: Apple
desc: This keeps doctors away for up to 24 hours!

name: Crimson Eagle Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Soar on the wings of a crimson eagle! Sponsored by Morphieus.

name: Grimstone
desc: The bleakest of stones.

name: Blackrock Wall
desc: This dark stone is the latest in dungeon couture.

name: Iron Bars
desc: Hello Dad, I'm in jail!

name: Jail Door
desc: You don't need a spoon to dig out, just open this.

name: Skeleton
desc: Ew, it's a dead guy.

name: Headsman's Axe
desc: Heads are gonna roll...

name: Iron Mask

func.add: You can't speak through an Iron Mask.

desc: When duct tape just won't cut it, we lock you in a tower with this on your face.

name: Worthless Rags
desc: You look like a sad little muppet.

name: Torch
desc: Keeps the dank out in your dungeons! Well, it reduces it slightly. You can punch this to turn it on or off.

name: Meow Ears
desc: Super-special kitty ears, now yours to wear! Once only for a select few, meow yours to wear with pride!

name: Sombrero
desc: Aqui esta el sombrero. El sombrero es muy bien.

name: Poncho
desc: Its like you threw a blanket in the washing machine along with a bag of Skittles.

name: Desperado Mustache
desc: Good for twirling when you are tying somebody to a railroad.

name: Flamenco Dress
desc: To help you /dance with class.

name: Hibiscus Hair
desc: Someone told me there's a girl out there with love in her eyes and flowers in her hair.

name: Fiesta Sombrero
desc: Take the fiesta with you everywhere you go!

name: Habanero Pepper
desc: This one is seriously hot pepper!

name: Olmec Head
desc: The Olmec people were known for two things: giant stone heads... and PARTYING DOWN!

name: Adobe Block
desc: Adobe is a fantastic material for building both sturdy housing and Flash games.

name: Ultra Pinata
desc: This is summoned by the Piata Bash event, it's not an item a player can use.

name: Pinata
desc: Put this on top of a bunch of items you want to give away. Once placed, anybody can break it and get the items!

name: Pinata Whistle
desc: Call your friends, then blow the whistle for a Piata Bash!

name: Stinky Bucket
desc: I don't know why you would stick a bucket that smells on your head, but it has eyeholes in it, so it's not useful as a bucket! Sponsored by Stinkbuckets.

name: Acid
desc: DO NOT TOUCH ALSO!!

name: Clouds
desc: Believe it or not, you're walking on air!

name: Hammer Pants
desc: Alternatively, harem girl pants.  Think of them however you like.

name: Ban Wand

func.add: Reality flickers as you begin to wake up.
func.rem: You are no longer banned.  Now be good!

desc: Use this on someone to ban them for 10 minutes.

name: Cybernetic Arm

func.add: You can smash bricks more quickly.

desc: KILL ALL HUMANS. Or just kill rocks - the Cybernetic Arm is superior to a human arm at all digging functions. Sponsored by i20HH.

name: Play Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Super special wings that are only for Play!

name: Lokster Hair
desc: Slick n' greasy, and nobody but Lokster can wear it.

name: Neon Lights
desc: Get your name up in lights!

name: Rabbit's Foot
desc: If you rub this, it will vanish and you will become lucky for half an hour!

name: Flipping Coin
desc: Flip the coin and see what you get! What you won't get is your coin back.

name: Gambler's Visor
desc: Ever wondered where these come from? Early incandescent lights were very harsh, so dim things for you a bit without impeding your vision

name: Slot Machine
desc: Big money, big money, no whammies.... (odds of pretend winning are 1 in 10).

name: Roulette Wheel
desc: Spin the wheel and take your chances! Where she ends up, nobody knows!

name: Pleiadian Star Ship
desc: Without a source of antimatter, all this ship can do is hover along the ground. Sponsored by Pleiadian.

name: Password Door
desc: These doors only open if you know the magic word... which you do, because you set it.

func.add: You've been infected by the g-Virus. Punch others to infect them, too! Braiiiins...

name: Little Red Corvette
desc: Baby, you're much too fast.

name: Sawed-Off Shotgun
desc: Shop Smart, shop S-Mart.

name: Combover
desc: Dont worry, youve combed it so well that nobody can even tell youre bald!

name: Lab Coat
desc: The perfect outfit for those occasions when you are zapping lightning through a corpse.

name: Traffic Barricade
desc: Zombies usually respect all traffic laws,so these are handy to have around.

name: Toxic Waste Barrel
desc: This barrel is filled with a highly unstoppable compound, well not filled exactly - some of it is dripping on the floor! Approach with your caution.

name: Toxic Waste
desc: Usually safely stored in barrels, but currently stored ON YOUR FACE.

name: Biohazard Sign
desc: Do not lick under any circumstances.

name: Antidote

func.add: You are now immune to zombie bites! Temporarily...

desc: This is THE antidote. To everything. Drink up, and you shall be cured!

name: Tombstone
desc: Looks like somebody got too close to some Death Spikes.

name: Military Radio
desc: This radio is your last link to the human race so why is it just playing spooky music?

name: Zombie-Stompin' Boots
desc: These military surplus boots are steel-toed and spike-soled. Hey hey, do the zombie stomp!

name: Combat Vest
desc: It's gots lots of pocketses!

name: Jens Beard
desc: Nobody but Jens is so wise and ancient.

name: Showgirl Headdress
desc: You're almost the Statue of Liberty.

name: Showgirl Top
desc: Sparkly!

name: Showgirl Leggings
desc: Sparkly!

name: Zeta Reticulant Mask
desc: No one is ever going to trust you with a probe again. Sponsored by Pleiadian.

name: Red Growsaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: You really don't want to drop this on your toe. Sponsored by JakeShore.

name: Black Growsaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: You really don't want this to drop on your toe. Sponsored by Pirate Hunter.

name: Green Growsaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: You really don't want to drop this on your toe.

name: Blue Growsaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: You really don't want to drop this on your toe.

name: Flamesaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: The energies contained in this blade are struggling to burst free.

name: Double Growsaber

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: Twice the sabery goodness, with half the calories!

name: Solorien On Fire
desc: She's the symbol of a revolution in moderating!

name: Flaming Skull Mask
desc: If you had skin on your face, this would really be painful. Sponsored by Ticklehead.

name: Ripper Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Rippling bands of dark energy carry you aloft. Sponsored by Ripply.

name: Seil's Magic Orbs

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Dark orbs for a dark heart, these floating spheres still radiate evil from their long-lost master...

name: Water Bucket
desc: Splash it around to make things wet. It can also scoop up water, though there's a good chance you'll just spill it. Butterfingers.

name: Refrigerator
desc: Keep your best items cool so they don't spoil! When its closed, the items are hidden. Punch to open it.

name: Emerald Block
desc: Wow, you get 5 emeralds for the price of 1!

name: Ruby Block
desc: Considering the size, this is the most valuable ruby in existence. But it's only a video game.

name: Beach Blast
desc: This magical object requires 100 Fireworks to detonate. It will create a brand new pristine beach world!

name: Coral
desc: This is a very special breed of coral that survives just as well in and out of water.

name: Fireworks
desc: Use this for a splendid celebration! Or save it for more important things.

name: Summer Surprise
desc: It's a box filled with summer excitement! Smash it with your friends.

name: Women's Swimsuit
desc: Hop in the pool, it's warm!

name: Men's Swimsuit
desc: Hop in the pool, it's warm!

name: Hula Bobblehead
desc: Feel the island rhythms.

name: Swim Fins
desc: These aren't the best way to move on land, but they'll zoom you through water like a dolphin!

name: Seaweed
desc: See weed?

name: Beach Umbrella
desc: If they had just let this palm tree live, you could've sat under that instead of a bunch of dead fronds.

name: Ocean Rock
desc: It's the back side of the ocean! Or a lake, whatever.

name: Barky's Mask
desc: A bit sweaty to wear during the dog days of summer. Sponsored by Barkbits.

name: Palm Tree
desc: These seeds of course grow on a Palm Tree Tree. Which looks nothing like a Palm Tree.

name: Garbage
desc: Yuck, man. I hope somebody cleans this up.

name: Screen Door
desc: Not for use in submarines.

name: Wrought-Iron Fence
desc: Whether you're making a classy manor or a haunted mansion, you can't go wrong with wrought-iron!

name: Velvet Rope
desc: Show people where they need to go in style!

name: Sproingy Eyes
desc: Dont worry, those arent your real eyes, theyre just plastic.

name: Cow
desc: Moooooo. You can milk a cow once a day or so!

name: Milk

func.rem: You can feel your bones softening.

desc: It does a body okay, though there are lower-fat ways to get calcium.

name: Calf Leash
desc: Moo! This little baby cow will follow you wherever you go! Mainly because its tied to your wrist.

name: Chicken
desc: BOK BOK BOK! Chickens will lay eggs for you about once a day!

name: Egg

func.add: You have egg on your face.

desc: Toss these all over, if you want to be a horrible vandal.

name: Chick Leash
desc: Peep peep! This little baby chick will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because it's tied to your wrist.

name: Piglet Leash
desc: Oink oink! This little piglet will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because it's tied to your wrist.

name: Wheat
desc: You're not in Kansas anymore... but if you were, it'd pretty much look like this.

name: Butterfly Leash
desc: Flap flap! This little butterfly will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because it's tied to your wrist.

name: Barn Block
desc: 'Tis  a fine barn, but sure 'tis no pool, English.

name: Barn Door
desc: Shut it! Were you raised in a barn?

name: Red Wood Wall
desc: This wood is red, but it's not redwood, it's oak. It's just painted red.

name: Straw Hat
desc: Keeps the sun off of you as you farm all the live-long day.

name: Overalls
desc: You feel like you could whitewash fences all day in this getup, yes sir!

name: Pitchfork
desc: Whether you're turning over hay, poking evildoers in the tukhus, or just eating incredibly large noodles, this is the tool for you.

name: Farmgirl Hair
desc: I reckon ya'll oughtta whitewash that thar fence!

name: Dear John Tractor

func.rem: You can walk faster than that thing!

desc: Too lazy to push buttons to farm? The tractor will do it for you!

name: Dragon Hand
desc: Call forth the Dragons of Legend! Please be aware the legends may have been a bit exaggerated.

name: Shockinator
desc: High voltage can lead to severe trauma and even, In extreme cases, frizzy hair.

name: Ze Goggles
desc: Not recommended to protect your eyes from acid - Ze Goggles, they do nothing!

name: Shocking Hair
desc: In the made science business, electrocution is a constant hazard. The made scientist Don King knows this well.

name: Enhanced Intellect
desc: You're a serious show-off, you know that? Nobody needs to see this.

name: Reanimator Remote
desc: It's ALLLLIIVVVVEEE!!!

name: Laboratory
desc: Drop three stacks of items on this, then punch it to attempt to process them into a fabulous new item! It can only mix exactly 3 stacks. Most combinations will do nothing, so experiment!

name: Chemical G
desc: This is a highly toxic chemical. Do not digest! Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals and create amazing new things.

name: Chemical R
desc: This is a highly toxic chemical. Do not ingest! Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals and create amazing new things

name: Chemical P
desc: This is a highly toxic chemical. Do not digest! Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals and create amazing new things.

name: Chemical B
desc: This is a highly toxic chemical. Do not digest! Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals and create amazing new things.

name: Mysterious Chemical
desc: This recently-discovered formulation is incredibly dangerous. Do not even LOOK AT IT. Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals to create amazing new things.

name: Chemical Y
desc: This is a highly toxic chemical. Do not digest! Place carefully in a Laboratory to combine with other chemicals and create amazing new things.

name: Steel Table
desc: Stack a bunch of these in a row to make a table as long as you want!

name: Science Station
desc: The ideal station for performing SCIENCE! You can collect experimental results about twice a day.

name: Death Ray

func.add: You can vaporize bricks more quickly.

desc: For safety reasons, we've had to disable the "Death" portion of this device. It is pretty hard on blocks though.

name: Weather Machine - Sunny
desc: Punch this to enjoy the most wonderful Growtopian weather. Not much use most of the time. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Weather Machine - Night
desc: Night is arguably the most common form of weather. Seems like every evening, a dark front just rolls right in. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Red Bones

func.add: Your bones, and all the stuff stuck to them, are red!

desc: Oddly, Redbone's skull is bigger than his head.

name: Tony's Tiger Mask
desc: It's GRRRRRRRrrreat!

name: Tony's Tiger Suit
desc: Also GRRRRRRRrrreat!

name: Desert Blast
desc: Use this astounding device to create an entirely new desert world. One free pyramid included.

name: Boulder
desc: It's like a rock, but dirtier.

name: Weather Machine - Arid
desc: Its amazing how a little change in the weather can completely reshape the mountains! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Scoreboard
desc: Punch it to see the top worlds of the day! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Bread
desc: Mmm, fresh-baked!

name: E-Z Cook Oven
desc: If science isn't pink enough for you, then mix your chemicals in here! For SCIENCE!

name: Sugar Cane
desc: The sweetest stalk of grass you'll ever chew!

name: Dough
desc: D'oh! This is raw! What can we do with it?

name: Blueberry Muffin
desc: Mmm, fresh-baked sweetness!

name: Habanero Cheese Bread
desc: It's a spicy gooey treat! Watch out though, it's really hot.

name: Tomato
desc: Express your displeasure with performance in vegetable form!

name: Pizza
desc: I'll have the Supreme With Cheese!

name: Apple Pie
desc: The most delicious incarnation of the humble apple.

name: Cheeseburger
desc: You're really not using all the parts of the animal, are you?

name: Silver Idol
desc: Some speak of an ancient curse placed on this idol. Others speak of a free frogurt. Who knows what to believe anymore?

name: Ancient Stone Gate
desc: What could lurk behind such a barrier? Ancient secrets? Cursed mummies? Perhaps a stash of purple blocks.

name: Obelisk
desc: Punching this mystical stone makes it pulse with dark energy...

name: Sungate
desc: This alien artifact can teleport you to distant worlds, but only if it's charged with the power of 7 Obelisks first.

name: Slime
desc: Yuck, this stuff is slippery and gross.

name: Profile
desc: Tap this to check out your own personal info!

name: Achievement Block
desc: Only usable in a world-locked world. Use your wrench to etch any achievement you've earned into it! Only the owner of the World Lock can etch it.

name: Weather Machine - Rainy City
desc: It's just another rainy night... without you, jet city woman. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Street Sign
desc: The classic method of identifying streets. Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Gargoyle
desc: Gargoyles just love hanging out, man.

name: Gothic Building
desc: The perfect perch for a gargoyle.

name: Streetlamp
desc: Light on a stick!

name: Sidewalk
desc: Most of this is actually bricks, but there's a little bit of sidewalk at the top!

name: Tenement Building
desc: It's not the nicest place to live, especially since you can't even enter it anyway.

name: Fire Escape
desc: This meets all safety standards. I mean, you know, pretty much. Well, it looks safe to me at least. Maybe not safe exactly... more like non-lethal. Well, not always lethal. Lethal on occasion?

name: Public Lava
desc: DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Fire Hydrant
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for a maximum bounce.

name: Hedge
desc: Neatly trimmed, to keep the neighborhood tidy.

name: Blue Mailbox
desc: You've got mail! People can write you private messages with this.

name: ATM Machine
desc: Your very own Automated teller machine...machine. This device is not FDIC insured. It does, however, spit out a random number of gems about once a day!

name: Destructo Ray
desc: Dr. Destructo's unstoppable beam of annihilation.

name: Stick Horse
desc: Clop clop clop. Coconuts not included.

name: Tumbleweed Attractor
desc: Static electricity in this bracelet draws tumbleweeds toward you. One, at least.

name: Six Shooter

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: Did I shoot five bullets or six? Doesn't much matter, since in Growtopia you can just keep shooting forever!

name: Tiny Appaloosa
desc: It's possible this is actually a dalmation, but you can still ride it! It's faster than walking.

name: Parasol
desc: The dainty way to slow your fall! Hold the jump button while falling to keep the parasol open.

name: Cowboy Hat
desc: Yeehaw! Git along little horsies which may be doggies!

name: War Paint
desc: Strike fear into the hearts of your enemies, until they realize you just put your lipstick on really badly.

name: Face Bandana
desc: When you don't want anyone to recognize your chin, this is a perfect disguise.

name: Sheriff's Vest
desc: Round up the badguys with this enduring symbol of authority. Comes with adorable kerchief.

name: Cowboy Boots
desc: We've attached specialized Safety Spurs to these boots, so you don't hurt anybody. Please respect other peoples' ankles.

name: Kansas Curls
desc: These lovely golden locks make you look like a right purty damsel.

name: Corset
desc: Feeling fat? You could exercise... or you could just cram your gut into one of these! Oh sure, you may end up with spinal deformities, but beauty demands pain!

name: Layer Cake Dress
desc: Your girl. She's not very good. She made you a dress that looks like you bought it in a store.

name: Western Building
desc: This isn't a real building, it's just a painted piece of plywood.

name: Saloon Doors
desc: When you really need to make an entrance, you can slam these open. Just don't get shot doing it.

name: Western Banner
desc: I don't know what language this is, but they spoke it in the old west.

name: Buffalo
desc: You really don't want a home where these guys roam. You can milk a buffalo once a day or so!

name: Rustic Fence
desc: This is an ideal place to lean while chewing on straw and saying "Yep." It also keeps animals in place.

name: Campfire
desc: Gather round and sing songs of days of yore...

name: Secret Of Growtopia
desc: On this paper is scrawled a deep secret of Growtopia. But to read the mystic scrawls, you must throw the paper to the winds! I don't know, that's just how it works. One of those secrets of Growtopia, I guess.

name: Transmog Crystal
desc: This mysterious crystal has the power to transform one object into another, but only in the fiery furnace of a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven.

name: Chinese Lantern
desc: A soothing dim light for evening festivities. You can punch this to turn it on or off.

name: Songpyeon
desc: This sweet steamed rice cake is said to lead to a bright future for whoever eats it. Eat up! You can also mix it with Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Harmony Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. "Harmony" is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Harvest Moon Blast
desc: The amazing lunar device will create a new world with a unique harvest moon background, filled with random trees ready to harvest!

name: Ultra Grow Spray
desc: Spray a tree to instantly grow it to full size! Can only grow 30 day's growth at the most, but that's longer than almost any item takes.

name: Scarecrow
desc: Notice how there are NO crows around? This thing is working!

name: Sky Lantern
desc: Release this lantern into the wind to celebrate the harvest!

name: Hand Scythe
desc: This creepy blade can chop down trees with great precision - you'll get twice as much fruit! The only downside is that it's highly likely to break when used. It has no effect (but won't break either!) on trees of rarity 100 or more.

name: Yellow Hanbok Top
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Purple Hanbok Top
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Green Hanbok Top
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Pink Hanbok Skirt
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Blue Hanbok Skirt
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Orange Hanbok Skirt
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Yellow Hanbok Pants
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Purple Hanbok Pants
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Green Hanbok Pants
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Festival Hair Bun
desc: Classy and festive at the same time.

name: Gat
desc: This style of hat is cleverly strapped to your head so it won't blow away.

name: Moon Mask
desc: Look at that cheesy grin.

name: Peace Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. "Peace" is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Longevity Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. "Longevity" is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Prosperity Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. "Prosperity" is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Pillar
desc: Add a touch of class to your architecture! Also, keep it from falling down.

name: Sequoia Tree
desc: These massive trees live for thousands of years. Please don't punch them.

name: Foliage
desc: You can't see the forest for this stuff.

name: Amphora
desc: This ancient greek vase could be filled with just about anything! But my bet is on gems and possibly a seed.

name: Potted Daisy
desc: This daisy is in a pot. Pretty simple, really.

name: Innie Block
desc: Way trippy!

name: Outie Block
desc: Tres trippy.

name: Dragon Tail
desc: We warned you to stay away from the toxic waste barrels.

name: Clown Shoes
desc: You want respect, you gotta EARN it. Or wear these shoes. BAM, instant respect.

name: Clown Pants
desc: They come complete with suspenders! Which is a good thing, since they're a BIT big.

name: Plain White Tee
desc: Just the basics!

name: Clown Nose
desc: HONK HONK

name: Crazy Purple Hair
desc: It's just crazy, man.

name: Foam Finger
desc: If you wear this, then YOU'RE #1! YOU'RE #1! YOU'RE #1!

name: Rocket Thruster
desc: Caution: Contents may be hot.

name: Solar Panel
desc: Green power all the way!

name: Martian Soil
desc: Mars is dirty.

name: Mars Rock
desc: This is a rock from Mars.

name: Mars Blast
desc: This amazing device will create a new world... Mars, to be exact!

name: Martian Tree
desc: I planted a tree, and it grew up so big, it grew two sizes up from an extra-large Squig! The tree had blue puffs at the end of each branch, so under the puffs we did the Zorbity Dance!

name: Astronaut Pack

func.add: You can fly!! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: This contains all the essentials you need for a successful extravehicular activity trip, including a book of sudoku. It also makes you jump like you're on the moon.

name: Space Suit
desc: Multiple layers offer protection against cold, vacuum, radiation, and parasitic alien infestation. Of course it's also sleeveless, so....?

name: Space Pants
desc: A space suit isn't going to protect you very well if you don't put on pants too.

name: Moon Boots
desc: It's just one small step for a Growtopian, one giant leap for Growtopia.

name: Astronaut Helmet
desc: Now you can be one of those creepy astronauts with a chrome-plated face, where nobody knows who you are and what you're up to.

name: Zorbnik Leash
desc: ZYERBLRB! This little zorbnik will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because it's tied to your wrist.

name: Zorbnik DNA
desc: You can't do much with just some Zorbnik DNA... unless you collect 10 Zorbnik DNA and use them all together, that is.

name: Space Connector
desc: Got things in space you want to stick together? Nothing works better than a space connector.

name: White Wallpaper
desc: It's a White Block squashed flat!

name: Black Wallpaper
desc: Its a Black Block squashed flat.

name: Porthole
desc: Wow, the view from up here is simply amazing!

name: Forcefield
desc: This directed energy field has the power to function as solid matter for people who aren't invited, while being completely permeable to anyone else. I guess that makes it a door.

name: Compu Panel
desc: This technology is incredibly advanced - you could run an entire starship on this Compu Panel! If you had any idea what any of the buttons did.

name: Vampire Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: This cape imparts mystical powers upon its wearer.

name: Slick Black Hair
desc: You must have a really greasy pillow.

name: Vampire Fangs

func.add: You don't vant to pronounce w's.

desc: Wearing these impedes lip movement just enough to induce a Transylvanian accent.

name: Vamp Vest
desc: Looks like you won the gold medal in bloodsucking.

name: Rollback Plaque II
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards again and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. Oct 2013

name: Aimster's Nightmare
desc: Shouldn't this belong to INightmareI?

name: Skeletal Horsie
desc: Did you forget to feed your horse again?

name: Spiritual Resonator
desc: This miraculous device allows you to commune with spirits from the Other Side.

name: Hockey Mask
desc: Surely you're just a big sports fan... right? Right?

name: Mummy Mask
desc: It's hard to speak through these bandages!

name: Skull Mask
desc: You're bad to the bone.

name: Wolfman Mask
desc: The fun bonus is that you can take this off, and then you're wearing your "daytime wolfman mask". It's almost 2 masks in one!

name: Black Cat Leash
desc: Meow! The bad thing about wearing this leash is that you end up with a black cat constantly crossing your path.

name: Creepy Hair
desc: Your hair's such a mess, you look like you just stepped out of a TV.

name: Haunted House
desc: Is it just your imagination... or are the walls actually stretching?

name: Jack O' Lantern
desc: I think this pumpkin is haunted... when you punch it, spooky music comes out!

name: Pumpkin Block
desc: This pumpkin was grown inside a square box.

name: Jack O' Block
desc: This pumpkin was grown inside a square box, and then carved up.

name: Lit Jack O' Block
desc: This pumpkin was grown inside a square box, and then carved, and then had a lit candle put inside.

name: Focused Eyes
desc: These eyes are a bit shocking.

name: Devil Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You don't jump higher than with normal wings, but man, you do look pretty cool.

name: Candy Corn
desc: Every year, they collect all the uneaten Candy Corn and store it again, to be given out the next year.

name: Weather Machine - Spooky
desc: Darkness falls across the land... The midnight hour is close at hand...

name: Lock of Black Fur
desc: Not much by itself, but if you had 25 of these, I bet you could mush them together into something pretty good! Or a gross hairball.

name: Familiar Leash
desc: Mrow HISS! This black cat contains the very essence of dark magic. Unfortunately, it's a cat, so you can't get it to use the magic for you.

name: Cultist Hood
desc: You look a little shady in this thing...

name: Cultist Robe
desc: Just the thing to worship Growganoth in!

name: Sigil Of K'Tesh
desc: Unlike the Sigil of John Tesh, which is smooth and jazzy, this arcane emblem grants you favor with Growganoth. Sadly, that means it will teleport you directly into his gaping maw.

name: Creepstone Platform
desc: These stones were mined in an alternate dimension where rocks float in the air.

name: Disabled Platform
desc: A creepstone Platform turned off. Not for players.

name: Evil Eye
desc: Don't let it look at you! Luckily it is very near-sighted so you'd have to actually touch it for it to see. Which would kill you, by the way.

name: Green Dragon Mask

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: Greenswe is indecisive, but stylish.

name: Frankenhair
desc: Did you stick your finger in a light socket?

name: Sonar Bracelet
desc: Meep meep! This bracelet attracts bats. Well, a bat.

name: Devil Wing Fragment
desc: Collect 4 of these fragments and see what happens!

name: Boney Block
desc: They're not fat, they're just big-boned.

name: Cobweb
desc: So sticky AUGHH!!!

name: Heart Monitor
desc: Place this device and anybody can watch it to see if you are online! Or alive. Note: it can't actually tell if you're alive. But it will beep if you are online!

name: Scrub Cap
desc: Keep your hair out of your eyes while performing surgery with this sterile cap.

name: Scrub Mask
desc: Stop spreading your germs around!

name: Scrub Top
desc: Special sterilized clothes, for chopping folks up!

name: Scrub Pants
desc: Even your knees need to be kept sterile when you are operating.

name: Bride Of Reanimator Remote
desc: Its wife is ALLLLIIVVVVEEE!!!

name: Magnifying Glass
desc: This has over 10,000,000x magnification, allowing you to clearly see the virus that is ... wait is that virus following you around? RUN!

name: Retro Magnifying Glass
desc: This has over 10,000,000x magnification, allowing you to clearly see the retrovirus that is totally grooving on your vibes.

name: Hospital Bed
desc: Lay in this bed and one of our doctors will see to you as soon as possible.

name: Surgical Sponge
desc: Used only in surgery. If you make a mess, a sponge can suck it up easily!

name: Surgical Scalpel
desc: Used only in surgery. Use this to cut people open!

name: Surgical Anesthetic
desc: Used only in surgery. You probably don't want to operate on somebody unless they are unconscious. Use this to knock them out!

name: Surgical Antiseptic
desc: Used only in surgery. Don't mix this up with the Anesthetic! This is used for cleaning an area before you cut it open.

name: Surgical Antibiotics
desc: Used only in surgery. If someone gets an infection, antibiotics should clear it up.

name: Surgical Splint
desc: Used only in surgery. If somebody has a broken bone, you better splint it up or it'll heal all crooked.

name: Surgical Stitches
desc: Used only in surgery. Bandages are included too, for lesser injuries. Use these to close up after performing surgery, or repair existing cuts and bleeding

name: Ambulance
desc: For the sake of your fellow Growtopians, we limited the siren. But you can still enjoy the flashing lights!

name: Edison Zoomster
desc: Only the chief of surgery can afford a speedy electric car like this!

name: Punch Jammer
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this prevents people from punching each other in your world.

name: Zombie Jammer
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this prevents zombies from infecting anyone in your world.

name: Birth Certificate
desc: A little white-out, a little scribbling, and voila, you'll have a new name! Use this item to change your GrowID permanently. Can only be used once every 60 days. Requires a GrowID. Is consumed when used.

name: Candy Striper Cap
desc: Red wig included. And stapled on.

name: Candy Striper Uniform
desc: I wonder where on earth this nurse's uniform gets its name from...

name: Candy Striper Skirt
desc: This is also nice if you want to work at the kind of burger restaurant the requires Pieces of Flair from its wait staff.

name: Hospital Curtain
desc: This helps maintain your privacy when you are undergoing delicate medical procedures.

name: Hospital Wall
desc: The soothing pale yellow tone and complete lack of anything interesting helps speed healing and make people want to get out of there.

name: Hospital Window
desc: Looking out at nature is supposed to help you recover.

name: Hospital Door
desc: This door is designed to be easy to push open when you're rolling a body around on a cart. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Surgical Gloves
desc: This item doesn't really exist, just using its icon for surgery menu.

name: Cutaway Building
desc: If you want to make an interior view of a building, you can use these blocks to show the walls and floors!

name: Roshambo Block
desc: Punch it to roll Rock, Paper, or Scissors. What you do with the resulting information is entirely up to you!

name: Cow Cube
desc: This cow is squarer than most.

name: Staircase
desc: Sometimes it's nice to climb a staircase instead of hopping up platforms. Unfortunately, you'll also have to hop up the staircase - Growtopians can't climb.

name: Terracotta Pot
desc: You should plant your trees in these. It's just classier.

name: Climbing Vine
desc: These vines can grow to extraordinary heights. Provided you place Climbing Vine blocks up to extraordinary heights.

name: Thingamajig
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Bushy Beard
desc: You look like you should be in charge of magical animals with this beard.

name: Ponytail
desc: Unlike an actual pony, your tail grows out of the back of your head.

name: Happy Sun Shirt
desc: Take joy in the great glowing orb that provides energy for all those toilet trees to grow!

name: Blue Sun Shirt
desc: "Well, what you plan and what takes place ain't ever exactly been similar."

name: Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... well, this is an old-school raptor!

name: Cliffside
desc: If your friends all jumped off of this, would you?

name: Rock Platform
desc: It's like a Wooden Platform that's been sitting outside since prehistoric times.

name: Cave Entrance
desc: Who knows what lurks inside? I guess whoever placed it and used a wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Prehistoric Palm
desc: Much like people, palm trees started out short and squat before evolving to be tall and skinny. Unlike palm trees, people then ate Twinkies and watched TV until they were tubby again.

name: Caveman Club

func.add: Float like a butterfly, sting like a punch in the face.

desc: We've come a long way in methods of settling disputes, but this technique still works.

name: Sabertooth-Skin Toga
desc: Clothing so stylish it'll make you shout "Rabble Dabble Goo!" - you know, to make sure you don't get sued.

name: Caveman Hair
desc: The chicken grease helps the bone stay in, and it adds luster.

name: Sabertooth Growtopian
desc: I think you've gone feral.

name: Cavewoman Hair
desc: The chicken grease helps the bone stay in, and it adds luster.

name: Fuzzy Bikini Top
desc: Is it for cold weather or warm weather? Who knows! It's the world's smallest parka.

name: Fuzzy Bikini Bottom
desc: It's kind of itchy.

name: Ice Cube
desc: This is very ancient ice, shipped from a glacier. Don't just use it to cool your drink!

name: Frozen DNA Fragment A
desc: Hey, there's some prehistoric DNA stuck in this ice! Most likely you'd ruin it by punching it. But maybe there's a chance...

name: Frozen DNA Fragment B
desc: Hey, there's some prehistoric DNA stuck in this ice! Most likely you'd ruin it by punching it. But maybe there's a chance...!

name: Mini Mammoth Leash
desc: The word "mammoth" has really lost all meaning at this point.

name: Whatchamacallit
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Kerjigger
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Snowy Rocks
desc: Or is it Rocky Snow? It's not. The snow is on top.

name: Candy Cane Block
desc: You just wanna lick 'em!

name: Winter Gift
desc: The joy of giving! You can use this on yourself to open it and get a surprise, or use it on another player to give it to them. If you are feeling extra cheerful, you can also give it to The Growch!

name: Candy Cane Fence
desc: This fence is terrible for keeping kids off of your lawn

name: Weather Machine - Snowy
desc: Man, the weather outside is frightful.

name: Dumb Friend
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Snowball

func.add: Your body has turned to ice. You can't move!

desc: Brrr! Toss this at a player to freeze them briefly.

name: Festivus Pole
desc: Tinsel is so distracting. Celebrate with an unadorned aluminium pole.

name: Giant Candle
desc: This candle is enormous, but not hot enough to do any real harm.

name: Tangyuan
desc: This dumpling soup is warm and toasty to keep you punching, building, and growing during the winter.

name: Yeonnalligi
desc: Fly this colorful kite to ring in the new year.

name: Ice Dragon Hand
desc: Another of the Dragons of Legend! Please be aware the legends may have been a bit exaggerated.

name: Elf Hat
desc: Hey hey hey!

name: Antler Hat
desc: The red checkers alert other hunters not to shoot you, but the antlers make you a prime target. We've scientifically designed this hat to ensure that your odds of being shot remain precisely the same as if you weren't wearing it. Note: Wearing this also makes guns and bows kill you!

name: Glowing Nose
desc: Warning: Wearing this could result in exclusion from reindeer games.

name: Buckskin Hood
desc: So warm and toasty! It's like you sliced open a deer and crawled inside.

name: Buckskin Jacket
desc: So warm and toasty! It's like you sliced open a deer and crawled inside.

name: Holiday Gift Box
desc: People can drop gifts into this box for you to pickup later!

name: Buckskin Pants
desc: So warm and toasty! It's like you sliced open a deer and crawled inside.

name: Polar Bear Leash
desc: If you look out your window and see this guy, you are looking south. Or at a zoo. Or at somebody playing Growtopia.

name: Doohickey
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Inviso-Block
desc: These blocks cannot be seen. Thus they cannot be used by players because that would be a nightmare.

name: Mini Growtopian
desc: Ah, he just wants to tag along!

name: Thermonuclear Blast
desc: Use this fabulous device to create a brand new world that is completely empty, except for bedrock and a white door.

name: Door Mover
desc: Use this fabulous device anywhere in a world you have world-locked to move the White Door to a new location. There must be an empty space where you tap and another empty space below it for this to work.

name: Skyrocket
desc: Celebrate the holidays by firing off colorful rockets!

name: Party Pants
desc: PARTY DOWNNNN

name: Party Vest
desc: PARTY DOWN!!!!

name: Party Hat
desc: PARTY DOWN!!!!

name: Party Horn
desc: PBBBBBLLLLTTTT DOWN!!!!

name: Party Socks
desc: PARTY DOWN!!!!

name: Party Glasses
desc: PARTY DOWN!!!!

name: Mannequin
desc: Dress up your mannequin with clothes! Use your wrench to change the sign on it.

name: Display Box
desc: Drop items for sale in these handy boxes! Only players with access to the lock can pick them up!

name: World Key
desc: If you trade this to another player while in a world that you own, they will become the owner of your World Lock! Use it to trade worlds safely.

name: For Sale Sign
desc: Tell people what you're selling! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Gem Sign
desc: Say something about Gems on this sign. I guess? Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Shop Sign
desc: Let everyone know youre running a shop! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Exclamation Sign
desc: Excited about something? Let people know! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Cash Register
desc: Punch it to ring cup a sale!

name: Security Camera
desc: This camera will watch your world and keep a record of everybody who enters! You may have up to 8 of these in a world.

name: Golden Pickaxe

func.add: You can smash bricks more quickly.

desc: This tool, made to honor Diichaan's service as a moderator, is worth more than the stuff you mine with it!

name: Evil Space Helmet
desc: Found in a teeny-tiny spaceship, this helmet is surprisingly normal-sized. What brave star traveler could have worn this?

name: Burning Face
desc: Styx has a burning sensation.

name: Frosty Hair
desc: Brr! This shivering style is only for the coldest of the cold. Whoever created it must have been a chilly soul indeed - where could they be now?

name: Open Sign
desc: You can punch this to switch it between Open and Closed! Let people know if you're around.

name: Television
desc: Yes kids, TVs really used to look like this! And they didn't have color screens! And they showed westerns! GET OFF OF MY LAWN!

name: Couch
desc: Just the thing to watch your TV on. Except your TV can only face the opposite direction.

name: Donation Box
desc: People can insert or put donations or gifts into the box for you to pickup later or keep it.

name: Meaty Apron
desc: Kiss the cook!

name: Gold Chain
desc: I pity the fool who doesn't wear a set of these.

name: Golden Heart Crystal
desc: This crystal can be combined with 200 Candy Hearts and any Valentines Clothing in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to infuse the clothing with gold magic!

name: Golden Angel Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Better than a Halo, these will actually let you Double Jump! Plus they're shiny!

name: Golden Diaper
desc: If you find yourself lost in a world without any Toilet Seeds, you'll be glad you have this. Plus it's shiny!

name: Golden Heartbow

func.add: Blast blocks from farther away! Weaker damage than punch though.

desc: Once used by Cupid himself, this bow shoots golden hearts! You can yank other players toward you with it. Plus it's shiny!

name: Golden Diamond Necklace
desc: Sparkles with the undying light of eternal love. Plus it's shiny!

name: Emerald Necklace
desc: Emeralds are May's birthstone. This particular one is lab-created, which you'd think is less classy, but they're much prettier.

name: Ruby Necklace
desc: It's a red rock on a metal string. But I guess people like that!

name: Microwave
desc: This is a quick and handy way to cook food. Or do SCIENCE!

name: Eggs Benedict

func.add: 25% chance of double XP for all actions.

desc: Eating these makes you smarter, so you can get more eggs-perience! Food Buff: 25% chance of double XP from all actions.

name: Ducky Pajama Pants
desc: There's ducks on these pants!!!

name: Ducky Pajama Top
desc: There's ducks on this shirt!!!

name: Window Curtains
desc: It's curtains for these windows! Lacy, gently wafting curtains.

name: Wall Clock
desc: Tell time in Growtopia! This clock displays the current Growtopia Time for you.

name: Atomic Shadow Scythe
desc: So sharp it can slice atoms, this scythe is part shadow and all malice. The first person to wield it must have been very, very evil.

name: Growtoken
desc: You can earn these from Crazy Jim and Sales-Man - try dialing 12345 or 53785 on your Telephone for details! Spend them in the store on special items! If you have 100 Growtokens you can tap them in your inventory to combine them into a Mega Growtoken!

name: Experience Potion
desc: Drink this fizzy potion to gain 10,000 XP instantly! Only works on yourself, no pouring it down other peoples' throats.

name: Weather Machine - Nothingness
desc: Punch this to eradicate all light from the universe. This sensitive technology will not function when damaged.

name: Doodad
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: ERROR!
desc: Please contact support to fix this item!

name: Rushboard
desc: Just like they predicted, we finally have hoverboards in 2014! Well, virtual ones.

name: Purple Stuff
desc: Yuck, purple stuff?! I'd rather drink imitation orange beverage.

name: Orange Stuff
desc: On second thought, orange stuff seems kinda gross too. But you can freeze it into a lovely block.

name: Winter Scarf
desc: This scarf is made of fuzzy aquamarine yarn with little sparklies on it. It's tres chic.

name: Old-Timey Hat
desc: If you're a grizzled old prospector, this is surely the hat for you. Also useful for hard-boiled reporters who always get their story.

name: Medical Scarf
desc: These elaborate scarves may only be worn by medical professionals (or anyone else with the title "Doctor").

name: Blarney Stone
desc: Players that touch this get a Blarney Pebble.

name: Blarney Pebble
desc: The legend goes that if you gather up ten of these pebbles, you can charm a leprechaun to be your friend!

name: Pet Leprechaun
desc: He's hidden a pot of gold somewhere... but you'll never find it!

name: Celtic Block
desc: Twisty.

name: Black-Rimmed Glasses
desc: These stylish glasses can be custom matched to any prescription.

name: Diving Bell
desc: Protect yourself from the crushing pressures of the great deep in this steel helmet. Of course, if you wear a normal wetsuit, you could end up sucked up into the helmet and crushed to death. So, you know, watch for that.

name: Great White Shark
desc: They say a shark can never stop swimming, but this particular shark can never stop swimming in place.

name: Jellyfish
desc: Beware of the painful sting of this sea creature! Also beware of the folk remedies for fixing it...

name: Wetsuit Pants
desc: Lay off the donuts, because these things are skin tight!

name: Wetsuit Top
desc: Lay off donuts, because this thing is skin-tight!

name: Sunken Anchor
desc: I guess a ship somewhere is flying free, never to settle down in one place again.

name: Giant Clam
desc: Store your treasures inside by dropping them! When it's closed, the items are hidden. Punch to open it.

name: Undersea Blast
desc: Use this astounding device to create an entirely new undersea world. Water included!

name: Cuddly Piranha
desc: He won't stay in his bowl because he LIKES you! This is one fish you'll never forget.

name: Deep Sand
desc: This sand is all mucked up with gross deep ocean stuff.

name: Deep Rock
desc: It's like a rock, but deeper.

name: Mid-Pacific Owl
desc: This friendly pet owl will fall asleep on your head if you don't keep him entertained! Dedicated to the students of the Mid-Pacific Institute.

name: Battle Trout

func.rem: You're making better life choices now.

desc: Why, it's a dead fish. And you're holding it. Oooookayyyy

name: Green Bowtie
desc: Bowties are cool.

name: Green Pageboy
desc: This is NOT a helmet, don't call it a helmet! But if you want to use it as a helmet, go ahead. It's hair though.

name: Easter Bonnet
desc: This fashionable accessory matches ANY outfit with style.

name: Bubble Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: With a pair of wings, you can double-jump! With these wings, you can also bubble.

name: Pet Bunny
desc: bunny bunny bunny bunny bunny bunny

name: Pastel Pink Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Orange Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Yellow Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Green Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Aqua Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Blue Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Pastel Purple Flower Block
desc: A daisier shade of pastel.

name: Lucky Pinata Hat
desc: Not only is this hat festive and suitable for formal occasions, but wearing it when you break an Ultra Pinata will reward you with a personal gift from The Great Burro!

name: Mariachi Guitar
desc: When you /dance with this, you can perform for your friends!

name: Churro Block
desc: The sweetest of blocks - crispy, chewy, cinnamony, delicious.

name: Parrot Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Polly want a double jump?

name: Fiesta Dragon
desc: This ferocious beast spews deadly PARTY at your enemies.

name: Party Cactus
desc: A dangerously happenin' plant! Do not touch.

name: Burrito
desc: Mmmm, rolled up food. Who cares what's inside? There's a TORTILLA!

name: Pink Cadillac
desc: There's nothing quite like cruising the Vegas strip in a pink Cadillac!

name: Mystery Pinata
desc: Put this on top of a bunch of items you want to give away. Once placed, anybody can break it and get the items! The mystery is that certain items will transform into something more festive when it explodes...

name: Pet Burrito
desc: So fuzzy! This is not to be eaten.

name: Clapboard
desc: The loud clacking sound this can produce is useful for syncing up audio with video. We've silenced this particular one for the sake of the other players.

name: 3D Glasses
desc: It's like Growtopia is COMING RIGHT AT YOU!

name: Black Beret
desc: Nobody understands your genius.

name: Theater Curtain
desc: Raise it up and start the show! Note: You can't raise it up.

name: GHX Speaker
desc: The audience is listening. And possibly being deafened.

name: Marquee Block
desc: Put your name up in lights! Letters not included, but hey, there's lights.

name: Director's Chair
desc: Sit down and tell everybody what to do.

name: Mint Julep
desc: Mmm, minty! With a hint of julep. Go horsey go!!

name: Theater Seat
desc: Down in front!!

name: Movie Screen
desc: Today's movie is entitled "The Polar Bear In A Snowstorm What Found A Piece Of Paper". It's an art film.

name: Movie Camera
desc: Film your own youtube videos! By using some sort of screen capture program, that is. This completely fake camera isn't going to help at all.

name: Red Glass Block
desc: People inside this should not throw stones, and they will be tinted red.

name: Blue Glass Block
desc: People inside this should not throw stones, and they will be tinted blue.

name: Growie Award
desc: Congratulations! Your film has been selected as the best picture of the week! Or you just bought this trophy from someone else like a common peasant.

name: Staging Platform
desc: If a player stands on this, they have first priority on joining a Game. Use your wrench to set which team this platform will assign them to!

name: Game Block
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this block belongs to! During a Game, the block can be smashed according to the Game rules, and it will rebuild after the game ends.

name: Busted Game Block
desc: This Game Block has been smashed. It will rebuild when the Game is over.

name: Game Flag
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this flag belongs to! During a Game, players can steal enemy flags and deliver them to their own Game Goals.

name: Missing Game Flag
desc: This Flag has been taken! It will return when the Game is over...

name: Carried Game Flag
desc: A flag being carried by a player.

name: Derpy Star Block
desc: DERP, IM A SUPERSTAR!

name: Lava Cube
desc: DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Coffee Maker
desc: These special slow-roasted beans are roasted so slowly that you can only get a cup of coffee once a day!

name: Coffee
desc: This'll put some pep in your step! And some verve in your nerve! But not that much pizzazz in your jazz.

name: Awkward Friendly Unicorn
desc: This unicorn is going through an awkward stage right now, but it's happy to be your friend. It'll even give you a present about once a week!

name: Unicorn Horn
desc: This pretty much rules out the possibility of hats, but it's so glowy!.

name: Very Bad Unicorn
desc: This is the kind of unicorn your parents warned you about.

name: Horse Mask
desc: These things are just creepy. I don't get the appeal.

name: Unicorn Jumper
desc: A gift from your friendly neighborhood unicorn!

name: Happy Unicorn Block
desc: This block is happy, and prominently features a unicorn.

name: Unicorn Garland
