desc: This magical garland from the mystic land of Unicornopialandburg joins your soul with that of a unicorn. Great for you, but for the unicorn it's pretty much slavery. Not cool, dude.

name: Pink Hair
desc: Oh, is that your natural color?

name: Aqua Hair
desc: It takes a liberal dose of Aqua Net to make it look like this.

name: Evil Brick Background
desc: Thankfully, these Evil Bricks are further away than the usual kind.

name: Game Grave
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this block belongs to! During a Game, players of that team will respawn here.

name: Game Goal
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this block belongs to! During a Game, you may want to bring Flags here, or just reach here yourself, depending on the rules.

name: Game Generator
desc: This machine generates games for people to play! Use your wrench on it to set up the game rules and start the game.

name: Spike Juice

func.add: You are briefly immune to spikes and lava

desc: By carefully drinking small amounts of Death Spikes, you can build up a tolerance! Well, what you can actually do is be immune to Lava and Death Spikes for 5 seconds.

name: Barbecue Grill
desc: It's summertime, why do your cooking indoors? Also, you can mix chemicals in here. I'm sure that's perfectly safe.

name: Sea Monster Floatie
desc: Blow it up and take a swim!

name: Water Wings
desc: Not a strong swimmer? Strap these on so at least your arms will stay above water as you drown.

name: Summer Kite
desc: Fly this colorful kite to celebrate summertime!

name: Rainbow Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Somewhere over the rainbow is a Growtopian, flapping away. These let you double jump. Sponsored by Oricho and Oriche.

name: Phoenix Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Is it hot in here, or is it just you? These wings let you double jump! There are only 500 in existence! Don't throw them away!

name: Squirt Gun

func.add: Squirt blocks from farther away! But weaker than punching.

desc: Squirt your friends with this usually harmless weapon! Or load it with hydrochloric acid and use it to dissolve metal, it works equallywell. Longer ranger than normal punches, but less damage.

name: Sandcastle
desc: Enjoy it while you can, before the tide comes in.

name: Super Fireworks
desc: This Omega-class firework is actually illegal in all countries. All of them. LAUNCH IT ANYWAY!!! Like cereal, it comes with a special prize inside. Note: it will use up 200 Fireworks from your inventory to ignite the Saturn V thruster it uses.

name: Gateway To Adventure
desc: You can set this door up like a Choose Your Own Adventure story! Type up to 5 lines of story, and then add up to 5 buttons for players to choose from, with Door IDs that they lead to.

name: Path Marker
desc: Use these sort of like Doors - They have IDs, so Doors can lead to them, though you cant travel from them. Use your wrench to set their ID.

name: Pith Helmet
desc: Dr. Koop, I presume?

name: Safari Jacket
desc: The comfortable fit you need to run away from giant rolling boulders.

name: Jodhpurs
desc: Do these pants make my butt look fat?

name: Adventuring Mustache
desc: Wot wot too right tally ho jolly good ermf ermf

name: Adventure Item - Rope
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Adventure Item - Key
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Adventure Item - Golden Idol
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Adventure Item - Banana
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world. Also useful in Gateway To Adventure!

name: Adventure Item - Torch
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Explorer's Ponytail
desc: This sensible hairstyle minimizes the number of cobwebs that stick to you when exploring ancient tombs. The glasses also help you avoid them in the first place.

name: Lazy Cobra
desc: This species features the deadliest venom of any snake in the world, capable of instantly killing a Growtopian. This is counterbalanced by the fact that it is too lazy to pursue prey at all, simply waiting for people to walk up and touch it.

name: Explorer's Shovel

func.add: You can smash bricks more quickly.

desc: This is not a whole lot different from a garden shovel, but holding it makes you feel adventurous. It also lets you dig faster than you can by punching dirt. I still don't get why punching dirt works at all.

name: Keytar

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: You can't punch when holding this, you're too busy ROCKING! Punch anywhere to play music. If you punch to your left or right, you can bend the note higher or lower. Punch in your own column to play the same notes that Sheet Music: Piano Note plays.

name: Bass Guitar

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: You can't punch when holding this, you're too busy ROCKING! Punch anywhere to play music. If you punch to your left or right, you can bend the note higher or lower. Punch in your own column to play the same notes that Sheet Music: Bass Note plays.

name: Tambourine

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: You can't punch when holding this, you're too busy ROCKING! Punch anywhere to play drums. If you punch to your left or right, you can play different drums. Punch in your own column to play the same drums that Sheet Music: Drums plays.

name: Flat-top
desc: Keep that haircut regulation, soldier!

name: Starchild Makeup
desc: You came down from a distant planet, to conquer the Earth with the power of ROCK.

name: Shredded T-Shirt
desc: This shirt isn't ruined, it's COOL.

name: Leopard Leggings
desc: These are the easiest pants to do leaping splits in, if that happens to be important to you. I mean, you might as well jump. Go ahead and jump.

name: Drumkit
desc: You're a rock star. Smack this to pound out some sick beats.

name: Rock N' Roll Wallpaper
desc: It's like your wallpaper is on fire, in the dark. WHOOOOOOOOOoooooo!

name: Stage Support
desc: Use these to build your stage for the ultimate rock show.

name: Mega Rock Speaker
desc: Your worlds doesn't have enough voltage to actually power speakers of this size, but they sure LOOK loud!

name: Rockin' Headband
desc: When you rock, you sweat. Soak it up!

name: Kuma-boshi
desc: Akiko's extra special hat.

name: Knight Helmet
desc: This helmet was forged by the awesome art god Hamumu. Sponsored by Knightmare.

name: Crystal Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Though less flexible than your average cape, this is a whole lot sparklier. Allows you to double jump off an imaginary Crystal Block. Sponsored by Edvoid20, Heme, and Aboge.

name: StarBoard
desc: Just like they predicted, we finally have hoverboards in 2014! Well, virtual ones. Sponsored by Miwsky, Chudy, and Dawid.

name: Puppy Leash
desc: Berf! This little puppy is modeled after Hamumu's dog Mia, and can also be found in the fabulous smash hit Flash game Mia's Happy Day! Go play it!

name: Brown Wallpaper
desc: It's a Brown Block squashed flat at last!

name: Fuel Pack
desc: This backpack contains volatile fuels you can use to power a flamethrower!

name: Flamethrower

func.add: You can torch stuff at the cost of 1 Fuel Pack per shot!

desc: The deadliest weapon in Growtopia! The downside is that you need to wear a Fuel Pack to use it, and it uses up 1 Fuel Pack every single punch. KILL IT WITH FIRE!

name: Weather Machine - Warp Speed
desc: This machine will send your entire world hurtling through space at warp speed. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Guestbook
desc: Lets people communicate by leaving messages to each other.

name: Flatscreen TV
desc: This tasteful TV hangs on your wall like a picture. A picture that moves and sings!

name: Tiger Block
desc: Be sure to point out any protestors that this is faux tigerskin. You don't want to end up with Red Blocks instead!

name: Growboard
desc: Just like they predicted, we finally have hoverboards in 2014! Well, virtual ones. This one spits fire. Sponsored by Coinman, iOliver, and Legomanz.

name: Spiritfire Mask
desc: For the less technologically-inclined, this mask relies on black magic to raise an evil spirit.

name: Soda Jetpack

func.add: You can fly!! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: Use the power of carbonation to leap tall buildings in a single bound, and then drift gently to Earth. Comes with a lifetime supply of soda, connected via wormhole for continuous refueling.

name: Dominatus Moderateus

func.add: You are very pale and fuzzy.

desc: Could there be more than one cult in Growtopia? Sponsored by Moderate.

name: Seagull
desc: These extra-strong seagulls can carry the full weight of a Growtopian! Hop on!

name: Pacifier
desc: Oh, grow up.

name: Flower Checkpoint
desc: If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched!

name: Bubble Gum
desc: This isn't even wrapped, it probably has all kind of germs on it. Are you really gonna chew it?

name: Diving Board
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Diving Board Support
desc: This part of the diving board is not bouncy at all. Go jump off the unsupported end!

name: Deluxe Grow Spray
desc: Spray a tree to grow it 24 hours worth!

name: Legendbot-009

func.add: You are piloting a legendary robot suit.

desc: This legendary battle armor was the turning point in the war of the Growtopia Valley.

name: Dragon of Legend

func.add: You should be very nice to your pet.

desc: This blade calls forth the Ancient Dragon of Unexaggerated Legends and binds it to your command. It's a biggun'.

name: Legendary Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! Its like flying, but less

desc: Turns out you had to do a lot more than ring a bell to get these suckers.

name: Legen Seed
desc: Wait for it...

name: Dary Seed
desc: Wait for it...

name: Legendary Wizard
desc: This wizard is legendary! Punch or wrench him to obtain Legendary Quests.

name: Great Legendary Orb
desc: Players that touch this get a Legendary Orb.

name: Legendary Orb
desc: This orb is legendary and filled with great power. However, you don't have an adapter for it, so the power isn't any use to you. Perhaps a wizard could use it?

name: Diamond Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. And looks good doing it. Tap on it in your inventory to break it down into 100 World Locks, if you have room in your inventory.

name: Minotaur Mask
desc: MOOOOoooooo.

name: Muscle Suit
desc: It's faster than exercise!

name: Puzzle Brick
desc: This brick is just made out of puzzlingly shaped pieces. It's not much of a puzzle itself. Just a brick.

name: Zeus' Lightning Bolt
desc: It's 1.21 gigawatts in the palm of your hands! Sponsored by Hercule, Dodoman11 and RTsoft Forumers.

name: Chinese Dragon Head
desc: You're lucky, you get to be the head!

name: Chinese Dragon Body
desc: This really adds a lot of body to your hair.

name: Chinese Dragon Tail
desc: Looks like you got stuck with the tail end. Again.

name: Ssireum Shorts - Red
desc: Wear these shorts when you are wrestling! If you play in a Game Pack game, your shorts will change color to match your team.

name: Ssireum Shorts - Blue
desc: Wear these shorts when you are wrestling! If you play in a Game Pack game, your shorts will change color to match your team.

name: Ssireum Shorts - Yellow
desc: Wear these shorts when you are wrestling! If you play in a Game Pack game, your shorts will change color to match your team.

name: Ssireum Shorts - Purple
desc: Wear these shorts when you are wrestling! If you play in a Game Pack game, your shorts will change color to match your team.

name: Ssireum Shorts - Grey
desc: Wear these shorts when you are wrestling! If you play in a Game Pack game, your shorts will change color to match your team.

name: Golden Air Robinsons
desc: These sporty shoes are coated with a layer of pure sparkling gold. Sponsored by Kubeti and Rooted.

name: Autumn Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: A leaf falls still on a pond. These wings let you double jump, and contain an endless supply of dried leaves for some reason!

name: Autumn Bomb
desc: I am become death, the destroyer of foliage. Toss this in the air to celebrate the fall!

name: Balance Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste, in 4 flavors combined with a perfect balance. A random jumble of four symbols is imprinted on the top in ancient Growtopian script. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Harvester

func.rem: You can walk faster than that thing!

desc: This advanced harvesting machine will chop down trees as it runs them over. If you wear a Fuel Pack, it has a 10% chance of harvesting double fruit from each tree below rarity 100! This burns up one Fuel Pack.

name: Sunflower Checkpoint
desc: If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched!

name: Moon Block
desc: With this block, you too can yell at the moon like Buzz Aldrin.

name: Diamond Flashaxe

func.add: You can smash bricks more quickly.

desc: I'm not sure why you're bothering to mine stuff when you already have an entire pickaxe made of diamonds, but at least you know this is harder than whatever you want to mine! Sponsored by Kloe, PartyFrog and xShaDo.

name: Hot Pink Highlights
desc: You got style.

name: Long Black Bangs
desc: This is the hair for people with flawed foreheads.

name: Pink Pageboy
desc: This is NOT a helmet, dont call it a helmet! But if you want to use it as a helmet, go ahead. Its hair though.

name: Long Blonde Bangs
desc: Cover your forehead and shoulders with one fell swoop!

name: Messy Auburn Tresses
desc: It's messy and it's red, what more could you want for hair?

name: Growbans
desc: These are some fierce designer sunglasses!

name: Pink Hair Bow
desc: You're like Ms. Pac-Man without the eating disorder!

name: Butterfly Hair Pin
desc: It looks like a real butterfly! A real robot butterfly.

name: Bee Hair Pin
desc: Psst, I think there's a bee in your hair...

name: Simple Purple Dress
desc: Sometimes simpler is better!

name: Red Sun Dress
desc: It looks like a whole galaxy of suns.

name: Blue Skirt
desc: This skirt is long, and thus classy.

name: Checkered Dress
desc: You are now the referee of fashion.

name: Cardboard Box
desc: The ultimate in stealth technology. Sponsored by JakeShore, ADmex1, and Bankai.

name: Block Glue
desc: Squirt some of this on a block, and neighboring blocks will attach to it, visually. For example, if you glue a block, and there's a Dirt Block below it, the dirt block won't have a green top, because it will think there's a dirt above it! Use glue again to remove it.

name: Violet Protodrake Leash
desc: Congratulations on completing all the holiday achievements! Have a lovely dragon!

name: Hanging Guytrap
desc: This is also what happens when you give a flower a taste for magic bacon!

name: Funhouse Mirror
desc: These mirrors make you look entirely wacky!

name: Ring Of Force

func.add: Your punches are imbued with force!
func.rem: If you liked this mod, you should've put a ring on it.

desc: This ring replaces your punch with a devastating blast of energy that can shatter nearby blocks!

name: Ring Of Winds
desc: This ring floats you on a cloud. Hold the jump button while falling to glide safely down to earth.

name: Carnival Wallpaper
desc: Throw up some of these and you'll feel like you've run away to the circus!

name: Carnival Awning
desc: Step right up and see this amazing square-headed person!

name: Carnival Block
desc: Doot doot doo doo doodle doot doot doo doo...

name: Red Pennant
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Blue Pennant
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Green Pennant
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Yellow Pennant
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Lion Taming Whip
desc: This is a cruel way to get somebody to do what you want. Keep it in video games only!

name: Lion Block
desc: This lion does tricks! You can stand on its head, you can stick your head near its mouth, it can stand near hoops, it can sit, it can even play dead (it pretends that rigor mortis has set in, so it does so sitting up).

name: Elephant Block
desc: This block never forgets anything, but since it has no method of communicating, that feature is completely useless.

name: Golden Ticket
desc: You can spend these at any Carnival game in the world CARNIVAL, if the Carnival happens to be in town.

name: The Ringmaster
desc: This is the master of all rings! Punch or wrench him to obtain Ring Quests.

name: Golden Ticket Booth
desc: Nothing to see here.

name: The One Ring

func.add: No one will take your precious!
func.rem: I guess someone took your precious.

desc: This ring is precious, and if you had pocketses you'd put the ring in them for safekeeping.

name: Carnival Sign
desc: Write stuff on it to tell your friends! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Bullseye
desc: Used in the carnival. When turned on, punch it for points.

name: Carnival Tent
desc: This is like a regular door, except it won't work if the destination is occupied by another player!

name: Carnival Landing
desc: Works the same as path marker.

name: Carnival Platform
desc: A nice way to get up to a highwire to perform an aerial show!

name: Mirror Maze Block
desc: Toggle this on to make it passable. Not usable by players due to confusion madness.

name: Ringmaster Hat
desc: This top hat is a bit rumpled, but it still has a certain rustic panache.

name: Ringmaster Suit
desc: The classic burgundy suit - the essence of style.

name: Fistful Of Rings
desc: None of these rings have any magical powers, but there sure are a lot of them!

name: Orbs Of Elixir
desc: These orbs contain a dark elixir said to be the blood of Growganoth... but it's probably just grape juice. Sponsored by Cukuzz and PikaPi.

name: Blazing Electro Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: It's shocking what they're doing with wings these days. Sponsored by Cukuzz, PikaPi and BigCream.

name: Diamond Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air It's like flying, but less

desc: These things are insanely heavy, I have no idea how you can even walk, let alone jump, with them on. Sponsored by xBone, Paulius, and TheMrSkate.

name: Diamond Rocket Shoes
desc: Shoes made of diamond? I guess you save money on ice skates. Sponsored by CrimsonSwag, Vitality, and Mitcho25.

name: Calliope
desc: Get in the carnival mood with some circus music! Yes, circuses and carnivals are different things. But not really? I did some research on it, I'm still not sure.

name: Diamond Diaper
desc: Well, they're easy to clean! Sponsored by Tiamwatt, Ardims, and Shesherbel.

name: Ice Calf Leash

func.add: Your little friend blasts ice beams.
func.rem: Your friend has flown the coop.

desc: Moo. This frost baby cow will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because its tied to your wrist. Sponsored by Orfeo and Destra.

name: Electro Magnifying Glass
desc: This has over 10,000,000x magnification, allowing you to clearly see the virus that is totally shocking! Sponsored by xSpeedo, Jynttari and PEIJJE.

name: Growley Motorcycle
desc: You look tough when you're riding a Growley Dennison motorcycle!

name: Owlbeard
desc: Blue Dwarf needs owl, badly.

name: Blue Star Shoes
desc: Sparkle like the heavens, twinkle-toes!

name: Chaos Cursed Wand
desc: Not the same as a Curse Wand. This one sucks the souls out of blocks! Sponsored by LOL, dongju, and MUNGSUNG.

name: Genuine Rings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Jenuine's a bit spacey.

name: Ecto Pack
desc: This backpack contains ghostly ectoplasm you can use to power a flamethrower in a spooky way!

name: Haunted Chemical
desc: Something evil lurks inside this chemical. You get the chills just looking at it.

name: Devilfruit
desc: This is evil, like the fru-its of the dev-il! It's recommended that you don't eat it, but it's not like you're going to listen to me.

name: Harvester Of Sorrows

func.rem: You can walk faster than that thing!

desc: This demonic harvesting machine will mangle trees as it runs them over. If you wear a Fuel pack, it has a 10% chance of harvesting double fruit from each tree below rarity 100! This burns one Fuel Pack.

name: Death's Scarf
desc: Death has come to retrieve his scarf! He seeks revenge on you for wearing it, waiting behind you for the perfect time to strike. Sponsored by EasyE, Meeps, and Stealthy

name: Nightmare Devil Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You don't jump higher than with Devil Wings, but man, you do look pretty scary. Sponsored by Cukuzz, Heme, and Seabreaze.

name: Edvoid's Mistake
desc: This makes you look really disturbed. Sponsored by Edvoid20, TETRAFANG and Passed.

name: Nightmare Magnifying Glass

func.add: You have a pet that spits fire.

desc: This has over 10,000,000x magnification, allowing you to clearly see a lethal doom virus! Sponsored by Pumuzutup.

name: Teeny Tiny Skull
desc: This skull is so small! It would probably take 10 of these to do anything useful.

name: Avenie Golden Horse
desc: This horse is the same thing as a Skeletal Horsie, but has such a shiny coat! Sponsored by Avenie.

name: Claw Glove
desc: They slice, they dice, they chop, they julienne! Just don't pick your nose with them on.

name: Creepy Wallpaper
desc: Pro-tip: build a haunted house from Haunted House blocks, then use Block Glue to add this into it, so you don't have to have windows everywhere!

name: Haunted Mausoleum
desc: Every so often, a ghost will come spooking out of this place.

name: Gemini Ring
desc: This ring is imbued with astrological power. It makes you a twin!

name: Doppelganger Potion

func.add: Something is lurking in the shadows...

desc: Toss this vile-smelling liquid on an impure soul and the darkest deeds of their past will return to haunt them for a while!

name: Deadly Spider
desc: Nature makes things purple to tell you to STAY AWAY! Also if a spider is as big as you, that's another clue.

name: Hanging Thread
desc: This is the perfect material for hanging spiders from. It has no effect on Growtopians.

name: Muerto Mask
desc: Tired of Halloween? Celebrate Dia De Los Muertos instead!

name: Ring of Wisdom
desc: This ring makes you feel a whole lot smarter. So smart, in fact, that you can tell that it gives you a 10% chance of getting double XP!

name: Skeletal Dragon Claw
desc: Did you forget to feed your dragon again?

name: Dragon Bone
desc: I bet if you had twenty of these, you could build a whole new dragon out of them! Still, it's kind of icky.

name: Golden Apple
desc: This apple is a bit more crunchy than usual, but it's fortified with lots of minerals!

name: Leather Jacket
desc: Look cool as you wear this jacket over whatever shirt makes you feel tough.

name: Puffy Orange Jacket
desc: Rappers get cold very easily, so this style of jacket is available for them.

name: Twisted Spikes
desc: The evilest kind of spikes available. Do not touch!

name: Glowy Block
desc: It's like living inside a computer!

name: Dark Grey Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Red Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Orange Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Yellow Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Green Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Aqua Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Blue Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Purple Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Dark Brown Block
desc: Dark blocks are available in a stunning array of colors!

name: Special Cultist Hood
desc: You look a little shady in this thing...

name: Puddy Leash
desc: Mew! This is Puddy, Fredis kitten! Sponsored by Fredi, Fynx and Ludo.

name: Comet Dust
desc: This is the sparkly dust from a passing comet. It seems to whirl around like a tiny galaxy. Perhaps if you collected enough of it, it would merge into a solid mass!

name: Starseed
desc: This strange seed from outer space won't grow anything here in Growtopia. But perhaps you can splice it to infuse cosmic energies into ordinary items... Of course, any scientist will tell you that would never work without a source of cosmic radiation present at the time of splicing. (Translation: you can only plant or splice these during the Night of the Comet.

name: Antimatter Dust
desc: This is the exact opposite of sparkly dust from a passing comet. Itseems to whirl backwards like a tiny galaxy. Perhaps if you collected enough of it, it would merge into an astonishingly valuable solid mass!

name: Unearthly Chemical
desc: This is a strange chemical from outer space. It glows with cosmic energy.

name: Comet Pants
desc: These extremely classy pants are emblazoned with the image of comets streaking by.

name: Comet Shirt
desc: Express your love for celestial phenomena with this informative T-shirt!

name: Comet Beanie
desc: The Night of the Comet never ends for you - there's always a comet soaring above your head! Or boinging anyways.

name: Weather Machine - Comet
desc: Fill your world with the cosmic rays of a comet all month long with this weather machine! Note: this is only a situation of a comet, it does not actually generate any cosmic rays. Good thing too, since that would fry your organs. This sensitive technology will not function when damaged.

name: Riding Comet
desc: You're probably never going to have kids after this, but come on, it's a COMET! That you can ride!

name: Rocket Pack

func.add: You can fly!! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: Powered by cosmic energy, this jetpack will notably increase your jump height!

name: Cosmic Lenses
desc: The only glasses certified safe for staring at comets!

name: Cosmic Hair
desc: What did the cosmic rays do to your head?!

name: Alien Block
desc: This block is made from elements that dont even occur in our galaxy.

name: Xenoid Block
desc: This block is made from elements that don't even occur in our galaxy.

name: Cosmic Skirt
desc: Micrometeors have shredded the bottom end of this skirt, but that is the latest style on Zarkon 9!

name: Velour Space Uniform
desc: Captain a starship in style!

name: Riding Meteor
desc: You're probably never going to have kids after this, but come on, it's a METEOR! That you can ride!

name: Cosmic Unicorn Bracelet

func.add: Your pet is like, way cosmic, man.

desc: This unicorn looks even more Like, whoa man. Im dreaming a dream of what dreaming is like, and my hands are like, not my hands, man under a blacklight.

name: Space Command Seat
desc: You could take your spaceship from here! If you had a spaceship.

name: Ion Conduit
desc: Transfer more power to the warp core!! This is a background block, by the way.

name: Xenonite Crystal
desc: This alien crystal has the power to grant or remove superpowers from all the Growtopians in your world! Use the wrench to set what powers it affects. Only one is allowed per world.

desc: Fight crime in this mighty leotard!

desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as Loverboy? Captain Cuddles? Dr. Cupid? Its up to you!

desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as Well, okay I dont even know what this logo is. So you can be anybody you want with this one! Its up to you!

name: Geiger Counter
desc: With this handy device, you can detect radiation. As you get closer to the source, the device will ping red, then yellow, then green for the closest. Stand still where you think the source is and you just might find it!

name: Radioactive Chemical
desc: This is a dangerous chemical that emits radiation. You probably shouldn't keep it in your pants pocket.

name: Phone Booth
desc: Hop inside with a punch to swap your entire outfit with the outfit stored inside. Presto-Change-o! You can use your Wrench to empty it out as well.

name: Action Hero Stubble
desc: Nothing says tough like not bothering with basic hygiene.

name: Black Crystal Dragon
desc: Another dragon of legend! Please be aware the legends may have been a bit exaggerated. Sponsored by Dupie, v0ren and Contesso.

name: Ice Horse
desc: You're probably gonna wish you had spent extra for the seat heater option with this particular ride. But it's faster than walking. Sponsored by @Aimster.

name: Edvoid's Fire-Nado

func.add: Fire walk with me! Fire does 50% damage.
func.rem: Your feet are no longer safe.

desc: Stay warm this winter by setting your pants on fire! You liar. Sponsored by Edvoid20, NeoRay, and Heme.

name: Mighty Snow Rod
desc: Gloves are highly recommended while holding this mystical artifact. Sponsored by iiStyloMilo, Bambam46, and MartinMan007's subscribers.

name: Tiny Tank
desc: Why don't you just go play Tanked instead? Sponsored by Liammagoo, Nelsonmandel, and Krampus

name: Reindeer Bell
desc: This is a perfectly ordinary animal, not anything related to flying, magic, or gifts. There are, however, only 2,000 of this endangered animal in existence!

name: Magic Reindeer Bell
desc: This guy has been sorely depressed ever since he got banned from gaming. Take him out on a flight to cheer him up!

name: Icicles
desc: As ice thaws, it drips down and refreezes into these razor sharp blades of agony.

name: Siberian Tiger Block
desc: It's so cold in Siberia that this tiger is frozen solid.

name: Snowmobile
desc: VROOOOM!

name: Candy Cane Platform
desc: This is one sweet way to hold yourself aloft.

name: Yeti Hat
desc: What you think yetis dont have ram horns? Prove it.

name: Holiday Cheer Bomb
desc: Nothing speaks of peace, love, and joy more than a bomb. Throw it at your friends!

name: Carnival Pipe
desc: This is the most festive way to get water around your house.

name: Winter Flu Vaccine
desc: It's really safest to use killed viruses in vaccines, but come on, who would kill this cuddly guy?

name: Red Crystal
desc: This crystal is not yet in balance. Perhaps if you place it in the bosom of its Earth Mother, and then join it with 4 other crystals, it can achieve harmony.

name: Green Crystal
desc: This crystal is not yet in balance. Perhaps if you place it in the bosom of its Earth Mother, and then join it with 4 other crystals, it can achieve harmony.

name: Black Crystal
desc: This mystical crystal is not yet in balance. Perhaps if you place it in the bosom of its Earth Mother, and then join it with 4 other crystals, it can achieve harmony.

name: Crystal Clock
desc: Tell time in Growtopia! This clock displays the current Growtopia time for you.

name: Red Crystal Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: These amazing lightweight hollow crystals actually allow you to jump in mid-air!

func.rem: You got through with all digits intact!

desc: Careful of the pointy bits. This thing is tough to hold, but look how cool it is when you throw it!

name: Crystal Skull
desc: You could run your own kingdom with a mask like this!

name: Stained Glass
desc: Ooh pretty.

name: Crystal Tree
desc: Everyone knows crystals don't grow on trees, so this is just a lovely decorative element.

name: Crystal Gate
desc: These magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Crystal Spikes
desc: These crystals have fragmented into razor sharp points. Do not touch!

name: Mini-You
desc: This Mini Growtopian looks strangely familiar...

name: Party Block
desc: You can't have a block party without a Party Block!

name: Party Boombox
desc: Rock some tunes to really kick the party into gear.

name: Weather Machine - Party
desc: Bring the party with you everywhere you go! This sensitive will not function while damaged.

name: Dead Geiger Counter

func.rem: Geiger Counter is no longer charging!

desc: This Geiger Counter is out of battery power. It will charge up from the static electricity you generate all the time, so just hold it in your hand until it's charged.

name: Party Confetti
desc: Ohh, its gonna take a LOT of this to get the party started

name: Party Tunes
desc: 3 notes? Pop songs just keep getting shorter! Maybe if we collect up a pile of these, we can get this party started!

name: Superpower - Heat Vision
desc: This is a Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage.

name: Superpower - Incinerate
desc: This is a Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage, but if opponent uses a Muscle power, it inflicts 2 damage.

name: Superpower - Flame On!
desc: This is a Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Ignite yourself, healing 1 damage, and your opponent takes 1 damage if they hit you in the next 3 turns.

name: Superpower - Liquify
desc: This is a Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflicts 1 damage and melts the card your opponent plays, removing it from play permanently. If you Liquify another card, the first one returns.

name: Superpower - Overheat
desc: This is a Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Your Fire cards are not countered by Ice on your next turn, and they do +1.

name: Crime In Progress
desc: Oh no! A villainous scallywag lurks here, perpetrating CRIME on an unsuspecting populace! Smack him in the face to set him straight with your superpowers.

name: Superpower - Death Ray
desc: This is a Rare Fire Superpower Card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Obliterates your opponent for 3 damage.

name: Party-In-A-Box
desc: You can just barely hear techno music deep inside the box. Maybe you should open it and see if a party comes out?

name: Superpower - Ice Shards
desc: This is an Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage.

name: Superpower - Frost Breath
desc: This is an Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Freeze your opponent, so they cant use any cards except Fire cards next turn.

name: Superpower - Ice Barrier
desc: This is an Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Protects you from the next hit you would take, including this turn. Lightning pierces it.

name: Superpower - Puddle
desc: This is an Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: For the next 3 turns, the opponent takes 1 damage if they use Lightning. They shouldnt do that standing in water!

name: Superpower - Frozen Mirror
desc: This is an Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage. If the opponent uses Fire, their card isnt countered, its reflected back at them!

name: Superpower - Ban Hammer
desc: This is a Rare Superpower Card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Give the opponent a warning on their 3rd warning they get banned from the game.

name: Superpower - Super Strength
desc: This is a Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage.

name: Superpower - Super Speed
desc: This is a Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage, and on the next turn, you see which card your opponent will choose before you choose yours. This card takes 2 turns to recharge.

name: Superpower - Enrage
desc: This is a Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Block 1 damage, this turn, and your next attack that hits will do +1 damage.

name: Superpower - Crush
desc: This is a Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: If your opponent uses Lightning this turn, they take *3* damage! Sadly if they dont this has no effect at all.

name: Superpower - Regeneration
desc: This is a Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Recover 1 Life this turn and the next turn.

name: Superpower - g-Virus
desc: This is a Rare Superpower Card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Summon a zombie to gnaw on your opponent for 1 damage per turn, forever. Each point of damage you take kills a zombie instead of hurting you.

name: Superpower - Shocking Fist
desc: This is a Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Inflict 1 damage.

name: Superpower - Thunderstorm
desc: This is a Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: No damage now, but for the next 2 turns, your opponent takes 1 damage each turn. If you take damage from a Muscle card, the storm ends.

name: Superpower - Overcharge
desc: This is a Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Charge up your Lightning cards to do +1 damage permanently. Getting hit by Muscle cards removes this effect.

name: Superpower - Megawatt Pulse
desc: This is a Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Does 2 damage, but takes 2 turns to recharge.

name: Superpower - Resuscitate
desc: This is a Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: If an attack would kill you in the next 3 turns, you recover with 1 Life.

name: Superpower - Duct Tape
desc: This is a Rare Lightning Superpower Card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Prevent your opponent from using the element they used this turn for 3 turns.

desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of The Firebug for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Super Logo - Z
desc: This is the logo of the supervillain (or philanthropist) Z. Everett Koop. Are you sure you want to wear it?

name: Super Logo - Yerfdog
desc: This is the logo of the supervillain Devil Ham. Or its just the logo of Hamumu Games. Are you sure you want to wear it?

desc: This is the logo of the supervillain Almight Seth. Or its just the logo of Robinson Technologies. Are you sure you want to wear it?

name: Super Logo - D
desc: This is the logo of the supervillain Dr. Destructo. Or at least it's his first initial. His name is Dennis. Are you sure you want to wear it?

name: Henchman
desc: Looks like you captured one of that villain's henchmen,,, Of course, you COULD let him loose somewhere to cause a little havoc! Note: Henchmen take 24 hours to complete their crime, then they disappear!

name: Crime Wave
desc: Good heavens, whered you find such an unsavoury bunch of miscreants?! I suppose you could let them loose in your world to commit crimes. If you were EVIL. Note: They take 24 hours to complete their crime, after which they disappear!

name: Love Bug
desc: Vroom vroom!

name: Heavenly Scythe

func.add: You wield the fury of the heavens.

desc: This scythe contains the fury of the heavens! Sponsored by Edvoid20, iKrideez and Anfinity

name: Heartbreaker Hammer
desc: Seriously, if this hits your chest, your heart will break. Also, it's good for smashing pumpkins.

name: Teeny Angel Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Even as tiny as they are, these wings allow you to jump in mid-air!

name: Teeny Golden Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Even as tiny as they are, these wings will allow you to jump in mid-air!

name: Golden Love Bug
desc: Vroom vroom!

name: Valensign
desc: Write Messages to your loved ones on it! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Locke The Salesman
desc: This guy loves locks. He'll trade you fabulous items for them!

name: Lucky Horseshoe
desc: Lucky you! You've been awarded this golden horseshoe by the Leprechaun's Guild in honor of your Blarney achievements. Of course, one horseshoe isn't much good. Why don't you get four of them together and shoe a horse? (Note: horse not actually required, just get 4 horseshoes and tap them anywhere)

name: Irish Sport Horsie
desc: The Irish Sport Horsie is traditionally used for all purposes from transportation to riding to working the land, and it is so popular as a competition riding horsie. It also wears a silly hat.

name: Kilt
desc: Wait a minute, this is Scottish.

name: Corncob Pipe
desc: This is a bad habit, you should stop it. Only found in Blarney 2 and 3.

name: Emerald Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. And looks blarney good doing it. Now, this lock is no Lucky Clover, but you just might feel a little luckier in a world locked by it...

name: Emerald Shard
desc: Watch out, this is a really sharp fragment of Emerald. It seems strangely magnetic attracted to other shards like it. Maybe if you got 200 of them together, they'd fuse into something! Yeah, that's how reality works!

name: Cloverleaf
desc: This is only one leaf of a clover! Clearly you need four of them if you want to be lucky.

name: Shamrock Sign
desc: Write stuff on it to tell your friends! Use the wrench on it to change the message.

name: Slimy Green Hair
desc: Wanna be a witch, but tired of hat-head?  This is the hairstyle for you. Only found in Blarney 5, 7 and 9.

name: Possessed Witch Hat
desc: I think Chudy's brain is being eaten right now.

name: Super Logo - MightyBOOSH
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as MIGHTYBOOSH, with his trademark lightning shield!

name: Shadow Wolf Leash
desc: Shadowsurfer's dog is spooky.

name: Super Shirt - Emerald
desc: Fight crime in this mighty Irish leotard!

name: Muscle Shirt - Emerald
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty Irish leotard!

name: Heroic Tights - Emerald
desc: To be an Irish superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Super Tights - Emerald
desc: To be an Irish superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Heroic Boots - Emerald
desc: These Irish boots add nothing to your crimefighting skills except to protect you from stray Legos.

name: Superhero Mask - Emerald
desc: Protect your secret identity, but your Irish eyes are still smiling!

name: Crimefighter Mask - Emerald
desc: Protect your secret identity, but your Irish eyes are still smiling!

name: Super Cape - Emerald

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You're no Heroman, but its still pretty swell.

desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty Irish leotard!

name: Super Eye Mask - Emerald
desc: Protect you secret identity by hiding the inch of skin around your eyes. Who could possibly recognize you?

name: Super Logo - Shamrock
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as... Saint Patrick? O'Superman? Lucky Lass? It's up to you!

name: Superpower - Lucky Shot
desc: This is a Rare Muscle Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Take a chance! This card's element when played is totally random, and it will inflict from 0-4 damage!

name: Villain Portrait - Paddy O'Malice
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of Paddy O'Malice for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Diamond Dragon
desc: This Dragon Of Legend is worth more than all the others combined... and he's pretty snotty about it.

name: Clothing Compactor
desc: This super fabulous device will crush any clothing and extract its pure essence. Just tap clothing items on here and they will be crushed! You might get back seeds, or gems, or who knows what?

name: Patchwork Quilt
desc: Hang it up on the wall, pass it down to your grandkids!

name: Green Glasses
desc: You look jealous in these.

name: Pencil Mustache
desc: You're a certified creeper. Don't forget to smile...

name: Distinguished Grey Hair
desc: You're not getting older, you're getting more distinguished.

name: Pink Fedora
desc: Like a regular fedora, but in cotton candy flavor.

name: Pink Suitcoat
desc: You look like a snake oil salesman in this getup!

name: Fancy Pants
desc: These come with a handy pocketwatch in the pocket, but it's less handy because you can't read the time on a 4-pixel watch.

name: Burning Eyes
desc: Need some eyedrops for those? Sponsored by SweGamerHD, his subscribers, and Palladius.

name: Locke's Mystery Box
desc: This block is a total mystery. Smash it and see what's inside!

name: Megaphone
desc: This handy device will let you broadcast to ALL of Growtopia at once!

name: Actual Leprechaun Hat
desc: This is not just a leprechaun-styled hat, it's an actual secondhand hat borrowed from a leprechaun. The largest size available.

name: Onisim's Genie
desc: This genie is all out of wishes, so he's pretty bored at this point. He's happy to just hang out with you. Sponsored by Onisim and Napoleonn.

name: Helmet Of Darkness
desc: Crafted from the darkest depths of Black Magic, this helmet was born! Sponsored by Devinn, Edvoid20, and anthonnoying.

name: Transmatter Field
desc: Items placed behind this energy field are protected! Only players with access to lock can pick them up!

name: Cosmic Mustache
desc: This is itchy. I think it's the radiation.

name: Asteroid
desc: To celebrate the robot that landed on a comet, splice together some comet stuff to make an asteroid that YOU can land on!

name: Baby Bunny
desc: bunny bunny bunny bunny bunny bunny

name: Pastel Pink Wallpaper
desc: Its a Pastel Pink Block squashed flat!

desc: Its a Pastel Orange Block squashed flat!

desc: Its a Pastel Blue Block squashed flat!

desc: Its a Pastel Purple Block squashed flat!

name: Dark Bunny Mask
desc: The life that has been carved out from your subconscious in the only evidence by which you will be judged.

name: Marshmallow Basket
desc: These marshmallow treats are pretty gross, but having one follow you around is fun!

name: Happy Flower Grass
desc: The happiest kind of grass.

name: Bouncy Bunny
desc: That is no way to treat an animal!

name: Superpower - Egg Shield
desc: This is a Rare Ice Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Block all 1-damage attacks for 4 turns. If an attack does more than 1 damage, the shield shatters!

name: Villain Portrait - Bunny Barko
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a creepy photo of Bunny Barko for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Super Logo - Bunny
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as... Bionic Bunny? The Hoppinator? Eastro? It's up to you!

desc: Fight crime in this mighty pastel leotard!

desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty pastel leotard!

desc: To be a pastel superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty pastel leotard!

name: Easter Egg - Striped
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Easter Egg - Polka Dots
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Easter Egg - Jagged
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Easter Egg - Wavey
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Easter Egg - Checkered
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Easter Egg - Rainbow
desc: This egg has been boiled, dyed, hidden, and found. Put it on display somewhere!

name: Cursed Jet Engine
desc: If the sky were to suddenly open up, there would be no law, there would be no rule. There would only be you and your memories.

name: Egg-Hunting Basket
desc: With this basket you can track down Easter Eggs hidden in all around Growtopia.

name: Full Egg-Hunting Basket
desc: You found an egg and dropped it in this basket! Now it's buried under all the fake grass. Keep digging at it, you'll re-find it eventually.

name: Egghead
desc: This hat always cracks me up.

name: Chocolate Block
desc: The tastiest of blocks.

name: Dark Chocolate Block
desc: The bitterest of blocks.

name: Carnival Spikeball
desc: There's always fun times at the carnival, even when your organs are being impaled on steel spikes!

name: Carny Vest
desc: Step right up! Sell popcorn and candy to rubes as you run nigh-unwinnable games!

name: Flame Scythe
desc: The flame represents all of the fallen heroes that served in the Armed Forces. Sponsored by iFlySolo and GhostEgo.

name: Ride'O'Gold
desc: A lot of people bling out their cars to show their wealth, but it just seems easier to ride around in a bucket of gold to start with, right? Sponsored by WoShiPaul, IcyFrost, and icebang.

name: Black Braids
desc: Classic Hairstyle!

name: Ginger Hair Bun
desc: Tie up those unruly red locks.

name: Change of Address
desc: If you own two worlds, you can use this handy form to swap their names permanently. See a new name you want that nobody wants? Lock it up, and do a name swap! Requires a World Lock in both worlds.

name: Teddy Bear
desc: You can't go off punching, building, and growing without Mr. Blinky!

name: Muddy Pants
desc: Where have you been playing?! What did you do to these? I just washed them! And wait a minute, what is that following you around!?!? Sponsored by @Hamumu since nobody else had the guts.

name: Holographic Sign
desc: Program messages into it to tell your friends! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Sassy Boots
desc: It's not possible to be any sassier than somebody wearing this boots. So put 'em on and get SASSY, Girlfriend!

name: Shifty Block
desc: This block constantly shifts through the colors of the rainbow. It's mesmerizing.

name: Legendary Katana
desc: This legendary blade was said to have sliced through 3 tomatoes AND a tin can during the course of a single infomercial! Nobody knows if that's really true, but it's certainly a big sword.

name: Unlucky Pinata Hat
desc: This hat is still festive and suitable for formal occasions, but all the luck has been sucked out of it.

name: Nacho Block
desc: Mmm nachos. Watch out, that cheese is slippery.

name: Luchador Mask - El Astro
desc: El Astro is known for the deadly Cometbuster Drop!

name: Luchador Mask - El Peligro
desc: El Peligro is the most dangerous wrestler in all of Lucha Libre.

name: Luchador Mask - El Tigre
desc: El Tigre is feared in the wrestling world for his Wild Stash attack!

name: Luchador Mask - El Verdugo
desc: El Verdugo has long since retired his mask, but you can take it up again and master the lethal Dynamite Axe move!

name: Luchador Tights - El Astro
desc: These provide the flexibility and movement you need to wrap somebody's head up in your thighs and do a backflip.

name: Luchador Tights - El Peligro
desc: These provide the flexibility and movement you need to wrap somebody's head up in your thighs and do a backflip.

name: Luchador Tights - El Tigre
desc: These provide the flexibility and movement you need to wrap somebody's head up in your thighs and do a backflip.

name: Luchador Tights - El Verdugo
desc: These provide the flexibility and movement you need to wrap somebody's head up in your thighs and do a backflip.

name: Luchador Jersey - El Astro
desc: This flimsy bit of clothing provides maximum display of your insane muscles.

name: Luchador Jersey - El Peligro
desc: This flimsy bit of clothing provides maximum display of your insane muscles.

name: Luchador Jersey - El Tigre
desc: This flimsy bit of clothing provides maximum display of your insane muscles.

name: Luchador Jersey - El Verdugo
desc: This flimsy bit of clothing provides maximum display of your insane muscles.

name: Luchador Boots
desc: Sparkly gold boots are ideal for stomping on people youve thrown on the ground.

name: Luchador Championship Belt
desc: This belt has a handy adjustable strap, which is really good, since the wrestler you beat to get it is like three times your size.

name: Villain Portrait - El Peligro
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a heroic photo of El Peligro for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Superpower - Atomic Backbreaker
desc: This is a Rare Fire Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Smash your opponent for 1 damage, and while they are dazed, automatically follow up with a randomly chosen card from your hand.

name: Wrestling Ring
desc: Step into the ring, amigo. Show us your moves!

name: Pinata Block
desc: A block made of pinta material! Instead of candy inside, there's either seeds, gems, or more pinta blocks. You know, kind of like every block.

name: Mexican Dress
desc: This light cotton dress is adorned with little embroidered flowers.

name: Rapier
desc: This famous sword is capable of slicing nearly any letter of the alphabet into nearly anybody's shirt.

name: Foxy Hat
desc: This hat lends you a sharp stylish line like a fox.

name: Swordsman's Mask
desc: This black eye mask includes a handsomely trimmed mustache for maximum swordfighting capacity.

name: Cape of Shadows

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Cloaked in the shadows, you can strike without warning! And double-jump.

name: Mystery Dress
desc: Is it blue and black, or white and gold? Who knows!?

name: Spotlight
desc: Use your wrench on this to point it at yourself or one of your friends!

name: Fashionable Dress - Blue
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashions a stranger. You think fashions your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Fashionable Dress - Red
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashions a stranger. You think fashions your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Fashionable Dress - Pink
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashion's a stranger. You think fashion's your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Fashionable Dress - Green
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashions a stranger. You think fashions your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Fashionable Dress - Purple
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashions a stranger. You think fashions your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Fashionable Dress - Yellow
desc: You think you know fashion? Well, fashions a stranger. You think fashions your friend? My friend, fashion is danger!

name: Stylin' Dress - Blue
desc: Beauty of person and elegance of manners in women will always command more admiration from the opposite sex than beauty, elegance or costliness of clothing.

name: Stylin' Dress - Red
desc: Beauty of person and elegance of manners in women will always command more admiration from the opposite sex than beauty, elegance or costliness of clothing.

name: Stylin' Dress - Pink
desc: Beauty of person and elegance of manners in women will always command more admiration from the opposite sex than beauty, elegance or costliness of clothing.

name: Stylin' Dress - Yellow
desc: Beauty of person and elegance of manners in women will always command more admiration from the opposite sex than beauty, elegance or costliness of clothing.

name: High Heels - Blue
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: High Heels - Red
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: High Heels - Pink
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: High Heels - Green
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: High Heels - Purple
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: High Heels - Yellow
desc: These really make your calves look good! Unfortunately, they also cause crippling pain and permanent deformity. Hey, make your choice!

name: Fashion Purse - Blue
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Fashion Purse - Red
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Fashion Purse - Pink
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Fashion Purse - Green
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Fashion Purse - Purple
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Fashion Purse - Yellow
desc: You can store all your stuff in here - dirt, toilets, cows, devil wings, whatever a girl needs.

name: Purse Dog
desc: You can't store all your stuff in here - there's already a dog inside!

name: Makeup
desc: Slap on a little lipstick and eye shadow before you hit the town tonight!

name: Kansas Pigtails
desc: This strange two-toned hair is all the fashion rage in Growtopia. I don't know why, but by popular demand, here it is!

name: MickeyMay Leash
desc: Mickey and May are Werkon and Compulsory's real life puppies! This puppy represents them both. Sponsored by Werkon and Compulsory.

name: Gold Choker
desc: Be careful with this necklace, they don't call it a choker for nothing

name: Emerald Choker
desc: Be careful with this necklace, they don't call it a choker for nothing. Now with a giant emerald!

name: Jade Block
desc: This is a finely carved block of jade. How much more elegant could you get?

name: Filigreed Jade Block
desc: This jade block is inlaid with a delicate gold filigree. How much more elegant could you get?

name: Draped Filigreed Jade Block
desc: Now theres pink silk draped on top. How much more elegant could you get?

name: Diamond-Encrusted Draped Filigreed Jade Block
desc: Okay, covering the block with diamonds has to be the height of elegance.

name: Googly-Eyed Diamond-Encrusted Draped Filigreed Jade Block
desc: Yep. You just went a step too far. This is not elegant.

name: Platinum Blonde Hair
desc: On average, blondes tend to have more fun, but live 20% shorter lives. That sounds like science, but luckily it's not!

name: Electric Bow
desc: This crossbow is mounted to a glove, so nobody can steal it from you. It shoots electric bolts! Why not? Sponsored by iNoodles.

name: Golden Aura

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You are burning with furious energy! And double-jump power. Sponsored by Palestinian, Signle, StardusJr.

name: Basic Blue Block
desc: This is a block. It is blue.

name: Superpower - Pineapple Spear
desc: This is a Rare Lightning Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Impale your opponent for 3 damage. This exhausts you for a turn, but you can use a Lightning card to get a second wind. Even if countered, the spear still does 1 damage!

name: Villain Portrait - Pine-Fresh
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of Pine-Fresh for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Pineapple Air Freshener
desc: This brings a fresh pine(apple) scent to the area.....a dangerous scent.

name: Pineapple Block
desc: By growing pineapples inside cubical molds, they can be forced to grow in a block shape! There's no real reason to do this, but it is fun.

name: Pineapple
desc: Yummy, it's a pineapple! You should just keep eating these nonstop!

name: Pineapple Head
desc: Here's a useful tip; if you find a pineapple big enough, you can hollow it out and jam it on your head! Wait a minute, that's not useful at all.

name: Fruity Hat
desc: Similar to the classic Beer Hat, this hat presents you with a movable fest! You'll never go hungry with this on. Note: fruit is made with wax.

name: Hawaiian Shirt
desc: The stylish classic is adorned with pineapples and tropical flowers. Suitable for any pineapple occasion.

name: Pineapple Pants
desc: Though hard to distinguish from Clay Brick Pants by appearance, the key here is soft, squishy, and juicy lining, Yeah, they're kinda gross to wear.

name: Weather Machine - Pineapples
desc: It is rare, but sometimes you'll see the little pineapple alert on your weather app. When you do, be sure to get undercover - an umbrella is not going to protect you! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Sugarloaf Pineapple Block
desc: This block is sweeter than a normal Pineapple Block. Since you can't eat Pineapple Blocks, that doesn't matter much.

name: Roasted Pineapple Block
desc: Be careful, this came out of the oven piping hot!

name: Frozen Pineapple Block
desc: The problem with frozen pineapple is it gets mushy when it thaws. So this one has a built-in liquid nitrogen tank to keep it from ever thawing!

name: Pineapple Launcher
desc: This pistol provides the power to pelt people with perilously pointy pineapples.

name: Demonic Arm
desc: It got into your arm and it went bad, so you have to lap it off at the shoulder. Sponsored by Edvoid20, SpamG and CrimsonSwag.

name: The Gungnir
desc: The legendary spear of Odin is yours! Sponsored by ZeroRarity, CoffeeGuy, and xAzureHKF.

name: Pineapple Juice
desc: This backpack contains pineapple juice you can use to power a flamethrower or Harvester!

name: Pineapple Earrings
desc: A bit of tropics hanging from your earlobes.

name: Pineapple Kite
desc: Fly this colorful kite to celebrate your love of pineapples!

name: Super Shirt - Pineapple
desc: Fight crime in this mighty tropical leotard!

name: Muscle Shirt - Pineapple
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty tropical leotard!

name: Heroic Tights - Pineapple
desc: To be a tropical superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Super Tights - Pineapple
desc: To be a tropical superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Heroic Boots - Pineapple
desc: These tropical boots add nothing to your crimefighting skills except to protect you from stray Legos.

name: Superhero Mask - Pineapple
desc: Protect your secret identity!

name: Crimefighter Mask - Pineapple
desc: Protect your secret identity!

name: Super Cape - Pineapple

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You're no Heroman, but still, it's pretty swell.

name: Superheroine Top - Pineapple
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty tropical leotard!

name: Super Eye Mask - Pineapple
desc: Protect you secret identity by hiding the inch of skin around your eyes. Who could possibly recognize you?

name: Super Logo - Pineapple
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as... Power Pineapple? Tropicanus? Dr. Pineapple? It's up to you!

name: Viney Block
desc: It may seem obvious, but I'll say it anyway: this block is viney.

name: Viney Wallpaper
desc: Its like youre lost in the jungle!

name: Leaf Block
desc: If you don't like it, you can make like this block and leaf.

name: Mission Block
desc: Mission style is a design that emphasizes simple horizontal and vertical lines and flat panels that accentuate the grain of the wood (often oak, especially quartersawn oak).

name: Air Conditioner
desc: Keep cool! It's hot out there.

name: Air Duct
desc: Sneak around in these to find the secret documents. Nobody knows why they build them human-sized!

name: Well
desc: Dip a bucket in! You can collect one bucket of water from here everyday.

name: Penguin Leash

func.add: Your little friend blasts ice beams.
func.rem: Your friend has flown the coop.

desc: Waddle waddle. Sponsored by TypoPig and IcyMeltz.

name: Poseidon's Trident
desc: This trident has been blessed by Poseidon, God of the seas. The glowy blue signifies all of the servants who served under Poseidon in his battles. What Poseidon left along with this trident is unknown - that's for you to figure out. Sponsored by mythicdawn and angel42.

name: Green Stuff
desc: Hmm, green stuff. What IS this stuff?

name: Blue Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in blue too! It's a veritable rainbow of stuff.

name: Texas Limestone
desc: In Texas, when you build a house, you just take all the rocks you end up digging up and slap them on the walls. It looks nice.

name: Air Vent
desc: How else are you going to get into the air ducts?

name: Sapphire Block
desc: Flawlessly cut by out master gemologists, enjoy this transcendent jewel, an heirloom to last a lifetime.

name: Phoenix Pacifier

func.add: You have a pet that spits fire.

desc: Aww, so cute you just wanna snuggle him all day! But you should really pace yourself on that, with a trip to the burn ward in between each snuggle. No more than 500 of these little guys exist in all of Growtopia.

name: Sun Block
desc: Don't rub this on your face.

name: Tiki Torch
desc: How you feelin'? Hot hot hot? Well, you can punch this to turn it on or off.

name: Cow Skull
desc: This bovine has moooved on to greener pastures.

name: Flamingo
desc: This bird's got legs that go allll the way up.

name: Summer Breeze
desc: These gentle breezes smell like freshly mown grass. They also blow with great ferocity!

name: Wizard's Staff

func.add: You have a staff that simulates legendary power!

desc: Congratulations on solving the Wizard's Riddle (or just googling what somebody else figured out). Since you're not legendary enough to obtain an actual Legendary Item, here's a replica of the great Wizard's staff. (Be careful, the winds might hurt you.) Sponsored by Devinn and PonyGarYelow.

name: White Fury
desc: This thoroughbred steed is burning with furious power. Sponsored by Hercule, PRONGS and HERMIUS.

name: Seafoam Beard
desc: You're looking a little green around the gills.

name: Seafoam Hair
desc: You've got that windblown chlorinated surfer look. It either makes you cool or a filthy beach bum. It's a fine line.

name: Oceanic Crown
desc: You are the KING OF THE SEAS!... It's whats written on the tag of this cheap plastic knock-off.

name: BLYoshi's Free Dirt

func.add: Your weapon fires high-velocity armor-piercing dirt.

desc: It's an unlimited supply of free dirt blocks! Unfortunately, it spews them at high velocity so they splatter at impact. Sponsored by BLYoshi.

name: FC Cleats

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Every pair of cleats comes with a new high-tech soccer ball capable of returning to you automatically! These cleats come from Funtimes College, the #1 party school on Earth. Sponsored by the admins of FC.

name: Man U Cleats

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Every pair of cleats comes with a new high-tech soccer ball capable of returning to you automatically! These cleats come from Man University, the school for manly men of masculinity.

name: FC Jersey
desc: Represent Funtimes College in this stylish jersey! PARTY ON!

name: Man U Jersey
desc: Represent Man University in this stylish jersey! Hallelujah, it's rainin' men! Notice of non-descrimination: Man University does not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, unless you're not a man. HOO HOO HOO MAN U!

name: Baseball Glove

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Hidden inside this glove is a wormhole to a dimension filled with nothing but baseballs. Baseballs and popcorn shrimp. But the wormhole's at the baseball end of the dimension.

name: Pigskin

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Don't worry, this isn't actually the skin of a pig. It's plastic. It's an American football! Also known as a hand-egg. Throw it to somebody!

name: Basketball

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Must... keep... dribbling...

name: Stadium
desc: Nobody showed up for the big game!

name: Crowded Stadium
desc: Everybody showed up for the big game!

name: Basketball Hoop
desc: Dunk it!! The more of these you stack up, the better the challenge.

name: Sporty Goal
desc: GGGGGGGGGggggggooooooooooooaaaalllllll!

name: Monkey On Your Back
desc: This is not a metaphor. Sponsored by SweGamerHD's subscribers, Kizashi, and Inforced.

name: Football Helmet
desc: Keep in mind that while headgear is necessary for dangerous sports, it doesn't eliminate brain damage. Keep your brain safe - play Growtopia instead.

name: Growies Cap
desc: Show your pride in the Growtopia Growies with their cap! Root for the home team!

name: Tennis Racquet

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Serve up an ace! Lifetime subscription to Rapidly Biodegradeable Tennis Ball Supply is included.

name: Carrot Sword
desc: This carrot is rather sharp. I wouldn't recommend eating it, especially if it's a sword or if you're a bunny. Sponsored by MrMehMeh.

name: Emerald Staff

func.add: You are armed with deadly flame magic.
func.rem: Missing. Add if you have it.

desc: The Orb Of Ajanti is mounted atop this staff, held by a silver hand - just make sure you never touch it with your human hand, or you will be incinerated. Sponsored by SilentRebel, COMBUSTION, and jason747.

name: Fishing Rod
desc: Equip this and then use bait on water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast.

name: Wiggly Worm
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. Wiggly Worms can only catch the smallest fish.

name: Shifting Scroll
desc: Strange letters swirl about on this scroll. It seems to shimmer before your eyes. The only think you can make out consistently is "18.IT", whatever that means.

name: Cryptic Scroll
desc: Incomprehensible words scrawl across this parchment: SNWISS CAGITE TET PLDOL

name: Really Cryptic Scroll
desc: Incomprehensible words scrawl across this parchment: EG TAC DESLI UREN HAI IB

name: Exceedingly Cryptic Scroll
desc: Incomprehensible words scrawl across this parchment: VROMO AOI ELN WREAR NSA

name: Needlessly Cryptic Scroll
desc: Incomprehensible words scrawl across this parchment: EO PAT NNN TED A BASK GCL

name: Smarty Pants
desc: These pants are colorful and tasty! But they do not enhance intelligence in any way.

name: Camo Pants
desc: Put these pants on and people will think you're just a floating torso! With some shoes underneath.

name: Carrot Pants
desc: It's the latest fashion! I guess...

name: Golf Pants
desc: It's a mystery as to why golfers have to wear ugly pants, but they really do. Have some!

name: Acid-Washed Skinny Jeans
desc: You need skinny legs to put in the skinny jeans, or perhaps just let the acid slim you down a bit.

name: Tiny Red Skirt
desc: YOUNG LADY, you are NOT going out in that skirt. In my day, people couldn't even see our ankles.

name: Flower Sarong
desc: This delicate flower print works both as a swimsuit cover-up, or an elegant skirt for a night on the town.

name: Purple Crystal Skirt
desc: As long as you don't mind clinking as you walk around, this is a beautifully sparkly style.

name: Golden Crystal Skirt
desc: As long as you don't mind clinking as you walk around, this is a beautifully sparkly style.

name: Aqua Crystal Skirt
desc: As long as you don't mind clinking as you walk around, this is a beautifully sparkly style.

name: Display Block
desc: "Use" nearly any item on this block to store it inside on display. Destroying the block will spit out the item, or you can wrench the block to remove it.

name: Ruined Sign
desc: Write stuff on it and tell your friends! Use your Wrench on it to change the message.

name: Robotic Lock
desc: This robotic guardian keeps your world safe by not allowing anybody without access to break or place blocks. Just like a world lock, only scarier!

name: Digger's Spade
desc: This shovel is very specifically designed for one purpose: to shovel dirt. It is pretty useless at digging anywhere else, but dang if it doesn't rip dirt apart (and Cave Background).

name: Disguise Glasses
desc: Wait a second... WHO ARE YOU!?!? How did you get in here?!

name: Growch Cultist Robe
desc: Just the thing to worship The Growch in!

name: Wedding Dress
desc: You look radiant on this special day!

name: Bridal Veil
desc: Today's modern bride doesn't want to conceal her face, so we've swept the veil aside for you.

name: Dark Red Wallpaper
desc: This is kinda creepy, like the walls are bleeding.

name: Fountain
desc: Relax by the soothing tinkle of water. You can punch this to turn it on or off.

name: Enchanted Spatula
desc: This mythical artifact, possibly from the future, has an unparalleled magical power: you can slap objects with it to turn them around. Use it on chairs, beds, whatever you find facing the wrong way! Note: Because the spatula is crystal, it shatters when used.

name: Sink
desc: Punch to wash your hands! Be clean, please. As of this item, Growtopia now includes everything but the kitchen sink (this is the bathroom sink, unfortunately).

name: Ring Of Water
desc: This mystical ring encases you in a bubble, allowing you to swim at high velocity. The cool bubble also protects you from dangerous burns like lava.

name: Spikey Anime Hair
desc: The great thing about this hairstyle is you just wake up with it every morning! Sure, some people use a comb to fix that, but you just call it anime!

name: Red Bicycle
desc: Its easy to remember how to ride this - its just like riding a bike!

name: Cybernetic Eye

func.add: Blast blocks from farther away! But weaker than punch.

desc: We've rebuilt you - better, faster, stronger than before.

name: Vending Machine
desc: Shopping without the hassle of human beings! Use your wrench on this item to stock it with an item and set a price in World Locks. Other players will be able to buy from it! Only works in World-Locked worlds.

name: Jester's Cap
desc: Bring joy to Growtopia in this classically designed headwear!

name: Blanket Cape
desc: If you can't afford a real one, just fake it with a blanket!

name: Riding War Wolf
desc: It's just like a horse... except you MAY want to avoid kicking it with your heels.

name: Wolf Tamer's Glove
desc: When you stare into a wolf's eyes, you're staring into the untameable heart of nature itself. But you can tame it anyway if you've got the right fashion accessories!

name: Red Royal Wallpaper
desc: The fanciest wall in town.

name: Blue Royal Wallpaper
desc: The fanciest wall in town.

name: Wolf Whistle
desc: Beware! Blowing this whistle will send you off the Wolfworld! When you are there, you will have only 10 minutes before the power of the wolf wears off and you return to the real world. Can you conquer the Wolfworld in time?

name: Great Wolf Totem
desc: Players that touch this get a wolf prize, and kicked out of the wolfworld.

name: Wolf Totem
desc: Now you can play Wolfworld: The Home Game with your own handy wooden totem!

name: Dire Wolf Mask
desc: This mask is usually kept in a glass case, with a tiny hammer and a sign that says Break glass only in case of dire emergency!

name: Goldfish
desc: These are named for their orange coloration, they're not actually made of any precious metals.

name: Fish Tank Port
desc: This is a handy hole in a fish tank, through which you can insert or remove fish! Use your wrench to manage the fish, just like real fish. You can only place this on a fish tank.

name: Fish Tank
desc: Fish can swim around in here! However, you need to put them in through a Fish Tank Port, sold separately.

name: Rollback Plaque III
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards again, the server burned to bits, and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. August 2015

name: E-Z Rod
desc: Equip this and then use bait on water next to you and go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bait, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. This is a beginner's fishing rod - it keeps fish on the line twice as long as other rods, so it's easy as pie.

name: Licorice Rod
desc: Equip this and then use bait on water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. This delicious fishing rod gets bites twice as often as other rods.

name: Shiny Flashy Thing
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. The shiny stuff appeals to larger fish then Wiggly Worms do.

name: Salmon Eggs
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. These eggs catch mid-sized fish.

name: Fishing Fly
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. The dancing action of these lures can even attract large fish.

name: Shrimp Lure
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. There is no fish too big to enjoy a shrimp lure.

name: Whizmo Gizmo
desc: This is bait for fishing with three high-tech features: it appeals to all sizes and types of fish, it homes in on the largest fish around, and special filtering fins keep it from hooking on anything other than a fish!

name: Electric Eel
desc: It's always a shock to find you've caught one of these on your line. Place it in your world to share the feeling with others.

name: Whale
desc: Don't be fooled just because you caught this whale while fishing - this giant of the ocean is mammal. And shame on you for catching it! They're endangered!

name: Catfish
desc: Catfish. I really don't know why they call these fish catfish. Weird.

name: Perch
desc: These fish are named for the strange way that they tend to hang in mid-air, like solid objects you can stand on. Try it, you can't knock one down no matter how hard you jump on it!

name: Dogfish
desc: Dogfish are a type of shark, and they are so named because they hunt in packs, like dogs do. It has nothing to do with their appearance, which is entirely fishlike and not canine at all.

name: Gar
desc: That doesn't even sound like a real word.

name: Mahi Mahi
desc: This fish is so nice they named it twice.

name: Sunfish
desc: If there's one fish that can brighten your day, this is it.

name: Bass
desc: Don't drop the bass. You'd hurt it.

name: Goldenrod
