desc: Equip this and then use bait in water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. This enchanted rod will catch 25% bigger fish than normal.

name: Fishing Hat
desc: Congratulations on winning the Fishing Frenzy Daily Challenge! With this hat on, there's a 5% chance to not use up your bait when you fish (I mean, there's a bunch of extra bait right there on the hat!).

name: Tackle Box
desc: You keep all your bait for fishing in here. Unfortunately, it's on a timed lock, so it can only be opened every two days.

name: Firefighter Helmet - Red
desc: Protect your head from falling embers, or occasionally falling buildings!

name: Firefighter Helmet - Yellow
desc: Protect your head from falling embers, or occasionally falling buildings!

name: Oxygen Mask
desc: Strap this on when people start tossing rotten eggs. You'll be much happier.

name: Firefighter Boots

func.add: Fire walk with me! Fire does 50% damage.
func.rem: Your feet are no longer safe.

desc: Finally, the technology exists to protect your feet from fire without exposing them to dangerous asbestos! Wear these for fire safety.

name: Firefighter Pants - Red
desc: These pants are made of stylish rubber to ensure you are as overheated as possible while standing in a burning building.

name: Firefighter Pants - Yellow
desc: These pants are made of stylish rubber to ensure you are as overheated as possible while standing in a burning building.

name: Firefighter Jacket - Red
desc: Is it hot in here? Throw on a jacket!

name: Firefighter Jacket - Yellow
desc: Is it hot in here? Throw on a jacket!

name: Pocket Lighter
desc: You just want to watch the world burn. Use this on any tile, whether you own it or not, to set it on fire.

name: Water Balloon
desc: Throw this to splash water over a wide area, putting out fires.

name: Fire Hose

func.add: Where does the water come from?
func.rem: Guess you finally ran out of water.

desc: Where is the other end of this hose plugged in? I don't know, but it has an infinite supply of water! This does no damage to blocks at all, but it puts out fires with great ease!

name: Fire Truck
desc: For the sake of your fellow Growtopians, we limited the siren. But you can still enjoy the flashing lights!

name: Fire Ax
desc: Chop your way into burning buildings to rescue puppies! This device is not licensed for any other use.

name: Firehouse
desc: This building provides protections against all fires! It can put out any fire in your world in seconds.

name: Floating Leaf
desc: This magic leaf can float you around. Just cuz.

name: Soul Harvester Mask
desc: Feast on their souls!!

name: Solar Collector
desc: This biomechanical device accumulates solar energy all day long. Then, when you plant a tree in your world, the stored energy is pumped into the tree, growing it to 25% of full growth instantly!

name: Autumn Viney Block
desc: It may seem obvious, but I'll say it anyway: this block is viney, but turning red and gold.

name: Autumn Viney Wallpaper
desc: It's like you're lost in the jungle! In the middle of October!

name: Autumn Leaf Block
desc: If you don't like it, you can make like this block and leaf. In the fall.

name: Dried Leaf Crown
desc: Handle with care or you're gonna end up with potpourri instead of the Heralded Crown Of Autumn.

name: Musical Gong
desc: If somebody bangs this while you are performing, it means your act is bad and you should feel bad. On the other hand, it plays a nifty tune!

name: Highly Combustible Box
desc: This box is made of gasoline-soaked balsa wood. It's a really bad design. If it gets lit on fire, it will burn up instantly. A few selected items can be tempered by fire though. Perhaps you could store them inside and see what happens when it burns?

name: Skeletal Shark
desc: This is what happens when you don't feed your fish.

name: Ghost Fish
desc: Theres nothing spooky about this fish, its just the kind where you see through it a bit. Kinda weird though.

name: Demon Angler
desc: This is a demonic fish, not a fish that angles for demons. I figured the teeth and eyes made that obvious.

name: Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Bad things.

name: Cursed Fishing Rod
desc: Equip this and then use bait on water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. You will suffer mysterious effects when catching fish with this rod. Beware the curse!

name: Eldritch Flame
desc: The seething fires of the underworld are at your command! Throw this in somebody's world to start a bunch of fires and really annoy them.

name: Flaming Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: This cape burns eternally with eldritch fire. It's also lined with asbestos, so you're all good. Probably.

name: Ghost Costume
desc: Nothing spookier than a bedsheet with two holes cut in it!

name: Chainsaw Hand
desc: If you ever get a possessed hand and have to lop it off at the wrist, here's a handy replacement for it! Also good for ice sculpture.

name: Cape Tatters
desc: This bit of cloth is black on one side and blood-red on the other. If you had 25 of these, you might be able to make a really spooky cape!

name: Inside-Out Vampire Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You accidentally made your cape inside-out!

name: Black Aura

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: I'm pretty sure it's a bad sign when your aura is this color.

name: Hellgate
desc: It seems like the destination of this portal is obvious, but actually you can choose any place you like with your wrench.

name: Riding Demon Dog
desc: It's just like a horse... except PURE EVIL.

name: Teeny Devil Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Even as tiny as they are, these wings allow you to jump in mid-air!

name: Teeny Wing Fragment
desc: This is about an eighth of a Teeny Devil Wing. So if you had 16 of these, you could make a pair of Teeny Devil Wings!

name: Soul Orb

func.add: Suck the souls of innocent blocks!

desc: This orb devours the soul of anything it touches - Growtopians, Blocks Trees, whatever!

name: Dark Magic Barrier
desc: This demonic energy field only lets the right people through.

name: Combusted Box
desc: This box done combusted.

name: Stethoscope
desc: Congratulations on winning the Doctor's Duel Daily Challenge! With this Stethoscope on, you are half as likely to make mistakes in surgery!

name: Super Logo - Crown
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume since you won the Card Clash Daily Challenge! With this logo on, you get +2 health during card battles!

name: Wolf Spirit

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Congratulations on winning the War of Wolves Daily Challenge! With this spirit equipped (it is a back item, by the way), you can double jump, and the guidance of the Wolf Spirit will improve your Wolfworld rewards (usually).

name: Wolfy Block
desc: This is the wolfiest block available with current technology.

name: Challenge Crown
desc: Congratulations! You were #1 in a Daily Challenge! Show off with a shiny crown.

name: Ring Of Savings
desc: Congratulations on winning the Carnie Contest Daily Challenge! With this ring equipped, you save 10% on Golden Ticket prices (pay 90 rarity per ticket, or get 33 per World Lock).

name: Challenge Board
desc: Wrench this board to see the situation with the Daily Challenge!

name: Cosmic Cape

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: This cape sparkles and very very rarely finds leftover Comet Dust in blocks you break when it's not The Night Of The Comet!

name: Rainbow Crystal Block
desc: Congratulations on winning the Crystal Crusher Daily Challenge! Enjoy this rainbowlicious block. Don't you just wanna lick it? Also, if you smash a Harmonic Crystal that is sitting on this block, there's a 20% chance of getting back one of the crystals you put into it.

name: Cosmic Power - Comet Strike
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: 25% chance of doing 1 extra damage whenever your card counters the opponent's.

name: Cosmic Power - Star Burst
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards arent used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you are hit for more than 1 damage at once, the opponent is blasted for 1 damage.

name: Cosmic Power - Lunar Barrier
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you are at or below 25% life, there's a chance to deflect damage done to you.

name: Cosmic Power - Nebula Gas
desc: This is a Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they just have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: When you cards are countered, there's a 25% chance that your card works anyways.

name: Transdimensional Vaporizer Ray
desc: This is a highly advanced alien device with one purpose: it can fire right through solid matter to vaporize background without doing any harm to the foreground blocks. It uses alien batteries which we can't replace, so each Vaporizer can only be used once.

name: Carnival Pinwheel
desc: Enjoy the beauty of this spinny pinwheel!

name: Sword And Shield
desc: This is a classic warrior's combo - a nice cutlass for your main hand, and a shield in the other. This shield makes you harder to knock back!

name: Twin Swords
desc: Why waste time with a shield? Just get two swords!

name: Preppy Blonde Hair
desc: I think you've got just enough gel in there to go to the sock hop with Buffy!

name: Pet Slime
desc: Nothing cuter than a sentient ball of slime that follows you around!

name: Strawberry Slime
desc: So much tastier than mucus flavor!

name: Angry Unicorn Block
desc: This block is angry, and prominently features a unicorn.

name: Legal Briefs
desc: Not only are these comfortable undergarments for everyday use, they also have a legal use: put them on when you are in trouble for Malpractice, and you'll be freed from your punishment! This uses up the Briefs.

name: Ring Of Smithing
desc: To be honest, this ring doesn't really do anything. Well, that is unless you want to smith something. Then you're definitely gonna need to wear this!

name: Anvil
desc: You can forge astounding weapons on this, if it's next to a Forge that's been heated to 1,000 degrees, and you have Smithing Tools, and wear a Ring of Smithing and a Blacksmith's Apron. Oh, and have some item you want to smith. If you've got all that, go ahead and use the item on the anvil!

name: Blacksmith's Apron
desc: This apron is made of heavy leather, making it very effective for protecting you from stray sparks when forging things.

name: Crystal Smithing Tools
desc: These tools are so gentle they break after 1 use! Use them wisely!

name: Blade Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of a sword blade. It's of a low-quality steel and could stand to be tempered.

name: Shield Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of a shield. If you had enough of these, you could probably forge them into a new shield!

name: Tempered Steel Fragment
desc: This is a beautiful steel fragment of a sword blade. If you had enough of these, you could probably forge them into a new sword blade!

name: Sword Pommel
desc: This is a lovingly crafted sword pommel. If only there were a blade to attach it to!

name: Sword Blade
desc: This is a lovingly crafted sword blade. If only there were a pommel to attach it to!

name: Warrior's Shield
desc: This is a loving crafted shield. But you can't punch block with a shield. Maybe you can combine this with a weapon to make a complete set?

name: Forge
desc: You can use this to forge astounding weapons, if you have an Anvil next to it. You'll also need to fuel it with something really hot.

name: Nuclear Fuel
desc: You can feel your cells mutating just being near this lump of radioactive garbage. About the only thing this is good for is firing up a forge to ridiculous levels of heat.

name: Gift of the Unicorn
desc: The unicorn has gifted you great wisdom! The wisdom is thus: If you stick this wisdom, 2 Sword Pommels, and 2 Sword Blades, into a Laboratory and SCIENCE them... well, let's just say it'll be super cool.

name: Giving Tree
desc: "Borrowed" from the Growch's private reserve, this magnificent tree will give you a gift every 4 hours for the duration of Winterfest!

name: Giving Tree Stump
desc: This will regrow into a Giving Tree in a while.

name: Tree Decorations
desc: All sorts of baubles and gewgaws to adorn your Giving Tree in true Winterfest style! One decoration won't do much, but you can toss up to 100 decorations on each tree! More decorations will logically result in better gifts, but taking the gift will remove all the decorations with it!

name: Lumber Axe
desc: This axe is precisely balanced to chop down trees in just a single hit! Now, you might not be impressed since you can do that with your bare hands already. But wait - this axe can chop down the GROWCH'S trees! Of course, doing that will shatter it. They're very special trees.

name: Axe Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of an axe blade. It's not very high quality, perhaps it could be tempered.

name: Icy Heart Of Winter
desc: You've found the Growch's icy heart! No wonder he's so mean - it's not even in his body! That's a major medical problem that would upset anyone.

name: Icy Heart Pickup
desc: Players pick up an Icy Heart of Winter by touching this.

name: Axe Of Winter
desc: Mittens are recommended when wielding this icy monstrosity, which does extra damage to blocks.

name: Moose Cap
desc: This beautifully styled hat, suitable for all formal occasions, has the unique property of attracting wild meese to follow you around.

name: Candy Cane Bait
desc: This is a bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This is the only bait that is its own hook! It catches unique seasonal fish that other bait doesn't appeal to.

name: Neon Squid
desc: This squid glows in neon colors! What a fine holiday gift it would make.

name: Antarctic Icefish
desc: These fish have the ability to survive in Antarctic waters because they actually have antifreeze in their blood! Its science, google it.

name: Gingerbread Fish
desc: You know how you can dunk cookies in milk? This one was dunked in the ocean. Kinda gross.

name: Swedish Fish
desc: This breed of fish is unique to the waters of Sweden, and it has a surprisingly sweet taste when eaten raw. Don't eat yours though, it's a pet.

name: Snowcone
desc: Yum, fruit flavors poured into ice! At least it's yum until all the flavoring gets sucked out.

name: Toboggan
desc: This sled was called "Onion Bulb" by its original owner, but you can call it whatever you want. It comes with a free purple blanket to keep your legs warm!

name: Winter Wind
desc: Place this anywhere you want the wind to come ripping through and push players around! The wind blows in the direction that you would blow air when placing it, so you can place it either way.

name: Snowflake Block
desc: Just one exceptionally large snowflake, perfectly preserved in lucite. I don't know how they did it, but it's nice and slippery!

name: Winter Robe
desc: Be the King of Winter in this luxurious satiny robe! Note: this is a "chest item", like a necklace, so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.

name: Magical Carrot

func.add: A snowman seems to be following you.

desc: With just a touch of winter magic, it's really not that hard to bring a snowman to life. I don't know why more people don't do it!

name: Hot Chocolate
desc: Mmm, sweet and toasty, with marshmallows! This not only warms your insides, but it also contains a massive dose of delicious iodine to clear out any radiation you're currently suffering from. Inexplicably it also charges up Geiger Counters when consumed. I can't explain that one.

name: Tempered Axe Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of an axe blade, tempered to polished steel! With enough of these, and a suitable source of enraged winter fury, you could forge an amazing Icy Axe Blade.

name: Icy Axe Blade
desc: This blade is enchanted with winter magic! You could build an awesome weapon with a pair of these and a handle... well, it'd be awesome if you could hold it. Maybe you need something to protect your hands when holding it.

name: Steel Axe Handle
desc: This thing has a nice heft, and handy notches for inserting up to two axe blades. The only real downside is that it's made entirely of metal, so if you were to place, say, magical ice blades in it, the cold would be transmitted right to your hand, and you wouldn't be able to hold it.

name: Grip Tape
desc: This is handy for wrapping around the handle of a weapon or tool. It can improve your grip, as well as protect you from cold metal handles.

name: Riding Winter Wolf
desc: It's just like a horse... except soft and fuzzy!

name: Weather Machine - Snowy Night
desc: Man, the weather outside is frightful! And dark!

name: Elf Stockings
desc: This is just really long underwear. You probably should wear pants over them, but hey, Growtopia doesn't support that, so you'll just have to be cold!

name: Sock On The Wall
desc: You'll need to wash your socks. This one stuck to the wall!

name: Steam Gear
desc: This is a cog in a vast steam machine. Or can it be, if you build one, with this in it! This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.

name: Steam Tubes
desc: Tubes for directing steam power. This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam flows straight when possible, otherwise it turns right (and turns left if it can't do that!)

name: Steam Piston
desc: Steam power makes it go whump whump whump. This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.

name: Steam Lifter Piston
desc: Steam power makes it go whump whump whump up and down. This links up to other steam blocks and can conduct steam power.

name: Steam Bellows
desc: Steam power makes it go eenk-oonk-eenk (pardon the technical terminology). This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.

name: Steam Riser Bellows
desc: Steam power makes it go eenk-oonk-eenk up and down (pardon the technical terminology). This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power.

name: Steam Stomper
desc: Jump on this to shoot steam below it! Use the other Steam Blocks to direct the steam when you need it.

name: Growtopia Fan Shirt
desc: This amazing psychic shirt can actually display your thought with spectacular new morphing Ink technology. Note: Yeah, it just says the one thing, but you know you're thinking it.

name: T-Shirt Cannon
desc: Powered by a Fuel Pack on your back, this gun can launch free T-shirts at your fellow Growtopians! Don't waste shots at anything else, it still burns fuel!

name: Ghost Fan Shirt
desc: You like ghosts? No? Sure looks like you do.

name: Pineapple Fan Shirt
desc: Who doesnt pineapple GT?

name: Steam Valve
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. If steam enters this block from the top or bottom, it will go out the bigger side, and the valve will flip for the next time.

name: Steam Organ
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When steam passes through this block, it plays a beautiful music! Use your wrench to adjust what note comes out.

name: Steam Vent
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When steam passes through this block, it vents some out with intense heat! Do not touch this for 3 seconds after steam has been through.

name: Steam Door
desc: Punch it to open it or shut it. But even if you don't have access to do that, you can still open and shut it with steam power!

name: Steampunk Corset
desc: Tired of always choosing the survival of your internal organs over looking skinny? The corset is the thing for you!

name: Steampunk Skirt
desc: Multiple layers of petticoats keep you warm!

name: Steampunk Top Hat
desc: Keep an extra pair of googles up there. You never know when you'll need them.

name: Steampunk Waistcoat
desc: This perfect garment for housing a pocketwatch, monocle, and perhaps taxidermy needles. Definitely some weird stuff in those pockets.

name: Steampunk Leggings
desc: Works equally well for a steampunk or a pirate! Or maybe a dancer from the 80s.

name: Steampunk Trenchcoat
desc: Keep warm on those frosty London evenings in this stylish piece by Grow Couture! Note: this is a Chest item, like a necklace so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.

name: Party Blaster
desc: Take the party with you everywhere you go!

name: Tempered Party Tunes
desc: This is a highly polished bit of music. So shiny! Enough of these might be able to forge a relic' from ancient times past...

name: 80's Tape Deck
desc: Wow, this is some seriously old technology. It's no good without a suitable power source and some speakers to rock out of.

name: D Battery
desc: A portable source of a tiny amount of power.

name: ERROR!
desc: Please contact support to fix this item!

name: Steampunk Sprocket
desc: There's not a lot of difference between a sprocket and a gear. But this is a sprocket.

name: Steampunk Gearbox
desc: It's a box full of sprockets and gears and whatnots! It's probably part of an awesome steampunk creation.

name: Stretched Canvas
desc: It's not the prettiest decoration for your world, but it's probably got some other good uses.

name: Silkworm
desc: A cute little pet for you to feed and care for! They'll eat almost anything, but don't forget to give them water too. Use your wrench to change your pet's name.

name: Silk Bolt - Red
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Green
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Blue
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Black
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - White
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Grey
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Yellow
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Purple
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Silk Bolt - Aqua
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Sewing Machine
desc: Use Silk Bolts on this machine to sew them together into finished products. You'll need 3 bolts of silk, and you'll have to sew them in the right order, using the right type of stitching!

name: Silk Turban
desc: Cover up that hair!

name: Patchwork Mess
desc: An experiment in sewing gone horribly wrong. This is just a bunch of silk stitched together in random directions.

name: Silk Vest - Red
desc: A snappy vest suitable for all occasion.

name: Silk Vest - Green
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.

name: Silk Vest - Blue
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.

name: Silk Vest - Purple
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.

name: Silk Vest - Grey
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.

name: Silk Vest - Black
desc: A snappy vest suitable for any occasion.

name: Silk Tie - Red
desc: You will command respect in this power tie!

name: Silk Tie - Yellow
desc: You will command respect in this power tie!

name: Silk Tie - Black
desc: You will command respect in this power tie!

name: Silk Tie - Blue
desc: You will command respect in this power tie!

name: Silk Tie - Grey
desc: You will command respect in this power tie!

name: Silk Skirt - Red
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Silk Skirt - Blue
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Silk Skirt - Aqua
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Silk Skirt - Black
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Silk Skirt - White
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Silk Skirt - Purple
desc: A classic look, available in a variety of colors.

name: Country Flag
desc: Place this anywhere to proudly display your country's flag!

name: Lovebird Pendant
desc: Pip pip! This little bird will follow you around forever, because it loves you. Or at least it loves that necklace, and possibly wants it back.

name: Booty Chest
desc: Store your treasures inside by dropping them! When it's closed, the items are hidden. Punch to open it.

name: Golden Booty Chest
desc: Smash it for Valentine's goodies! Every year the Golden Heart Crystal is locked in time and remains constant, appearing at the same frequency throughout the ages, while new items change and fade with the passage of time.

name: Sour Lollipop
desc: Zing! This is one tart little lollipop.

name: Sweet Lollipop
desc: Mmm! This is one sweet little lollipop.

name: Pink Marble Arch
desc: This rich marble comes from the hills of Cupidia, and our finest artisans have carved it into this sturdy arch.

name: Silkworm Toy
desc: Whee! Silkworms love to play with these. Whatever they are.

name: Steam Collector
desc: If steam enters this block, it will be held there for up to 20 seconds. The collector will hold as much steam as it takes to shoot it out of every output (except the one that the last steam entered from), and then shoot them all out. I hope that makes sense. Try it.

name: Steam Scrambler
desc: This link up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. If steam enters this block, it will exit in a random legal direction.

name: Dark Cult Hood
desc: When you reach level 7 in the cult, like Jairrocket, your eyes get glowy.

name: Serpent Staff
desc: St. Patrick wandered around Ireland with one of these. It scared away all the other snakes because they saw it and thought he was constantly strangling a snake.

name: Roasted Cobra
desc: Deep fried on a stick! This tasty treat is found at your local county fair, obviously.

name: Cobra Statuette
desc: This beautifully carved image of a cobra has two sockets for gems in the eyes.

name: Yellow Diamond
desc: Flawlessly cut from our master gemologists, enjoy this transcendent jewel, an heirloom to last a lifetime.

name: Potato Couch
desc: If you feel like a couch potato, there's no better place to relax than a potato couch.

name: Potato
desc: There's no end of ways to make these tasty... fry em, bake em, roast em, grill em. Just don't forget the salt!

name: Lucky Pendant
desc: This pendant symbolizes two snakes eating themselves. Whatever that means, it also causes a luck dragon to follow you around! Note: it's the dragon that's lucky, not you. I guess you're just lucky to hang around with it!

name: Catch-of-the-Day Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait won't catch anything but the Catch of the Day, which changes each day. Fish have a chance to escape, though! Bonus: Fish caught this way can be larger than the normal maximum size!

name: Rainbowfish
desc: Nobody knows where the name of this fish came from, it's quite mysterious.

name: Totally Legit Bunnyfish
desc: You have caught the incredibly rare and elusive, and completely real Bunnyfish! There's nothing fake about this at all!

name: Seahorse
desc: This rare fish is very hard to keep in an aquarium, requiring careful feeding and cleaning, and a constantly maintained temperature. Lucky for you, this is a videogame, and you can just dump it in and forget about it.

name: Mutant Fish
desc: Looks like the comet's radiation has caused unfortunate mutations in the wildlife. You gotta wonder what it's doing to you...

name: Riding Bumblebee

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You're too heavy for this bee to fly, but it can help you jump an extra time.

name: Spring Crown
desc: Keep it watered or you'll end up with a crown of thorns instead of the Heralded Crown Of Spring.

name: Weather Machine - Spring
desc: Punch this to enjoy springtime weather, anytime! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Lobster Trap
desc: Put this in deep water, load it up with 5 of any type of bait, and wait... Come back and check the trap by punching it occasionally. It may be days before an animal will wander in! You just better hope they don't wander back out with your bait.

name: Lobster
desc: Who ever decided that a giant ocean spider would be something tasty to eat? Shudder.

name: Purple Shore Crab
desc: These guys are pretty crabby.

name: Alaskan King Crab
desc: Strange thing about this crab: Alaska isnt actually a monarchy.

name: Dungeonist Crab
desc: This crab comes armed for dungeon exploration!

name: Crawdad
desc: Whether you call them crawfish, crayfish, crawdads, or even mudbugs, its really just a little tiny lobster.

name: Hermit Crab
desc: Stay off of its lawn!

name: Brainflower
desc: Flower power! This flowers roots growing down into your brain make you smarter at finding Magic Eggs in an Egg-Hunting Basket. Who knows, you might even find two sometimes!

name: Mermaid Tail
desc: You don't need to trade your voice for a pair of legs... just take this off and you're all set! But this tail does make you move faster in the water, and slower on land.

name: Sushi Knife
desc: This razor-sharp blade has the unique ability to slice up fresh chunks for sushi! Just drop a fish item on a Cutting Board, then attack it with the Sushi Knife!

name: Fish Chunk
desc: Gross, it's a slimy bit of fresh fish.

name: Cutting Board
desc: Place poor innocent fish on this and then slice them up with Sushi Knife!

name: Rice
desc: The most popular food on Earth has finally come to Growtopia!

name: Maki Roll
desc: Dude, you know that fish is raw, right?

name: Spring Bouquet
desc: Aw, a lovely bunch of flowers to share!

name: Paint Bucket - Red
desc: Brush this cerulean shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Yellow
desc: Brush this cerulean shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Green
desc: Brush this verdant shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Aqua
desc: Brush this aquatic shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Blue
desc: Brush this cerulean shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Purple
desc: Brush this cerulean shade onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Charcoal
desc: Brush this ebony onto blocks with a paintbrush to customize your world's appearance!

name: Paint Bucket - Varnish
desc: Brush this caustic fluid onto blocks with a paintbrush to wipe off any color you've painted onto them

name: Paintbrush
desc: Paint the town a variety of delightful colors with this here brush! Paint not included.

name: Steam Revolver
desc: Run through this to shoot steam upward! Use the other Steam Blocks to direct the steam where you need it.

name: Steam Launcher
desc: Stomp on this and... nothing happens! But pump steam into it first to charge up, and it become a steam-powered trampoline!

name: Saturday Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Anulot's bringing in the funk.

name: Raspberry Beret
desc: This is the kind you find at a second-hand store.

name: Artist's Smock
desc: Looks like you spilled a little there. No, over there. And there. And the first place you thought I meant.

name: Goatee
desc: You're either a hipster or an evil twin. Or perhaps... a hipster's evil twin? How would you know which one is evil!?

name: Writing Desk
desc: Nowadays people prefer laptops, but sometimes a good old ink and quilt is what you need. Those items were all hundreds of years ago, of course.

name: Arrow Placard
desc: This sign includes a bit of added information - an arrow! The arrow points whichever direction you are facing when you place the sign.

name: Scroll Bulletin
desc: Lets people communicate by leaving message to each other.

name: Gilded Frame
desc: Surround your art with a beautiful frame! Comes with a blank canvas inside if you don't have any art. Note: if your art is made of background blocks, you'll need to apply Block Glue to it to make the frame surround it.

name: Painting Easel
desc: Wrench this to paint your favorite item on it!

name: Orange Shirt
desc: I know you dreamed about this since Day 1 of Growtopia. It is finally here. For real. Yes - there is an Orange Shirt, and it's not just a block, you can WEAR IT.

name: Funtime Block
desc: Wheeeee! This block spins wildly when somebody steps on it.

name: Weather Machine - Howling Sky
desc: Howling in shadows, living in a lunar spell, he finds his heaven...  This weather has up to 3 wolves in it, which is an incredible wolf-to-machine ratio you won't find anywhere else.

name: Homeopathic Medicine
desc: Exactly 100% as effective as real-life Homeopathic Medicine! These sugar pills are sure to cure what ails you, or my name isn't Xjlgfkvhsnas.

name: Howling Wolf Emblem
desc: Slap this emblem around your world to show you are one with the wolf!

name: Charbroiled Wolf Emblem
desc: Why did you burn up your beautiful wolf emblem?

name: Hero Portrait - Buddy
desc: Hey, that villain was carrying a picture of Buddy, the Growtopia mascot!

name: Picasso Triggerfish
desc: Also known as Hawaii's state fish, the Humuhumunukunukuapua'a. Yes, that's one of my favorite words.

name: Fish And Chips
desc: Deep fried goodness. Enjoy it with some malt vinegar!

name: Battle Pet Cage
desc: This is the perfect place to starve and torture your pets, turning them into brutal engines of destruction! Wrench it to insert a pet. Note: you can never remove a battle pet - they've become too dangerous to be set loose! If you destroy a cage with a pet inside, the pet is destroyed.

name: Axolotl
desc: This isnt a fish, its actually a salamander. A cute little mexican salamander!

name: Battle Leash
desc: This amazing octohedron can actually contain two Battle Pets, primed and ready to strike. Unequip and re-equip to swap pet is active. Wrench a Battle Cage to load a pet into the Leash. Wrench another player with a Battle Leash to battle them! You must have 2 pets in the Battle Leash to battle.

name: Pet Trainer
desc: This trainer's stepping on your turf. Take him down with your Battle Leash!

name: Dark Cave Background
desc: This far-away dirt is speckled with shiny minerals. However, this dirt is in a dark cave (I don't care where you put it, IT IS IN A DARK CAVE!!). Players can only see what's on this tile if it's in their line of sight, or they have special tools.

name: Steam Engine
desc: Feed Nuclear Fuel to heat this above 500 degrees, and it will generate steam toward the left or right (depending on how it's placed)! Use the other Steam Blocks to direct the steam where you need it. This is a steam generator.

name: Lock Mover
desc: Use this fabulous device anywhere in a world you have world-locked to move the World Lock to a new location. There must be an empty space where you tap for this to work.

name: Cave Blast
desc: This devastating bomb will create a brand new underground cave world, full of darkness and creepy surprises!

name: Cave Dirt
desc: Yep, it's dirt. In a cave.

name: Cave Column
desc: Cave Dirt hooks into this like it's got Block Glue on it, so you can build seamless caverns. These are just fun pillars to hide behind in a cave!

name: Stalagmite
desc: These dangerous spikes grow from the GROUND (StalaGmite!) as water drips down and accumulates minerals. Cave Dirt will blend into them seamlessly.

name: Stalactite
desc: These dangerous spikes grow from the CEILING (stalaCtite!) as water deposits minerals on its way to dripping down. Cave Dirt will blend into them seamlessly.

name: Cave Platform
desc: Handy rock platforms. These connect seamlessly to Cave Dirt and can sit atop Cave Columns as well.

name: Spelunker's Headlamp
desc: This hardhat protects you from falling rocks, while the headlamp lights up the dark caverns.

name: Night Vision Goggles
desc: Equipping this lets you disregard darkness completely! If you're not in a world you own, they consume 1 D Battery for every minute you wear them. You can wear them without a battery if you just want to look cool, though.

name: Hand Torch
desc: British people would call this a flashlight, but this is an actual torch, for your hand. As opposed to an Adventure Item or wall torch. Carrying this lights up dark caves. Torches burn out at unpredictable moments, so carry several.

name: Purple Cave Crystal
desc: These crystals grow naturally in caves. They don't actually glow - bioluminescent organisms feed on them and emit light. Also heat - be careful!

name: Golden Cave Crystal
desc: These crystals grow naturally in caves. They don't actually glow - bioluminescent organisms feed on them and emit light. Also heat - be careful!

name: Aqua Cave Crystal
desc: These crystals grow naturally in caves. They don't actually glow - bioluminescent organisms feed on them and emit light. Also heat - be careful!

name: Climbing Wall
desc: Install this right next to walls. It will add bumps and grooves for Climbing Boots to latch onto, so people can climb wall with the right tools!

name: Climbing Picks

func.add: You slice and dice! And climb!

desc: These handy picks allow you to climb Climbing Walls. Just jump and hold the arrow towards the wall!

name: Climbing Boots
desc: These handy boots allow you to climb Climbing Walls. Just jump and hold the arrow towards the wall!

name: Steam Pipe
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. The big difference is it's behind you so you can walk over it!

name: Maracas
desc: Shake shake shake your maracas!

name: Pinata Pal

func.add: My pal is stuffed with candy!

desc: When you are feeling down and lonely, nothing cheers you up like a rainbow-colored friendly burro filled with candy!

name: Festive Banner
desc: Whatever occasion you have to celebrate, this banner is sure to make it more celebratory.

name: Fish Taco
desc: Fresh Baja taste, with a guacamole cream sauce.

name: Fiesta Dress
desc: Got a festive occasion to celebrate? Pop on this colorful number for a night on the town!

name: Golden Treasure Hoard
desc: Ooh, smash that pile of gold, jewels and priceless treasure! There's probably something GOOD inside!

name: Topaz Block
desc: Flawlessly cut by our master gemologists, enjoy this transcendent jewel, an heirloom to last a lifetime.

name: Deep Iron
desc: Mine this to forge stuff out of Deep Iron.

name: Deep Iron Ore
desc: This is raw ore, mined from the deep within the Earth. Surely there's something you can do with it!

name: Deep Iron Ingot
desc: You've managed to process this ore into a pure, shining ingot, just by tossing it into a fire!

name: Pick Blade
desc: This pick blade is forged from Deep Iron, which makes it particularly attuned to pickin real darn good.

name: Guardian Pineapple
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this jealous pineapple prevents anyone from using Consumable items in your world.

name: Pineapple Ring
desc: Watch out, these are really slippery to stand on!

name: Pineapple Fish
desc: This SHOULD be known as Hawaii's state fish!

name: Pineapple Daiquiri
desc: Mmm, this non-alcoholic cocktail is sweet and fruity!

name: Pineapple Hair
desc: This hair isn't made of pineapple, it's just been dyed and gelled to look like pineapple leaves.

name: Pet Trainer Cap
desc: This hat says PT on it. You can wear it to show you're a Pet Trainer, but you could also use it to celebrate Physical Therapy, or Popcorn Time, or whatever you like!

name: Silkworm Leash
desc: You wanna take your Silkworm for a walk? Use this on it! Note: The silkworm will become a permanent pet, no longer able to produce silk. Good news: it will also become immortal!

name: Silkworm Saddle
desc: Use this on your silkworm to saddle up and ride! Note: The silkworm will become a permanent riding item, no longer able to produce silk. Good news: it will also become immortal!

name: Leashed Silkworm - Red
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Green
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Blue
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Black
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - White
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Grey
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Purple
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Yellow
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Leashed Silkworm - Aqua
desc: Silkworm on a silk string.

name: Riding Silkworm - Red
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Green
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Blue
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Black
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - White
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Grey
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Purple
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Yellow
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: Riding Silkworm - Aqua
desc: The more legs your ride has, the smoother it is. Too bad centipedes don't grow this big.

name: CRISPR Technology
desc: This is not a tasty potato chip. With this cutting-edge genetic technology, you can splice Battle Pets of different elements together! One CRISPR is used up for each cross-element splice you perform.

name: Genetic Resequencer
desc: Wrench a Battle Pet Cage with a pet inside, and you can use this to resequence their DNA. It will rotate the order of their 3 powers, so that their 1st gene-spliced ability becomes their natural ability, and thus their appearance.

name: Pet Trainer Medal
desc: Congratulations! You have been awarded a medal for defeating a Pet Trainer!

name: Whale Block
desc: Whale whale whale, you'll really have to wail on this block to smash it. But you'll have a whale of a time doing it! And what a tail to tell it will be. I'm way ill from all of these puns, I'm gonna start blubbering. ORCA.

name: Pet Trainer Whistle
desc: You know how to battle a Pet Trainer, right? You just put your lips together, and blow this whistle. You might want to have a fully stocked Battle Leash first though, because Pet Trainers won't stay around waiting to fight you forever!

name: Thinking Cap
desc: They say two heads are better than one. We can't arrange that, but we can get you two of what's inside your head!

name: Phlogiston
desc: This fantastic substance contains the very essence of living flame.

name: Lock-Bot
desc: This robot works for Locke. He'll trade you fabulous items for locks! He'll only stick around in your world for 24 hours before he's needed elsewhere, though.

name: Lock-Bot Remote
desc: This handy remote will call Lock-Bot to your world at the location you specify. It only works once, so choose wisely! Lock-Bot will leave after 24 hours.

name: Toy Lock-Bot

func.add: Clearly you have too many world locks.

desc: It's just like Lock-Bot, only tiny! And he doesn't trade locks, he SHOOTS them.

name: Burnt Leather
desc: If this was a piece of a pig, you'd call a pork rind. But it's a cow rind. Strong material for crafting!

name: Buckle Design
desc: This paper details a method for forging a buckle out of Deep Iron. If you forge 100 Deep Iron Ingots with this design in hand, you'll make an Iron Buckle instead of a Pick Blade.

name: Iron Buckle
desc: This buckle would be good for holding straps together, if you need for such things!

name: Weather Machine - Heatwave
desc: This amazing new weather machine emits a vortex of howling flame, but if you wrench it, youll find adjustable settings to control the color of the flames! You can only have one of these per world.

name: Riding Phoenix
desc: Whoa, you're really sitting on the ride now. There are only 500 of these in existence, so don't lose yours!

name: Red Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!

name: Green Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!

name: Blue Flip Flops
desc: Bright rubber to protect your feet from pointy shells on the beach!

name: Paper Airplane
desc: Toss it and see where it goes! It'll smash if it hits any blocks, so aim carefully. Tap the direction you want to throw it. The further from yourself you tap, the harder you throw.

name: B.O.O. Shirt
desc: The official uniform of the B.O.O. - Battlers of the Otherworldly. Join today!

name: B.O.O. Pants
desc: The official uniform of the B.O.O. - Battlers of the Otherworldly. Join today!

name: Spectral Goggles
desc: The spectrally polarized lenses of these goggles allow you to actually see paranormal activity. Be warned: it is very spooky! But it's there whether you can see it or not... wouldn't you rather know?

name: B.O.O. Helmet
desc: The trouble with poltergeists is that theyre always pushing things off of shelves (side note: cats pose same problem). Thats where the helmet comes in. Protect yourself from falling books and antiques!

name: Neutron Pack
desc: This backpack contains a portable nuclear reactor. I know that sounds a bit unsafe, but... well, it is. It's a terrible idea. It has blinky lights, though. You'll need to wear a Neutron Pack to power a Neutron Gun.

name: Neutron Gun

func.add: You fire Neutron Beams (requires Neutron Pack to work)

desc: This energy blaster looks impressive, but actually has no impact on our world. Rather, it creates a stream of neutrons that attracts spirits. Ghosts can't escape the beam. Which reminds me: Don't ever cross your beam with somebody else's! That would be bad.

name: Rubber Boots
desc: These are tight-fitting boots made of a natural rubber that protects from slime while still allowing your feet to breathe.

name: Ghost Jar
desc: Place this jar down and it will suck in a ghost that's above it. You will probably need some friends with Neutron Guns to keep the ghost contained or it will escape! A jar takes 2 seconds to activate, and then only collects spirits for 5 seconds, so time it carefully.

name: Ghost-In-A-Jar
desc: Spooky! This jar contains a ghost! You can throw it to break the jar and unleash the ghost, or instead Drop it gently in front of a Spirit Storage Unit where you can keep the ghost for good.

name: Spirit Storage Unit
desc: This incredible machine was invented a hundred years ago, and still runs on Steam power! Drop Ghosts-In-A-Jar in front of it, then provide it with Steam power to store the ghosts. Warning: If you overload the device, it may explode!

name: Destroyed Spirit Storage Unit
desc: An SSU that exploded. No good for anything now.

name: Ectoplasm Sample
desc: This is an important scientific discovery that could change our understanding of life itself! But you know what'd be fun? Throwing it at somebody.

name: Crystallized Ghost
desc: This ghost underwent some kind of reaction during a Spirit Storage explosion, and now it's been crystallized inside a solid block. Maybe one day scientists will extract its DNA and make a theme park of ghosts. Probably not, since ghosts don't have DNA.

name: Warning Block
desc: When something is so dangerous there's no time for words, just throw down some yellow and black stripes!

name: Warning Background
desc: When something is so dangerous theres no time for words, just throw down some yellow and black stripes!

name: Demon Control Cap
desc: With this helmet, which is not a colander at all, you can control a demon dog from another dimension!

name: Haunted Pants
desc: What's that eerie noise coming from in there? These pants must be haunted!

name: Root Beer
desc: Ah, a cold frosty mug root beer. The only downside is that all that carbonation is sure to make you burp a tiny bit...

name: Spray Tan
desc: If you don't want to get cancer from the sun, spray this on your skin to get an ultra-realistic bronze tone! Warning: Causes lots and lots of cancer. Lots.

name: Shark-Tooth Necklace
desc: I don't know if this is a tooth from every shark you've killed, or each one that's bitten you, but either way it's impressive.

name: Firefin
desc: Its not too tough to figure out where this fish gets its name. During the winter, they stay in warmer waters, but for the week of Summerfest, these can be found in their old spawning grounds right here in Growtopia!

name: Bone Spikes
desc: Someone has stacked a bunch of bones here and sharpened the ends. I know that's dangerous in itself, but aren't you a little more concerned about exactly who did it and where they are now?

name: Ghost Charm
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this horrific face terrifies even ghosts, preventing new ghosts from appearing in your world. Ghosts that are already in your world still need to be captured by B.O.O. professionals, however. The poor ghosts are trapped on this earthly plane!

name: Steam Funnel
desc: The links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam can enter this Funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!

name: Steam Funnel - Up
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. Steam can enter this Funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!

name: Steam Funnel - Down
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and conduct steam power. Steam can enter this funnel from 3 sides, but can only exit from one side. You figure out which!

name: B.O.O. Sign
desc: Advertise your ghost-hunting services with this handy sign! You're a proud member of B.O.O., so let everybody know. Use your wrench to set the message.

name: Data Bedrock
desc: No info.

name: Shark Tooth
desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back to the shark dentist...

name: Atomic Fireball
desc: For when lava isn't hot enough!

name: Steam Crossover
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. It's actually 2 unconnected pipes - one runs from left to down, and the other runs from up to right. Use this to keep steam from going places you don't want!

name: Steam Crank
desc: This links up to other Steam blocks and can conduct steam power. When punched, this pipe rotates between horizontal and vertical. Use your wrench to decide whether to allow the public to adjust it.

name: Steam Lamp
desc: This crystal lamp is powered by steam! It burns for 10 seconds each time it gets charged. It can only be powered from below. The Steam Code prohibits more than 100 steam-powered items in a world.

name: Steam Spikes
desc: Steam forces razor-shape spikes from the ground in this dastardly trap! It can only be powered from below. Power it again to lower the spikes.

name: No-Face
desc: Embarassed? Feel like hiding your face? How about just removing it instead?

name: Purple Djellaba
desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!

name: Yellow Djellaba
desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!

name: Green Djellaba
desc: This long robe is suitable for male or female Growtopians, provided they want to look snazzy and colorful!

name: Mini Blocks
desc: These blocks are only 1/4 the size of a normal block! To make up for that, they come in sets of four.

name: Teeny Blocks
desc: These blocks are only 1/4 the size of Mini Blocks! To make up for that, they come in sets of sixteen.

name: Jigsaw Wallpaper
desc: Well, that was easy... It's a picture of a jigsaw puzzle!

name: Riding Broomstick
desc: What magic makes this fly? Witch magic makes this fly!

name: Techno Visor
desc: This is handy technology for people who are overwhelmed with modern life - it blocks one of your ears from hearing things, and one of your eyes from seeing things. Just relax and enjoy the left half of the world.

name: Glowstick
desc: This plastic tube of lethal radioactive elements is the perfect thing to swing around at a party! It also provides light.

name: Display Shelf
desc: These are some big shelves. Why not display your favorite items on them? They can hold four items to display.

name: One-Way Block
desc: This block can only be moved through in the direction the arrow is pointing. From the other direction, it might as well be a wall!

name: VIP Entrance
desc: The fanciest door in town! The only people getting through this door are the ones who are on The List. Wrench the door to add people to The List. Or remove them, if they have offended you in some way.

name: Rhino Horn
desc: Aw, it thinks you're its mama.

name: Globe
desc: Add a little class to your office with a globe! You can also wrench it to check the current top worlds.

name: Challenge Timer
desc: Players can punch this to begin a challenge: get from the Challenge Start Flag to the Challenge End Flag before time runs out! Wrench the timer to set up your challenge and insert prizes.

name: Challenge Start Flag
desc: Use this with a Challenge Timer. Wrench it to set an ID, so it knows which Challenge Timer to work with.

name: Challenge End Flag
desc: Use this with a Challenge Timer. Wrench it to set an ID, so it knows which Challenge Timer to work with.

name: Fish Wall Mount
desc: Proud of your catch, but you don't want the responsibility of caring for it? Mount it to this wall plaque with your wrench! You can display Perfect or Massive fish on this mount. Once a fish is mounted, it can never be removed.

name: Octopus Head
desc: This is why aquariums have rules.

name: Stonefish
desc: This is one of the most poisonous fish in the world! It's also made of rock, which is weird.

name: Tamago Sushi
desc: Wait, this sushi doesnt even have fish in it!

name: Portrait
desc: Demonstrating your speed-painting skills by painting pictures of anyone in your world in moments! Wrench the portrait to begin painting. It costs 2 of each color of paint for each painting.

name: Orca
desc: You could put this in a fish tank, but then people would probably make documentaries about you. Not flattering ones.

name: Red Hair Dye
desc: Pour this gunk on your head if you want your hair to be red! It may require multiple applications to achieve the desired color, or mixing with other dyes. The dye interacts with your natural hair color, so some colors may simply be impossible to achieve.

name: Green Hair Dye
desc: Pour this gunk on your head if you want your hair to be green! It may require multiple applications to achieve the desired color, or mixing with other dyes. The dye interacts with your natural hair color, so some colors may simply be impossible to achieve.

name: Blue Hair Dye
desc: Pour this gunk on your head if you want your hair to be blue! It may require multiple applications to achieve the desired color, or mixing with other dyes. The dye interacts with your natural hair color, so some colors may simply be impossible to achieve.

name: Black Hair Dye
desc: Pour this gunk on your head if you want your hair to be black! It may require multiple applications to achieve the desired color, or mixing with other dyes. The dye interacts with your natural hair color, so some colors may simply be impossible to achieve.

name: Shampoo
desc: Messed your hair up with dyes? Wash it out with the refreshing scent of lime, coconut, wallaby, and pears. Lather, rinse, and repeat - one bottle might not do the job.

name: Weather Machine - Stuff
desc: It's rainin' stuff! This amazing new weather machine will let you choose any item you have to rain down from the sky! Wrench it to choose your item and adjust other settings. You can only have one of these per world.

name: Beehive
desc: I feel like this warning is unnecessary, but I'll say it anyway: don't punch a beehive.

name: Honey
desc: The sweet nectar of bee spit! Bees also craft plastic bear shapes to store it in. Nobody knows why.

name: Sorcerer Stone
desc: There's mystical gem embedded in this rock. Heck, there's probably a few in there. Smash it open and see!

name: Villain Portrait - The Harvester
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of The Harvester for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Cosmic Power - Life Harvest
desc: This is a Rare Cosmic Superpower card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Cosmic Cards aren't used, they have an effect as long as they are in your hand. Card effect: Heal 1 life every time you inflict more than 1 damage.

name: Super Shirt - Autumn
desc: Fight crime in this mighty leafy leotard!

name: Muscle Shirt - Autumn
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty leafy leotard!

name: Heroic Tights - Autumn
desc: To be a leafy superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Super Tights - Autumn
desc: To be a leafy superhero, you really need to wear tights of some sort.

name: Heroic Boots - Autumn
desc: These boots add nothing to your crimefighting skills except to protect you from stray Legos.

name: Superhero Mask - Autumn
desc: Protect your secret identity!

name: Crimefighter Mask - Autumn
desc: Protect your secret identity!

name: Super Cape - Autumn

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You're no heroman, but it's still pretty swell.

name: Superheroine Top - Autumn
desc: Flex your muscles in this mighty leafy leotard!

name: Super Eye Mask - Autumn
desc: Protect you secret identity by hiding the inch of skin around your eyes. Who could possibly recognize you?

name: Super Logo - Leaf
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight crime as... Leaf Lord? Lady Leaf? The Fallen Avenger? It's up to you!

name: Harvest Witch Mask
desc: Normally this mask is only worn during the most profane of dark rituals, beneath a blood red moon. But you can wear it for shopping, parties, whatever!

name: Harvest Horn
desc: Don't blow this horn. Never blow this horn. It is evil.

name: Ancestor Mooncake
desc: This pastry is filled with a sweet bean paste. An image of your ancestor is imprinted on the top. Mix this with other Mooncakes in a Laboratory or E-Z Cook Oven to create special Harvest Festival items.

name: Blue Hanbok Top
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Orange Hanbok Top
desc: These festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Blue Hanbok Pants
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Orange Hanbok Pants
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Green Hanbok Skirt
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Yellow Hanbok Skirt
desc: These Festival clothes are extra festive!

name: Sunflower Hair Pin
desc: When sunflowers are out of season, stick this plastic replacement in your hair.

name: Lil' Sheepers
desc: Baa. This little baby sheep will follow you everywhere you go! Mainly because it's tied to your wrist.

name: Sheep
desc: Baaaaaaa. You can shear a sheep once every few days!

name: Wool
desc: This is just a blob of wool. Not too useful. Get 100 of these to weave a bolt together!

name: Wool Bolt
desc: Sew wool items by using this in a sewing machine with silk bolts. It takes 3 bolts of silk or wool to craft an item.

name: Harvest Robinsons
desc: These special edition Air Robinsons are themed to celebrate the harvest, or just to be bright crazy colors, like all basketball shoes.

name: Silkworm Soul
desc: The great thing about silkworms is that they don't have unique souls. They're totally interchangeable! Jam this into any dead silkworm to bring it back for a 2nd chance.

name: Telephone
desc: It's a phone! Dial it with your wrench. Growtopia doesn't have any cell service, so you're stuck with this old thing.

name: Wooden Sword
desc: They use these to train in Kendo. They won't cut much, but getting whacked with one certainly does hurt!

name: Crazy Jim
desc: Not a real item, just for an icon in the telephone screen.

name: Code Block: Kappa
desc: This block looks like a mysterious computronic data reference. But that's just for fun, i'm sure. I mean, this is just a game... isn't it?

name: Code Block: Charlie
desc: This block looks like a mysterious computronic data reference. But that's just for fun, I'm sure. I mean, this is just a game... isn't it?

name: Code Block: Ouroboros
desc: This block looks like a mysterious computronic data reference. But that's just for fun, I'm sure. I mean, this is just a game... isn't it?

name: Code Block: Edamame
desc: This block looks like a mysterious computronic data reference. But that's just for fun, I'm sure. I mean, this is just a game... isn't it?

name: Wool Scarf
desc: Your neck is toasty warm. Maybe you should put some pants on too.

name: Sheep Shears
desc: This handy tool is a lot more effective at cutting wool than your fingers are, so you can get twice as much when you use it to shear a sheep!

name: Illuminati Stone
desc: Finally, the 100% undeniable proof! You have DISCOVERED THE TRUTH!

name: Fossil Rock
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Fossil Boulder
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Deep Fossil Rock
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Fossilroid
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Alien Fossil Rock
desc: This Rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Mabye you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Igneous Fossil Rock
desc: This rock seems to have a fossil embedded in it. Maybe you could crack it loose if you tap very carefully with a Rock Hammer. There is a rumor, as old as time itself, that having a busy world will generate more Fossil Rock. The Growtopia Archaeological Society have officially announced that this is totally untrue. Time to bury that rumor, once and for all!

name: Igneous Rock
desc: Igneous rock is formed through the cooling and solidification of magma or lava.

name: Rock Hammer

func.add: This tool must be used with care.

desc: A precision instrument for chipping fossils out of rocks. If you find a fossil, equip this hammer and start tapping, - but do it *carefully!* If the fossil comes loose and you hit it again, you'll break it!

name: Rock Chisel

func.add: This tool must be used with care.

desc: So you've extracted a fossil from a rock, but the rock is still in your way. That's where the chisel comes in! It lets you chip away the rock without damaging the fossil.

name: Fossil
desc: A corpse from millions of years ago, turned to stone. It's still covered with a lot of stone, so we're not sure what it is just yet. Try cleaning it off in a Fossil Prep Station.

name: Fossil Prep Station
desc: Put a fossil in this tank where special solvents and bacterial agents will slowly dissolve any remaining rock and reveal exactly what you've found. The time required varies anywhere from an hour to a day depending on how much needs dissolving. The light turns green when it's ready, so punch to collect!

name: Ammonite Block
desc: A huge beautiful ammonite fossil has been extracted! It'd make a lovely coffee table.

name: Dino Ribcage
desc: It's a bit grisly, but these enormous bones make kind of a fun set of monkey bars...

name: Dinosaur Mask
desc: This is how you would look if a dinosaur snuck up behind you and swallowed you, but you got stuck in his throat. It's really a bad situation for everyone involved.

name: Ancient Plant Seed
desc: This seed from the ancient past is completely intact - there may still be some DNA inside! Plant DNA, but still that`s exciting, right?

name: Amber Block
desc: This ancient tree sap has hardened into a beautiful crystal. Who knows, there might even be a mosquito inside holding dinosaur DNA! That's pretty standard for amber.

name: T-Rex Skull
desc: This would make an impressive display in your museum! Even more impressive in your haunted house.

name: Red Pet Pteranodon
desc: You've brought a dinosaur back to life with genetic engineering! There's no way that this could go badly!

name: Red Pet Pterosaurus
desc: You've brought a dinosaur back to life with genetic engineering! There's no way that this could go badly!

desc: You've brought a dinosaur back to life with genetic engineering! There's no way that this could go badly!

name: Grey Pet Triceratops
desc: You've brought a dinosaur back to life with genetic engineering! There's no way that this could go badly!

name: DNA Processor
desc: This advanced device from Growtech can take in strands of ancient DNA and combine them to create real living creatures. It has terrifying ethical implications.

name: Dino DNA Strand A-273
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand C-904
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps theres a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesnt seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand G-137
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps theres a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesnt seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Dino DNA Strand T-658
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a dinosaur. Perhaps theres a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesnt seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Plant DNA Strand X-277
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a plant. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That actually sounds pretty safe, since it's a plant.

name: Plant DNA Strand Y-985
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. All we know for sure is it comes from a plant. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That actually sounds pretty safe, since it's a plant.

name: Prehistoric Flowering Fern
desc: Welcome... to Jurassic Botanical Garden.

name: Prehistoric Red Fern
desc: It's sad to think where this grows.

name: Prehistoric Fern
desc: Nature always finds a way.

name: Purple Devourer Plant
desc: This is what happens when you give a prehistoric flower a taste for magic bacon!

name: Blue Devourer Plant
desc: This is what happens when you give a prehistoric flower a taste for magic bacon!

name: Prehistoric Vines
desc: You can hide from rampaging dinosaurs in these vines.

name: Prehistoric Candy Vines
desc: You can try to hide from rampaging dinosaurs in these vines, but you'll probably get eaten because the vines themselves taste like candy.

name: Seussian Tree
desc: These particular trees, near the Jurassic seas, produced quite a crunchety fruit. Though scientists say that it tasted okay, we can't pollinate so it's moot.

name: Flowersaurus Rex
desc: You monster, what fresh horror have you wrought?!!? Has science gone too far?

name: Blue Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!

name: Brown Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!

name: Red Riding Raptor
desc: I know, they're supposed to have feathers and stuff nowadays... Well, this is an old-school raptor!

name: Golden Riding Raptor
desc: I think this raptor has more World Locks than you do.

name: Raptor DNA Strand Alpha
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. It appears to be the beginning of a velociraptor DNA sequence. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: Raptor DNA Strand Omega
desc: This is a strand of prehistoric DNA. It appears to be the tail end of a velociraptor DNA sequence. Perhaps there's a way to recombine it and bring them back! That doesn't seem like a terrible idea at all.

name: DNA Extractor
desc: This experimental device can extract prehistoric DNA from objects which contain even small traces. To give it a try, just use an item on it and see what you find! This is very new technology, so results are unpredictable, and rarely successful.

name: Stone Spear

func.add: You got a spear, so toss it.

desc: In ancient times, sticks and stones were about as good as it got. The upside is it's a magic stone - this spear will teleport back into your hand once thrown!

name: Blue Hardhat
desc: Head protection is required in construction areas, and at some dig sites.

name: Outback Hat
desc: G'day! Barbie! Shrimp! That's not a knife, it's a hat! These hats are popular among paleontologists and other desert dwellers.

name: Fossil Brush
desc: You can use this to gently brush a fossil before you pick it up, improving its quality. A Fossil Brush will be destroyed upon use (fossils are very rough until you brush them!). If you pick up a fossil, your finger oils will make a Fossil Brush useless, so be sure you brush before collecting!

name: Polished Fossil
desc: This fossil has been carefully polished, so it's sure to yield something good when run through a Fossil Prep Station!

name: Heatbow
desc: This bow shoots flaming arrows!

name: Doompunk Corset
desc: Internal organs rotted away? The corset should fit you fine!

name: Doompunk Skirt
desc: Multiple layers of petticoats keep you warm when stalking your prey!

name: Doompunk Top Hat
desc: Keep an extra pair of goggles up there. You never know when you'll need them for evil.

name: Doompunk Waistcoat
desc: The perfect garment for housing a pocketwatch, monocle, and perhaps poison needles. Definitely some evil stuff in those pockets.

name: Doompunk Leggings
desc: Works equally well for a doompunk or a pirate! Or maybe a serial killer from the 80's.

name: Doompunk Trenchcoat
desc: Keep warm while stalking people on those frosty London evenings in this stylish piece of Grow Couture! Note: this is a "chest item", like a necklace so you can wear any shirts and back items you want underneath it.

name: Eye Of Growganoth

func.add: Your pet is like, way cosmic, man.

desc: This accursed necklace binds one of the eternal and innumerable Eyes of Growganoth to your service. Just make sure you dont take your eye of it - at the first sign of weakness, it will devour your soul!

name: Apocalypse Steed
desc: The four horsemen have updated to more modern steeds. They're probably gonna be pretty mad when they find out you have swiped one.

name: Jack o' Lantern Mask
desc: Luckily this is just latex and not actually a gooey carved-out pumpkin.

name: Devil Tail
desc: Why you little devil...

name: Buzzsaw
desc: This is how your shop teacher lost those fingers.

name: Rickety Wallpaper
desc: So this is what the inside of a haunted house looks like!

name: Rickety Window
desc: So this is what the inside of a haunted house looks like! Plus, you can see outside of it from here.

name: Rickety Door
desc: Finally, your chance to escape this haunted house! Wrench the door to set the destination.

name: Death's Scythe

func.add: You wield the blade of death.

desc: Careful where you swing that thing.

name: Demon Chariot
desc: This thing goes pretty fast for a vehicle with only 2 horsepower.

name: Logarithmic Wheel
desc: You know what a really good weapon is? A wagon wheel. Yeah, I mean... yeah.

name: Demonic Skull
desc: Just the thing for showing your appreciation of the darker musicks.

name: Death Metal Block
desc: Throw up the horns! METAL!!!!!

name: Steel Spike
desc: Hey, these things have a million uses! I cant think of any right now, but they totally do. Just dont leave them inside surgical patients, please.

name: Tempered Steel Spike
desc: This spike is so much shinier now! Classy enough to wear to the Halloween Ball.

name: Spiked Collar
desc: Ah yeah, you look tough, like a junkyard dog.

name: Malevolent Hair
desc: What are you up to under that mop-top? Seems like something a little sneaky..

name: Riding Raven

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Only dark magic could breed a raven so massive. It`s so powerful it allows you to double-jump!

name: Haunted Darkness
desc: Its pitch-black inside this haunted house! Players can only see whats on this tile if its in their line of sight, or they have special tools.

name: Haunted Window
desc: Its so dark in here, only the window provides any relief! Players can only see whats on this tile if its in their line of sight, or they have special tools.

name: Haunted Door
desc: Finally, your chance to escape this haunted house! Wrench the door to set up a creepy question player must answer to go through.

name: Sheet Music: Spooky
desc: If you arent in range of a boombox, this will play a spooky sound for you. There are 14 different sounds, depending where you place it vertically. Try them all!

name: Stone Pagoda
desc: There's no better place for a Grand Tournament than in a pagoda!

name: Master Peng Stonework
desc: Isn't Master Peng awesome? This stonework blends in with Stone Pagoda blocks.

name: Paper Wall
desc: This wallpaper is a paper wall.

name: Stone Pagoda Roof Element
desc: Stick this at the ends of your pagoda roofs.It doesn't serve any functional purpose, but it does sure nice. Just make sure you put it the right way or it'll be floating in midair.

name: Decorative Roof Dragon
desc: Just for looks. Make your pagoda roofs spikey with dragons! Not so spikey they hurt, though.

name: Grand Jade Platform
desc: Something stylish to stand on. Try decorating it with Decorative Roof Dragons!

name: Stone Pagoda Base
desc: This is a special piece - it looks like the bottom row of a Stone Pagoda, and it even tiles properly with Stone Pagoda blocks. The trick is, it won't tile with the ones below it. Use it to put a roof in the middle of your pagoda! Kind of a key feature of pagodas, right? It will also tile with Decorative Roof Dragons.

name: Demonic Horns
desc: MAHHTIN looks like Tim Curry.

name: Master Peng
desc: Master Peng runs The Grand Tournament. Don't mess with him. But punching is how he likes to be greeted, so one punch is cool.

name: Tourney Token
desc: Your reward for victory in The Grand Tournament. Put it in the Prize Ladder to win fabulous prizes!

name: Wooden Pagoda Wall
desc: For a warmer look to your pagoda, try wood. Also, you can walk in front of it, which stone is less forgiving about.

name: Wooden Pagoda Window
desc: See what's outside your pagoda!

name: Wooden Pagoda Door
desc: Like any door, you can wrench it to set the destination.

name: Wooden Pagoda Roof
desc: This is a roof for your wooden pagoda. Unlike the Wooden Pagoda Wall, this is solid, so it's safe to stand on.

name: Prize Ladder
desc: Players can put Tourney Tokens in here to push their luck in winning prizes.

name: Tournament Ticket
desc: This ticket allows you entry into one Grand Tournament. Visit Master Peng in the world TOURNAMENT to enter the tournament. You can battle as many times as you wish in the current tournament, but when it ends, your ticket will self-destruct.

name: Punched Tournament Ticket
desc: Your ticket has been punched! You can battle in the current Tournament as many times as you like. The ticket will self-destruct when the tournament ends. Don't lose it, or you can't battle anymore!

name: Snack Fu
desc: Master Ping, Master Peng's brother, runs Snack Fu, providing delicious and exotic treats to everybody watching the tournament!

name: Ramune
desc: This fizzy lemon-lime drink is sure to result in some major burps.

name: Pow Stones
desc: This carbonated candy crackles and pops in your mouth. Don't worry, it's probably not made from real rocks. Warning: DO NOT COMBINE WITH SODA. Super duper true urban legends verify that this is dangerous.

name: Extractium Ore
desc: This mysterious element has strange properties which seem to make DNA extraction more successful!

name: Extractium Shard
desc: This mysterious element seems to be present in small quantities in ancient fossils. Maybe you can combine these shards into a piece large enough to have a measurable effect on something!

name: Tournament Banner
desc: Wrench this to find out key info about the Grand Tournament!

name: Jade Portcullis
desc: Lock out the ruffians with this decorative gateway.

name: Weather Machine - Pagoda
desc: Wow, it's pagoda season already? They're sprouting up everywhere! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Non La
desc: This conical straw hat is useful for full sun protection, as well as carrying stuff!
