name: Minor Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing.This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Minorly bad things.

name: Lesser Otherworldly Bait
desc: This is bait for fishing. Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait on water that you are standing next to in order to start fishing. This bait actually travels through a wormhole into a dark dimension and catches things there, instead of in the water. Lesser bad things.

name: Penguin Mask
desc: Wanna be as COOL as Master Peng? Not gonna happen. But you can wear this mask and look like a dork.

name: Mini-Peng
desc: Master Peng is so swift, he can appear to be in multiple at once. But in the extra places, he looks very small.

name: Pet Fox
desc: THE CUTENESS IS KILLING ME.

name: Popcorn
desc: Uh oh, drama! Somebody bust out the popcorn.

name: Wasabi Peas
desc: Yowza, those are some spicy peas!

name: Present Goblin Disguise
desc: Disguises you as a Present Goblin, bringer of joy.

name: Toy Train
desc: Chugga chugga CHOO CHOO!

name: Stuff-4-Toys Box
desc: Drop stuff in here, and we'll donate toys to needy Growtopians!

name: Letter Block - Zerp
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Zerp on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.

name: Letter Block - Forg
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Forg on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.

name: Letter Block - Wump
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Wump on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.

name: Letter Block - Doozle
desc: This is a letter block, like you played when you were a kid! This particular one has the letter Doozle on it. But I don't need to tell you that, you can just read it.

name: Hideous Holiday Sweater
desc: Your grandma thinks you look adorable in this.

name: Winter Turtleneck
desc: Celebrate Winterfest in cozy style, with no worries of chin-freeze.

name: Yo-Yo
desc: It's a disk on a string. Try smacking stuff with it!

name: Meh, Bunny Mask
desc: MrMehMeh likes carrots.

name: Meh, Bunny Suit
desc: MrMehMeh stores the carrots he eats here.

name: Rubber Band Airplane
desc: Toss it and see where it goes! It'll smash if it hits any blocks, so aim carefully. Tap the direction you want to throw it. The further from yourself you tap, the harder you throw.

name: Stuff-4-Toys Shirt
desc: Stuff-4-Toys is offering these stylish t-shirts to all Silver level donators!

name: Present Goblin Home Edition
desc: Dress up as a Present Goblin for fun! You won't automatically drop presents, but it's festive year-round! This costume overrides all other clothing, but if you don't like tossing tennis balls, try equipping other sportsballs with it!

name: Solsascarf
desc: Solsagann is tossing out yesterday's baguettes! They are quite stale.

name: Stuff-4-Toys Tote Bag
desc: Tote around your shopping with our fabulous tote bag. It lets everybody know you are serious about donating Stuff for Toys.

name: Betty Bluetooth Doll
desc: This high-tech doll is the big craze this Winterfest! Everybody wants a remote-controlled doll that fires deadly lightning bolts!

name: Surg-E
desc: This robot is an amazingly accurate human analog (just look at it!), capable of simulating a wide range of disease and trauma conditions. Place it anywhere and wrench it to perform surgery just like on a human being. Since you have to cut into it, it's only usable once, win or lose.

name: Caduceus
desc: This symbol is your reward for saving someone with surgery. You can trade them for rare surgical prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Golden Caduceus.

name: Golden Caduceus
desc: This is worth 100 Caducei (that's the plural of Caduceus, I looked it up!). Double-tap this in your inventory to break one back into 100 Caducei. You can trade these for rare surgical prizes by calling Sales-Man on your telephone at 53785.

name: Golden Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you won the Grand Tournament!

name: Silver Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you placed in the top 3 of the Grand Tournament!

name: Jade Dragon Statue
desc: Congratulations, you placed in the top 10 of the Grand Tournament!

name: Surgical Pins
desc: Used only in surgery. When a bone is absolutely shattered,you need to use pins to put it back together. A [[Surgical Splint]]won't do it! Can only be used once you've opened an incision, of course.

name: Surgical Transfusion
desc: Used only in surgery. If a patient's blood supply gets dangerously low, this will fill 'er up!

name: Surgical Defibrillator
desc: Used only in surgery. If a patient's heart stops (which can happen when they are anesthetized), zap them with this to fire it up again.

name: Surgical Clamp
desc: Used only in surgery. This can reduce a patient's bleeding significantly, but without closing up their incisions, like [[Surgical Stitches]] will do. You can only use this when you have open incisions.

name: Surgical Ultrasound
desc: Used only in surgery. This detailed scan can inform you of any broken bones, tumors, or other physical issues within the patient's body. Use this right away to diagnose the problem!

name: Surgical Lab Kit
desc: Used only in surgery. This kit will identify different microbes that could be present in the patient. Use it right away to diagnose any bacterial or viral issues. You cannot use Surgical Antibiotics until you've used a Lab Kit to identify the bacteria you're fighting.

name: Empty Surgery Tray
desc: Not a real item, just used for an icon.

name: Autoclave
desc: Wrench this device to clean your surgical instruments. And by "clean", we mean exchange 20 of one instrument for 1 of every other instrument.

name: Biotronic Brain Enhancer

func.rem: You're getting dumber by the second.

desc: This advanced cybernetic technology will increase your mental capacity, granting you 50% more XP (on average) for half an hour.

name: Plague Doctor Mask
desc: There was a time when actual medical professionals would go out on the streets wearing this. It was a creepy, creepy time.

name: Plague Doctor Hat
desc: Rumpled and trumpy, really showing your dedication to your craft.

name: Plague Doctor Robe
desc: This robe is intended to protect you from pestilence. Sadly it was invented in pre-scientific times, so all it really protects you from is cold weather.

name: Living Dead Remote
desc: You just couldn't accept your patients' deaths. And now you've created an abomination, haven't you? What has your foul science wrought?!

name: Spare Body Part
desc: Oh, nobody's even gonna notice this is missing, I'm sure. They had at least two of these when they came in.

name: Spare Body
desc: Wow, you had all the right parts to make a spare body! You never know when this might come in handy.

name: Limb Connector
desc: This horrible twisted spikey thing could surely jam some limbs together if you needed to do that. For some reason.

name: Water Spirit Necklace
desc: Zfert's got spirit!

name: Massive Fang
desc: Imagine the size of the wolf this came from!

name: Howler
desc: This seemingly harmless statue actually launches deadly sonic blasts. Wrench it to set the rate of fire! You can place as many Howlers as you like, but only 10 blasts can exist at a time, so if you have a lot, most of them will just sit there.

name: Fuzzy Pants
desc: Ah, classic fuzzy pants.

name: Gemmin' Juice

func.add: Chance of bonus gems from breaking blocks!

desc: Got your mind on your gems and your gems on your mind? Start sippin' on Gemmin' Juice! It gives you a 10% chance of getting double gems from any blocks you break for 30 minutes. Consumed when used.

name: Wolf Skull Shoulders
desc: Three heads are better than one, even if two of them are empty and skinless.

name: Wolf Gate
desc: Punch it to open or shut it! Anybody unlucky enough to be caught inside when it closes gets wolfed down.

name: Wolf Ticket
desc: This ticket is your reward for completing Wolfworld. You can trade them for rare Wolfworld prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into an Enchanted Wolf Ticket.

name: Enchanted Wolf Ticket
desc: This is worth 100 Wolf Tickets. Double-tap this in your inventory to break one back into 100 Wolf Tickets. You can trade this for rare Wolfworld prizesby calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785.

name: Sales-Man Standee
desc: The perfect way to advertise your wares - with a cardboard cut-out of Sales-Man himself! Scientifically proven to drive conversions and increase ROI.

name: Sales Shades
desc: Cover your eyes, the savings are simply too glorious to behold!

name: Ghost Wolf Monocle
desc: This monocle is haunted by the spirit of an ancient wolf! That's more common than you'd expect among monocles.

name: Challenge of Fenrir
desc: Your progress in the Wolfworld has caused Fenrir himself to challenge you! Use this summons on All Howl's Eve to enter the halls of Valhowla. Once inside, you'll have only 3 minutes to search for the 4 treasures. Also don't forget Climbing Boots and a light source!

name: Party Screamer
desc: Blow this horn to let everybody know where the party is! Its like a super broadcast, only you cant control what you say, because this party be OFF THE CHIZZY!!

name: Valhowla Treasure
desc: Treasures for players to collect in Valhowla.

name: Party Popper
desc: Get the party started with a blast of streamers!

name: Party Bunting
desc: Dress the place up a little for our anniversary party!

name: Party Fowl
desc: Whoa dude, major party fowl. You earned this for playing Growtopia for THREE YEARS, and over 300 hours, and reaching level 50! Wow, that's dedication.

name: IIII Block
desc: It's Growtopia's fourth anniversary! Celebrate with this classic pewter-plated design reminiscent of the Roman numeral 4. Yes you can write 4 as IIII instead of IV, that's a real thing!

name: Party Cake
desc: This tastes so good it just makes you want to dance!

name: Head Bangin' Steel Wolf
desc: This robotic wolf rocks hard. Punch to activate, wrench to adjust settings.

name: Pink Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely pink fabric.

name: Blue Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely blue fabric.

name: White Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely white fabric.

name: Green Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely green fabric.

name: Yellow Bunting
desc: Fancy the place up a little with some lovely yellow fabric.

name: Red & White Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Green & Yellow Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Blue Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Black Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Heart Awning
desc: These are surprisingly bouncy. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: Gruel
desc: This bland flavorless mush is not delicious. The only nice thing about it is that you can feed it to a Silkworm without changing its color!

name: Pegasus

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: If you were a pegasus, you'd spend all your time flying too. Why walk on those teeny legs? These mighty wings allow you both to double jump too.

name: Golden Pegasus

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: If you were a pegasus, you'd spend all your time flying too. Why walk on those teeny legs? Those mighty wings allow you both to double jump too.

name: Heart Glasses
desc: The world just looks like a lovelier place through these rose-colored glasses.

name: Loveseat
desc: Legs getting tired? Have a seat!

name: Golden Heart Glasses
desc: The world just looks like a more expensive place through these gold-tinted glasses.

name: Chocolate Heart
desc: Chocolate heals all wounds. Emotional wounds that is. It is pretty useless for broken bones. And really it doesn't do much for emotional problems either, it just tastes good.

name: Valentine Dress
desc: Dress for the occasion!

name: Ruby Shard
desc: Watch out, this is a really sharp fragment of Ruby. It seems strangely magnetically attracted to other shards like it. Maybe if you got 200 of them together, they'd fuse into something! Yeah, that's how reality works!

name: Ruby Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. And looks lovely doing it. There's a 1% chance each day that a rock in the world will become Heartstone! More rocks do not increase the chance.

name: Chemsynth Processor
desc: Place a row of 10 Chemsynth Tanks to the right of this machine, and then wrench it to use GrowTech's new synthetic chemical creation technology! Patent pending.

name: Chemsynth Tank
desc: You'll need to attach this to the right side of a Chemsynth Processor to get any use out of it. You'll need 10 attached to a Chemsynth Processor, in fact.

name: Chemsynth Centrifuge
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to rotate chemicals around it. Rotates as many from the right as it can to match how many are to the left of the selected Tank.

name: Chemsynth Replicator
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to duplicate its contents, pushing all chemicals to the right to make room.

name: Chemsynth Catalyst
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to shift its color upward on the spectrum (Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Pink, Red). This also affects all touching tanks of the same color.

name: Chemsynth Solvent
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to dissolve it, shifting chemicals left to fill in the gap. A random chemical is added to the rightmost tank.

name: Chemsynth Stirrer
desc: Use on a highlighted Chemsynth Tank to swap the chemicals on either side of it with each other. The selected tank is unaffected.

name: Synthetic Chemical
desc: This chemical was created in a lab. Its properties are virtually untested!

name: Gruesome Marker
desc: Use these sort of like Doors  They have IDs, so Doors can lead to them, though you cant travel from them. Use your Wrench to set their ID.

name: Skeletal Throne
desc: Looks like youre the new king of the zombies! Or somebody with four legs died here.

name: Zombie Brain
desc: Ew, this is a brain that popped out of a zombies head! Maybe sales-man wants it, You sure dont. Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Pile Of Zombie Brains!

name: Pile of Zombie Brains
desc: Ew, this is a brain that popped out of a zombie's head! Maybe Sales-Man wants it. You sure don't. Double-tap this in your inventory to split it up into 100 Zombie Brains.

name: Mutated Seed Core
desc: This is an immature mutated seed. Itll mature into a mutated seed if you log out and back in!

name: Zombie Defense Force Helmet
desc: This helmet covers your vital brain region from zombie attack. Unfortunately, zombies only need to punch you to infect you, so it's not terribly useful.

name: Zombie Defense Force Uniform
desc: This is the official uniform of the Zombie Defense Force! It has lots of pockets for your lip balm, candy, paper clips, and other key zombie-fighting tools.

name: Zombie Defense Force Pants
desc: You could just wear any green pants and you probably won't get in trouble, but these have a cool Z logo sewn into the inside waistband.

name: Camouflage Facepaint
desc: They'll never see you coming. Unless they look anywhere other than your face. At least you might freak them out - "Ah, it's a guy with no face!!"

name: AK-8087

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: The ultimate zombie-slaying weapon. Or pumpkin-slaying.

name: Barricaded Door
desc: This door has been barricaded, so zombies can't get through it, only normal Growtopians! Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Infected Door
desc: Yuck, this door has horrible zombie slime on it. Nobody but a zombie would dare enter it. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Zombie Sign
desc: This sign is written in Zombiese, so humans can't read it. only zombies!

name: Retinal Scan Data Repository
desc: This data system can store useful information, but the retinal scan prevents zombies from accessing it. Only humans can!

name: Skull Launcher
desc: The ultimate zombie weapon. Actually, the only zombie weapon - you can use this while you're a zombie! (Also usable by humans)

name: Rainbow Kite
desc: The most colorful kite in all of Growtopia!

name: Zombie Hound
desc: Braaainnss! This little puppy just wants to play! Or maybe he's hungry... hmmm...

name: Crazy Zombie Hair
desc: The undead use a lot of hairspray.

name: Objective Marker
desc: Use these sort of like Doors - They have IDs, so Doors can lead to them, through you cant travel from them. Use your wrench to set their ID.

name: Infected Block
desc: This block is pulsing with g-Virus infection. It should be safe to smash, just wash your hands afterward.

name: Weather Machine - Apocalypse
desc: Feeling nostalgic for the end of the world? Let's bring it back! With this weather active, somebody in your world will get infected with the g-Virus every hour, and players can kill zombies in your world, with the appropriate weapon. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Mutated Cell
desc: Strange mutated cells collected during the Zombie Apocalypse. If you combine 200 of them, you might be able to create new mutant life...

name: Chainlink Fence
desc: The flimsiest and cheapest way to keep zombies out. Unfortunately this fence is in front of Growtopia, so it only keeps zombies from getting into the game from outside of the screen, which is a pretty unlikely situation.

name: Z.D.F. Fence
desc: Let the zombies know what they;re in for if they trample your fence! The Z.D.F. is ready to rumble!

name: Rusted Chainlink Fence
desc: It won't take zombies long to get through this fence!

name: Commercial Oven
desc: Real chefs do their cooking in Growtech ovens like this - 2 bays, with individual heat settings up to 11,00 K. And a warning drawer! Wrench it for information.

name: Chef's Whites
desc: Spotless! Until you actually start cooking.

name: Chef's Cap
desc: A real chef doesn't wear the big poofy hat... this cap keeps your hair out of your eyes and out of the food without catching on fire regularly.

name: Chef's Pants
desc: These are made of plastex polymer... all the sauce you spill on them just rolls right off! Onto your shoes.

name: Butcher Knife

func.rem: The world is now a safer place.

desc: This heavy blade is perfect to hacking through bones. Use it on Cutting Board to chop up meat!

name: Unearthly Synthoid
desc: It's completely synthetic life! Not on this Earth!

name: Radioactive Synthoid
desc: It's completely synthetic life! Burning with radiation!

name: Mysterious Synthoid
desc: It's completely synthetic life! How mysterious!

name: Haunted Synthoid
desc: It's completely synthetic life! Possessed with synthetic unlife!

name: Untrade-a-Box
desc: This amazing box can store all those pesky untradable items! Only the World Lock owner can use it, and the World Lock can't be traded or destroyed while an Untrade-a-Box is in the world.

name: Wobbly Dress
desc: It's difficult to tell whether Bungbi's dress is made of candy, or just styled to look like it...

name: Lucky Portal
desc: This portal isn't actually lucky unless you set a destination for it that is lucky. So it's really up to you!

name: Lucky Kitty
desc: This kitty sits in your world, constantly waving, and reminding you of how lucky you are to have a kitty in your world.

name: Unlucky Kitty
desc: Don't cross this kitty's path.

name: Bamboo
desc: Bamboo is a sign of luck. It's also a grass!

name: Ladybug Leaf
desc: Ladybugs are considered lucky, so consider yourself lucky that you found this sweet leaf that's making one follow you around.

name: Cosmic Rain
desc: This is what the call "hard radiation". That of course means it's solid so you can't jump up through it, you can however drop down, since it's moving down!

name: Shamrock Hair Pin
desc: Carry the luck of the Irish on your head! Only found in Blarney 6 and 8.

name: Golden Razor Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Slice through the air with the greatest of ease! And double jump.

name: Cosmic Sky Horse
desc: This winged beast hails from a distant star system. Those mighty wings let you move fast, but they're not strong enough to double jump (living in space has atrophied its muscles).

name: Bridle Design
desc: This paper details a method for forging a bridle out of Star Iron. If you forge 100 Star Iron Ingots with this design in hand, you'll make a Cosmic Bridle. This consumes the design.

name: Star Iron
desc: This is raw ore, mined from the heart of a comet. Surely there's something you can do with it!

name: Star Iron Ingot
desc: You've managed to process this ore into a pure, shining ingot, just by tossing into a fire!

name: Cosmic Bridle
desc: I'm pretty sure this bridle is some kind of alien technology. Now what can you do with it?

name: Hover Platform
desc: Cosmic energy keeps these platforms aloft. Who knows what keeps the wooden ones up?

name: Spaceman Pants
desc: I don't know why, but most alien creatures insist on wearing clothes made of tin foil.

name: Spaceman Suit
desc: I don't know why, but most alien creatures insist on wearing clothes made of tin foil.

name: Synthetic Oculum
desc: The human eye sees a limited spectrum. Replace yours with these synthetic models! They transmit data direct to your central cortex. Unfortunately they also make you look cross-eyed.

name: Cranial Lagomorph
desc: Don't be alarmed, but there may be a bunny on your head...

name: Bunny Slippers
desc: Snuggle your feet!

name: Cardboard Egg
desc: It's a classic photo op! Stand behind it and pretend you're a newly hatched chick. Fun for the whole family!

name: Salsa
desc: This item doesn't really exist, it's just for cooking.

name: Flour
desc: We've ground it up, and bleached out all the nutrients! It's not really edible anymore, but it's a key ingredient in deliciousness.

name: Lettuce
desc: Crisp and green, no calories, no flavor. Just like we like it!

name: Salt Block
desc: Deer like to lick this. The pink coloration in it is from trace minerals in the salt.

name: Salt
desc: The greatest thing since sliced bread - and even sliced bread would be pretty bad without some salt in it.

name: Pepper
desc: Would you be surprised to learn that this is a fruit? Its true!

name: Sugar
desc: Pro-tip: if you can resist it, never ever eat this substance. It is very unhealthy. But it's sooooo gooood.

name: Disgusting Mess
desc: This abomination is what happens when you let video gamers cook. Do NOT eat.

name: Bland Mush
desc: This is not even food. Nobody would eat this.

name: Beef
desc: A big ol' juicy T-bone. Well, and O-Bone. Is that a thing?

name: Ground Beef
desc: Now with 11% fewer hooves!

name: Food Grinder
desc: The high speed blades and crushers in this device can grind up some foods into more ground-up foods! Just tap your food on the Food Grinder to begin.

name: Pepper Tree
desc: The spiciest of trees. Well, I guess there's also cinnamon. Probably a lot of spices grow on trees, huh? I regret this entire description.

name: Bacon
desc: Bacon. It's raw though, don't eat it.

name: Chicken Meat
desc: This item is often known as Chicken Of The Land. According to mermaids

name: Zraei's Dragoscarf
desc: When a normal scarf isn't enough... This Dragoscarf will assist you, granting Enhanced Digging, but only if you don't have it already. Sponsored by Bretz and Zraei - first to complete all epic quests!

name: Homemade Fish Taco
desc: Homemade Baja taste, with fresh pico de gallo. Food Buff: Gain 1 gem for every 5lbs. your fish catches weigh.

name: Apple Strudel
desc: Fresh from the oven! Food Buff: Trees you plant grow 5% faster.

name: Berry Crepes
desc: It's the really thin pancakes you love so much! Just say it! Food Buff: 30% more XP earned from Surgery.

name: BBQ Bacon Burger

func.add: Get 100 gems from every Villain you defeat.

desc: The king of burgers. Food Buff: Get 100 gems for every villain you defeat.

name: Beer-Battered Fish And Chips
desc: Deep fried goodness. Food Buff: Catch 5% larger fish.

name: Onion
desc: Ah, dont cry. Its just a vegetable.

name: Arroz Con Pollo

func.add: 10% chance of a gem when you break a block.

desc: In English, that's rice with chicken. Creative! Food Buff: 10% chance of a gem everytime you break a block.

name: Egg Wallpaper
desc: Bring the springtime indoors with our classic line of wallpapers.

name: Mini Mallard
desc: Ducks instinctively follow their mothers around. This one just follows you because it's tied to your wrist, though.

name: Baking Chocolate
desc: This chocolate is ready for all your baking needs! It's not sweet though, don't eat it.

name: Mac n' Cheese Star
desc: Your reward for incredible cooking skill! You can trade them for cooking prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785. Double-Tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them together.

name: Plethora Of Mac n' Cheese Stars
desc: This is worth 100 Mac n' Cheese Stars. Not even Growdon Ramsley has this many! Double-tap this in your inventory to break one down into 100 Stars. You can trade these for rare cooking prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785.

name: Mac n' Cheese Star Block
desc: Now you can decorate your world with Mac N' Cheese Stars! Show off your incredible cooking skill.

name: Home Oven
desc: Toss in some food and cook it up! This oven actually works! Wrench it for info.

name: Master Chef's Oven
desc: This oven is custom-built for you because of your incredible cooking skill. It works so well, you can be lazy - it will produce edible food at 50% quality or higher. Wrench it for information.

name: Chemist's Goggles
desc: The perfect eyewear for doing chemistry! Grants a 10% chance to not consume a chemical when you use a Chemsynth tool.

name: Marshmallow
desc: Bouncy and delicious. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce.

name: TXMom's Crown
desc: Be honored to wear this beautiful crown. Sponsored by TXMom.

name: Kudo's Carriage

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Your winged friends are happy to help you double jump! Sponsored by Kudobelle.

name: Audio Gear
desc: Wanna get crazy with music? This solid block works like Sheet Music, but with your Wrench, you can adjust the volume and play up to 5 simultaneous notes.

name: Audio Rack
desc: Wanna get crazy with music? This passable block works like Sheet Music, but with your Wrench, you can adjust the volume and play up to 5 simultaneous notes.

name: Sheet Music: Sax Note
desc: If you aren't in range of a Boombox, this will play a saxophone note for you. Put it in different places for different pitches

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Sax
desc: This plays a half-step higher than Sheet Music: Sax Note.

name: Sheet Music: Flat Sax
desc: This plays a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Sax Note.

name: Sheet Music: Repeat Begin
desc: This marks where your song should begin repeating. You'll need a Sheet Music: Repeat End in the same row to actually repeat. You can add more pairs in other rows to repeat multiple times, or repeat other sections

name: Sheet Music: Repeat End
desc: This marks where your song should repeat a section. The music marker will jump back to the most recent Sheet Music: Repeat Begin that's in the same row (or the beginning of the song if not). If you need to repeat a section more than once, put Repeat pairs in multiple rows.

name: Saxamaphone

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: You can't punch when holding this, you're too busy ROCKING! Punch anywhere to play music. If you punch to your left or right, you can bend the note higher or lower. Punch in your own column to play the same notes that Sheet Music: Sax Note plays.

name: Hazmat Boots

func.add: Fire walk with me! Fire does 50% damage.
func.rem: Your feet are no longer safe.

desc: In case of hazardous spills, you'll want a pair of these! Reduces lava damage by 50%.

name: Hazmat Pants
desc: Don't get a tear in these, or you'll be exposed to whatever lurks outside!

name: Hazmat Suit
desc: This suit protects you from any sort of biochemical leaks. Or it would if you had zipped it up right. Yikes, good thing this was just a test!

name: Hazmat Helmet
desc: Protects your precious face from exposure to harmful stuff.

name: Geiger Charger
desc: Tap a Geiger Counter in here to charge it up! It's half the speed of hand-charging, but it's convenient. Punch to retrieve it when it's ready.

name: Uranium Necklace
desc: Wearing this will dramatically reduce your lifespan, but you'll be looking GOOD until it's over!

name: Uranium Block
desc: This block might be slowly making you sick. Surely there are better things you could be building with. Maybe you can blast a hole in it, instead...?

name: Confetti Cannon

func.add: You're bringing the party whether they like it or not!

desc: Precision telescopic sights ensure you deliver lethal payload directly to center mass.

name: Riding Fiesta Burrito
desc: This donkey likes to party.

name: Hotpants

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: You look hot in these. And so does your pet jalapeo!

name: Lemon
desc: Warning: Keep out of eyes.

name: Corn
desc: This is what it's like before you pop it.

name: Corn Meal
desc: This corn has been crushed into a pile of dust!

name: Avocado
desc: This mushy green-black blob is actually a citrus fruit. What horrors hath nature wrought.

name: Chips And Guacamole

func.add: Get 50 Gems for beating a Pet Trainer.

desc: Crunchy and gooshy. Food Buff: 50 gems for every victory against a Pet Trainer.

name: Green Geiger V-Neck
desc: This shirt is made out of... stuff.

name: Blue Geiger V-Neck
desc: This shirt is made out of... stuff.

name: Purple Geiger V-Neck
desc: This shirt is made out of... stuff.

name: Orange Geiger V-Neck
desc: This shirt is made out of... stuff.

name: Xenoid Suit
desc: This skin-tight suit really makes you look like a freaky alien.

name: Xenoid Mask
desc: You seriously look like a freaky alien.

name: Xenoid Claws
desc: These nasty claws makes you look like a freaky alien.

name: Xenoid Leggings
desc: These skin-tight leggings make you look like a freaky alien.

name: Xenoid Shoes
desc: These awkward pointy heels make you look like a freaky alien.

name: Villain Portrait - H.R. Geiger
desc: Just before knocking him unconscious, you snapped a lovely photo of H.R. Geiger for posterity. Put it up on the wall, show off your achievement!

name: Superpower - Alien Egg
desc: This is a Rare Ice Superpower Card for use in fighting crime. You can also place it as a block! Card effect: Implant an egg in your foe. If they repeat an element during the next four turns, it bursts for 5 damage!

name: Locked Adventure Door
desc: This door can be walked through by anyone holding an Adventure Item  Key.

name: Adventure Rope Piton
desc: Install this right next to walls. If a player is holding an Adventure Item - Rope, they can climb the wall.

name: Ancient Block
desc: Its amazing how ancient Growtopians were able to carve such perfect blocks. Some say it was done by aliens! Theyre wrong.

name: Adventure Brazier
desc: When a player who has Adventure Item - Torch steps on this, their torch is used up to light all braziers for 10 seconds. While it's lit, all the Adventure Barriers in the world move in or out, just for that player.

name: Adventure Barrier
desc: These blocks can be punched by the world owner to open or close them. But if a player lights an Adventure Brazier, they will be reversed for that player  open ones will be shut, shut ones will be open.

name: Adventure Pedestal
desc: When a player who has Adventure Item - Golden Idol steps on this, their idol is placed on the pedestal, opening all Adventure Idol Gates in the world (for them only), or shutting ones that are open.

name: Adventure Idol Gate
desc: These blocks can be punched by the world owner to open or close them. But if a player places an idol on an Adventure Pedestal, they will be reversed for that player - open ones will be shut, shut ones will be open.

name: Angry Adventure Gorilla
desc: This gorilla will pummel anyone who gets close! But if you have an Adventure Item - Banana, you can punch him to give it to him, and sneak by while he is eating for 10 seconds.

name: Minecart
desc: Nothing says adventure like riding around in a minecart! Tracks not included (but the wheels are modified to run on any surface).

name: Adventure Item - Pineapple
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Mystery Door
desc: You can set up to 5 destinations for this door with your Wrench, and when a player enters it, theyll be sent randomly to any of them!

name: Adventure Checkpoint
desc: If you die, you'll respawn at the last checkpoint you touched!

name: The Adventure Begins
desc: Wrench this to adjust settings for your adventure. When players step on it, all their adventure items are reset, and you can assign them limited lives or a timer to complete the adventure.

name: Mariachi Hat
desc: Not only does this fancy hat cover your head from the heat, it also makes you look amazing while you sing and dance.

name: Mariachi Suit
desc: Look the part while playing your guitar like a true musician of Mexico.

name: Mariachi Pants
desc: Fiesta! Time to dance.

name: Seductive Rose
desc: Sticking a rose in your mouth seems to make your voice so much more attractive when you sing.

name: Red Brimmed Hat
desc: A party hat for the most sophisticated.

name: Red Formal Dress
desc: The finest dress for all your fancy dress parties.

name: Luchador Announcer
desc: A new challenger enters the ring! Summons the villain "El Peligro"...

name: Adventure Item - Crystal Goblet
desc: Place this in your world to be used in your Gateways To Adventure! Players can pick it up by punching it. They lose it if they leave your world.

name: Adventure's End
desc: Start your adventure at The Adventure Begins, and end it here! This resets all adventure items and announces to the world how well you did on the adventure.

name: Tomb Robber
desc: Watch out! These guys will steal Adventure Items from you! If you own the Tomb Robber, smack him with a wrench to change his mind about what to steal.

name: Adventure Tomb Gate
desc: These gates can be punched by the world owner to open or close them. But Tomb Robbers can change their status for a player who pays them - open ones will shut, shut ones will open.

name: Diamond Horn

func.add: You shoot lightning from your horn(s)!
func.rem: Tired of tooting your own horn?

desc: This amazing horn transforms each time you unequip it. Try all 3 flavors! It also boosts your build range.

name: Super Pineapple
desc: WOW, it's a super pineapple! This is even better than a normal pineapple, you should just keep eating these nonstop!

name: Super Exploding Pineapple
desc: Wait... this isn't any normal super pineapple! It looks like it's about to blow! STAND BACK!!!

name: Can Of Beans
desc: This can contains a magical fruit.

name: Mini-Mod
desc: When activated (punch to activate), this guy won't allow anyone to drop items in the world. Keep your place clean!

name: Pet Frog
desc: Ribbit ribbit. This little frog hops along everywhere you go!

name: Amethyst Block
desc: A lovely purple gem!

name: Pineapple Slice
desc: Slice of pineapple.

name: Cherry

func.rem: The effects of the Cherry have worn off.

desc: Leaves your tongue a little red, and well the rest of your body for that matter!

name: Pineapple Turnover

func.add: Get triple XP for using consumables.

desc: Eating these makes you sticky, so you can get more YUM from your food! Food Buff: Get triple XP for using consumables.

name: Pineapple Finger Ring
desc: This tasty pineapple ring is now stuck to your fingers. For some reason, a creepy pineapple spider keeps following you around!

name: Pineapple Glasses
desc: Pineapples in your eyes! Who wouldn't want that? Gives sticky vision which is suspiciously similar to normal vision but more sticky.

name: Jungle Blast
desc: Use this astounding device to create an entirely new jungle world. One free ziggurat included.

name: Weather Machine - Jungle
desc: What's lurking in the depths of the jungle? This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Adventurer's Whip
desc: Only a true adventurer can swing this thing with such style.

name: Adventurer's Sling Bag
desc: Look stylish while on all your greatest adventures. Who knows what you can hold in this. Doesn't actually give any more backpack space.

name: Jungle Fern
desc: Just an ordinary fern commonly found in the jungle.

name: Statue Mouth
desc: Its a piece of a statue. Seems to be a mouth.

name: Rubble
desc: There isn't much left of these bricks to be used anyway.

name: Jungle Pillar
desc: Looks like an ancient piece of some ruins. However, it is just a pillar, nothing special.

name: Overgrown Vines
desc: These vines are everywhere. Great for hiding in your favorite game of hide and seek.

name: Hanging Snake
desc: This deadly snake can be found lazing about in the growtopian jungles and is capable of instantly killing a Growtopian.

name: Royal Lock
desc: This fabulous world lock has some special new options. Wrench it and become the king of your world! It also shows you where players are in your world with Peasant Radar!

name: Silk Bolt - Floral
desc: Sew Silk items by using this in a Sewing Machine. It takes 3 Bolts of Silk to craft an item.

name: Hula Skirt
desc: Aloha. Sway those hips!

name: Floral Bikini Top
desc: Scandalous!

name: Floral Lei
desc: This particular one is lab-created, which you'd think is less classy, but they're much prettier.

name: Zinc

func.add: Fire walk with me! Fire does 50% damage.
func.rem: Your feet are no longer safe.

desc: Protection from the sun. Well at least your nose will be safe.

name: Frangipani
desc: Put a flower in your hair. All the girls are doing it this summer! Just don't let Jim catch you stealing flowers from his garden... He's Crazy!

name: Short Surfer Hair
desc: You've got that windblown chlorinated surfer look. It either makes you look cool or a filthy beach bum. It's a fine line.

name: Long Surfer Hair
desc: You've got that windblown chlorinated surfer look. It either makes you look cool or a filthy beach bum. It's a fine line.

name: Phoenix Crown
desc: Be honoured to wear this beautiful crown. Light the way for all to see. No more than 500 of these exist in all of Growtopia.

name: Surfboard
desc: Surfs up! This magical piece of fiberglass allows you to walk on water.

name: Surfboard - Flame
desc: Surfs up! This magical piece of fiberglass allows you to walk on water. Now with Flames artwork!

name: Surfboard - Wave
desc: Surfs up! This magical piece of fiberglass allows you to walk on water. Now with Wave artwork!

name: Surfboard - Electric Green
desc: Surfs up! This magical piece of fiberglass allows you to walk on water. Now in Electric Green!

name: Balloon-O-Matic
desc: Convert all your random junk into balloons for the war. Beware, may overheat and explode. WARNING! Is public for anyone on your team to use.

name: Destroyed Balloon-O-Matic
desc: Convert all your random junk into balloons for the war. Beware, may overheat and explode. WARNING! Is public for anyone on your team to use.

name: Team Entrance - Punch
desc: The only people getting through this door are the ones who are on team Punch. Outside of Balloon Warz, this functions as a normal entrance.

name: Team Entrance - Grow
desc: The only people getting through this door are the ones who are on team Grow. Outside of Balloon Warz, this functions as a normal entrance.

name: Team Entrance - Build
desc: The only people getting through this door are the ones who are on team Build. Outside of Balloon Warz, this functions as a normal entrance.

name: Balloon Launcher
desc: With this launcher you can throw balloons farther. Not much good for anything else, though.

name: Balloon Repellent
desc: Drinking this will keep those pesky balloons away for a while! The bubble of protection is extremely fragile. One hit and your protection will be gone!

name: Small War Balloon
desc: Toss these all over. Scores 1 team point per hit. Only counts if they aren't already colored. 0 points for hitting your own team; that's not cool.

name: Medium War Balloon
desc: Toss these all over. Scores 2 team point per hit. Only counts if they aren't already colored. 0 points for hitting your own team; that's not cool.

name: Large War Balloon
desc: Toss these all over. Scores 5 team point per hit. Only counts if they aren't already colored. 0 points for hitting your own team; that's not cool.

name: Balloon Warz Leaderboard
desc: Wrench this board to see how the Balloon Warz are going! Is your team ahead?

name: Balloon Filling Station
desc: The ideal station for creating war balloons! Shame every Growtopian is out filling balloons, though - the water's running low and it'll take a while to fill yours!

name: Team Shorts - Punch
desc: Red with victory. Wear your team colors proudly.

name: Team Shorts - Grow
desc: Green with glory. Wear your team colors proudly.

name: Team Shorts - Build
desc: Blue with bravery. Wear your team colors proudly!

name: Team Shirt - Punch
desc: Resplendent with redness. Wear your team colors proudly.

name: Team Shirt - Grow
desc: Glorious with greenness. Wear your team colors proudly.

name: Team Shirt - Build
desc: Beautiful with blueness. Wear your team colors proudly.

name: Team Pennant - Punch
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Team Pennant - Grow
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Team Pennant - Build
desc: It's just flappin' in the breeze.

name: Bouncy Balloon
desc: Formulated with extra-bouncy plastic. Hold Jump as you land for maximum bounce!

name: Super Squirt Gun Jetpack

func.add: You can fly!! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: Strap these to your back and get ready for the ride of your life. Use the power of pressurization to leap tall buildings in a single bound, then drift gently to Earth.

name: Towel Rack Checkpoint
desc: If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched! Also keeps you dry at a beach... or after eating a water balloon. Note: only dries you if it is also dry.

name: Balloon Jammer
desc: Prevents war balloons from being thrown in your world when activated (punch to activate). Has a 5 second countdown when activating/deactivating.

name: Weather Machine - Balloon Warz
desc: This machine will send your entire world up into the clouds where the balloons fly. This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Balloon Fragment
desc: This is a broken piece of a war balloon. If you feed enough of these into a Balloon-O-Matic, you're bound to get something good...

name: Balloon Warz Gold Trophy - Punch
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Silver Trophy - Punch
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Bronze Trophy - Punch
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Gold Trophy - Grow
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Silver Trophy - Grow
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Bronze Trophy - Grow
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Gold Trophy - Build
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Silver Trophy - Build
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Bronze Trophy - Build
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz MVP Trophy - Punch
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz MVP Trophy - Grow
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz MVP Trophy - Build
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Throwing Stand
desc: It's a classic photo op! Stand behind it and pretend you're getting splatted by a balloon. Fun for the whole family!

name: Target
desc: Punch it to win. Fun for the whole family!

name: Team Headband - Punch
desc: When there's a war on, sweat, water, and balloon fragments fly everywhere. This'll keep them all out of your eyes for more effective fighting!

name: Team Headband - Grow
desc: When there's a war on, sweat, water, and balloon fragments fly everywhere. This'll keep them all out of your eyes for more effective fighting!

name: Team Headband - Build
desc: When there's a war on, sweat, water, and balloon fragments fly everywhere. This'll keep them all out of your eyes for more effective fighting!

name: Red Facepaint
desc: Looks like youve been punched in the face or have you? Nope, its just face paint and a whopping dose of team spirit.

name: Green Facepaint
desc: Blend in with the trees for a surprise attack like a true Grow supporter.

name: Blue Facepaint
desc: Even Sir William Wallace would be envious of your team spirit. FREEEEDDDOOOOMMMMM! Wait! This is just a balloon war

name: Red Floaty Balloon
desc: Hold on tight and hopefully you wont float up into the sky. Theres a song with 99 red balloons, but sadly, this is only 1.

name: Green Floaty Balloon
desc: Hold on tight and hopefully you wont float up into the sky. Make everyone green with envy when they see your beautiful balloon.

name: Blue Floaty Balloon
desc: Hold on tight and hopefully you wont float up into the sky. The balloon might be blue, but youll never be.

name: Dark Green Wallpaper
desc: Kinda creepy, like you're in a green room with no lights on...

name: Dark Blue Wallpaper
desc: Kinda creepy, like you're trapped deep beneath the waves...

name: Super Squirt Gun Jetpack Pants

func.add: You can fly!! Well, you can jump higher than normal.

desc: Strap these to your hips and get ready for the ride of your life. Use the power of pressurization to leap tall buildings in a single bound, then drift gently to Earth.

name: Solar Chariot
desc: Run at the speed of, well... horses. On FIRE!

name: Silk Corset
desc: Feeling fat? You could exercise or you could just cram your gut into one of these! Oh sure, you may end up with spinal deformities, but beauty demands pain!

name: Gothic Corset
desc: Feeling fat? You could exercise... or you just cram your gut into one of these! Oh sure, you may end up with spinal deformities, but beauty demands pain!

name: Unicorn Hair
desc: Like unicorns? Well, so does the rest of the internet, and now you can look like one, too!

name: Emerald Pickaxe
desc: This tool is worth more than the stuff you mine with it!

name: Sand Shark
desc: A shark with a vicious bite. Sand Sharks can live up to seven years old. See this shark in action in Hungry Shark World.

name: Megalodon
desc: Amazing! You have caught the incredibly rare and elusive Megalodon. The largest shark ever. Class: MEGA-SIZED! Along with a mega diet, it's incredibly powerful and deadly. See this shark in action in Hungry Shark World!

name: Beanbag
desc: Flop down into a world of lazy wonder with this majestic sack o' beans!

name: Black Espadrille
desc: Perfect for kicking back - or kicking butt! - in the tropical sun.

name: Checkered Espadrille
desc: Perfect for kicking back - or kicking butt - in the tropical sun.

name: Sports Bra
desc: Get running and show off your curves while you're at it!

name: Pink Aura

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You are burning with brilliant energy! Also double-jump power.

name: Blue Aura

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You are burning with brilliant energy! Also double-jump power.

name: Wedding Headdress
desc: Everyone should look like a queen in their own wedding.

name: Sarong
desc: Casual, comfortable, and affordable! What more could you want?

name: Dress with Smock
desc: This light cotton dress is adorned with adorable stripes. Aww. How cute.

name: Waistcoat and Jacket
desc: The perfect garment for housing a pocketwatch and monocle. Will also keep you warm during those long winter days.

name: Orange
desc: A delicious sphere, complete with sweet, tingling citrus flavor.

name: Orange Juice
desc: Oranges are great. Grind the hell out of them and they're still delicious! Only, like, wetter.

name: Inside-Out Devil Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: You don't jump higher than with normal devil wings, but man, you DO look pretty cool, like an inside-out devil. Wait... doesn't that make you an angel?!

name: Speed Medallion

func.add: You trail lightning as you run!

desc: This amulet bestows you with speed energy, making you run so fast that lightning trails behind you! Grants Super Speed if you don't have it already.

name: Skateboard
desc: Skate or die! Alternatively you can live by doing other things, like eating and breathing. Actually, do those even if you ARE skating.

name: Antigravity Generator
desc: Disables gravity in your world when activated (punch to activate)! Well, it reduces gravity, and lets everybody jump as much as they want! This sensitive technology can't be used while damaged.

name: Builder's Lock
desc: Locks 200 tiles around itself. Only allows either building or breaking of blocks inside - wrench it to decide which!

name: Burning Hands
desc: Spew jets of flame from your hands!

name: Riding Turtle
desc: It's not the fastest transportation around, but it's the bumpiest!

name: Weather Machine - Background
desc: Tired of pesky weather? Choose any Background Block with this weather machine, and your world will look like you filled it up with that block! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Playful Fire Sprite

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: Looks like a little blob of fire following you! Makes sense.

name: Playful Wind Sprite

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: Looks like a little blob of wind following you! Makes sense.

name: Playful Wood Sprite

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: Looks like a little blob of wood following you! Makes sense.

name: Playful Water Sprite

func.add: Your pet has a fiery temper!

desc: Looks like a little blob of water is following you! Makes sense.

name: Plate Greaves
desc: Tired of being kicked in the shins? Aren't we all?

name: Flaming Horsie
desc: There was a saddle here, but it burned up. Eh, you can probably ride bareback.

name: Flaming Horse Chunk
desc: This is fairly morbid. Also hot.

name: Newspaper
desc: Great for checking the daily gazette. Equip to read.

name: Riding Chicken
desc: A feathered friend to carry you to and fro! Best parts? He'll never peck you to death with hordes of his angry pals.

name: Prismatic Aura

func.rem: Aw, back to your dull self.

desc: A fantastic aura of prismatic energy pulses around you, turning heads and bending the laws of gravity to your will. The power to double jump - and look awesome - will be yours!

name: Chicken Plow
desc: Ancient magic has unlocked the secrets of advance chicken farming! Now, for the first time, your chicken will PLANT seeds instead of eating them! (When equipped, will plant whatever seed you have selected as you move!)

name: Fire Essence
desc: The blazing heart of blockdom. Ow! Ow! Spicy.

name: Water Essence
desc: The slippery, liquid soul of blocks. Not only looks nice - it's also refreshing!

name: Earth Essence
desc: Titanic forces of dirt and stone have ground together to forge this pure piece of earth. Also makes for a nice paperweight.

name: Wind Essence
desc: Fluffy clouds and raging storms howl within this airy essence. Weighs a ton, surprisingly enough. Probably something to do with physics.

name: Fissure
desc: Punch it to open and shut it. Anyone unlucky enough to be caught inside when it closes becomes one with the soil. Really handy for gravediggers, too!

name: Waterfall
desc: Falling water is one of the strangest natural phenomena in Growtopia. You can't jump up through it, since you're not a salmon. You can, however, drop down, since you're like everything else!

name: Hidden Door
desc: Looks like an Art Deco Block, but with extra friendship - you can use this to allow access to others. Just, y'know, keep it secret. Hidden Doors are only cool if they're secret.

name: Anemone
desc: Stinging denizen of the deep! It won't kill you, but it'll hurt somethin' FIERCE. Unless you're a clown fish, I guess, but they have other things to worry about.

name: Aurora
desc: Dancing celestial light, compressed into handy block form! Fun Fact: Auroras are actually caused by collisions between electrically charged particles from the sun as they enter a planet's atmosphere! ...wait, that wasn't very fun, was it?

name: Obsidian
desc: Volcanic glass, forged deep beneath the earth. Slippery, potentially sharp, and has absolutely nothing to do with dragons.

name: Lava Lamp
desc: Groovy glows to light up your life! This lamp may be a little outdated, but who cares? It looks awesome!

name: Fire Asteroid
desc: Tearing through the atmosphere, this chunk of rock has ignited with whirls of flame! Now, thanks to magnets or something, it will float and burn forever!

name: Water Asteroid
desc: Laced with unobtanium, this floating rock comes complete with lovely cinematic waterfalls! The perfect touch to elevate a zen garden, or at least make your neighbours jealous.

name: Earth Asteroid
desc: You might think most asteroids are made of earth already, but this one have EXTRA earth for the dirtiest, most magnificently rocky experience to be found in a floating piece of the heavens.

name: Wind Asteroid
desc: The howling winds that came down with this asteroid have become a permanent part of it! Now it will float forever, whispering the secrets of space to you as it does. (NOTE: Secret of space may not actually be secret. Or audible.

name: Inferno Gate
desc: These blazing magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Ow hot!

name: Tidal Gate
desc: These rippling magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Ah, refreshing!

name: Typhoon Gate
desc: These whispering magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia.

name: Verdant Gate
desc: These lush magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Wow, tropical!

name: Ancient Hinge
desc: Creaking with legendary power, this must be the piece of something far greater. And doorlike. Maybe.

name: Ancient Pin
desc: Eons have not dulled the point of this pointy treasure. Careful! It's supernaturally pokey!

name: Ancient Bracket
desc: Superb craftmanship has kept this pristine across the ages. Once part of some grand design, it can be again... if you can figure out what it will make!

name: Ancient Lens
desc: Forged with long-lost sorceries, this glass remains unscratched after untold centuries! What could it reflect? Peer through it and into a time long past...

name: Crystallized Reality
desc: A raw chunk of reality itself! The pure magic surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!

name: Crystallized Wealth
desc: A pure piece of prosperity! The solidified richness surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty.

name: Crystallized Brilliance
desc: Thought given form! The tangible intelligence surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!

name: Crystallized Nature
desc: A fragment of Gaia's beating heart! The unstoppable life force surrounding it could certainly used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!

name: Ancestral Totem of Wisdom
desc: Incredible forces of willpower and mental strength have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this totem. Equip it and ancient knowledge will be yours...

name: Ancestral Tesseract of Dimensions
desc: Astonishing whirls of space and time have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this tesseract. Equip it and watch your hoard grow..

name: Ancestral Seed of Life
desc: Fantastic powers of verdant night have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this seed. Equip it and the bloom of life will bend to your will...

name: Ancestral Lens of Riches
desc: Unrelenting luck and luxury have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this lens. Equip it and unstoppable fortune will be yours... but do be careful. Power tends to corrupt, after all.

name: Ancient Altar
desc: A celestial seat of crafting power - use this to make your artifact even better. Who knew you could improve on perfection?

name: Ghastly Robe

func.add: Whoooaaaa! You're a scary ghooooost! Boo!
func.rem: You are back among the living.

desc: Clutching darkness whispers from the very essence of this dire robe. A mantle of unfathomable shadow, only the brave dare wear it, for it is marked by the haunting touch of the grave. We don't know where it came from - only that it must have been incredibly, deeply dark.

name: Bonsai
desc: Carefully tended and artfully shaped, this miniature plant is a harmonious expression of art and nature. It also makes for very tasty - but very small - salad!

name: Acorn
desc: The tiny start of a mighty oak! Don't collect too many, or the squirrels will come for you.

name: Centerpiece
desc: A colorful collection of leaves, candles, and wood. No fall celebration is complete without a stylish centerpiece to get in the way of people trying to enjoy their meal.

name: Maple Leaf
desc: A lovely leaf, it's color burnt by the changing seasons. It's a sign of hockey, Canadian patriotism, and, most importantly... pancake syrup!

name: Dragon Scales
desc: Shimmering layers of reptillian armor fit for the mightiest of drakes. Surprisingly enough, they also make for a really nice wallpaper!

name: Koi Fish
desc: This majestic koi will instantly make any pond or fish tank at least 86% classier. Don't question it - it's science!

name: Leaves
desc: Piles of fall leaves are good for exactly two things: Jumping into them, and who cares? I'm gonna jump in some leaves!

name: Celestial Kaleidoscope
desc: Whirling mirrors of the finest crystal reveal a beautiful barrage of color and patterns. Just don't stare at them too long, or you'll start seeing psychedelic swirls everywhere! Ow, my eyes!

name: Harmonic Chimes
desc: These Chimes hum with crystal wisdom, bringing serenity to all who hear their gentle music...tough they sometimes play heavy metal for no apparent reason

name: Hay
desc: Haaaaay! A big bale of harvest goodness, this is the perfect treat for a hungry horse. Just don't feed them too much. It makes them crazy.

name: Pinecone
desc: The secret weapon of pine trees. Nothing says 'fall' like getting hit in the head with a big, pointy bundle of seeds! Ow!

name: Weather Machine - Autumn
desc: Rev this baby up and enter a world of fall delights! Rustling leaves, setting suns, and a brisk chill in the air await you - just punch to activate! This sensitive technology will not function when damaged.

name: Tea
desc: Steady your hands with a refreshing sip of herbal tea! Posh! Halves the chance of skill failure when performing surgeries! (Doesn't stack with other items that reduces skill failure chance)

name: Tea Set
desc: Be careful! This upscale set of porcelain goodness is incredibly delicate. One wrong move, and you'll chip it and let all the tea ghosts out! They are a thing, you know.

name: Scarecrow Mask
desc: Act out your inner villain - or scare the bejeezus out of some birds - with this creepy harvest headgear. Who knew burlap and stitches could be so unsettling?

name: Rake
desc: Tear up some topsoil with this handy home implement. Can anything really be better than punching though?

name: Cloud Rabbit
desc: Bunny bunny bunny cloud cloud cloud bunny cloud bunny cloud bunny bunny cloud cloud

name: Dryad
desc: This pint-sized woodland sprite will defend the beauty of nature - and you - with all her adorable might! Just don't eat salads around her - it's very insensitive.

name: Zen Garden
desc: Create your own place of peace with this tranquil block. This has been carefully crafted with only the most soothing grains of sand, and trust me, it takes FOREVER to pick out the right ones.

name: Harvest Scarf
desc: A whirling wisp of fabric to accent your perfect harvest style. Will also keep you warm with extra snuggly fibers. Seriously, this thing is, like, TEN times snuzzlier than the next leading scarf.

name: Soul Stone
desc: Unearthly life pulses within this strange stone! You think it might be a link to the great beyond... but what purpose could such ancient power have in the worlds of the living? No one knows..

name: Plasma Globe
desc: Beams of dancing light twist and twirl within this glassy orb, bringing out the mad scientist in everyone! Also makes your hair stand up, which is pretty cool.

name: Cloak of Falling Waters

func.add: Your back is a raging rapid!
func.rem: You are a lot more dry, and a lot less cool.

desc: Mystic whorls of water have been bound in shifting fabric to forge a cape fit for only the wettest, wildest Growtopians. Command one of the primeval elements through the Azure Gem of Waters pinned to this gorgeous cloak and use it to extinguish even the mightiest blazes. Or y'know, spray people with it. It's your cape.

name: Demon Megalodon
desc: Oh what have you DONE?! This terrifying shark combines prehistoric predator power with the unholy corruption of Growganoth to create an unstoppable chomping machine! Class: DEMON-SIZED! See this shark in action in Hungry Shark World!

name: El Pollo Diablo
desc: THE DEMON CHICKEN! A feathered fiend to scare and carry you to and fro! The best part? He'll absolutely peck you to death, just for fun! ...wait, that's bad.

name: Doom Plow
desc: Are your crops not sufficiently terrified? Well, buckle up, because the power of Growganoth has overcharged the measely chicken plow into this fire-belching, flame-spewing monstrosity. Crazed chicken included. Do not operate while on prescription medication. Or for any other reason.

name: Killer Doctor's Smock
desc: Calmly perform surgery in this horrific top. Your new and gruesome bedside manner will be an instant hit with those meat sack- uh, I mean patients.

name: Killer Doctor's Cap
desc: Terror is the new black! Nurse, pass me the scalpel!

name: Killer Doctor's Face Mask
desc: Scare the bejeezus out of your patients with this deeply creepy surgeon's item. No unwanted surgery is complete without an evil mask to veil your villainous smile!

name: Killer Doctor's Pants
desc: Hit the dance floor - or the nearest surgery suite - in these breezy, yet unsettling scrubs. Nothing says comfort like a two-legged memento of your latest surgery success (or failure)!

name: Demon Clown Mask
desc: Hey, don't run away! IT really hurts my feelings when everyone flees my festive presence!

name: Neon Voodoo Mask - Pure White
desc: Electric voodoo stylings to put the frighteners on your friends! Now in woeful white!

name: Neon Voodoo Mask - Electric Blue
desc: Electric voodoo stylings to put the frighteners on your friends! Now in amazing blue!

name: Neon Voodoo Mask - Shocking Pink
desc: Electric voodoo stylings to put the frighteners on your friends! Now in petrifying pink!

name: Neon Voodoo Mask - Plasma Green
desc: Electric voodoo stylings to put the frighteners on your friends! Now in ghastly green!

name: Fish Monster Mask
desc: Ew! This thing is frilly, wet, and slimy - most places won't want you around in it, except maybe those hipster fish restaurants. May I recommend the "Black Lagoon Risotto"?

name: Demented Cowl
desc: Make friends with the shadows in this crazed - yet cool - cowl of darkness! Looming darkness may give those who wear this creepy cloth a pass...

name: Iron Maiden
desc: Ouch! This thing packs some seriously spiky nails. However tempting it may be, do NOT go inside!

name: Looming Shadows
desc: Uh, Its just a trick of the light, right? Nothing to worry about, right? RIGHT?! Oh man you'd better move!

name: Hanging Bats
desc: Dangling spooky bats on string. Don't worry, your fellow Growtopians will totally think they're the real deal. Keep those wigs covered!

name: Death Metal Radio
desc: Head bang to the extreme - and maybe a bit of dizziness - with this deadly radio. Crank it up to 11 and trash your way into any party.

name: Plastic Ghost
desc: Oooo-OOO-ooooh! Who doesn't like glow-in-the-dark ghosts? Be the life of any spooky event with these spectacular specters!

name: Totally Harmless Doll
desc: A completely ordinary, absolutely not-possessed, super-safe doll, perfect for children and other helpless creatures. Please don't be afraid. It's your friend. You should keep it close. Especially when you're asleep.

name: Headsman's Hood
desc: Heading to a Halloween party and don't want your beautiful face to take attention away from everyone else? Hide it behind this creepy hood and sneak about in secret!

name: Doll Head Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.

name: Doll Torso Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.

name: Doll Legs Part
desc: Hmm, looks like part of a doll! I bet you could make a complete one if you found the other pieces.

name: Pumpkin Candy
desc: Pumped full of seasonal goodness! For a tasty snack, take fresh pumpkin seeds, roast in the oven in a single layer at 300F until dry (about 50 minutes), then take them out, toss with melted butter, sugar, cinamon, and salt, and return to the oven at 350F until golden (about 12 more minutes). Growlicious!

name: Chi Harmonizer
desc: This steampunk clockwork crystal tuning fork uses its whirling gears to make crystal balancing a harmonious affair - broadens the spectrum of required chi for crystal balancing.

name: Harmonic Lock
desc: Forged from the finest, most calming and balanced materials in all the worlds, this lock's peerless powers will influence ANY crystal recipes you craft. Using it to lock a world will broaden the spectrum of chi requirements for crystal balancing within! Radical!

name: Neon Gum

func.add: Dazzle your friends as super funky neon lines course across your skin.

desc: Take a piece and dazzle your friends as super funky neon lines course across your skin. Chew rapidly to get a Speed boost and surround yourself with glowing bubbles!

name: Neon Nerves
desc: Check it out, chummer! Slap this colour-shifting circuitry under your skin and dazzle those dataslaves with wired speed! The only thing they'll catch is a trail of arctic light as you leave them in the dust!

name: Static Hair
desc: A shocking style for sure, but there might be more to it than that! Maybe you should check to see if it reacts with any other electrical sources...

name: Amethyst Choker
desc: Clasp your neck in this flawlessly cut piece of jewelwork, and be the envy of all.

name: Opal Block
desc: An enormous chunk of shimmering opal, resplendent in it's square-shaped majesty. You could never build a house out of opal in the real world, which is just one more reason why Growtopia is so much cooler.

name: Kaleidoscopic Wallpaper
desc: Build with these chunks of psychedelic sweetness, and their shimmering patterns will forever delight visitors to your worlds. I wonder if they'd hypnotize people, too - just look at those colors...

name: Demon Crystal
desc: Vile energies ripple across the surface of this twisted relic. Ancient tales tell of a demon trapped within a profane crystal - could this be it? And if so, what of the other legends, those that speak of a crown of stars stolen by the fiend? Could this be its prison? Could there be a way to pry the crown from its clutches?

name: Celestial Lance

func.rem: Seriously? Are you joking? You're totally joking!

desc: Everyone's heard of crafting swords from fallen stars, but this incredible weapon is forged from the CONSTELLATIONS themselves, radiating with the might of the heavens. Vile corruption and ancient darkness are no match for the glory of this device, for it can banish them utterly.

name: Celestial Halo
desc: Ripped from the heavens, stolen by demons, and now bequeathed to you. This miraculous crown will make you as light as the feather itself - a fitting gift for one who would stand against the darkness.

name: Celestial Frame
desc: Let the twinkling majesty of the heavens enclose your artwork! Comes with a blank canvas inside if you don't have any art. Note: If your art is made of background blocks, you'll need to apply Block Glue to it to make the frame surround it!

name: Celestial Dust
desc: The dust of precious stones. This dust contains heavenly properties, perhaps it could be refined to form something of use.

name: Celestial Blade
desc: This blade is enchanted with celestial power! You could build an awesome weapon with one of these and a handle... well, it'd be awesome if you could hold it. Maybe you need something to protect your hands when holding it.

name: Turkey Onesie Hood
desc: The crown of your turkey ensemble! Just don't lose your head over it! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Onesie Body
desc: No turkey is complete without a gobbly body, and this is the best you can find! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Onesie Legs
desc: Do the turkey trot with these gobble-tastic gams! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Onesie Feet
desc: Find your fall footing with these turkey toes! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Carving Set
desc: Reach out and get a handle on the holidays with a turkey touch! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Onesie Tail
desc: Look your Thanksgiving best with this wobbly tail! Gobble gobble gobble!

name: Turkey Onesie Beak
desc: Peck your dinner to death - just like a real turkey! Gobble gobble gobble

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Bronze
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this bronzed Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Silver
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this silvered Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey Dinner - Gold
desc: You indulged in one of the year's mightiest meals and came away with this fine reward (and maybe a tummyache)! Show off this gilded Thanksgiving turkey leg in recognition of your feat!

name: Black Friday Cart - Bronze
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this bronzed shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Black Friday Cart - Silver
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this silvered shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Black Friday Cart - Gold
desc: You survived the Black Friday stampede. Show off this gilded shopping cart in recognition of your feat.

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Bronze
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this bronzed tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Silver
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this silvered tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Cyber Monday Tablet - Gold
desc: You got high-tech and value-conscious on the best Monday of the year! Show off this gilded tablet in recognition of your feat!

name: Winterfest Calendar - 2017
desc: A wonderful Winterfest Calendar, jam-packed with joy and gifts to celebrate the holidays. Make sure to check back each day to get a new gift! ...or just wait and open them all in one go! Either way, it's a blast! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Winterfest Calendar will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Winterfest Calendar - 2017
desc: Winterfest 2017 was a bright and beautiful season, and this calendar marked the occasion with joys and gifts! Now that it's empty, you won't be getting anymore presents, but it can still be used as a lovely decoration.

name: Zephyr Helm

func.add: Ha! You have a helm fit for a king!
func.rem: You don't like to be the king?

desc: We've captured mystic winds in gleaming gold and used super-complicated rituals to transform them into a helm fit for a king! Don't bother trying to figure out how we did it, though. We, uh, kinda lost the notes after someone left a window open.

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Gold Trophy - Punch
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Silver Trophy - Punch
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Bronze Trophy - Punch
desc: Theres no such thing as a loser in balloon warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it of anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Gold Trophy - Grow
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Silver Trophy - Grow
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Bronze Trophy - Grow
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Gold Trophy - Build
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Silver Trophy - Build
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 Bronze Trophy - Build
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 MVP Trophy - Punch
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 MVP Trophy - Grow
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter 2017 MVP Trophy - Build
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Gingerbread Block
desc: The most delicious of blocks, spiced with ginger, cloves, nutmeg, a touch of honey and a heaping helping of holiday goodness! Shame you can't eat it...

name: Gingerbread House
desc: Growtopia is the only place it's acceptable to build a house out of gingerbread. It's far too delicious not to eat, otherwise!

name: Gingerbread Roof
desc: Raise the roof! The gingerbread roof, that is. Will shelter you from syrup rain, candy hail, and sugar blizzards.

name: Gingerbread Door
desc: The most welcoming doors are the ones made of gingerbread! Just be careful nobody eats it while you're distracted...

name: Holly
desc: Get festive with this pretty - yet pointy - decoration!

name: Log Cabin
desc: Live the life of a wilderness adventurer to the fullest with the help of this cozy cabin. Warning: Will not protect you from bears. Seriously, don't mess with those things.

name: Log Cabin Roof
desc: Shelter yourself from the wilderness elements with this heavy roof of terrific timber. Stops: Wind, rain, snow, sleet, hail, lightning. Does not stop: Bears.

name: Log Cabin Door
desc: If you're going to barricade yourself against the wilderness, it helps to have a way in and out. Fun fact: Bears never go through doors. Just... everything else.

name: Jack-in-the-Box
desc: Hopping holiday fun, compacted with springs and a touch of seasonal joy to make every bounce the best yet! Also good for scaring small children and cats.

name: Twinkling Lights
desc: Turn on these delightful lights and rejoice in their cozy twinkles. Just don't let them get tangled!

name: Small Icicles
desc: As ice thaws, it drips down and refreezes to create these wonderful wintry spikes, I like to think of them as free, water-flavoured popsicles.

name: Sheet Music: Winterfest
desc: If you aren't in range of a boombox, this will play a festive Winterfest-inspired sound for you. There are 14 different sounds, depending on how you place it vertically. Try them all!

name: White Chocolate Block
desc: Also known as albino chocolate, white chocolate is just regular chocolate that's been left out in the sun for too long.

name: Chocolate Swirl Block
desc: Unlike the swirling vortex of Growganoth, this spiral is sweet, wholesome, and almost completely guaranteed to not devour your life force.

name: Chocolate Sprinkles Block
desc: The sprinkles are the most important part of any dessert, even if it's a chocolate block. The key is to eat the chocolate first, so you can wear the sprinkle shell as a hat!

name: Chocolate Orange Block
desc: Orange you glad you found this block?

name: Chocolate Cherry Block
desc: Now the cherry on top of your sundae comes surrounded by chocolate! That's what i call a win-win.

name: S'mores Block
desc: Perfect for a cookout or a wintry cabin, there are few things better than toasting marshmallows, slapping them together with chocolate, and sandwiching the delicious mess between two graham crackers. Aw, now I've made myself hungry...

name: Cherry Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of cherry jelly.

name: Lime Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of lime jelly.

name: Blueberry Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of blue jelly.

name: Orange Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of orange jelly.

name: Lemon Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of lemon jelly.

name: A Row of Winterfest Socks
desc: A perfect decoration for your fireplace, log cabin and gingerbread house. Even better if you can find someone to fill them with presents.

name: Snow Block
