desc: There's nothing like the soft crunch of freshly fallen snow as you clumsily plod your way through it.

name: Winterfest Dancefloor
desc: Look at those lovely lights! Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started!

name: Mistletoe
desc: A bright and cheerful bundle of seasonal leaves, perfect for doorways and ceilings. Now's your chance to continue the charming tradition of kissing under it!

name: Winterfest Cracker
desc: A bundle of festive goodies, best cracked open with a friend. What will you find inside?

name: Deluxe Winterfest Cracker
desc: The finest and most upscale of crackers! Pop this lovely present open with a friend, and hope for something amazing!

name: Gingerbread Man
desc: A deliciously dangerous Gingerbread Man. Watch out! He's full of anger - as well as sugar - and ready to defend you against all your holiday foes!

name: Gingerbread Dough
desc: The spiced building block of something amazing. What will you create with this...?

name: Ice Skates of Winter
desc: Glide across the ice like a pro in these dashing ice skates. No more sliding around like a jerk!

name: Snowshoes
desc: Perfect for trekking through snow and doubles up as a nice pair of rackets, if you get the urge to play some tennis while you're out on the tundra.

name: Sleigh of Winter
desc: Everyone will want a ride on this luxurious winter sleigh, especially with your trusty Reindeer leading the way! (We recommend charging competitive rates and hiring a marketing firm for any new sleigh-focused business models).

name: Winter Frost Bow

func.add: That is one cool looking bow, man!

desc: Tired of shooting boring old arrows from stupid normal bows? Well THIS holiday beast of a bow shoots freezing ice shards! How cool is that?!

name: Ice Serpent Scarf

func.add: The cold envelopes you! Fire does 50% less damage.

desc: You might think a frosty ice serpent wouldn't be useful in the cold, but think again! This elegant creature will wrap your neck in so much friendship, you'll stay toasty warm all winter. Um, just don't let it snuggle you TOO hard...

name: Mountain Coat
desc: Toss this on to keep warm and become one with the wilderness. Maybe try to befriend a bear while you're at it? No, that's crazy...

name: Mountain Cap
desc: Whatever critter became this cap, I hope it was proud to know it would be forever immortalized as a sweet accessory for the top of your head.

name: Mountain Boots
desc: Trudge through trackless forests and raging mountain rivers in these old-timey boots.

name: Parka Hood - Orange
desc: Mmmph mmph mmph!

name: Parka Hood - Blue
desc: Prevent your face from freezing off and avoid the embarrassing outcome of having icicles dangling from your nose with the help of this cozy blue parka hood.

name: Puffy Blue Jacket
desc: If you ever saw a jacket and thought, "That's not NEARLY puffy enough for me," then this poofed-up piece of apparel will be perfect for you. Get it now to stay warm AND awesome all winter long!

name: Mr. Narwhal
desc: This is a 1 lb. Mr. Narwhal. The majestic narwhal, unicorn of the deep and expert poker of all things aquatic, is now yours for all your aquarium-enhancing needs!

name: Glass Piglet Squid
desc: Pigs are magical creatures - they can fly, swim, turn invisible, become bacon, and now... they can be SQUID! That's what this thing is, right? A really weird pig? Hmm... maybe I should look it up.

name: Gingerbread Cookie

func.add: 10% chance of triple XP for all actions.

desc: Not just ANY cookie, but a super-spiced winterrific GINGERBREAD cookie! Go to town on this treat and it'll give you more than just a sugar rush! Food Buff: 10% chance of triple XP from all actions.

name: Gross Golden Holiday Sweater
desc: Finally, the most luxuriously horrible holiday sweater you've been waiting for. Your super-wealthy, ultra-classy grandma would be proud.

name: Silverstar Bow
desc: Forged from stardust, aether winds, and purest silver, this beautiful bow belongs amongst the heavens - you must have been incredibly fortunate to count it among your possessions. Well, that or you're just a really good trader. Either way, let's shoot some stuff!

name: Red Eye Drops
desc: Need a new look? These drops will have you seeing red! You may need multiple drops - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect. Eye drops also interact with your natural eye color, so some effects may be impossible to achieve.

name: Green Eye Drops
desc: Need a new look? These drops give your eyes a green gleam! You may need multiple drops - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect. Eye drops also interact with your natural eye color, so some effects may be impossible to achieve.

name: Blue Eye Drops
desc: Need a new look? These drops will have you feeling anything but blue! You may need multiple drops - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect. Eye drops also interact with your natural eye color, so some effects may be impossible to achieve.

name: Black Eye Drops
desc: Need a new look? These drops will darken your eyes, but not your day! You may need multiple drops - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect. Eye drops also interact with your natural eye color, so some effects may be impossible to achieve.

name: Eye Cleaning Solution
desc: Fed up with your current eye color? This soothing and refreshing eye cleaner will leave your peepers sparkly clean - but you might need more than one bottle to finish the job!

name: Bathroom Mirror
desc: Take a good look at your face! Try not to stare too long, though - no matter how beautiful you are.

name: Sun Yellow Dancefloor
desc: Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started in sweet, sunny yellow!

name: Hot Pink Dancefloor
desc: Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started in eye-popping pink!

name: Bodacious Blue Dancefloor
desc: Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started in bodacious blue!

name: Groovy Green Dancefloor
desc: Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started in groovy green!

name: Raving Red Dancefloor
desc: Dance floors with color beat dance floors with no colors every time, so let's get this party started in raving red!

name: Rayman's Fist

func.add: Who needs arms when you have these?

desc: The perfect punch! Ever wanted to send a disembodied fist flying across the land like Rayman? Well, now you can! Land a blow like none other with this furious fist. It even comes with a friend: Globox!

name: Rayman's Hair
desc: Halt your fall with this helicopter hair, courtesy of Rayman himself! How does it spin like that? And more importantly, how does it look so amazing?

name: Rayman's Hoodie
desc: Stay warm and stylish with Rayman's personal hoodie. It even smells like him: waffles, vanilla, and determination!

name: Rayman's Shoes
desc: Rayman's spectacular shoes are yours! These are a toe-tingling delight, with all kinds of padding and luxury features you'd expect from a platform-hopping pro like Rayman. Toss these on and enjoy comfortable - and stylish - foot-based movement from now on!

name: Rayman's Nose
desc: Taking "Got your nose!" to a whole new level, aren't you? Somehow, some way, you've wound up with Rayman's nose! I hope he has a spare!

name: Equalizer Tee
desc: Celebrate optimal sound balance and look great at the same time!

name: Ultra Equalizer Tee
desc: This ultra version not only celebrates optimal sound balance, but it does it will mesmerizing movement! Ooh, the colors...

name: Rollback Plaque IV
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards yet again, and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. December 2017.

name: Flame Tee
desc: Don't worry - no matter how realistic this t-shirt's flames may be, it won't light anything on fire! ...though you WILL look super hot!

name: Ultra Flame Tee
desc: Don't let the flickering flames of this ultra version fool you - this shirt is NOT currently on fire! ...but your dance moves are!

name: Party Light Wave Vest
desc: Be the light of the party with this bright and beautiful vest!

name: Ultra Party Light Wave Vest
desc: Turn up the awesome with this ultra version - it'll really light up the night!

name: Party Style Top Hat
desc: This isn't just a great party hat - it's the GREATEST party hat. Top the evening (and your noggin) with this finely-honed piece of wearable art!

name: Ultra Party Glow Top Hat
desc: We've taken the greatest party hat known to science and given it an ultra upgrade. Okay, NOW this is clearly the best possible hat. How else could it be better?

name: Party Style Shades
desc: Hypnotize your fellow Growtopians as they stare longingly into these dazzling shades!

name: Ultra Party Glow Shades
desc: Take your party powers of shade-based hypnotism to the next level with this ultra version and never be friendless again!

name: Party Glow Sneakers
desc: Light up the night - and the dance floor - by popping these hotly-glowing goodies over your toes!

name: Party Style Scarf
desc: Wow, look at these colors! Ring your neck with the perfect party scarf.

name: Ultra Party Glow Scarf
desc: Turn up the heat with this ultra version of the party scarf - just be careful the only thing you set on fire is the dance floor! Those bulbs get hot!

name: Megawatt Bass Speaker
desc: Push partygoers around with the power of deep bass!

name: 5th Anniversary Block
desc: Wow! FIVE YEARS! Celebrate this incredible anniversary achievement with this wonderfully wobble (and gloriously golden) number 5!

name: Hand Drill
desc: Bore through the surface of frozen blocks with this hand drill and get fishing! Be careful not to put too much strain on it, though - it may break!

name: Nuclear Detonator
desc: Blast through the surface of irradiated blocks with this nuclear detonator and get fishing! It's a bit volatile though and may break!

name: Uranium Glowing Lure
desc: Attract nuclear fish! Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait in a nearby radioactive water to start fishing. The ghostly glowing light of uranium will catch unique fish that other bait can't entice!

name: Mega-Pellet Bait
desc: Attract frosty fish! Equip a fishing rod and then use this bait in nearby ice water to start fishing. The icy shimmer of this bait will catch unique fish that other lures can't entice!

name: Training Port
desc: This port is for adding or removing fish for Training! Use your wrench to manage the fish, just like real fish. You can only place this on a fish tank.

name: Fish Medicine
desc: Make a sick Training Fish bright and healthy with this healing potion. One dose is enough to make even the sickest fish all better!

name: Fish Reviver
desc: Resurrect a dead Training Fish with a revivifying zap from this Rare Fish Reviver! One dose is enough to reach beyond the veil and bring a fish back from the dead! Comes with a 100% zombie-free guarantee!

name: Fish Flakes
desc: Every fish adores these tasty flakes! Give a pinch to your Training Fish and fill their scaley bellies with aquatic goodness! Take the guesswork out of finnicky feedings with a treat you know they're love.

name: Maidmare Fish
desc: A terrifying creature forged by the awful effects of radiation! Don't stare too long or "she'll" get upset...

name: Maidmare
desc: A terrifying creature forged by the awful effects of radiation! Your enemies flee in terror from this creepy creature's mega fishy, slimetacular wet smooch attack!

name: Double-Headed Angel-Devil Fish
desc: Good heavens, this is one heck of a fish. Embodying the best (and worst) of the cosmos, this split-faced aberration loves giving good and bad advice.

name: Riding Double-Headed Angel-Devil Fish
desc: Good heavens! This is one heck of a riding fish. Embodying the best (and worst) of the cosmos, this split-faced aberration loves giving good and bad advice while carrying you to and fro.

name: Double-Headed Angel-Devil Fish Leash
desc: Good heavens! This is one heck of a pet. Embodying the best (and worst) of the cosmos, this split-faced aberration loves giving good and bad advice while floating at your side.

name: Absolutely Real Elephant Fish
desc: A genuine elephant fish that totally exists. Ha! Look at his silly nose! Just hide your peanuts while they're around - they're obsessed.

name: Absolutely Real Elephant Fish Leash
desc: A genuine elephant fish pet that totally exists. Ha! Look at his silly nose! Will delight onlookers as it follows you around, dispensing wisdom and menacing peanut sellers.

name: Cuttlefish
desc: You may think this is a fish, but you'd be wrong! Cuttlefish are molluscs - but "Cuttlemollusc," doesn't quite roll off the tongue does it?

name: Riding Cuttlefish
desc: Writhing tentacles clear the way as you ride into town on this slimy beast! All shall tremble before your mighty fish- err... mollusc!

name: Cuttlefish Leash
desc: You may think this is a fish, but you'd be wrong! Cuttlefish are molluscs - but "Cuttlemollusc," doesn't sound quite roll off the tongue does it? Either way, it'll be happy to follow you around, no matter what you call it.

name: Riding Stonefish
desc: Through careful training, one of the most poisonous fish in the world can now be ridden without fear! Careful, though - they're still quite pointy.

name: Stonefish Leash
desc: This is one of the most poisonous fish in the world... and you have it following you around?! You're crazy!

name: Riding Sand Shark
desc: Out of the sand and happy on land, this sand shark has decided to let you ride it around. Isn't that nice of him?

name: Sand Shark Leash
desc: Out of the sand and happy on land, this sand shark has decided to follow you around like a toothy balloon. Isn't that nice of him?

name: Riding Seahorse
desc: Neither fish nor horse, but after careful feeding, it's still a trusty steed! Ride this undersea mount into battle and become a Knight of the Seahorse! It's a very prestigious order, you know.

name: Seahorse Leash
desc: This rare fish is very hard to keep in an aquarium. Lucky for you, this is a videogame, and it's happy to float beside you and impress everyone who sees it!

name: Battle Gar
desc: The snappiest, toothiest, chompin'est fish is out of the tank - and out for blood! This battle gar will chow down on your foes and bring you victory! ...just don't get too close to those snappy jaws!

name: Battle Mutant Fish
desc: Strange mutations can make for the meanest fish, as this battling mutant will prove! Good thing it's on your side - with that extra eye, it can always keep a Lookout while it takes down your foes!

name: Alpha Great White Shark
desc: The king predator of the sea. Full of teeth and bereft of mercy, this abyssal biter can shred unwary swimmers in seconds! Du-dum, dumm-dum... dum, dum, dum, dum, dum, dum, dum, dumm, dum - sh, sh, sh, SHARK! Aiiiiieee!

name: Riding Alpha Great White Shark
desc: How do you make the king predator of the sea even cooler? Toss a saddle on and ride them into the sunset, of course! Little-known fact: Great whites Love Westerns, and secretly wish they could survive in the desert.

name: Alpha Great White Shark Leash
desc: The king predator of the sea will follow you around and watch your back. Take him on dates for an extra-romantic companion. Nobody can resist the owner of a deep sea terror, and this is one of the deepest, most terrifying things you can get!

name: Weird Manta Ray
desc: Once a peaceful vegetarian, this manta has emerged from the depths of toxic sludge with a hunger for other fish and a nasty sting!

name: Riding Weird Manta Ray
desc: This voracious beast can now be ridden across the land, striking fear (and awe) into all who gaze upon it. Perfect for those who always wanted to ride a carpet with teeth.

name: Weird Manta Ray Leash
desc: Flapping wings curl through the air at your side, but this is no pet bird - it's a really creepy manta ray! Happy to be freed from toxic sludge, it floats beside you as a loyal friend.

name: Goldfish Leash
desc: These aren't made of gold, which is actually a good thing - otherwise they'd be too heavy to float beside you, looking all fishy and cool!

name: Catfish Leash
desc: Hey! It's not a real cat at all! It doesn't even purr! Well, at least it's friendly enough to follow you around. Here kitty!

name: Sunfish Leash
desc: If there's one fish that can brighten your day as it follows you around, this is it. Warning: Not a real sun.

name: Bass Leash
desc: Don't slap the bass - you'd just hurt it, and all it wants is to follow you around.

name: Mahi Mahi Leash
desc: The fish so nice they named it twice - now it will follow you around, and thrice as nice!

name: Dogfish Leash
desc: This adorable Dogfish will follow you around like a little lost puppy. They're so obedient!

name: Whale Leash
desc: This giant of the ocean is a mammal and extremely heavy - so how the heck does it float whilst following you around?

name: Picasso Triggerfish Leash
desc: Also known as Hawaii's state fish, the Humuhumunukunukuapua'a, which is probably the best name ever. Regardless of what you call it, it'll still follow you around with majestic grace.

name: Ice Crust Block
desc: Solid ice! Maybe you can use something to bore a hole inside it...?

name: Goldfish Bowler Hat
desc: Who's to say you can't wear a goldfish on your head? Silly people, that's who. They just don't understand how great it is to rock a goldfish upstairs. Don't listen to them. They're not cool like you.

name: Catfish Slippers
desc: The warmest, fluffiest fish-based slippers around, these are the cat's meow!

name: Dogfish Slippers
desc: Arf! For times when your dogs are barkin', slide on a pair of these slippers and relax in fishy comfort.

name: Picasso Face
desc: Someone's turned this triggerfish into a masterpiece for your face! Awesome!

name: Tentacle Beard
desc: Arrr, me hearties! Sail the seven seas with floating tentacles on your face, and all will know your name and tremble before your rubbery glory.

name: Puffer Fish Block
desc: Puffer Fish expand when scared, and here in Growtopia, they're always terrified for some reason. Watch out for those spikes!

name: Queen Conch Shell
desc: Blow into this like a trumpet and enjoy the soothing tunes of the sea wherever you may be. Or set it on a shelf and discuss tall tales of the briny deep with your best mates. Ya harr!

name: Davy Jones' Chest
desc: Store treasures of the deep (or your grandma's garage sale) within its barnacled interior by dropping them! When it's closed, the items are hidden! Punch it to open it!

name: Radiation Block
desc: Don't worry, the deadly radiation is still safely stored inside this block - however, don't go prodding and poking it just in case!

name: Radiation Sign
desc: Radical! Write stuff on it to tell your friends! Use your Wrench to change the message.

name: Fancy Fish Wall Mount
desc: Proud of your catch, but you don't want the responsibility of caring for it? Place it on this fancy mount with your wrench! You can only display Perfect or Massive fish on this mount. Once a fish is mounted, it can never be removed.

name: Tiny Frozen Chunk
desc: Oh no! The frigid waters froze your bait into a tiny chunk! Consume to get a Mega-Pellet Bait.

name: Small Frozen Chunk
desc: Oh no! The frigid waters froze your bait into a small chunk! Consume to get a Mega-Pellet Bait.

name: Large Frozen Chunk
desc: Oh no! The frigid waters froze your bait into a large chunk! Consume to get a [[Mega-Pellet Bait]].

name: Tiny Radioactive Bit
desc: Yikes! The radioactive waters blasted your bait into a tiny radioactive bit! With only trace amounts (honest) of radiation, consume to get a Uranium Glowing Lure.

name: Small Radioactive Bit
desc: Yikes! The radioactive waters blasted your bait into a small radioactive bit! With only trace amounts (honest) of radiation, consume to get a Uranium Glowing Lure.

name: Large Radioactive Bit
desc: Yikes! The radioactive waters blasted your bait into a large radioactive bit! With only trace amounts (honest) of radiation, consume to get a Uranium Glowing Lure.

name: MAGPLANT 5000
desc: Tired of picking up things with your puny human hands only to put them down later? With the awesome power of MAGNETS, these woes will be a thing of the past! GrowTech inc. proudly presents the MAGPLANT 5000, an all-in-one item-collecting and planting masterpiece. Simply target the machine to the seed or block of your choosing, and it will collect and store any that drop in your world! Only collects items from breaking blocks and harvesting!

name: MAGPLANT 5000 Remote
desc: Switch your patent-pending MAGPLANT 5000 to plant mode, and this handy remote will place any blocks or seeds it contains wherever you target! Wow! It's not a miracle - it's SCIENCE! (TM)

name: Cupid Leash
desc: This cherubic companion brings romance wherever he goes! With feathery wings and a love-laced bow, he's an unstoppable source of sweetness.

name: Heart Shirt
desc: Forget wearing your heart on your sleeve - put it right out there on your shirt so everyone can see how lovable you are!

name: Golden Heart Shirt
desc: True heartthrobs dont just assume people will realize how amazing they are  they wear awesome animated shirts like this to show off their romantic might for them!

name: USMom's Talaria

func.rem: Your feet are back on the ground!

desc: Made to the exacting specifications of its angelic sponsor, these winged wonders will get you where you need to be in a blur of flapping finery! Sponsored by USMom.

name: Golden Talaria

func.rem: Your feet are back on the ground!

desc: For times when ordinary winged shoes won't do, pop these shining masterpieces on and show the world you're not just faster and flightier than the average footwearer - you're also fancier.

name: Heart Necklace
desc: A heart that's incomplete is a symbol of want, of the need to belong, and that means this necklace is looking for a match. Find your valentine out there and be whole again!

name: Weather Machine - Valentine's
desc: Love is in the air! Send hearts sailing through pink and fluffy skies with this adorable weather machine and everyone will know what a romantic you are! This sensitive technology will not function while damaged.

name: Teddy Bear Block
desc: This is probably the only safe bear out there - and he's huggably wonderful! No need to worry about claws and doom with a plush companion like this. If only real bears were as friendly...

name: Love Birds
desc: Chirp chirp! Learn the songs of love from these sweethearts. They're so happy together, they can't wait to share their joy with the world!

name: Love Curtain
desc: A tender-hearted drapery to hide you and your sweetheart from prying eyes! Just make sure you know them well - otherwise you might end up getting in a less-than-affectionate fight!

name: Valentine's Dust
desc: A sprinkle of romance, a touch of affection, and a dash of intimacy, all ground up into one passionate powder! What could it be for?

name: Valentine's Card
desc: Show the world you care by using this card to send a gift of love to a fellow Growtopian! They'll surely appreciate the gesture, and who knows - perhaps your generosity will be rewarded!

name: Laser Grid
desc: This is just a harmless frame with cool-looking lights on it, right? Huh. Now they're getting brighter. And hotter. Um... maybe you should move. No, faster than that! FASTER!

name: Command - Move Left
desc: Send your CyBots one square to the left with this command!

name: Command - Move Right
desc: Send your CyBots one square right with this command!

name: Command - Move Up
desc: Send your CyBots one square straight up with this command!

name: Command - Move Down
desc: Send your CyBots one square straight down with this command!

name: Command - Pause
desc: Make your CyBots stop for a moment with this command!

name: Command - Basic Shot Left
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 4 squares to the left with this command!

name: Command - Basic Shot Right
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 4 squares to the right with this command!

name: Command - Basic Shot Up
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 4 squares upwards with this command!

name: Command - Basic Shot Down
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 4 squares downwards with this command!

name: Command - Improved Shot Left
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 8 squares to the left with this command!

name: Command - Improved Shot Right
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 8 squares to the right with this command!

name: Command - Improved Shot Up
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 8 squares upwards with this command!

name: Command - Improved Shot Down
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 8 squares downwards with this command!

name: Command - Long Shot Left
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 12 squares to the left with this command!

name: Command - Long Shot Right
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 12 squares to the right with this command!

name: Command - Long Shot Up
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 12 squares directly up with this command!

name: Command - Long Shot Down
desc: Make your CyBots (the ones that can shoot, that is) fire 12 squares down with this command!

name: Small Seed Pack
desc: Contains 5 randomly chosen seeds, including 1 rare seed! Use it on yourself to open it - who knows what you'll get?!

name: Will of the Wild

func.add: Fire, Water and Earth, sorry no Air!

desc: The powerful forces of the wild elements: fire, water and earth live in this ethereal hair - just don't mention the air element! The mage that tamed these wild forces could never control his wind, and he's already the butt of all jokes at mage parties!

name: Giant Pot O' Gold
desc: Gleaming treasures await! Let's see if you have the luck o' the Irish - drop stuff in here, and wonderful items may emerge!

name: Weather Machine - St. Paddy's Day
desc: Celebrate St. Patrick's Day in style with the most magical of all weather! You can only have one of these per world.

name: Drinks Hat
desc: Celebrate alllll day - *hic* - long with this hands-free, extra-*hic*-strong drinking device. Urp. 'Scuse me.

name: Irish Dance Dress
desc: You might fling your shoes off when the spirit of the dance takes over, but at least you can be confident this dress will stay firmly on your body.

name: Lucky Clover Background
desc: A lovely stylized image of a clover, the luck o' the Irish is with you!

name: Sheet Music: Flute Note
desc: If you aren't in range of a Boombox, this will play a flute note for you. Put it in different places for different pitches.

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Flute
desc: This note plays a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Flute Note.

name: Sheet Music: Flat Flute
desc: This note plays a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Flute Note.

name: Harp
desc: The heavenly sounds of the harp - who can resist the soothing pleasure of running their fingers across the strings?

name: Giant's Causeway Block
desc: This remarkable block will create an area of interlocking basalt columns - legend has it they were created by a giant!

name: Rainbowfish Leash
desc: Nobody knows where the name of this fish came from  it's quite mysterious  but what we DO know is that it'll fill your world with happiness and glee as it follows you around.

name: Rainbow Cape

func.rem: I guess dreams only come true for others, not you.

desc: A mesmerizing ripple cape. Dazzle your friends!

name: Magical Rainbow Fishing Rod
desc: Equip this and use bait on water next to you to go fishing! All you have to do is wait for a bite, and then punch the fish before it escapes! If you miss, your bait is wasted, so punch fast. You will suffer mischievous effects when catching fish with this rod! Only found in Blarney 6 and 8.

name: Paper Dividing Wall
desc: Delicate, stylish paper makes for a fine traditional wall. Just don't lean on it too hard!

name: Decorative Paper Wall
desc: This is made of delicate, stylish paper for a fine traditional wallpaper.

name: Chinese Arch
desc: An arch of great cultural significance and history. Plus it looks nifty.

name: Coin Door
desc: The gateway to prosperity! May it always be open to you.

name: Fortune Cookie
desc: A tasty treat with a touch of wisdom. Crack one open for instant enlightenment (and prizes)!

name: Lucky Token
desc: Legend says these will link your world to the realm of the ancients, where great gods of chance watch over us. Perhaps if you add this to your world, they will bless you with a small piece of their vast fortunes...

name: Draconic Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Shimmering scales of pure power coat these marvelous wings, marking them as the sign of the truly fortunate. These give you the power to double jump... and look amazing. Fortune has smiled on you for possessing this! There are only 1000 in existence!

name: Red Dragon Head
desc: The head of the dragon? What else can you add to this, I wonder.

name: Red Dragon Body
desc: A body of the dragon! See how long you can make it!

name: Red Dragon Legs
desc: The legs of the dragon! See how long you can make it!

name: Red Dragon Tail
desc: The tail of the dragon! An end, perhaps... or is it a new beginning?

name: Lunar Spice Spray
desc: Packed with rich spices and wholesome powers, this spray will speed up the growth of one tree from the Chinese New Year event by 24 hours!

name: Chinese Fireworks
desc: Set the skies alight with a burst of traditional fireworks from the land that invented them!

name: Chinese Crackers
desc: A snapping, popping string of fun! Light it up and let merrymaking commence!

name: Growmoji World Lock
desc: Pop a world lock into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Grow
desc: Gain a bit of growth in your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Gems
desc: Make your chat sparkle with delicious gems! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Growtoken
desc: Brighten up your chat with a rare and wonderful Growtoken! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Vend
desc: Put your chat up for sale with a vending machine! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Oops
desc: Feeling nervous and a little awesome? Grin and bear it with this growmoji! Just consume to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Sleep
desc: Zzz... wha?! Oh, you're feeling sleepy, too? Let everyone know it! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Punch
desc: Behold the mighty fist of Growtopia! Punch it into your chat so all may see your power! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Broken Heart
desc: Behold the mighty fist of Growtopia! Punch it into your chat so all may see your power! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Cry
desc: Behold the mighty fist of Growtopia! Punch it into your chat so all may see your power! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Guild Lock
desc: Locks an entire world for the guild. Use your wrench to set guild member and non-member access. The guild lock cannot be broken.

name: Guild Key
desc: The key to your kingdom! If you trade this to another player while in your guild world, they will become the new guild leader, and you will be demoted to Co-Leader, so BE CAREFUL!

name: Guild Entrance - Normal
desc: Members only! This plain - but effective - private door only lets people in your guild (or folks you like) pass through. Wrench it to add guild members and any 'others'. Note: Guild members will automatically be removed if they leave the guild!

name: Guild Entrance - Ornate
desc: Members only! This ornate private door only lets people in your guild (or folks you like) pass through. Wrench it to add guild members and any 'others'. Note: Guild members will automatically be removed if they leave the guild!

name: Guild Banner - Normal (Horizontal)
desc: Show off your guild colors with this honorable banner. Banner colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Banner - Ornate (Horizontal)
desc: Show off your guild colors with this honorable - and ornate - banner. Banner colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Banner - Normal (Vertical)
desc: Show off your guild colors in a vertical manner with this banner. Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Banner - Ornate (Vertical)
desc: Show off your guild colors in a vertical - and ornate - manner with this banner. Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag Pole - Spear
desc: What better way to show off your guild flag than to perch it on top of this super-pointy pole!

name: Guild Flag Pole - Wings
desc: What better way to show off your guild flag than to perch it on top of this wonderfully-wingy pole!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered - yet still groovy -flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Filigree)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and filigreed flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Harlequin)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and harlequin-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Plaid)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and plaid-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Cross)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and cross-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Slant)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and slant-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Panel)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and panel-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Stripe)
desc: Show off your guild mascot with this tattered and striped-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Flame)
desc: Show off your guild mascot and let everyone know you're at the top of your game with this tattered and flame-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Tatters (Division)
desc: Show off your guild mascot and let everyone know you're at the top of your game with this tattered and well-divisioned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot.

name: Guild Flag - Arrow
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Filigree)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and filigreed flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Harlequin)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and harlequin-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Plaid)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and plaid-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Cross)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and cross-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Slant)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and slant-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Panel)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and panel-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Stripe)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and stripe-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Flame)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and flame-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Arrow (Division)
desc: Point the way to victory for your guild with this arrow-shaped and well-divisioned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Filigree)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and filigreed flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Harlequin)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and harlequin-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Plaid)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and plaid-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and cross-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and slant-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and panel-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Stripe)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and striped-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Flame)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and flame-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Wave (Division)
desc: Surf into success and show off your guild mascot with this wave-shaped and well-divisioned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot.

name: Guild Flag - Peak
desc: Show off your guild mascot and let everyone know you're at the top of your game with this peak-shaped flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Peak (Filigree)
desc: Show off your guild mascot and let everyone know you're at the top of your game with this peak-shaped and filigreed flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Shield
desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Shield (Filigree)
desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped and filigreed flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Shield (Harlequin)
desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped and harlequin-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this this shield-shaped and plaid-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped and cross-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!
