name: Guild Flag - Shield (Flame)
desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped and flame-patterned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot!

name: Guild Flag - Shield (Division)
desc: Stand proud and show off your guild mascot with this shield-shaped and well-divisioned flag! Its colors will adapt to the seeds from your guild mascot.

name: Guild Potion - Geiger

func.add: The Guild Leader released the magic!
func.rem: The effects of the Guild Potion have ended!

desc: A mighty guild potion! Only a Guild Leader can consume it, which will give its buff to ALL guild members. Guild Potion Buff: Geiger charge time reduced by 25%! - Buff lasts for a limited time.

name: Guild Potion - Grow

func.add: The Guild Leader released the magic!
func.rem: The effects of the Guild Potion have ended!

desc: A mightly guild potion! Only a Guild Leader can consume it, which will give its buff to ALL guild members. Guild Potion Buff: 5% Grow time reduction! - Buff lasts for a limited time.

name: Guild Potion - Gems

func.add: The Guild Leader released the magic! 1% bonus chance of Extra Gems!
func.rem: The effects of the Guild Potion have ended!

desc: A mightly guild potion! Only a Guild Leader can consume it, which will give its buff to ALL guild members. Guild Potion Buff: 1% bonus chance of Extra Gems to be dropped! - Buff lasts for a limited time.

name: Guild Potion - Big Fish

func.add: The Guild Leader released the magic!
func.rem: The effects of the Guild Potion have ended!

desc: A mighty guild potion! Only a Guild Leader can consume it, which will give its buff to ALL guild members. Guild Potion Buff: 10% chance of catching a bigger fish! - Buff lasts for a limited time.

name: Guild Potion - Blocks

func.add: The Guild Leader released the magic! 1% chance of Extra Blocks!
func.rem: The effects of the Guild Potion have ended!

desc: A mighty guild potion! Only a Guild Leader can consume it, which will give its buff to ALL guild members. Guild Potion Buff: 1% bonus chance of a dropping an Extra Block! - Buff lasts for a limited time.

name: Guild Potion: White Mixer
desc: A small part of a mighty guild potion! Collect enough mixers to brew a truly terrific concoction!

name: Guild Potion: Black Mixer
desc: A small part of a mighty guild potion! Collect enough mixers to brew a truly terrific concoction!

name: Gold Guild Chest
desc: Congratulations to you for landing in the Top 1-10 on the Guild Leaderboards! Open this glorious gold chest for a surprise item!

name: Silver Guild Chest
desc: Congratulations to you for landing in the Top 11-30 on the Guild Leaderboards! Open this shining silver chest for a surprise item!

name: Bronze Guild Chest
desc: Congratulations to you for landing in the Top 31-100 on the Guild Leaderboards! Open this beautiful bronze chest for a surprise item!

name: Guild Chest
desc: Loaded with guildy goodness (and other things)! Pop this chest open for a surprise item!

name: Ubisoft
desc: Not used, it's just an icon, But like, the best icon ever.

name: Epoch Machine
desc: Send your world spinning through time and space! A distant past of fiery volcanoes, a forgotten age of ice and auroras, a time-tossed land of majesty and floating isles await you! Wrench your awesome Epoch Machine to choose your time period (and adjust other settings). Note: You can only have one of this per world.

name: Bunny Toy
desc: You can never have enough cute bunnies! Carry this little guy with you wherever you go!

name: Pastel Dress - Blue
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this blue pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Pink
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this pink pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Purple
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this purple pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Orange
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this orange pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Yellow
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this yellow pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Aqua
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this aqua pastel dress!

name: Pastel Dress - Green
desc: Spring fashion has arrived! Tis the season for brightening skies, growing seeds, and this green pastel dress!

name: Pastel Tie
desc: Show your business side this spring with a power pastel tie! That promotion is yours!

name: Egg Shell Spikes
desc: Yikes! Don't try walking on these shells. This is the egg that breaks YOU. Do not touch!

name: Bunny Lock
desc: Locks an entire world. Works exactly like a normal world lock, only WAY fluffier. A lock makes it so only you (and designated friends.) can edit an area.

name: Hidden Eggs
desc: Springtime treats are hiding here, which makes this the happiest kind of grass.

name: Chocolate Bunny

func.rem: Your feet shrink back to normal.

desc: Ganache-filled, cocoa-dusted, deep-fried bouncy chocolatey bunny goodness! Yum! Food Buff: High jump! Doesn't stack with other high jump mods.

name: Totally Legit Bunnyfish Leash
desc: Amazing! You have trained the incredibly rare, elusive, and completely real Bunnyfish! 100% cute, 0% fake!

name: Totally Legit Bunny Ears
desc: These totally legit ears somehow allow you to have your actual ears too. Now thats bunny magic!

name: Magic Bell
desc: Ding ding! Ring is spring - and any other cool events you can imagine - with this mystic bell. It's enchanted to sound exactly the same, every time you ring it! Wow!

name: Game Egg
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this flag belongs to! During a Game, players can steal enemy flags and deliver them to their own Game Goals.

name: Missing Game Egg
desc: This egg has been taken! It will return when the Game is over

name: Carried Game Egg
desc: A flag being carried by a player. Get moving!

name: Game Goal Egg Basket
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this block belongs to! During a Game, you may want to bring Eggs here.

name: Game Grave Egg
desc: Use your wrench to set which team this block belongs to! During a Game, players of that team will respawn here.

name: Growmoji Bunny
desc: Pop a bunny into your chat and get your hop on! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Bear Spirit

func.add: You are one with your spirit animal!
func.rem: Back to the realm of the living!

desc: You are one with your spirit animal! The awesome guidance of the Bear Spirit has given you the gift of double jump! Which is something wild bears do. Don't look it up. Just trust us.

name: Rainbow Hair
desc: Style your hair in shimmering rainbow light to amuse your friends and infuriate Leprechauns. Also works great for reading late at night.

name: Intergalactic Warrior Hair
desc: YOUR HAIR IS NOW PURE POWER AND THAT POWER IS OVER NINE THOUSAAAAAAAAAAND! BELIEVE IN THIS HAIR, FOR THIS HAIR BELIEVES IN YOU!

name: Egg Rescue Ticket
desc: Growtopia requires you, great adventurer, to save Easter and rescue the eggs from Bunny Barko. This ticket entitles the holder to one entry in the Great Growtopia Easter Egg Rescue project. Present this to claim your reward! Fabulous prizes await all who participate.

name: Dumb Leader
desc: Not used, it's just an icon.

name: WOTD Trophy 2018
desc: Best of all possible trophies in 2018.

name: GrowScan 9000
desc: Mystified by machines? Well, struggle no more! The GrowScan 9000 is here to help! Wrench this incredible invention and you'll instantly learn about every last block in your world - Check stats, find items and more with a flip of the wrench! Wow!

name: Element - Earth
desc: Elemental Icon

name: Element - Fire
desc: Elemental Icon

name: Element - Wind
desc: Elemental Icon

name: Element - Water
desc: Elemental Icon

name: Whip of Truth
desc: Whirling with wisdom and knowledge long forgotten, the Whip of Truth can pull secret from the very air  AND those you whap with it! Under its gleaming golden might, no falsehoods can survive

name: Ring Of Shrinking

func.rem: You grow back to your normal size.

desc: Become your very own Mini-You! Fool your friends with this amazing optical illusion, now with complete lack of particle emitters! Once again, we reiterate that this is an illusion - Growtech accepts no responsibility for users getting stuck in tight spaces (or inability to use auras convincingly).

name: Sheet Music: Spanish Guitar Note
desc: Magnifico! This sheet will play a spanish guitar note for you as along as you aren't in a range of a boombox. Put it in different placed for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Spanish Guitar
desc: This sheet will play a spanish guitar note for you - a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Spanish Guitar Note - as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Flat Spanish Guitar
desc: This sheet will play a spanish guitar note for you - a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Spanish Guitar Note - as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Axolotl Leash
desc: Kudos to you! You've trained a fish that's actually a salamander! Now that he's worldly and wise, this mighty little Mexican salamander is all too happy to follow you around!

name: Riding Axolotl
desc: After some intensive training, this cute little Mexican critter can now be ridden across the land - and he's stronger than he looks. Ride through town and give a jaunty wave to jealous passersby from atop this majestic steed!

name: Riding Fiesta Axolotl
desc: What's this now? The cute little Mexican critter is wearing a sombrero? Well, things just got a whole lot more adorable, didn't they?

name: Feather Headdress
desc: If you're the slightest bit ticklish, stay away from this flamboyant, feather-adorned headgear. If not, then wear it with grace and become the Tickle Master!

name: Fiesta Mariachi Guitar
desc: Bring the party everywhere you go. When you /dance with this, you can perform for your friends!

name: Magnifico Carne Guacamole - Bueno

func.add: Get 100 Gems for beating a Pet Trainer.

desc: One great guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 100 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.

name: Magnifico Carne Guacamole - Sabroso

func.add: Get 150 Gems for beating a Pet Trainer.

desc: One grandly tasty guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 150 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.

name: Magnifico Carne Guacamole - Perfecto

func.add: Get 200 Gems for beating a Pet Trainer.

desc: One glamorously perfect guacamole! Will have you saying, "I don't give a guac!" as you and your pet charge into battle! Food Buff: 200 gems for every Pet Trainer defeated.

name: Growmoji Cactus
desc: Pop some spicey spikes into your chat with this cactus! Just consume it to add it to your available Growmojis!

name: Pinata Lasso
desc: Make the Piata Bash more fun than ever by snaring the Ultra Piata with this lasso. It'll seriously reduce the speed it travels for 15 seconds!

name: Bandolier
desc: The favored garb of a legendary outlaw, this is the perfect gear for rustling cattle, robbing trains and - surprisingly - afternoon tea. Who knew?

name: Dual Six-Shooters

func.add: You shoot bullets instead of punching!

desc: Did you shoot 11 bullets... or 12? Trick question: These guns never run out! Sure, NONE of Growtopia's guns ever run out, but these come loaded with extra grit and vigor! Yahoo!

name: Dark Spirit Board
desc: Able to commune with dark and devastating powers from beyond the veil, this board can rip answers from the other side in the hands of a talented medium! Requires 5 brave Growtopians to stand in a circle around the board in order to properly contact the Realms Beyond. Only the owner of a world can place this board for safety reasons. WARNING: Using this means meddling with incredibly strong powers that can damage - and may destroy - worlds! Be careful where you use it. Your bedroom may not be the best idea!

name: Spirit Board
desc: Tired of paying overpriced mediums and fortune tellers to chat up the dead? Don't throw your money away! Invest in a Spirit Board and start contacting ghosts on your own! It's like a seance in a box!

name: Spirit Guide
desc: This little ghost will guide you on your travels, and hell even reduce the chance of a Spirit Board breaking when summoning ghosts! Aww, isnt that nice of him?

name: Ghost-Be-Gone
desc: A blast of ectoplasmic annihilation! Use this mighty mix to remove all ghosts from the world!

name: Dumpster
desc: Pretty standard place to put all your trash, but that's about it. At least it's not on fire.

name: White Brick Wall
desc: Combines a fairly boring color with a moderately boring building material to create... a somewhat boring wall. Huzzah.

name: Fuse Box
desc: Your standard wall, now with electrical wires and junctions and stuff! Everything's cooler when you stick a fuse box on it.

name: Otherworldly Block
desc: This thing isn't from around here. I've looked at a lot of blocks, but not many that looked back! Especially from another world...

name: Otherworldly Warning Light
desc: Alert! Alert! This spiritually-attuned light will flash on if it detects otherworldly entities nearby! Use it to prepare yourself for an onslaught from the afterlife!

name: Boss Goo
desc: Rare spectral ichor! You don't get this from just any ghost. I bet it could be turned into something useful... Warning: Is sure to overload any Spirit Storage Unit! Good news, though; The more ghosts you have in the SSU before you add this, the better your odds for something really good!

name: Mind-Ghost-In-A-Jar
desc: Spooky! This jar contains a ghost - a mental one! You can throw it to break the jar and unleash the ghost, or instead drop it gently in front of a Spirit Storage Unit, where you can keep the ghost for good!

name: Ghost Trap
desc: Snags spirits in a snap! Place this trap down and it'll suck in a ghost that's above it. The Ghost Trap generates an enhanced field that is larger than a ghost jar, but you'll probably still need some friends with Neutron Guns to keep the ghost contained or it will escape! A trap takes 2 seconds to activate, and then only collects spirits for 5 seconds, so time it carefully!

name: Containment Field Power Node
desc: Power this node with little ghosts to activate. Put four active nodes near each other to create a containment field that can weaken a Boss Ghost! Note: The Boss Ghost can only be damaged while weakened inside the field!

name: Neutron Power Glove
desc: Summons deadly spectral energies to give you the awesome power to punch ghosts dead! Well, again. Actually, were not sure where they go... but theyre not happy about it!

name: White Brick Pillar
desc: You'd think adding a pillar to a boring white wall made of boring white bricks would make it more exciting, but... turns out it's a boring pillar, too. Dang.

name: Neutron Focus Core

func.rem: Now you are a wimp again.

desc: Insert this into your Neutron Pack to give it a little extra oomph. Will deal double damage for a short time before burning out, so use it wisely!

name: Foil Hat
desc: Paranoid when theres someone out there, inclined to meddle with your mind? Don this fancy little hat and fear no more! Its foily goodness will protect you from even the most powerful mind control!

name: Summer Event Player Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this in your world, and congratulations!

name: EctoJuicer
desc: Infuse your muscles with the unearthly might of the Other Side! This spectral potion gives you the strength to wring every last drop of ectoplasm from a defeated Boss Ghost, granting you an EXTRA Boss Goo after a successful banishing!

name: Bamboo Frame
desc: Use a touch of the tropics to make your art pop! Comes with a blank canvas inside if you don't have any art. Note: if your art is made of background blocks, you'll need to apply Block Glue to it to make the frame surround it!

name: Pineapple Koa Lantern
desc: Light up your next luau with this stylish fiery lantern! Ow! So hot right now.

name: Pineapple Sign
desc: Point the way to your next party (and few other points besides) with this multi-directional sign. Where to go, Growtopian?

name: Pineapple Tiki Door
desc: You can't open the door to a tropical adventure if you don't, y'know, actually have a door. Try this one!

name: Pineapple Fish Leash
desc: The sweet (and slightly sour) fish has flopped out of the tropical waters it calls home and onto a leash! Take him out for your next luau!

name: Pineapple Tiki Mask
desc: Show off your pineapple spirit with this leering mask! Looks just as great on a shelf as it does on your face! Wait... was this actually a fish at once point?

name: Pineapple Spear

func.rem: Your hand feels empty like your stomach.

desc: Now you're playing with pine-power! Wield the true might of the pineapple and blast blocks into oblivion with this delicious spear!

name: Pine-ch Buggy
desc: Part car, part pineapple, all style. There might be a lot of cars on the road, but none can compare to the four-wheeled fury of the Pine-ch Buggy!

name: Pineapple Engine Part
desc: A sweet-smelling piece of a larger whole, this engine part is infused with pineapple power!

name: Pineapple Wheel
desc: Reinforced with pineapple rubble and filled with concentrated pineapple scent, this wheel will get you on the road - when you collect a few more, that is.

name: Pineapple Plating
desc: Offering unmatched pine-tection to its passengers, there's no safer way to travel than in a pineapple-plated car. Get a few more pieces and build your masterpiece!

name: Super Pineapple Guardian Charm
desc: Pining for protection? Make the power of the pineapple guardian personal with this amazing necklace! When activated, grants immunity to thrown consumables for 5 seconds (starts as soon as you get hit), followed by a 5-minute cooldown.

name: Growmoji Super Pineapple
desc: Pop a Super Pineapple into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Dumb Question 1
desc: Not used, its just yet another dumb question.

name: Dumb Question 2
desc: Not used, it's just another dumb question.

name: Dumb Question 3
desc: Not used, it's just yet another dumb question.

name: Summer Event Player Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Summer Event Player Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Summer Event Guild Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Summer Event Guild Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Summer Event Guild Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Extract-O-Snap
desc: Got a big pile of junk and don't want to waste time sorting through it? Have no fear; Extract-O-Snap is here! This handy hook will scan any stacks you target and then extract your desired item in a snap!

name: Extractor Dynamo
desc: Building on the design of the Extract-O-Snap, the Extractor Dynamo will analyze stacks of items within range and extract anything you desire. Best of all, it can do this as many times as you like - it's a permanently awesome addition to your item-sorting setup!

name: Aurora Wings

func.add: These are some fine looking wings!
func.rem: Now why would you do that?!

desc: Glowing with the majesty of the high heavens these wings shift and shimmer with all the colors of a wild aurora. They also send out shimmering motes of light, which not only look amazing, but also make everything 200% more sparkly!

name: Deathtrap Wall
desc: Ready to pulverize unsuspecting parkouristsl Don't linger too long near these, or you'll be the subject Of a very... pointed exchange!

name: Dimension Block
desc: Now you see them, now you don't! These blocks like to phase in and out of our visual dimension, but don't worry - they're still there!

name: Royal Gilt Bathtub
desc: If you're going to look your best, shouldn't you start with the place you clean up? All that glitters may not be gold, but this tub certainly is!

name: Royal Canopy Bed
desc: The perfect place to drift to sleep after a hard day of watching knights joust, fools juggle, and peasants till crops.

name: Throne
desc: Lord it over your lessers from this sear of power (lessers not included).

name: Banquet Dining Chair
desc: Perfect for pulling up to a medieval banquet table laden with roasts and goblets!

name: Banquet Table
desc: The perfect place for a feast (or a politically-charged argument with lords and ladies). Add more pieces for more guests!

name: Castle Chandelier
desc: Shed a little light on your drafty keep with this bejeweled chandelier. Also handy for interrupting sword fights!

name: Iron Torch
desc: A sconce of iron with a light of crackling fire, just like in olden times! Punch to turn on and off, just like in... uh... never?

name: Suit of Armor
desc: Look, but don't touch! This spiky suit will shred the unwary with the barest touch. Someone really ought to put a rope around it or something...

name: Bear Wall Mount
desc: Rar! Show everyone what a fearsome hunter (or antique collector) you are with this trophy. Warning: May not impress anyone born after the 19th century.

name: Gibbet
desc: Too many thieves and rapscallions stinking up your castle? Toss the riff-raff into this hanging cage and turn them into a cheerful decoration instead!

name: Castle Door
desc: Theres only one way into the best castles, and it isnt a Hidden Door or a Hospital Door or a Log Cabin Door or a Saloon Door or a- say, weve got a lot of doors in Growtopia, dont we?

name: Castle Stone
desc: Don't build a castle out of just anything - use special Castle-brand(TM) stone for a catapult-resistant treat that's sure to impress visiting nobles and stinky peasants alike!

name: Castle Stone Background
desc: All good castles need walls on multiple sides. Don't just put up some blocks on the front and call it a day - add these background blocks for a true castle experience!

name: Castle Turret
desc: Top your castle with than just flat stonework! These turrets great for spying on your knights when they think they're on a break. too!

name: Castle Sewage Pipe
desc: Castles are pretty disgusting places, and this is where all that grossness goes. It's really kinda awful, so try not to go for a swim. Or, like, put it near anything you don't want to smell terrible.

name: Tunic - Royal Red
desc: Rocking the clothing world for thousands of years and still going strong, this tunic isn't just a medieval fashion statement: its also red.

name: Tunic - Royal Blue
desc: Rocking the clothing world for thousands of years and still going strong, this tunic isn't just a medieval fashion statement: its also blue.

name: Tunic - Royal Green
desc: Rocking the clothing world for thousands of years and still going strong, this tunic isn't just a medieval fashion statement: its also Green.

name: Guild Steed
desc: A trusty steed for a trusted guildmate! Collect one for all your allies and have a parade! Or keep them all to yourself and taunt your friends. Either way, this horse is just happy to help.

name: Guild Night Stallion
desc: A mighty steed for a mighty guild. This midnight mount has giant hooves and an even bigger attitude. Perfect for real leaders!

name: Summer Token
desc: Access to the wonders of the Summer Season! Collect these to unlock its many rewards!

name: Gold Architect Chest
desc: GOLD ARCHITECT CHEST

name: Silver Architect Chest
desc: SILVER ARCHITECT CHEST

name: Bronze Architect Chest
desc: BRONZE ARCHITECT CHEST

name: Overstuffed Vintage Leather Armchair
desc: Now THIS is comfort. If the best chairs are fluffy and supportive, then this is like sitting in a cloud that's also a therapist.

name: Articulated Reading Lamp
desc: Toss a light on your work (or a good book) and spend the light in illumination with this angled lamp. Now that's a bright idea!

name: Castle Moat
desc: Keep out peasants and other undesirables with this gross moat! Nobody will want to take a dive in these waters!

name: Surgical Tool Bag
desc: A bag of medical goodness! This bottomless sack somehow produces surgery tools, even if it's empty! We assume someone fills it when you're not watching, but who? And why?! It's on a timed lock, so it can only be opened once every five days.

name: Holographic Mannequin
desc: Send your fashion shows to the future with the flickering fun of holograms! This mannequin will wear anything a normal mannequin can, and look super futuristic while it does!

name: Architect's Robes
desc: Keep warm long into the night with these well-tailored robes. Perfect for workaholic architects who want to jot down just a few more diagrams before bedtime!

name: Architect's Compass
desc: Keep your finest tools close at hand by putting them around your neck on a chain! Looks pretty blingin' too, which, as any architect will tell you, is a must-have for a neckwear.

name: Architect's Beret
desc: Cover up your wispy architect hair with this classy beret, ensuring the whole world will know you're cultured, and making it less likely for them to guess you're bald.

name: Architect's Beard
desc: No master of diagrams and charts can be trusted unless they also have a big, highly-educated beard to back them up. Now THAT'S the face of an architect!

name: Architectural Diagrams
desc: One of your finest projects! Pop these plans on the wall to let everyone know your angled achievement!

name: Anatomical Diagrams
desc: You've studied the frameworks that support buildings, the heavens, and even the body itself and you have the notes and drawings to prove it! Growtopians are brilliantly engineered, and these notes prove it!

name: Biological Diagram - Fauna
desc: All your notes on animals would fill a library, but this piece is just too nice to stick in a book - so let's stick it on a wall, instead!

name: Botanical Diagram - Flora
desc: All your notes on plants would fill a library, but this piece is just too nice to stick in a book - so let's stick it on a wall, instead!

name: Drafting Table
desc: You can't create buildings and other beautiful things on just ANY table: You need a place with the perfect angle, and this drafting table is IT!

name: Loaded Bookshelf
desc: These shelves are the best way to show everyone how much you've learned from (and how much you've spent on) books! Build them ever-higher and surround yourself with knowledge!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Hammer
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Hammer
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Hammer
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Scythe
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected trees, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Scythe
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected trees! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Scythe

func.add: Harvester of souls... zombie souls that is!

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected trees!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Bone Saw
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected patients! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Bone Saw
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected patients! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Bone Saw

func.rem: Not so exquisite surgeon skills anymore.

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected patients!

name: Reliable Anomarod
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected fish, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Pristine Anomarod
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected fish! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Anomarod

func.add: Exquisite catch - 10% bigger fish than normal.
func.rem: Not so exquisite fishing skills anymore.

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected fish! This exquisite rod will catch 10% bigger fish than normal.

name: Amulet of Force
desc: The mystic Jewel of Might empowers this amulet, lending its supernatural strength to the wearer and giving them a little extra oomph when they want to break stuff

name: Glove of the Giants

func.add: You suddenly feel a wave of vertigo!
func.rem: Phew, back to your normal size!

desc: A big glove demands a big owner, but this glove takes it a step further - it'll MAKE you bigger! Slip the glove on and send the might of the giants coursing through your veins. You'll be towering over your friends and squashing your problems like bugs in no time!

name: Summer Blaster Shirt
desc: Rock the season with the new Summer Blaster style! This shirt doesn't just say you're cool - it also says you're hot! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Summer Blaster Shirt
desc: Rock the season in ULTRA Summer Blaster Style! This shirt don't just say you're ULTRA COOL - they also say you're ULTRA HOT! Try to find another line of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Summer Blaster Pants
desc: Rock the season with the new Summer Blaster style! These pants don't just say you're cool - they also say you're hot! Try to find another line of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Summer Blaster Pants
desc: Rock the season in ULTRA Summer Blaster Style! These pants don't just say you're ULTRA COOL - they also say you're ULTRA HOT! Try to find another line of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Growmoji Peace Sign
desc: Calm your chat with a touch of peace! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Terrified Face
desc: Give your chat a jolt of terror! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Trollface
desc: Troll your chat as badly as you troll your friends! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Evil Devil
desc: Mock your chat with this fiendish face! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Weather Machine - Guild
desc: Proud of your guild and it's amazing mascot? Well, time to show it off in style! This machine will set your world of choice spinning with weather based on YOUR special mascot! Now that's guild power!

name: World Architect
desc: Need help planning on your next great creation? The World Architect will project a numbered grid over the entire world, scaling as you zoom in and out to let you pinpoint blocks and locations for tweaking!

name: Flaming Aura
desc: Strap on this awesome item and prepare to receive an aura of brilliant fire energy! Also double-jump power. We're not sure how that part works.

name: Storage Box Xtreme - Level 1
desc: The scientific brains at GrowTech have created this ridiculously useful box to help you store large amounts of items! Unfortunately, those pesky untradeable items can't be placed here - those GrowTech geniuses were too. busy celebrating after they made the first version! Note: Only World Lock owners can use this item.

name: Storage Box Xtreme - Level 2
desc: The scientific brains at GrowTech have created this ridiculously useful box to help you store large amounts of items! Unfortunately, those pesky untradeable items can't be placed here - those GrowTech geniuses were too busy celebrating after they made the first version! Note: Only World Lock owners can use this item.

name: Storage Box Xtreme - Level 3
desc: The scientific brains at GrowTech have created this ridiculously useful box to help you store large amounts of items! Unfortunately, those pesky untradeable items can't be placed here - those GrowTech geniuses were too busy celebrating after they made the first version! Note: Only World Lock owners can use this item.

name: Dumb Checkmark
desc: Not used, it's just a dumb checkmark.

name: Raptor Legs

func.rem: Millions of years have aged to your legs!

desc: Everybody do the Dinosaur! Pop on these prehistoric legs and leap into the fray with all the speed of an angry raptor! Just be careful, or you might go out in the same way - With a fiery meteor!

name: Mirage Platform
desc: Get an eyeful of anything that passes over this vision-shifting tile! Its enhanced optics will twist and wrap any Growtopian who gets close!

name: Smoog the Great Dragon

func.rem: Smoog is tired, night-night, sweet dreams!

desc: Ancient flames and armored scales await your command! Smoog is a proud and fearsome beast, but he's decided to allow you - yes YOU - to have the honor of being his rider! Who needs horses or cars when you can sit astride a mighty DRAGON!

name: Dancemaster's Crown
desc: Let's boogie! Nobody can resist the awesome beat of the DANCEMASTER - and when you wear this gleaming helm, that's you! Use its funky power to get everybody's groove on and start a dance party at the drop of a hat! This hat, specifically.

name: Summer Blaster Glasses
desc: Rock the season with the new Summer Blaster style! These glasses don't just say you're cool - they also say you're hot! Try to find another kind of eyewear that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Summer Blaster Glasses
desc: Rock the season with the new ULTRA Summer Blaster style! These glasses don't just say you're ULTRA COOL - they also say you're ULTRA HOT! Try to find another kind of eyewear in a such ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Bubble Machine
desc: Bubble up! This machine will fill the air with bright and beautiful bubbles - perfect for a summer pool party, a sweet midnight rave, or a really classy pizza night.

name: Beach Ball

func.rem: Time to go home. I'm taking my ball with me!

desc: Inflated with extra summer fun! Bounce this onto the beach and relax in the sun and sand!

name: Watermelon Slice
desc: Juicy and sweet, but definitely NOT seedless! Take a bite and get ready to blast the world with weaponized watermelon!

name: Phoenix Sword

func.rem: The flames subside, but it will live again!

desc: Swirling flame and eternal glory are yours, for you possess the blade of emperors: The Phoenix Sword! Astonishingly rare, incredibly powerful, and explosively sharp, this weapon will proclaim its wielder as a force to be reckoned with! Wield it well, for you are worthy. There are only 500 of them in existence, in all of Growtopia!

name: Crushed Ice

func.add: Your body has turned to ice. You can't move!

desc: Tasty! A summertime treat with a sweet kick and an icy crunch. Just don't eat it too fast!

name: Deep-Fried Tropical Ice Cream
desc: Now you're thinking with fryers! The only thing better than an icy cool treat is an icy cool treat wrapped in fried batter!

name: Firefin Leash
desc: The blazing fish is out of the water and at your side, happy to light your way with glowing gills and searing scales!

name: Flaming Floaties
desc: Not a good swimmer? Toss these fire-themed floaties on and keep your hands dry. At least they'll be fine! Not sure about the rest of you though.

name: Growmoji Fireworks
desc: Pop a burst of fireworks into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Deck Chair
desc: Drop down and relax in the summertime with this playful deck chair! Now all you need is a deck!

name: Flying Disc
desc: Whirls through the air with a simple toss. I bet you could play a really fun version of golf with this!

name: Crab Wall Mount
desc: Proud of your catch, but you don't want the responsibility of caring for it? Mount it to this wall plaque with your wrench! You can only display Perfect or Massive crabs and lobsters on this mount. Once a crab or lobster is mounted, it can never be removed.

name: Embers
desc: Crackling sparks of a greater flame. What could these create?

name: Flaming Feathers
desc: Capable of cutting through wind and rain like a hot knife through butter. Imagine what you could make with these if you got enough together...

name: Danieldd's Chimera Wings

func.add: You can double jump! It's like flying but not!
func.rem: Your feet are back on the ground!

desc: Forged from bladed feathers of flame and fury, these wings will let you tear through the skies with the might of the chimera! Sponsored by Danieldd!

name: Growpedia
desc: A helpful tool to guide you on your way! Use this to see your quests - oh, and welcome to Growtopia!

name: Mighty Tiger
desc: The terror of dark jungles and rustling fields has been tamed! This awesome beast comes to you from distant lands, willing to lend its primal might - and incredible stride - to your efforts! Rise up to the challenge of your rivals with your new feline friend!

name: Startopian Empire - Uniform Pants
desc: Are you ready to travel the stars? To explore strange new worlds and fight for the glory of Startopia? Then vacuum-pressed and ready for space - get the rest of your uniform together and enlist today!

name: Startopian Empire - Uniform Mini-Skirt
desc: Are you ready to travel the stars? To explore strange new worlds and fight for the glory of Startopia? Then you'll need to look the part! This mini-skirt is expertly tailored and ready for space  - get the rest of your uniform together and enlist today!

name: Startopian Empire - Command Class Uniform
desc: Show everyone you're a ranked officer of Startopia! Those who bear the Command Class uniform have excellent leadership and political abilities. Wearing this also provides a slight boost to your ship rating for all Reputation-based skill checks!

name: Startopian Empire - Engineer Class Uniform
desc: Show everyone you're a ranked officer of Startopia! Those who bear the Engineer Class uniform have excellent maintenance and system abilities. Wearing this also provides a slight boost to your ship rating for all Ship Health-based skill checks!

name: Startopian Empire - Medic Class Uniform
desc: Show everyone you're a ranked officer of Startopia! Those who bear the Medic Class uniform have excellent personnel and healing abilities. Wearing this also provides a slight boost to your ship rating for all Crew-based skill checks!

name: Startopian Empire - Phase Blaster
desc: Cut down vile Xenoid raiders, defend yourself against Greezak hunters, and make pirates shake in their stolen boots with a blast of hot plasma from a Startopian blaster! For the Empire! Made on Proxima Centauri II. All space rights reserved.

name: Startopian Empire - Combat Troop Mk.II Helmet
desc: This helm will keep your noggin safe from all kinds of extraterrestrial threats, like the brain-sucking mosquitorrasques of Vreebin VII! Show everyone you're a loyal soldier of Startopia with the official Mk.II Combat Troop outfit!

name: Startopian Empire - Combat Troop Mk.II Body Armor
desc: This body armor will keep your torso safe from all kinds of extraterrestrial threats, like the heart-stealing shadowfiends of Xarhoom IX! Show everyone you're a loyal soldier of Startopia with the official Mk.II Combat Troop outfit!

name: Startopian Empire - Combat Troop Mk.II Leg Armor
desc: These plated pants will keep your legs safe extraterrestrial threats, like the bone-melting lava worms of Multak VIII! Show everyone you're a loyal soldier of Startopia with the official Mk.II Combat Troop outfit!

name: Startopian Empire - Combat Rifle
desc: This combat rifle will mow down alien hordes and toast a mean marshmallow, but only when fired in the name of the Emperor! All hail Startopia! Made on Gliese III. Firing upon giraffes will void warranty.

name: Greezak Horde - Warrior Helmet
desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! This helmet is styled in the traditional manner of the Greezak, with plenty of breathing room and a pocket for snacks.

name: Greezak Horde - Warrior Armor
desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! This armor has been retailored to fit your Growtopian body, as the Greezak have a few extra limbs. All the better to catch their prey, you see.

name: Greezak Horde - Warrior Leg Armor
desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! These leg plate are aerodynamic and whisper-quiet, perfect for a hunting party (or a late-night snack run.

name: Greezak Horde - Skull Necklace
desc: The fearsome warriors of the Greezak Horde welcome you to the hunt! This necklace of trophies was taken from a veteran Greezak, and chronicles the results of his many successful (and delicious) hunts.

name: Greezak Horde - Shoulder Cannon
desc: Lock onto your prey and fire! This incredibly deadly shoulder cannon is designed to leave a Greezak warrior's hands free so he can fight and fire at the same time! The plasma bolts it shoots are low-energy, so they don't ruin animal pelts.

name: LordStar Environment Mask
desc: The mask of a daring outlaw king! Raid ancient alien treasures and splash your name across the cosmos from behind this fantastic mask! All will (probably) remember you!

name: Space Thruster Boost Boots
desc: Zip through space and hover like a champ with these high-tech boost boots! Thanks to a HyperTech dynamo core, these can keep you off the ground forever, meaning you'll never have dirty shoes again! Now THAT'S progress!

name: Alien Mind Protector
desc: Alien in your brain! Alien in your brain! Thankfully, this is one of the few times that's actually a good thing, because you're fortunate enough to have a Mind Protector along for the ride! This clever controller will keep your gray matter safe from those who might try to mess with your thoughts!

name: MagTron LightCycle
desc: Flaring with HyperTech superluminal banding and an everlasting reactor, this bike is unstoppably cool AND eco-friendly. It'll never run out of juice, and as long as you're riding it, you'll never be out of style.

name: Ferungi Ears
desc: A race of a galactic merchants and business dealers, the Ferungi love to chat. That's why theirs ears are so huge - they never want to miss a conversation (or a potential trade secret)!

name: Volcanix Ears
desc: Very pointy! And the pointier the ears, the wiser the Volcanix, as they say. The founding race of the Stellarix Union, the Volcanix are a deeply pragmatic and calculating people with long lifespans. These factors have led them to become distant, even detached from galactic affairs, which is why it's up to the Startopian Empire to keep the peace!

name: Startopian Empire - Force Shield & Phase Blaster

func.add: Shield ready and Phaser set to "punch"!

desc: The most advanced personal combat gear ever designed for Startopian Special Forces, this blaster/shield combination uses re-engineered HyperTech repulsor to deflect attacks and keep their wielder safe even as they unleash blazing lances of plasma on their foes! When activated, grants immunity to thrown consumables for 5 seconds (starts as soon as you get hit), followed by a 30-minute cooldown.

name: Robot Legs
desc: Tired of using your boring human legs like a sucker? Well, fear not, because the advanced surgical teams of the Stellarix Union have crafted these incredible robot legs to take you to and fro without having to waste a single calorie! Powered by Stellithium X9 battery and guarenteed to work 2 billion steps or your buckazoids back, these legs will keep on walking after you drop!

name: Starship Floor Tile
desc: Welded durallium tiles to keep up with all manner of interstellar wear and tear. If you're going to be flying through a vacuum in a fragile metal box, you'd better have something solid underfoot.

name: Starship Wall
desc: Keep out the horrors of space with these welded durallium walls. A must-have for the discerning starship captain.

name: Starship Door
desc: When you have to enter a room on a spaceship, do you want it to be through lame door with HINGES, or whisper-smooth sliding metal panels? The choice is clear.

name: Starship Transporter
desc: A new Checkpoint for a new future! Take a walk by this device to save your bio-signatures in its transporter buffer! If you die, you'll respawn at the last Checkpoint you touched!

name: Starship Console Panel
desc: Make a few important adjustments to your starship systems with this easy-access console.

name: Starship Porthole
desc: Enjoy staring into the endless void of space but don't want to go for a spacewalk to see it? Pop a porthole into your starship and enjoy the view instead!

name: Starship Airlock
desc: A deadly dangerous vacuum lurks beyond the metal safety of your starship - so let's add a way to get to it quickly! This airlock is a one-way ticket into the void, so if it's open while you're nearby, watch your step!

name: Starship Deck Ladders
desc: A quick and easy way to get to higher places on your starship! Note that these ladders are based off the ancient GrowTech ladder technology, so you can still only go up, not down. But now you can do it in SPACE!

name: Looming Triffid
desc: The Triffid is the second-deadliest creature on Parblaax XII, capable of devouring a Greezak warrior whole in mere seconds! Don't step beneath it, or you'll find out first-hand just how quick they are!

name: Xenoid Acid Pool
desc: A seething pit of Xenoid poison, this caustic block will set anything that touches it ablaze, and is exactly the sort of thing that keeps the Xenoid from being invited to the nicer parties.

name: Greezak Hive Floor
desc: Few Startopians have seen the inside of a Greezak Hive and lived, so whoever got you this floor block was either very brave or very lucky!

name: Greezak Hive Wall
desc: Few Startopians have seen the inside of a Greezak Hive and lived, so whoever got you this wall block was either very brave or very lucky!

name: The Varlaak
desc: A toothy maw of ever-hungering destruction, the Varlaak is only too happy to eat anything that comes close. Terribly dangerous, but also an easy way to dispose of kitchen scraps and unwanted guests!

name: Replicator
desc: HyperTech engineering at its finest, the Replicator uses chronoburners to help you prepare your food, granting a small chance to get a temporal COPY of whatever you create! That's two dishes for the price of one! Wow! Thanks HyperTech!

name: Star Tool Droid
desc: A tireless forgebot, this droid works constantly, hoping to produce a useful Star Tool for its owner. Creating these advanced pieces of technology takes time, however, so you shouldn't expect a new tool any sooner than once every five days.

name: Star Fuel
desc: While every starship uses Growtomic Energy to power its systems and engines, revving up its Emergency Warp requires something with a bit more kick! That's where Star Fuel comes in: Every time you escape a dangerous situation (or fail a mission), you'll use up Star Fuel to do it! Always make sure you have enough!

name: Buckazoid
desc: The currency of the starts! This buckazoid is your reward for successfully completing a mission for the Startopian Empire. You can exchange buckazoids for rare interstellar prizes by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785! Double-tap this in your inventory to combine 100 of them into a Mega Buckazoid!

name: Imperial Starship Blast
desc: Command your very own Starship and explore the cosmos! This blast contains one of 3 possible Imperial ship types - which will you get? Note: Comes with a full tank of gas, an Imperial Helm - Mk. I, Imperial Reactor - Mk. I and an Imperial Viewscreen - Mk. I, so you'll be all set for your adventure among the stars! Also comes with an assortment of space-age blocks!

name: Stellarix Starship Blast
desc: Command your very own Starship and explore the cosmos! This blast contains one of 3 possible Stellarix Union ship types - which will you get? Note: Comes with a full tank of gas, an Imperial Helm - Mk. I, Imperial Reactor - Mk. I and an Imperial Viewscreen - Mk. I, so you'll be all set for your adventure among the stars! Also comes with an assortment of space-age blocks!

name: Greezak Starship Blast
desc: Command your very own Starship and explore the cosmos! This blast contains one of 3 possible Greezak Horde ship types - which will you get? Note: Comes with a full tank of gas, an Imperial Helm - Mk. I, Imperial Reactor - Mk. I and an Imperial Viewscreen - Mk. I, so you'll be all set for your adventure among the stars! Also comes with an assortment of space-age blocks!

name: Starship Sickbay Bed
desc: With the help of advanced medicines, space-age surgical gear, and extra-soft pillows, the starship sickbay is the perfect place to perform surgery! Cure your patients here for a chance at some interesting new items, too...

name: Imperial Starship Helm - Mk.I
desc: Navigate to distant suns in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 30. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Imperial Starship Helm - Mk.II
desc: Navigate to distant suns in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Imperial Starship Helm - Mk.III
desc: Navigate to distant suns in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 280. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Imperial Starship Reactor - Mk.I
desc: Empower your ship in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 30. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Imperial Starship Reactor - Mk.II
desc: Empower your ship in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Imperial Starship Reactor - Mk.III
desc: Empower your ship in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 280. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Imperial Starship Viewscreen - Mk.I
desc: Negotiate with alien kings and space outposts in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 30. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to view your Star Stats!

name: Imperial Starship Viewscreen - Mk.II
desc: Negotiate with alien kings and space outposts in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to view your Star Stats!

name: Imperial Starship Viewscreen - Mk.III
desc: Negotiate with alien kings and space outposts in the name of the Emperor with the Imperial viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 280. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to view your Star Stats!

name: Stellarix Union Starship Helm - Mk.I
desc: Engage in calculating diplomacy and intergalactic discussions with the Stellarix Union viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 720. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Stellarix Union Starship Helm - Mk.II
desc: Engage in calcualting diplomacy and intergalactic discussions with the Stellarix Union viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 900. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Stellarix Union Starship Helm - Mk.III
desc: Engage in calcualting diplomacy and intergalactic discussions with the Stellarix Union viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 1080. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Stellarix Union Starship Reactor - Mk.I
desc: Give your ship a technologically-boosted power source with the Stellarix Union reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 720. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Stellarix Union Starship Reactor - Mk.II
desc: Give your ship a technologically-boosted power source with the Stellarix Union reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 900. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

desc: Give your ship a technologically-boosted power source with the Stellarix Union reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 1080. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

desc: Engage in calculating diplomacy and intergalactic discussions with the Stellarix Union viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 900. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to view your Star Stats!

desc: Engage in calcualting diplomacy and intergalactic discussions with the Stellarix Union viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 1080. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to view your Star Stats!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Helm - Mk.I
desc: Set course for knowledge and understanding of the cosmos with the Greezak Horde helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 2000. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Helm - Mk.II
desc: Set course for knowledge and understanding of the cosmos with the Greezak Horde helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 2310. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Helm - Mk.III
desc: Set course for knowledge and understanding of the cosmos with the Stellarix Union helm! Provides a Ship Rating of 2640. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starsip. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Reactor - Mk.I
desc: Make sure your ship can survive the rigors of a lengthy hunt with the Greezak Horde Reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 2000. One of the three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Reactor - Mk.II
desc: Make sure your ship can survive the rigors of a lengthy hunt with the Greezak Horde Reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 2310. One of the three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Reactor - Mk.III
desc: Make sure your ship can survive the rigors of a lengthy hunt with the Greezak Horde Reactor! Provides a Ship Rating of 2640. One of the three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Viewscreen - Mk.I
desc: Listen to your prey cower as you chase them across the stars with the Greezak Horde viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 2000. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Viewscreen - Mk.II
desc: Listen to your prey cower as you chase them across the stars with the Greezak Horde viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 2310. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Greezak Horde Starship Viewscreen - Mk.III
desc: Listen to your prey cower as you chase them across the stars with the Greezak Horde viewscreen! Provides a Ship Rating of 2640. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Helm - Mk.I
desc: Blast off into the great unknown at ludicrous speeds with the HyperTech helm as your navigator! Provides a Ship Rating of 4200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Helm - Mk.II
desc: Blast off into the great unknown at ludicrous speeds with the HyperTech helm as your navigator! Provides a wonderfully overclocked amount of Ship Rating and Crew Health. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Helm - Mk.III
desc: Blast off into the great unknown at ludicrous speeds with the HyperTech helm as your navigator! Provides a massively overclocked amount of Ship Rating and Crew Health. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Reactor - Mk.I
desc: Enjoy power for generations of exploration and adventure with the HyperTech reactor at your back! Provides a Ship Rating of 4200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: HyperTech Starship Reactor - Mk.II
desc: Enjoy power for generations of exploration and adventure with the HyperTech reactor at your back! Provides a Ship Rating of 4690. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: HyperTech Starship Reactor - Mk.III
desc: Enjoy power for generations of exploration and adventure with the HyperTech reactor at your back! Provides a Ship Rating of 5200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to add Star Fuel to your ship!

name: HyperTech Starship Viewscreen - Mk.I
desc: Experience the cosmos in crystal clarity with the HyperTech viewscreen as your window to the galaxy! Provides a Ship Rating of 4200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Viewscreen - Mk.II
desc: Experience the cosmos in crystal clarity with the HyperTech viewscreen as your window to the galaxy! Provides a Ship Rating of 4690. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: HyperTech Starship Viewscreen - Mk.III
desc: Experince the cosmos in crystal clarity with the HyperTech viewscreen as your window to the galaxy! Provides a Ship Rating of 5200. One of three components - Helm, Viewscreen, and Reactor - needed to fly a starship. Wrench this to start a Star Mission (but make sure you have enough Star Tools)!

name: Bastion Tactical Console - Mk.I
desc: Track your foes to their atoms with a Bastion Tactical Console onboard! Provides a solid boost to your Ship Rating for all Ship-related challenges!

name: Bastion Tactical Console - Mk.II
desc: Track your foes to their atoms with a Bastion Tactical Console onboard! Provides a great boost to your Ship Rating for all Ship-related challenges!

name: Bastion Tactical Console - Mk.III
desc: Track your foes to their atoms with a Bastion Tactical Console onboard! Provides a fantastic boost to your Ship Rating for all Ship-related challenges!

name: Oracle Science Station - Mk.I
desc: Get exacting analysis on every strange new world, alien, and adventure you encounter with an Oracle Science Station on your ship! Provides a solid boost to your Ship Rating for all Reputation-related challenges!

name: Oracle Science Station - Mk.II
desc: Get exacting analysis on every strange new world, alien, and adventure you encounter with an Oracle Science Station on your ship! Provides a great boost to your Ship Rating for all Reputation-related challenges!

name: Oracle Science Station - Mk.III
desc: Get exacting analysis on every strange new world, alien, and adventure you encounter with an Oracle Science Station on your ship! Provides a fantastic boost to your Ship Rating for all Reputation-related challenges!

name: Vitahope Life Support System - Mk.I
desc: Keep yourself and your crew the picture of health with the salubrious strength of the Vitahope Life Support System! Provides a solid boost to your Ship Rating for all Crew-related challenges!

name: Vitahope Life Support System - Mk.II
desc: Keep yourself and your crew the picture of health with the salubrious strength of the Vitahope Life Support System! Provides a great boost to your Ship Rating for all Crew-related challenges!

name: Vitahope Life Support System - Mk.III
desc: Keep yourself and your crew the picture of health with the salubrious strength of the Vitahope Life Support System! Provides a fantastic boost to your Ship Rating for all Crew-related challenges!

name: HyperShields
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to enhance your defenses in a moment of crisis!

name: AI Brain
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to protect your computer systems and engage in technical espionage!

name: Galactibolt
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to heal your ship Health and repair damage in a snap!

name: Space Meds
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to heal your Crew Health and resolve medical emergencies!

name: Teleporter Charge
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to beam yourself and your crew on and off your ship!

name: Gigablaster
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to cut down alien threats to your crew!

name: Quadriscanner
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to help your crew get information and location data about their surroundings!

name: Tactical Drone
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to get tactical telemetry and scanning data about the space around your ship!

name: Stellar Documents
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to deal with delicate diplomatic situations and cut through bureaucratic red tape!

name: Star Supplies
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to heal your Reputation and give aid to the needy!

name: Cyborg Diplomat
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to interface with alien lifeforms and engage in tactful interstellar diplomacy!

name: Growton Torpedo
desc: A Star Tool used only in Startopia Missions! Use this to blast enemy ships, interstellar beasts, and other threats to your ship!

name: Starship Floor Grill
desc: A slotted grill for a starship floor - perfect for cleaning up gross alien pirates after you unleash a gigablaster on them!

name: Starship Light Wall
desc: Glowing with high-tech power! These walls are a must-have for the discerning starship captain - nobody wants to walk around on a dull ship, after all!

name: HyperTech Starship Blast
desc: Command your very own Starship and explore the cosmos! This blast contains a HyperTech ship, the finest craft in the galaxy! Comes with a full tank of gas, an Imperial Helm - Mk. I, Imperial Reactor - Mk. I and an Imperial Viewscreen - Mk. I, so you'll be all set for your adventure among the stars! Also comes with an assortment of space-age blocks!

name: Field Grass
desc: Gleaming green and trimmed to regulation height, this grass is ready to host a ferocious match-up!

name: World Cup Cleats

func.rem: You're taking your ball and going home.

desc: Tap the ball into the goal and bask in the adoration of your fans with these eye-catching cleats!

name: Growmoji Football
desc: Pop a football into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Ref's Jersey
desc: Foul! Make the call with this jersey - you have to be right, because you're striped!

name: World Cup Winner's Jersey 2018
desc: To make this jersey, we had to steal a sports almanac from the distant future and used it to find the winners of this year's World Cup! Allez Les Bleus!

name: Super Utility Helmet - Red
desc: Hide your identity with this red helmet - but not your might!

name: Super Utility Shirt - Red
desc: Stop crime and look great! It's a super shirt for a super Growtopia!

name: Super Utility Tights - Red
desc: Toss on these tights for a beautiful - yet breathable - superhero style!

name: Super Utility Belt
desc: Keep all your superheroing gadgets close at hand and well-organized with this helpful utility belt! Oh, and keep your pants up, too. That's important for fighting crime.

name: Super Utility Boots - Red
desc: Give evil the boot with our newest line of fighting footwear! Now in rebellious red!

name: Super Utility Helmet - Yellow
desc: Hide your identity with this yellow helmet - but not your might!

name: Super Utility Shirt - Yellow
desc: It may be yellow, but you certainly aren't - show the world you care about looking great while fighting crime!

name: Super Utility Tights - Yellow
desc: Your legs will look wonderful - and yellow - with these sparkling new lights!

name: Super Utility Wings

func.rem: The flying hero or the fly?

desc: All-purpose utility wings to carry you onto the heads of your villainous foes from on high!

name: Super Utility Boots - Yellow
desc: Give evil the boot with our newest line of fighting footwear! Now in youthful yellow!

name: Starship Hull - EXT Roof (RED)
desc: No info.

name: Starship Hull - EXT Roof Top Corner (R) (RED)
desc: No info.

name: Star Tool Background
desc: ADD ME!

name: Mega Buckazoid
desc: Now you're talking! This is worth 100 buckazoids! Double-tab this in your inventory to break it back down into 100 buckazoids. You can exchange buckazoids for rare interstellar rewards by calling Sales-Man on your Telephone at 53785!

name: Starship Hull - EXT Metal Panel
desc: No info.

name: Starship Hull - EXT Metal Panel (GREEN)
desc: No info.

name: Starship Hull - EXT Metal Panel (PURPLE)
desc: No info.

name: Starship Hull - EXT Metal Panel (RED)
desc: No info.

name: Growmoji Alien
desc: Pop an awesome alien into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Space
desc: No info.

name: HyperTech Antigravity Field
desc: Gravity got you down? Well, thanks to this salvaged HyperTech artifact, you can kick it to the curb and float in freedom! As long as you stay inside the antigrav field, you and the ground will be nothing more than distant acquaintances!

name: Summer Blaster Mohawk
desc: Rock the season with the new Summer Blaster style! This mohawk doesn't just say you're cool - it also says you're hot! Try to find another kind of hairstyle that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Summer Blaster Mohawk
desc: Rock the season in ULTRA Summer Blaster Style! This mohawk doesn't just say you're ULTRA COOL - it also says you're ULTRA HOT! Try to find another kind of hairstyle that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Squirrel King

func.rem: These acorns taste too good to throw away!

desc: All shall kneel before the nuttiest ruler of all: YOU! Wield the twitchy might of the squirrel empire with this wondrous tail. Acorns are your ammunition, the trees are your home, and the world is your kingdom. Go forth and chitter with pride!

name: Scepter of the Honor Guard

func.rem: I return thee to thy realm!

desc: Guards! Guards! Assemble the troops with a wave of this lordly scepter! Your foes will run in terror before you and your gang of guardians!

name: Cloak of Hoveration

func.rem: Back in the closet you go!

desc: Say hello to the friendliest threads around! This cape will take you to and fro with style, and happily yank you high into the air whenever you desire! It's like a very loyal blanket, but with a touch of magic to make your day extra lofty!

name: Red Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul and get the red in with these pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors- to achieve a desired effect.

name: Green Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul and go for the green by popping in these pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired affect.

name: Blue Contact Lens
desc: Give your eyes an overhaul in a beautifully blue way with these handy pupil-painting lenses! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired affect.

name: Black Contact Lens
desc: Wrap your pupils in eban darkness with these bleakly black lenses. When your friends stare into your eyes, the void will stare back! You may need multiple lenses - and other colors - to achieve a desired effect.

name: Contact Lens Cleaning Solution
desc: Tired of your current pupil color? Give them a wash with this hygienic cleaning solution! Note: You might need more than on application to finish the job!

name: Rara Skirt
desc: You'll be a "rara" beauty when you don this skirt! Who can resist those colors?

name: Gravity Well
desc: When GrowTech accidentally spawned a swarm of miniature black holes, shareholders were worried the damage to spacetime might hurt business. Fortunately, their engineers were able to harness the power of the singularity to create these irresistible blocks! Punch to turn it on and feel the pull of the void!

name: Little Red Hoodie
desc: My, what fine fashion you have! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Big Bad Blue Hoodie
desc: Time to huff, puff, and blue your hood down! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Punk Purple Hoodie
desc: Break out of the routine and set your own style as long as it's purple! This hoodie will keep you warm and, more importantly, looking great in all kinds of weather!

name: Dabstep Low Top Sneakers
desc: Light up every footfall and move to a better beat with these dabulous shoes! When you're wearing these, the world is your dance floor!

name: Horns of Infinity

func.add: The horns turned out to be finite!

desc: Ripped from the endless gulf between the stars, these twisted horns still carry a touch of hyperspace! They'll accelerate you into the great beyond, but just remember - when you stare into the void... the void stares back!

name: Rhinestone Evening Dress
desc: All eyes are on you when you stride into the ballroom in this vintage dress! It sparkles and shines like a constellation setting you among the stars!

name: Plaid Skirt
desc: Perfect plaid for the budding lady lumberjack in you!

name: Peplum Top
desc: A cute color for an even cuter Growtopian!

name: Stripy Jumpsuit
desc: They say stripes are slimming, but nobody ever mentioned how good they look on you!

name: French Maid's Dress
desc: Ooh la la! Grab your feather duster and put on your best French accent, because this dress is made to impress! Oui, mademoiselle!

name: Twintail Hair
desc: When one tail o' hair just won't do, try doubling up with these twins! Your locks never looked so good!

name: Braided Hair
desc: As bright, fresh, and braided as a fine pastry, this hair doesn't just look stylish - it also looks DELICIOUS.

name: Growmoji Face Mask
desc: When you're tired of using all those crazy facial muscles, this mask is here to help! Hide your tired human face with this reliable, totally-not-creepy one instead!

name: Pet Rock
desc: Brought to you by popular demand, meet the most playful, incredibly popular, and astonishingly amazing friend for all Growtopians... A ROCK! All sales final.

name: Mega Growtoken
desc: Now you're talking! This is worth 100 growtokens! Double-tap this in your inventory to break it back down into 100 growtokens. Spend them in the store on special items! Try dialing 12345 or 53785 on your Telephone for details!

name: Bubble Gun
desc: Pop! Pop! Bring a boatload of bubbles to any occasion with this poppin' fresh firearm!

name: Oink-Oink Nose
desc: Got a nose for food? Or is it truffles? Either way, for those who need to show the world their piggy powers, this nose knows best!

name: Sheet Music: Violin Note
desc: Maestro! This sheet will play a violin note for you, as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Violin
desc: Maestro! This sheet will play a violin note for you - a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Violin Note - as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Flat Violin
desc: This sheet will play a violin note for you - a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Violin Note - as along as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Bubblicious Hair
desc: Dying for that fresh-out-of-the-bubble-bath look? Well, die no more! Top your melon with these bodacious bubbles and LIVE! Whoever snagged this hairdo had to be quick so the bubbles wouldn't pop and super-chilly so they'd stay in place, all to bring it to you!

name: Fire Punk Hair
desc: Are you fed up with the status quo? Want to burn the system and start anew? Then start with your hair! This sizzling style will show you're not just a thorn in the system - you're making anarchy look GOOD. Whoever snagged this hairdo had to be quick so the flames wouldn't go out and super-hot so they'd stay bright, all to bring it to you!

name: Nightwings
desc: Wrap yourself in harrowing darkness and take to the skies! These wings are spun from Midnight shadows, harvested from those with a touch of the starry void in their souls - Dare you wear them?

name: Crystal Shard Necklace
desc: Shimmering crystals and gems to adorn only the fanciest of necks! Strangely magnetic, these crystals must amplify the personal pull of those who wear them! Careful, though - these shards are sharp!

name: Growmoji Party
desc: Slide a pizza slice into your chat! Mmm, just like mom used to make! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Pizza
desc: Don't be a party pooper - pop a party vibe into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojs!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Trowel
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Trowel
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected empty spaces in the world! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Trowel

func.rem: Not so exquisite building skills anymore.

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected empty spaces in the world!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Cultivator
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected splices, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Cultivator
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected splices! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Cultivator
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected seeds!

name: Amber Resin
desc: Polished by eons, this ancient tree sap has hardened into a beautiful jewel! I wonder what you could do with it...

name: Dreamcatcher Staff
desc: Empowered by bountiful spirits from the Other Side, this delicate dreamcatcher will grant its wielder clear skies... and 2% chance of getting extra blocks from harvesting trees!

name: Raven Wings
desc: CAW! Feathers dropped by a dark valkyrie have been collected and forged to make these gorgeous wings. Rich dark with velvet tips, they'll cut through the skies and tickle your hands.

name: Amber Necklace
desc: These ambers have come together (with some other bits and pieces, of course) to make this wonderful necklace, just for you! It gives you 5% chance to get double fossil!

name: Ring of Nature
desc: The call of the wild... in the palm of your hand! Wear this ring and enjoy a special bond with all things that grow! Reduces the grow time of seeds by 2% when planting or splicing!

name: Luminous Eyes
desc: My, what crazy eyes you have! Besides looking amazing, these pristine peepers give you a bonus 2.5% chance of finding crystals using Geiger Counter!

name: Tutorial Exit Door
desc: These magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination.

name: Tutorial Regen Block
