desc: This block is used in the tutorial AND it regenerates - just wait and see!

name: Weather Machine - Digital Rain
desc: Take the grow pill, and we'll show you how deep the rabbit hole goes! Splash the scrolling code of creation across the skies of your world. They say you learn to understand it after a while... Note: You can only have one of these per world.

name: 3-Day Free Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for three full days of special treatment! You'll get a chance of doubling any XP earned, 10 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 100 gems every day!

name: 14-Day Free Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for fourteen full days of special treatment! You'll get a chance of doubling any XP earned, 10 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 200 gems every day!

name: 30-Day Premium Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for thirty full days of special treatment! You'll get access to unique skins, a chance of doubling any XP earned, 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 4000 gems every day!

name: 365-Day Premium Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for a full YEAR of special treatment! You'll get 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 9600 gems, and 1 World Lock every day and a chance of doubling any XP earned, grow time reduction on all seeds planted and Exclusive Skins!

name: Tutorial Regen BG
desc: This block is used in the tutorial AND spawns a block - just wait and see!

name: Life Stone
desc: Raw elemental power surges within this strange stone! Somewhere in its shimmering depths is the power to manipulate Life, but without something to channel and control it, its unfiltered might would destroy you! Better find the proper artifact to hold it...

name: Wind Stone
desc: Raw elemental power surges within this strange stone! Somewhere in its shimmering depths is the power to command Wind, but without something to channel and control it, its unfiltered might would destroy you! Better find the proper artifact to hold it...

name: Death Stone
desc: Raw elemental power surges within this strange stone! Somewhere in its shimmering depths is the power to manipulate Death, but without something to channel and control it, its unfiltered might would destroy you! Better find the proper artifact to hold it...

name: Fire Stone
desc: Raw elemental power surges within this strange stone! Somewhere in its shimmering depths is the power to command Fire, but without something to channel and control it, its unfiltered might would destroy you! Better find the proper artifact to hold it...

name: Water Stone
desc: Raw elemental power surges within this strange stone! Somewhere in its shimmering depths is the power to command Water, but without something to channel and control it, its unfiltered might would destroy you! Better find the proper artifact to hold it...

name: Earth Stone
desc: This incredibly strong gauntlet was designed for a single purpose: To hold the six Elemental Stones. It currently holds the Earth Stone and can move any block with Earth Chi. This is only the beginning, though - there are more stones to be found! Be warned, however, for adding a stone to this gauntlet requires the sacrifice of a soul in similar form. Doing so will bind the Elemental Stone to the gauntlet and focus its power!

name: Sorcerer's Tunic of Mystery

func.rem: Back to a dull boring life!

desc: Capable of reflecting the true colors of the world around it, this rare tunic is made of captured starlight and aether. If you think knitting with thread is hard, just try doing it with moonbeams and magic! The result is worth it though, as these clothes won't just make you look amazing - you'll be able to channel their inherent power into blasts of cosmic energy!

name: Growmoji Clapping Hands
desc: Show your appreciation - pop an applause into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Yellow Hardhat
desc: Show off your builder bona fides and keep your noggin safe with this bright and beautiful hat!

name: Munchin' Straw
desc: Show off your farmer flair and enjoy a long-lasting snack with this tasty wheat!

name: EMT Jumpsuit
desc: Show off your surgery skills and dress for the next big emergency with this hypoallergenic coverall!

name: Fishing Wader Boots
desc: Show off your fishing finesse and keep your toes nice and dry with these water-proof waders!

name: Star Captain's Hat
desc: Show off your starship strengths and command the respect of your crew with this dashing cap!

name: Composer's Cookie

func.add: View musical notes in the world.
func.rem: Your stomach's rumbling to the beat.

desc: Take a bite and enjoy a symphony of flavors! Food Buff: Consuming this cookie will allow you to see musical notes in the world!

name: Glutton's Gazpacho

func.add: Increase the duration of food buffs by 30%
func.rem: Your stomach can't take anymore buffs!

desc: A soup for the discerning overeater, one sip and you'll find that everything just tastes better! Food Buff: Eat to increase the duration of food buffs received from other food items by 30%! Note: Will only affect food buffs consumed after consuming the Gluttons Gazpacho!

name: Growlectables

func.add: 25% chance of double Growtokens from Daily Quests.

desc: Fine gourmet treats for only the most delicate and refined palates! Food Buff: Take a bite to gain a 25% chance of getting DOUBLE Growtokens from completing Daily Quests!

name: Skill Spice

func.add: Reduce your skill fails by half in both Surgery and Startopia missions.

desc: The true spice of life (and starships, for some reason)! Food Buff: Munch on this to halve your chances of getting a skill fail in surgery and/or Startopia missions!

name: Gemonade

func.add: Get extra gems from a variety of actions!
func.rem: Your stomach has too many bubbles!

desc: Sparklier than the most pristine sparkling water! Food Buff: This high-value treat will give anyone who consumes it BONUS gems from fish catches (125 gems), surgeries (250 gems) and Startopia missions (500 gems)! Gems for cooking recipes (300 gems) has been temporarily disabled due to bot abuse.

name: Flashback Flan
desc: Pulsing with temporal goodness, this treat is in a constant state of flantum flux! Use this on an eligible block in your world and marvel as time rewinds and the block returns to your inventory!

name: Delicate Potion

func.add: Gain extra Points from delicate anomalizers!
func.rem: Your stomach's rumbling for more potion goodness!

desc: Don't drop it! This bubbling potion is very fragile! Take a super-careful sip... Food Buff: Increases the points by 10% you gain from ALL delicate anomalizers (when used during an active Season Event)!

name: Pristine Potion

func.add: Gain extra Points from pristine anomalizers!
func.rem: Your stomach's rumbling for more potion goodness!

desc: Ooh! It's almost too perfect to drink! If you can bear to disturb this beautiful potion, drinking it will... Food Buff: Increase the points by 10% you gain from ALL pristine anomalizers (when used during an active Season Event)

name: Elegant Potion

func.add: Gain extra Points from elegant anomalizers!
func.rem: Your stomach's rumbling for more potion goodness!

desc: Now THIS is a classy drink! Show you're a Growtopian of refinement and grace by taking a sip of this... Food Buff: Increases the points by 10% you gain from ALL elegant anomalizers (when used during an active Season Event)

name: Exquisite Potion

func.add: Gain extra Points from exquisite anomalizers!
func.rem: Your stomach's rumbling for more potion goodness!

desc: The most marvelous of all potions! Aged to perfection, this fizzing drink is only for the highest of the high-class potion specialists. Food Buff: Increase the points by 10% you gain from ALL anomalizers (when used during an active Season Event)!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Hammer
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected blocks! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Scythe
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected trees! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Bone Saw
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected patients! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Elegant Anomarod
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected fish! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Trowel
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected splices! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Cultivator
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected empty spaces in the world! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Scanner
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove tomporal anomalies discovered on Star Missions! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in this devices is prone to failure and may break! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Scanner
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies discovered on Star Missions! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Scanner

func.rem: We're not reading anything on the scanners.

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies discovered on Star Missions!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Scanner
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies discovered on Star Missions! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version, but more than an Exquisite one)! Use with care!

name: Gaia's Beacon
desc: The pulse of nature calls to its own! Place this beacon to start summoning seeds! Simply tune this bioform to the seed of your choosing, and it will collect and store any that drop in your world! Only collects seeds from breaking blocks and harvesting!

name: Unstable Tesseract
desc: A spatial vortex is a dangerous thing, but this one... can be controlled! Place this techno-hazard to start summoning blocks! Simply target this tear to the block of your choosing, and it will collect and store any that drop in your world! Only collects blocks from breaking blocks and harvesting!

name: Heart of Gaia
desc: Tired of harvesting trees on your own? Perhaps it's time we made nature work for US, for a change! Empower this pulsing Heart with enough Gems, tell it to target any tree of your choosing, and it will harvest them AUTOMAGICALLY!

name: Tesseract Manipulator
desc: Tired of smashing blocks on your own? Perhaps it's time we meddled in the darker side of science and made our lives easier! Fuel this advanced machinery with enough Gems, tell it to target any block of your choosing, and it will break them AUTOMATICALLY! Note: Blocks broken by this device will not drop gems! it's convenient, but inefficient!

name: Techno-Organic Engine
desc: What has science DONE?! By fusing the verdant powers of nature and the chaotic energies of the void, you've managed to create a device capable of breaking blocks OR harvesting trees, and then collecting a target drop, all in one go! Just fuel it with enough Gems, set a target, and let 'er rip! Note: Blocks broken by this device will not drop gems! It's convenient, but inefficient!

name: Beat-root Block
desc: Now here's a thumping good treat that can't be beet! This musical root (or perhaps the root of all music) has a tempo all on its own and a taste that's even louder!

name: Beat-root Puree
desc: The product of many beaten beets, this puree is pulsing with good times (and tastes)!

name: Carrot Block
desc: Popped fresh from the Earth and loaded with color and a crisp snap, these carrot blocks prove the best way to eat your vegetables is by the square!

name: Bloccoli Mini-Tree
desc: Tired of being told to eat your broccoli? Well, now it's time to show down on it's blockier cousin!

name: Strawberry Block
desc: Picked up at the height of freshness and practically bursting with fruity power, this ripely red block is great in desserts, buildings, and as a mighty snack!

name: Riding Bull
desc: YEEHAW! Saddle up this bucking bull and charge its horns for maximum fury! This beastly bovine is none too happy to have a rider, so make sure you take its fury out on your foes, instead!

name: Saffron Crocus Flower
desc: A rare and beautiful flower, this is one of the rarest and most expensive plants you can find! Lucky indeed it's come into your hands, wouldn't you say?

name: Bio-Waste
desc: It might not be much of a looker, but this compost is full of nutrients and fertilizer, giving it all kinds of useful applications (definitely not perfume, though - yuck)!

name: Toffee Block
desc: A sweet treat! These chunks of goodness can be enjoyed on their own, but perhaps it's best to see if you could make something even tastier with them...

name: Caramel
desc: Sweet and syrupy with just a hint of salt, this home-made caramel is good on everything... if you can keep yourself from eating it all on its own!

name: Electrical Power Cube
desc: Ouch! You've managed to store a storm of energy in a block... and it's not happy about it! This thing is dangerous to the touch, but perhaps it has other uses... (besides injuring yourself, of course)

name: Operating Theater Lamp
desc: Nurse! Lights! Turn up the brightness in your operating room with this lamp and get a better look at all grisly wounds and diseases your fellow Growtopians tend to collect!

name: Tiled Staircase
desc: Build your way into the skies with the help of these lovely tiled blocks! They're up to code and perfectly angled for even the most precise builder!

name: Wheelchair Speedster

func.add: Burn some dust, eat my rubber!

desc: Tear up the streets with triple-wheeled power! This chair isn't just incredibly comfortable and supportive - it also features GrowTech-powered wheels to propel you wherever you need to go! Take a seat and get ready to roll!

name: Slip 'n' Slide Slime Floor
desc: Whoa! Clean-up on Aisle Slime! Add a truly slippery spill of slime to any deserving surface with this new floor. We recommend applying it to: Fancy balls, graduation ceremonies, choir recitals, and tap-dance competitions!

name: Aquamarine Stone
desc: A brilliant jewel of the forgotten depths! See how it shimmers and shifts in the light, like warm sunlight through soft sea foam... Gorgeous!

name: Primordial Ooze
desc: The building block of life! They say that all living things in Growtopia got their start in a pool of goo like this! Really makes you think... Think about what YOU can make with it, that is!

name: Primordial Soup
desc: Deliciously developmental! This soup is pure evolution in a can! Fun fact: Turns out the chemical basis for all organic life tastes a lot like tomato bisque. Who knew?

name: Sea Sponge
desc: A delicate denizen of the depths! This little guy is very content to sit around and do nothing, but it's also happy to help your world look great - just so long as you don't use him to clean your dirty dishes!

name: Naval Mine
desc: A relic of a long-forgotten war, this mine is still as deadly as the day it was placed! Take care not to swim (or walk or fly or, like, breathe) too close! Otherwise, you might find yourself going out with a very big, very dangerous bang!

name: Fishing Dinghy
desc: A lovely personal watercraft, just for you! Perfect for a quiet day on the water, listening to waves lap gently against its hull as you wait for a nibble on your fishing line!

name: Mint
desc: A beautiful plant with a refreshing taste! Gather as much mint as you can to keep your world smelling nice, and even if your visitors have no sense of smell, it'll still look pretty!

name: Sprig of Mint
desc: Mmm! Adds freshness to any dish and eliminates bad breath! Whether you're tossing together a bright dish or hoping to co-exist happily with other people, you can't go wrong with mint!

name: Quantum Starfish
desc: Phasing in and out of our reality one limb at a time, this starfish is part cosmos, part ocean, and all mysterious!

name: Chrono-Luminescent Liquid
desc: Distilled from living interspatial oddities, this liquid is in a constant state of uncertainty, flowing in both space and time with every twist of its container!

name: Space Rock
desc: You might think this is just like any other rock, but it's NOT, because it was found in SPAAAACE! That makes it at least 55% more spacey, which is, of course, better.

name: Star Tool Nanoforge
desc: Thanks to a breakthrough in our understanding of HyperTech, we've unlocked the secrets of nano-scale industrial processing! Wrench this device to reconfigure your Star Tools, and by "reconfigure", we mean exchange 20 of one Star Tool for 1 of every other Star Tool!

name: Starship Packing Crate
desc: Need to transport something valuable across the gulf of space. Well, you can't trust someone to just carry it by hand, and you can't pack it in a lame, ground-based crate! Enter: The Starship Packing Crate! Specially made to endure the rigors of the void, this will - hopefully - keep the goods inside it safe, as well.

name: Encapsulated Galaxy
desc: Billions of stars, even more planets and moons, and who knows how many creatures, all in a single, easy-to-handle container, thanks to GrowTech's Experimental Immorality Division! This miracle of technology wasn't made by shrinking one of OUR galaxies, of course - GrowTech's engineers just took one from a parallel dimension where everything"s waaaay smaller.

name: Cosmic 5-Spice Star
desc: Wow. You, uh, ground up an entire galaxy to make this spice. That's, like, uncountable numbers of living things, not to mention planets, stars, asteroids... all of it gone, turned into-well, okay, a COSMICALLY DELICIOUS spice, but still. That's cold, man.

name: Energy Capsule
desc: Flickering growlithium energy, a font of immense power, stored in this easy-to-handle capsule! Nice! Just don't drop it, or everything will probably explode.

name: Starship Turbo Fan
desc: Blast solar winds wherever you want with this vortex-funneling turbo fan! Warning: Do not use at parties. Well, unless you want your parties to be blown away by turbo winds.

name: Cupcake Apron
desc: Show off your cooking cleverness and keep your clothes stain-free with this cute and comfortable apron!

name: Mengu Koi Samurai Facial Armor
desc: A traditional facemask obtained from an even more traditional fish! You can't help looking great (and traditional) while you're wearing this!

name: Geta
desc: Geta pair of these traditional wooden slippers and you'll soon be standing head and shoulders above your style-impaired companions!

name: Pink Kimono
desc: Sleeve your arms (and the rest of yourself) in shimmering silk. Dyed an adorable orange and hand-stitched by crafty artisans, it's the perfect look for your next tea ceremony or historical reenactment!

name: Blue Kimono
desc: Sleeve your arms (and the rest of yourself) in shimmering silk. Dyed an adorable orange and hand-stitched by crafty artisans, it's the perfect look for your next tea ceremony or historical reenactment!

name: Orange Kimono
desc: Sleeve your arms (and the rest of yourself) in shimmering silk. Dyed an adorable orange and hand-stitched by crafty artisans, it's the perfect look for your next tea ceremony or historical reenactment!

name: Ornamental Hair Fan & Chopsticks
desc: Style yourself with the perfect hair, and then keep it in place with these lovely lacquered chopsticks at no additional charge! Two-for-one deals are very traditional, you know.

name: Oil-paper Umbrella
desc: Cut the scary part out of falls and look good while you're doing it with this delicate - yet supportive - paper umbrella. May not be the best in a storm, but it'll definitely keep gravity at bay!

name: Geisha Makeup
desc: Applied with exacting precision and exquisite materials, this makeup is a statement to the world that its bearer is poised, beautiful, and probably displeased with shenanigans. ANY shenanigans.

name: Panda Mask
desc: Aww, it's adorable! Don this mask (with associated suit) and you'll instantly look like the second-cutest type of panda (after red pandas) and second-most monochromatic bear (after polar bears) in the world! Just goes to show that you can be second-place in looks... and first in our hearts.

name: Panda Suit
desc: Aww, it's adorable! Don this suit (with associated mask) and you'll instantly look like the second-cutest type of panda (after red pandas) and second-most monochromatic bear (after polar bears) in the world! Just goes to show that you can be second-place in looks... and first in our hearts.

name: Master Sensei's White Eyebrows
desc: You! Your eyebrows are weak! SMALL! UNWISE! They are unworthy, and should be replaced by THESE eyebrows, which are the true mark of ancient arts and knowledge. Put these perfectly-sized, immaculately-groomed eyebrows on and become the font of skill and understanding you know in your heart you should be.

name: Jade Crescent Axe

func.add: Nothing will stand in my way!
func.rem: The axe returns to its velvet case!

desc: Honed over centuries by very bored monks and layered with precious stones and runed filigrees, this axe is a masterwork of ancient magix and EVEN MORE ANCIENT weaponsmithing. Wield it and you'll tear through foes, blocks, and butter like... um... even softer butter!

name: Cherry Blossom Tree
desc: Serene leaves drift down from this beautiful blooming tree. A mark of traditional beauty and peaceful landscapes, they are not, unfortunately, associated with tasty desserts. Apparently, traditional cherry blossom trees don't make very tasty cherries! Ah, well - at least it still looks pretty!

name: Jade Spikes
desc: Extra-beautiful means extra-deadly, right? These spikes are hand-carved from ancient jade, but they'll destroy you and anything they touch just as quickly as modern spikes! Now that's long-lasting quality. And pain.

name: Coconut
desc: Beloved by castaways, curry-makers, and hipsters the world over, this is the best fruit that's also a drink! Crack open a lukewarm one today!

name: Coconut Water
desc: Have you ever found yourself drinking water and thinking, Wow, this doesnt make me feel special, nor does it taste anything like vaguely sweet clark! I wish there were a stupidly expensive drink I could idolize and brag about drinking to my friends on social media. Well think no more: now you can enjoy all that and an insignificant percentage of your daily electrolytes in one gulp with COCONUT WATER! Ah, thats the stuff!

name: Coconut Milk
desc: A delicious component in many fine curries and dishes, this is made from crushing coconut meat and has many useful applications! Makes for great desserts, drinks, sauces and more! So much better than coconut water, right?

name: Coconut Tart

func.add: Earn an extra 50 xp from catching ghosts!

desc: Sweet and silky, this tart is made from tropically-ripened coconuts and some very precise, very ancients baking secrets! These secrets are so ancient, in fact, that they're able to connect with the ghosts of other coconut aficionados! Food Buff: Grants anyone who eats this tart 50 XP from capturing ghosts! Note: Apparently, all ghosts REALLY enjoy coconut, so this bonus applies to any of them! Who knew?

name: Purity Mooncake
desc: Perfection is a powerful message, and it's clearly in full effect with this astonishingly fine mooncake! Anyone who partakes of such a lovely and delicate treat will be empowered by the ancestors of the Harvest... Food Buff: Reduces the chance of suffering any Hand Scythe breakages by 5%.

name: Koi Fish Leash
desc: The classiest of all fish (by at least 86%) has decided to join you on land! Now its classiness will follow you wherever you go! Thanks, classy koi.

name: Growmoji Songpyeon
desc: Celebrate the harvest in your chat as well as your worlds! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Dumb Farmer
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Growtorial Entrance
desc: It's like a wall, except you can choose to let your friends come in! Only usable in the Growtorial!

name: Dumb Surgeon
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Dumb Builder
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Dumb Fisher
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Dumb Star Captain
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Dumb Cook
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Legendary Clash Key & Finale Ticket
desc: One is for opening an end-of-year legendary prize, the other's for getting into a dangerous parkour world full of traps and treasures! We'll let you figure out which is which.

name: Ezio's Hood
desc: Conceal your features from the watchful eyes of the Templars with this iconic hood.

name: Ezio's Vest
desc: Comes with hidden pockets for blades, potions, explosives, and snacks?

name: Ezio's Cape
desc: Weighted just right to catch the winds, this cape will help you stick a death-defying landing and look cool the whole time.

name: Ezio's Trousers
desc: Just loaded with knives. Like, there are more weapons in an Assassin's pants than fabric.

name: Ezio's Armguards
desc: Complete with deadly Hidden Blades, these armguards will help you unleash swift justice on all who side with the Templars.

name: Ezio's Beard
desc: Exactly the right amount of grizzled and wise.

name: Ezio's Hair
desc: Full of all roguish charm you need to make the ladies of the Renaissance swoon - even the Templar ones.

name: Ezio's Boots
desc: Ready to climb the Leaning Tower of Pisa, leap from the parapets of the Vatican, and knock cruel Templars from their seats of power.

name: Hay Cart
desc: Incredibly soft and well-padded. You could easily hide in here, and probably even survive a leap of faith into it from hundreds of feet in the air - assuming your aim was perfect.

name: Apocalypse Scythe

func.add: Nothing will stand in my way!
func.rem: The scythe returns to its velvet case!

desc: Stolen from one of the four riders of the Apocalypse, this deadly blade is able to slice open the veil between life and death.

name: Famine's Steed
desc: The undead steed of one of the four riders of the Apocalypse, FAMINE. This dark steed withers all that it passes.

name: Conquest's Helm
desc: BEHOLD! The conqueror approaches. All who view this helm shall flee in terror before its bearer, and those who remain will find naught but ruin.

name: Dark Aurora Wings

func.rem: Now why would you do that?!

desc: The majesty of the skies has been corrupted by the dark powers of Growganoth! Once a symbol of beauty and grace, there is nothing left in these wings but wickedness and terror...

name: Cat Eyes
desc: Wow, pawesome! These new eyes are the cat's meow, and the purrfect addition to any style.

name: Knife Head
desc: A truly splitting headache.

name: Evil Grin
desc: Makes you look way, WAY too happy...

name: Vampiress Dress
desc: Perfect for a Bloodsucker's Ball!

name: Nightmare Vampiress Dress
desc: The chosen garb for a dark baroness of the crypts, this coldly beautiful dress is made of the finest lace and all set for a night of revelry and ruin!

name: Vapor Vent
desc: Don't get too close! The fumes from this vent can blast a Growtopian into bones in seconds flat!

name: Riding Skeletal Shark
desc: Deaaaaaadly SHARK doo doo, doo doo doo doo! Deadly shark doo doo, doo doo doo doo!

name: Angler Mask
desc: Makes even the most beautiful Growtopians into terrifying creatures of the depths! Great if you want to skip out on a blind date or scare small children!

name: Demon Plague Doctor Mask
desc: As if normal Plague Doctor formal wear wasn't terrifying enough, someone's imbued this mask with haunting spirits of darkness and evil! Was that even necessary?!

name: Vampire Hunter Hat
desc: Stake your claim on the night and show the legions of the undead who's boss with this extra-sharp hat. Remember, only the pointiest of headgear for the most skilled vampire hunters.

name: Tragicomic Mask
desc: Celebrating happiness, sadness, and all the little moments in between! This mask will show the world you believe the true drama and splendor of life is not in stability, but it has its highs and lows!

name: Creepy Baby Head Mask
desc: Tired of people treating you like a little kid? Toss this bad boy on and send THEM crying home to momma!

name: Growmoji Ghost
desc: Celebrate halloween with a ghost in your chat as well as your worlds! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Demon Angler Leash
desc: This is a demonic fish, not a fish that angles for demons. If you're ever unsure about which it is, just check for the gruesome teeth and eyes! Luckily, this particular specimen seems happy to join you on your adventures. Don't get your fingers near those chompers, though - even if it's loyal, it's still a demon!

name: Skeletal Shark Leash
desc: This is what happens when you don't feed your fish, then bury it in unhallowed ground! Even worse, it looks like some foul magic has brought it back to float by your side once more!

name: Ethereal Rainbow Dragon
desc: Fae energy from beyond the veil of life and space have flitted into our worlds! Sparkling with the prismatic glory of light beyond mortal reckoning, this creature of mist and mystery will empower you with its knowledge of the realms beyond! Also, it'll look pretty.

name: Heroic Tights of Prevention

func.rem: Okay, I want floating items again!

desc: Amazing prismatic pants for a true hero of Growtopia! These glorious tights will keep you safe from villains AND prevent you from picking up floating items in the world! Nothing sticks to you, for you have the power of heroes!

name: Wriggling Tentacle
desc: Oh, gross! This twitching, pulsing lump of flesh is STILL ALIVE! What horrifying creature did it belong to? And how could it survive without food or water for so long? If you brought more tentacles together, do you think it could create something like its former owner...?

name: Tamed Looming Triffid
desc: Those terrifying tentacles have merged to create... a pet! It looks like this twitching monster is just grateful to be moving around on its own, and doesn't even want to eat your brains! Let's just hope it doesn't get any bigger!

name: Magic Carpet
desc: More than just a rug! Step on and enter a whole new world! ...well, if you consider hovering slightly above the ground a "new world," that is.

name: Mountain Dire Wolf

func.add: Feel the rush of the wind!

desc: AWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! Arctic lands shake with the terrifying howl of the monstrous dire wolf! If you find a way to ride this beast, its unnatural speed and deadly claws will be yours to command!

name: Super Logo - Fist
desc: Emblazon this logo on your super costume to fight as... Knuckle Sandwich? Meat Hood? Mr.Fisticuffs? It's up to you!

name: Stone Gargoyle Wings
desc: You wouldn't think stone wings could soar, but thanks to a thousand-year-old spell, these have the power to take you to the skies!

name: Plasma Hair
desc: Set your hair afire with the energies of space and time! Inspired by HyperTech and made possible thanks to the mad science of Growtopia's test kitchens, this hair isn't just an electrifying fashion statement - it's also edible! WARNING: DO NOT EAT.

name: Tiled Hospital Wall
desc: Guaranteed germ-free! Put enough of these together and you'll have the perfect place for health and recuperation!

name: Fallen Pillar
desc: Nothing beside remains.

name: Oil Slick
desc: Whoa! Careful you don't slip - and DEFINITELY don't light a match around this!

name: HyperTech Multi-Jet Energy Pulser
desc: Boing-oing-oing! Using blasts of prototype repulser power, this HyperTech invention channels energy against anything that touches it, no matter what the angle!

name: Hour Glass
desc: You might think that these sands of time are an old-fashioned way to count the hours, but time is not always so predictable. Some say it can be like an ocean in a storm...

name: Red House Entrance
desc: It's like a wall, except your friends can come in! ...and it's red! That's an important difference, too!

name: Ancestral Orb of Time
desc: Incredible forces of immortality and history have been combined with the building blocks of creation to forge this orb. Equip it and mastery of the fourth dimension will be yours...

name: Dragon Block
desc: This dragon is impossibly mighty! Easily the strongest, most deadly creature we've ever seen in all of Growtopia! It also happens to be very, VERY lazy, however, so it never moves or does anything... but trust us - it's an unstoppable terror when it wants to be!

name: Carnival Ladders
desc: All new and improved ladders! You can still only climb up - not down - but now with the lovely carnival colors!

name: Carnival Creep Platform
desc: You might think these platforms float in the air thanks to magic or super-magnets or something extra-weird, but we actually just pumped them full of carnival-grade helium. Science!

name: Disabled Carnival Creep Platform
desc: A Carnival Creep Platform turned off. Extra-not for players! Even MORE than the original creepstone platform! Stay away!

name: Atomic Gate
desc: These astonishingly dangerous magical doors connect all the worlds in Growtopia. Place one and then use your Wrench on it to set the destination. Warning, warning! Danger, Growtopian, danger!

name: Crystallized Time
desc: A raw chunk of frozen eternity, preserved forever! The glitched-out time eddies surrounding it could certainly be used for something spectacular... or set on a shelf to look pretty!

name: Blue Gem Lock
desc: Locks an entire world - and looks dazzling while it does it! Tap on it in your inventory to break it down into 100 Diamond Locks (if you have room in your inventory).

name: Guild Name Changer
desc: Tired of people making fun of your guild because of one silly spelling error? Or maybe just looking for a change? Use this and get a second shot at it!

name: Shadow Spirit of the Underworld
desc: A demon of the Shadow Plane, this dangerous creature obeys only you, its master, and lives to shred all others! Nobody knows how it came to be in your service, and it's probably best not to ask. For those who long a darker world, this is definitely your spirit animal!

name: Hacker's Dialog
desc: Hacker's simulator, for developers & QA only. Probably shouldn't have a description, but if you're actually in the office and bored and reading this, here's a joke: a Mexican magician says he will disappear on the count of 3. He says "Uno...Dos..." - poof! - he disappears without a tres.

name: Monarch Butterfly Wings
desc: These wings have the honor of being named after royalty! With a luscious color scheme, a wingspan of up to 10cm, these majestic wings offer action packed jumping capabilities.

name: Winter Freezer Hood
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Winter Freezer style! This hood doesn't just keep you warm - it also makes you cool! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Winter Freezer Hood
desc: Celebrate the season in ULTRA Winter Freezer style! This hood doesn't just keep you ULTRA WARM- it also makes you ULTRA COOL! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Storm Cloud
desc: A soft and cuddly cloud that's willing to give you a step into the skies! Just be careful - he has a shocking sense of humor...

name: Supplier's Cape

func.add: Supplying you with extra Role points!
func.rem: Argh, no more extra Role points!

desc: The best Suppliers bring a wide assortment of goods for trade, and what better way to show them off than with this multicoloured, ever-shifting cape? Don this garment and enjoy bonus points for any Supplier - that's Farmer, Surgeon, Fisher, and Star Captain, at the moment - Role quest you undertake!

name: The Great Chameleon: Master of Disguise
desc: The hidden wonder of Growtopia has joined your side! Glekki, the Great Chameleon, has emerged from his hidden sanctuary and chosen YOU as his new apprentice. Keep him close at hand, and he'll teach you the ways of the chameleon, allowing you to blend in with ANY SURFACE as long as you stay verrrrry still. What an honor!

name: Winter Freezer Robe
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Winter Freezer style! This robe doesn't just keep you warm - it also makes you cool! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Winter Freezer Robe
desc: Celebrate the season in ULTRA Winter Freezer style! This robe doesn't just keep you ULTRA WARM- it also makes you ULTRA COOL! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Lunar Crater

func.add: One small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind!

desc: That's one small step for a block... one giant leap for a Growtopian! Besides bringing the tranquil splendor of the Moon down to earth, these blocks provide a lovely high-jump thrust AND a pleasent slow-fall to any who take a jump from their craggy surface!

name: Crafter's Cape

func.rem: Argh, no more extra Role points!

desc: Loaded with all kinds of useful tools to make a construction project a breeze, this many-pocketed cape is a Crafter's best friend! Don this garment and enjoy bonus points for any Crafter - that's Builder and Cook, at the moment - Role quest you undertake!

name: Mad Hatter

func.rem: That's odd. You have no hat!

desc: Hats! Hats for all! AHAHAHAAA! Don the tallest, wobbliest, most majestic tower of hats Growtopia has ever seen and become one with madness! Hats for me! Hats for you! Hats for EVERYONE! WOOHOO!

name: Sheet Music: Lyre Note
desc: Order of the Minstrels! This sheet will play a lyre note for you, as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Sharp Lyre
desc: This sheet music will play a lyre note for you - and a half-step higher note than Sheet Music: Lyre Note - as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Sheet Music: Flat Lyre
desc: This sheet will play a lyre note for you - a half-step lower note than Sheet Music: Lyre Note - as long as you aren't in range of a boombox. Put it in different places for different pitches!

name: Oak Tree
desc: Majestic in its age and tough as they come, this old tree will shelter many a generation of Growtopia beneath its spreading boughs.

name: Winter Foliage
desc: Rustling golden hued leaves, this foliage is a sign of changing seasons and evenings by the fireplace.

name: Galleon's Mast
desc: Even the greatest galleons won't be going anywhere without a mast to hold their sails! Make sure your ship is tall and stout before you set out from port!

name: Winter Hedge
desc: Perfect for creating a golden tinged hedge maze. Just don't put it near any hotels with dark pasts and invite caretakers with issues to watch over them. Not that that's ever happened before...

name: Growmoji Halo
desc: Show off your angelic side while chatting with friends! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Growmoji Nuke
desc: Blast your chat in 3... 2... 1... BOOM! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Sunset Clouds
desc: Lit by the fading light of a warm and cheerful sun, these fluffy clouds will brighten any sky!

name: Sunset Clouds Background
desc: The day is ending and the sun's getting low, so why not mark the passing of the hours with a fluffy touch? These clouds are the perfect backdrop to a sleepy world that's ready for a nice night!

name: Galleon's Ratlines
desc: These waters aren't safe! Get to the rigging and scout around for safe passage! What do you mean, we don't have rigging? Well, grab these ratlines and build it, sailor!

name: Galleon Hull
desc: Yo ho, yo ho, a builder's life for me! Put the finishing touches on a ship fit for the open seas with this waterproof hull!

name: Galleon's Crow's Nest
desc: Caw! The perfect place to scan the seas! Scamper up and set a spyglass to your eye - first to spot land gets an extra ration o' grog! Ya-harr!

name: Lyre

func.add: You're too busy rocking to punch anybody!

desc: Perfect for a Renaissance Faire or your average medieval-themed garage band. Note that you can't punch when holding this lovely instrument, as we'll be too busy entertaining royalty! Punch anywhere to play music; if you punch left or right, you can bend the note higher or lower. Punch in your own column to play the same notes that Sheet Music: Lyre Note plays.

name: Weapons Rack
desc: Show off your antique collection of weapons in this eye catching and ever expanding rack. They're sure to impress any visitors you may have!

name: Jack's Shoes

func.add: Giving you extra Role points for Supplier and Crafter roles!
func.rem: No more a Jack of All Trades!

desc: The shoes of a very skilled road warrior! Collect Jack's full outfit and you'll be able to draw on his incredibly varied experiences to improve your performance in all kinds of Roles!

name: Jack's Jeans

func.add: Giving you extra Role points for Supplier and Crafter roles!
func.rem: No more a Jack of All Trades!

desc: The jeans of a very skilled road warrior! Collect Jack's full outfit and you'll be able to draw on his incredibly varied experiences to improve your performance in all kinds of Roles!

name: Jack's Vest

func.add: Giving you extra Role points for Supplier and Crafter roles!
func.rem: No more a Jack of All Trades!

desc: The vest of a very skilled road warrior! Collect Jack's full outfit and you'll be able to draw on his incredibly varied experiences to improve your performance in all kinds of Roles!

name: Jack's Hat

func.add: Giving you extra Role points for Supplier and Crafter roles!
func.rem: No more a Jack of All Trades!

desc: The hat of a very skilled road warrior! Collect Jack's full outfit and you'll be able to draw on his incredibly varied experiences to improve your performance in all kinds of Roles!

name: Future Perfect Chip
desc: A model 101 super-processor, the FPC will attach directly to your neural cortex and, from there, extend a web of nanofibers throughout your skin, transforming you into a cybernetic powerhouse!

name: Swirling Rainbow Eyes
desc: Whoosh! See the world in a new light with these kaleidoscopic eyes! Their fantastic, ever-spiraling beauty will set a smile on the faces of all who greet you!

name: Knight's Chainmail - Sun
desc: Turn aside the blades of your enemies and show your fealty to the illuminating power of the sun with this hand-tooled chainmail!

name: Knight's Chainmail - Lion
desc: Turn aside the blades of your enemies and show your fealty to the inspiring courage of the lion with this hand-tooled chainmail!

name: Knight's Chainmail - Crown
desc: Turn aside the blades of your enemies and show your fealty to the deep-rooted honor of the crown with this hand-tooled chainmail!

name: Tapestry
desc: Sure, it's made of the finest threads and hand-stitched over years by artisans. Sure, it depicts scenes of glory and valor and acts as a visual marker for the great acts of history. But... isn't it still just a carpet for your wall?

name: Peasant Fence
desc: Get in touch with your rustic side! This weathered fence will keep wild forest critters at bay and mark the borders of your land just as well as those fancy city fences!

name: Nobleman's House
desc: Your new home is ready, m'lord! This regal-yet-solid building will shelter you and your kin from elements and keep things warm, even in the depths of winter!

name: Rotten Woodland Tree
desc: A venerable giant of the forest has fallen! This once-towering tree took a tumble some time ago, and has already begun its return to the earth. Take a tour inside to see the cycle of life up close!

name: Knight's Great Helm - Golden
desc: Show everyone you abide by the Code of Chivalry while keeping the sun - and any pesky arrows - out of your eyes at the same time! Now in glorious golden plate!

name: Knight's Helm - Crusader
desc: Show everyone you abide by the Code of Chivalry while keeping the sun - and any pesky arrows - out of your eyes at the same time! Now in courageous crusader colors!

name: Knight's Helm - Antlers
desc: Show everyone you abide by the Code of Chivalry while keeping the sun - and any pesky arrows - out of your eyes at the same time! Now with amazing antlered accents!

name: Weather Vane
desc: Check the course of the winds and the rattle of oncoming storms with this old-fashioned weather vane! Perfect for topping barns - as well as the walls of hipster coffee houses.

name: Stables
desc: Too many horses in your life? Horses in your house? Horses at the office? Horses in the hall? Stop tripping over those thoroughbreds and stash them here instead! This handy-dandy stable will turn even the worst horse-related clutter nice and tidy.

name: Murder Hole - Hot Liquid Tar
desc: Ow, that's HOT! Perfect for protecting your medieval castle, or letting everyone know that you really, REALLY don't want salesmen coming to your door.

name: Cheval de Frise (Siege Barrier)
desc: Stop cavalry charges in a snap with these spiky walls! With a good supply of these in place, those gallant knights will think twice before stomping around YOUR lands!

name: Royal Carpet
desc: Extra thick for royal feet! This carpet is so relaxing - and expensive - it's like FIVE carpets in one!

name: Wooden Guard Tower
desc: Get the lay of the land (and a good spot to use for launching a few arrows) from a high with this nice and sturdy guard tower!

name: The 'Other' Royal Throne
desc: Hewn from oak and polished to a mirror shine. Even Kings and Queens need to do business somewhere!

name: Scavenger Wheels
desc: A rumbling engine beneath you, choking soot behind, and post-apocalyptic adventures ahead. The world may have ended, but the roads... they go on forever!

name: Scavenger Lord's Wheels

func.rem: Not so menacing now are you!

desc: Shiny and chrome! Rule the wastelands from atop this diesel-powered monster! The scavengers and warriors of the apocalypse will bow when they see you tearing past on this mad machine!

name: 2-Face
desc: Seems like there's two sides to everything - and with this face, that includes you! What will you show to the world?

name: Golden Midas Masterpants
desc: Wrap yourself in glittering, gleaming GLORY! Don this, and every inch of skin, every nerve and fiber, everything will transform into most malleable and marvelous of metals... GOLD!

name: Tiger Spirit
desc: You are one with your spirit animal! The awesome guidance of the Tiger Spirit has given you the gift of double jump! Ever see a tiger leap and take down unsuspecting prey? Well, now you can too! Just don't get distracted by laser pointers - tigers might be big, but they're still kitties at heart!

name: Anomalizing Reliable Rolling Pin
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected food items, and guaranteed to never break!

name: Anomalizing Pristine Rolling Pin
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected food items! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Delicate version)! Use with care!

name: Exquisite Rolling Pin

func.rem: You're not even a sous chef.

desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected food items! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Pristine version)! Use with care!

name: Anomalizing Elegant Rolling Pin
desc: Built to exacting specifications by GrowTech engineers to find and remove temporal anomalies from infected food items! Note: The fragile anomaly-seeking circuitry in these devices is prone to failure and may break (though with less of a chance than a Exquisite version)! Use with care!

name: Nobleman's House Roof
desc: Getting rained on just won't do, m'lord! Every fine and upstanding noble house needs a solid roof to keep their tapestries, family portraits, and rich silks dry, so stock up on these blocks to keep out the elements!

name: Nobleman's House Door
desc: Careful, m'lord! I have it on good authority that bears are attracted to wealth and fine food, which makes you a prime target! Protect yourself - and your things - from this danger with a nice, solid door. As an added bonus, it also keeps out unsightly beggars and street urchins.

name: Stable Roof
desc: If you think you have horse problems now, wait until your horses get rained or snowed on - they HATE weather, and they'll blame you for it. Best to avoid the issue entirely by building a nice roof for their stables!

name: Stable Background
desc: Stables aren't very effective with only one wall! Keep your clever horses from exploiting Growtopia's geometry and escaping by adding a background to their stables as well!

name: Winter Token
desc: Access to the wonders of the Winter Season! Collect these to unlock its many rewards!

name: Winter Event Player Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Winter Event Player Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Winter Event Player Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Player Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Winter Event Guild Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Winter Event Guild Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Winter Event Guild Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Thanksgiving Bell
desc: Ding Ding! Ring in a wonderful season - and meal - of thanks with this bright and beautiful bell!

name: Dead Thanksgiving Turkey
desc: This turkey has gobbled its last! Now it has a new purpose: Gracing your dinner table! Prep the oven, because it's TURKEY TIME!

name: Roasted Turkey
desc: The centerpiece of every feast! What better way to celebrate a season of thanks than a gorgeous roast turkey? Smells divine, tastes even finer!

name: Riding Turkey

func.add: Just as fast as a chicken!

desc: Gobble gobble! Release the turkeys and begin the festivities! Thanksgiving is upon us, and it's time to celebrate!

name: Turkey Wings
desc: Don't let anyone tell you turkeys are lame! They are FANTASTIC flyers, and with their wings behind you, the skies are yours! Now go forth and gobble!

name: Pilgrim's Hat
desc: There are all kinds of things to be thankful for during the holidays, but maybe one of the most important is just how dang awesome those pilgrims looked! Top your ensemble with this traditional hat and join the fun!

name: Pilgrim's Coat
desc: There are all kinds of things to be thankful for during the holidays, but maybe one of the most important is just how dang awesome thsoe pilgrims looked! Cover your ensemble with this traditional coat and join the fun!

name: Pilgrim's Shoes
desc: There are all kinds of things to be thankful for during the holidays, but maybe one of the most important is just how dang awesome those pilgrims looked! Complete your ensemble with these traditional shoes and join the fun!

name: Pilgrim's Bonnet
desc: There are all kinds of things to be thankful during the holidays, but maybe one of the most important is just how dang awesome those pilgrims looked! Top your ensemble with this traditional bonnet and join the fun!

name: Pilgrim's Dress
desc: There are all kinds of things to be thankful for during the holidays, but maybe one of the most important is just how dang awesome those pilgrims looked! Cover your ensemble with this traditional dress and join the fun!

name: Colonization Wagon Base
desc: Westward, ho! Put together the toughest all-terrain traveling machine imaginable, starting with this mighty wagon base!

name: Colonization Wagon Canopy
desc: Westward, ho! Put together the toughest all-terrain traveling machine imaginable and keep it nice and dry with this weather-resistant canopy!

name: Wagon Wheel
desc: Westward, ho! Put together with the toughest all-terrain traveling machine imaginable, and make sure it can take the ups and downs of the trail with this rough-and-tumble wheel!

name: Thanksgiving Turkey
desc: Gobble gobble! Release the turkeys and begin the festivities! Thanksgiving is upon us, and it's time to celebrate!

name: Growmoji Turkey
desc: Gobble gobble! Celebrate and give thanks while chatting with friends! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Monochromatic Bedrock
desc: No info.

name: Monochromatic Dirt
desc: Yep, it's black-and-white dirt.

name: Monochromatic Lava
desc: DO NOT TOUCH! Apparently, even black-and-white lava can burn...

name: Monochromatic Cave Background
desc: Technically, this is also dirt, but it's not just dirt that's farther away - it's also black-and-white!

name: Monochrome Blast
desc: Who needs color? Enter a world of blacks and whites and nothing else! It may be monochromatic, but it's a full spectrum of FUN! Warning: Fun not guaranteed.

name: Onyx Block
desc: Deep, rich bands of white and black give this precious gemstone a sense of life - and value - to be envied.

name: Go-Go-Growformer!
desc: Zip through the streets on squealing wheels of steel, then transform and smash through walls and villains with the power of the Growformers! This incredible automaton has a mind of his own, but he's happy to be your wheels and shield as you tear through the many worlds of Growtopia! Push the pedal to the metal and you'll be saying 'GG!' in 0.5 seconds!

name: Ultra Winter Freezer Teddy Suit
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Winter Freezer style! This suit doesn't just turn you into an ULTRA warm and adorable teddy bear - it also turns you into an ULTRA cool one! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Winter Freezer Teddy Mask
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Winter Freezer Style! This mask doesn't turn you into a warm and adorable teddy bear - it also turns you into a cool one! Try to find another piece clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Crown of Duplication
desc: What's better than one pet? Why, TWO, of course! With the strange powers of this ancient relic, any pet that chooses to follow you will be joined by its own time-tossed duplicate from another reality! What strange adventures does this doppel-pet have while it's away? Probably best not to ask - what if it's from a better world than yours? You might get jealous!

name: Mage's Orb
desc: Long before they build totally responsible and not-at-all dangerous techno-marvels. GrowTech used to be known as MagiGrow, and they turned out all kinds of crazy inventions like this ancient Mage's Orb! We're not sure how or where this relic was found, but it's still supercharged with mystic might! Ouch! Wield this and you'll find zapping things easier than ever! MagiGrow: Puttin' the "harm" in thaumaturgy since 740AD!

name: Cracked Stone Slab
desc: Careful! Careful! This beautiful stone slab took a nasty spill somewhere before it got into your hands, and now it's a bit shaky! If you're still going to build with it, do it gingerly!

name: Snowflake Eyes
desc: Forget those fools with stars in their eyes! This holiday season, it's snowflakes or nothin'! Show off your winter wizardry with these icy-cool eyes! You'll never lose a staring contest again!

name: Rugged Winter Beard
desc: Beautiful and burly, just like you! This beard has been through snow, mud, rain, cougars, and falling trees, and only gotten mightier for it! Can you live up to its brawny power?

name: Ice Queen Winter Makeup
desc: Crisp and cool, just like you! This makeup has been applied by frosty faeries using all-ice ingredients for a look that's fit for only the most wintry of royalty. Can you live up to its snowy majesty?

name: Snowflake Eyes with Rugged Winter Beard
desc: Cement yourself as a king of winter with this one-two knockout combo of frosty eyes and burly beardery! Nobody will question your devotion to the season again!

name: Snowflake Eyes with Ice Queen Winter Makeup
desc: Cement yourself as a queen of winter with this one-two stunner of icy-cool eyes and pristine snow-dappled makeup! Nobody will question your devotion to the season again!

name: Super Snowball Launcher
desc: Ah, now here's something any Nutcracker would go well, crackers for! Using advanced frost-gauss technology, this launcher accelerates snowballs to dangerous velocities!

name: Abominable Snowman Suit
desc: Rar! The body of a horrible, terrifying beast of the arctic wastes! All who see you will know your abominableness... but is that truly who you are on the inside? And who are they to judge, anyway?!

name: Abominable Snowman Mask
desc: Rar! The mask of a horrible, terrifying beast of the arctic wastes! All who see you will know your abominableness... but is that truly who you are on the inside? And who are they to judge, anyway?!

name: Snowflake Wings of Winter
desc: Through the magic of snow and icy auroras, these wings keep you aloft by making you as light as a snowflake, and twice as special!

name: Chipmunk

func.add: What a cheeky chipmunk you have!

desc: Chittering, chattering, and tons of fun, this chipmunk is tired of hoarding nuts for winter and wants to spend all his time playing with you!

name: Snow Leopard Tail

func.add: I thought I saw a puddy cat!

desc: Swooshing through the artic terrain, the mighty snow leopard stalks his prey - and now you can, too! This tail grants perfect pouncing balance, so look out, mice and rabbits!

name: Snowfrost's Top Hat
desc: A cheery holiday hat to cap the costume of a most mischievous sprite! Snowfrost is here - and it's time to play!

name: Snowfrost's Mask
desc: Get your warm face on with this frost-shielding mask! You may be a prince of winter, but you'll never be left in the cold with Snowfrost at your side!

name: Snowfrost's Suit
desc: Threaded with frost, whorls of ice, and a hint of merriment, this suit feels surprisingly warm... and just a little bit mischievous!!

name: Snowfrost's Candy Cane Blade
desc: Slice through those who'd dare to harm your holidays! ...or snack away to satisfy your sweet tooth! It's an all-in-one weaponized treat, hand-spun for you!

name: The Horrible Holiday Hoodie
desc: And you thought the sweater was bad! This hoodie is sixteen flavors of terrible holiday glitz and glurge, all spun together by blind spiders with poor fashion sense. Spectacular!

name: Slime Green Hoodie
desc: Hide your hair from snow and show your slimy side with this gloriously green hoodie!

name: Snow Husky
desc: Arf! Even if you're not running a race across the ice, this husky is the perfect winter pet! He's warm, fuzzy, and happiest when he's helping you spread holiday cheer!

name: Snow Husky Sledge
desc: Dashing through the snow, barking as we go, this sledge is pulled by dogs, and anything but slow!

name: Poseidon's Digger's Trident
desc: Don't let the king of the deep know you've got this! He's been trying to cultivate the perfect coral garden, and he's going to be SO MAD when he finds out we stole his trident for you! This watery trident is very specifically designed for one purpose: to prick deep sand and ocean rock. It is pretty useless at digging anywhere else, but dang if it doesn't rip deep sand and ocean rock apart.

name: Long Tree Log
desc: Tired of short, pointless little logs that just lie on the ground and don't go anywhere? Well, this long, looooong log is here to help by making your buildings extra-woody! Just add log!

name: Tall Tree Log
desc: Tired of short, pointless little logs that just stuck around by themselves and don't reach for the skies? Well, this tall, tallllll log is here to help by making your buildings extra-woody! Just add log!

name: White Grape Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of grape jelly... that somehow tastes like a holiday soda with just a hint of a cinnamon! Not sure how that happened...

name: Cranberry Jelly Block
desc: A wibbly-wobbly block of cranberry jelly. It tastes like festivals and family-time... and also tart berries. Ew - needs more sugar!

name: Snow Crust Block
desc: What could be hiding underneath this heavy layer of snow? You'll just have to build and find out, won't you?

name: Winterfest Tree
desc: Build a primeval forest of these majestic snow-wrapped trees and you'll have the perfect place for a deep-winter cottage!

name: Winterfest Wonderland Foliage
desc: It's like normal foliage, except 50% more merry! Probably full of rustling squirrels and stoic nutcrackers, too!

name: Candy Cane Streetlamp
desc: Shining with warm yuletide light and the gleam of freshly-forged candy!

name: Snowy Rocks Platform
desc: Watch your step! These rocks have been dusted with a light layer of frost, making them extra-dangerous - and who knows what's waiting for you down below?

name: Icy Igloo
desc: Shelter from the icy cold in a warm cocoon of... more ice? Weird how that works, isn't it?

name: Winterfest Sign
desc: Let everyone know you have something to say, and with an extra dose of holiday cheer sprinkled on top!

name: Dark Snowy Cave Background
desc: The building block of a dark and sunken place of snowbound wonders! Will your cave be a place of holiday cheer and light, or an eerie and foreboding home for yetis... and worse?

name: Nutmeg Block
desc: Just think of how many pies you could make with this enormous hunk o' spice. That's a good price for twelve pounds of nutmeg!

name: Ground Nutmeg
desc: Brimming with holiday goodness and a powerful taste! Use sparingly, or you'll overwhelm your dishes (and tastebuds)!

name: Pumpkin Pie

func.add: Doubles the points per [[Winter Gift]] given to [[Growch|GROWCH]].

desc: Delectable holiday goodness, rich with creamy squash and hints of cinnamon and nutmeg! Not QUITE as American as apple pie, but still pretty high up there! Food Buff: Doubles the points per Winter Gift given to GROWCH!

name: Eggnog

func.add: Doubles how much a Tree Decoration decorates a Giving Tree.

desc: Mmm! Tired of eating your eggs? Then this traditional holiday brew is just for you! No cooking needed (but probably a TON of exercise)! Food Buff: 25% chance of doubling how much a Tree Decoration decorates a Giving Tree!

name: Mr. Narwhal Leash
desc: The majestic narwhal, unicorn of the deep and expert poker of all things aquatic, has made the leap from the deep and landed at your side! Take him for a spin, but watch out for that horn!

name: Narwhal Tusk Staff
desc: Perfect for summoning the powers of the seas as well as poking slow people in front of you at the store! Narwhals HATE waiting in line almost as much as they love the water, so they'd appreciate if you took the time to do both!

name: Bandaged Mr. Narwhal
desc: The majestic narwhal, bandaged due to a terrible accident! Poor fella - maybe you can give him a good home in your aquarium so can recover!

name: Growmoji Gift
desc: Winterfest and toss some gifts in your chat at the same! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Winterfest Calendar - 2018
desc: A wonderful Winterfest Calendar for 2018, jam-packed with joy and gifts to celebrate the holidays. Make sure to check back each day to get a new gift! ...or just wait and open them all in one go! Either way, it's a blast! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Winterfest Calendar will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Used Winterfest Calendar - 2018
desc: Winterfest 2018 was a bright and beautiful season, and this calendar marked the occasion with joys and gifts! Now that it's empty, you won't be getting anymore presents, but it can still be used as a lovely decoration.

name: Growformer PowerKey
desc: Boop beep! Give this a click to shift your Growformer into its alternate form! Also activates its security system if you have to leave it in the parking lot!

name: Nutcracker
desc: I'm the Nutcracker, nuts, crackers and slightly mad!

name: Winter Chest
desc: WINTER CHEST ICON ONLY

name: Galleon's Mast - Crossbeam
desc: Caw! The perfect place to scan the seas! Scamper up and set a spyglass to your eye - first to spot land gets an extra ration o' grog! Ya-harr!

name: SLaminator's Boomerang
desc: Show the sound barrier who's boss with this slammin' slapper of a boomerang! Thanks to its supporter, it travels extra-far and crazy-fast! If you ever see it coming back, though, watch out! It's not easy to catch something this unpredictable and keep all your fingers! Sponsored by JIRISTAR, ChiggaLam and SLaminator.

name: Nutcracker Hat
desc: Extra tall for hiding a winter's worth of nuts! Just don't let any squirrels know - it's near-impossible to clear out a squirrel infestation without ruining the fabric.

name: Nutcracker Mask
desc: So you wanna be a bit nutty like me? Here's a copy of my stoic face. It's elite nutcracker royalty I'll have you know! Warning: Do not try to crack nuts with your teeth just because you're wearing this - it WILL hurt!

name: Nutcracker Coat
desc: I offer you this warm and cozy coat perfect for keeping away the chill if you go on any mystical winter-time journeys.

name: Nutcracker Pants
desc: Well-sized for your average Growtopian (and nutcracker Lieutenant), these are made from GrowTech's patented nut-wicking material to ensure you won't have any stray almonds or walnuts sticking to your side!

name: Nutcracker Boots
desc: Polished so well you can see yourself in them, and carefully swept free of nut shells and dust!

name: Nutcracker Saber
desc: Slash and parry at villainous mice (and particularly tough nuts) with this crackin' good blade!

name: OVEROLL's Wings
desc: Hit the heights with these wicked-cool wings! Thanks to their sponsor, you won't just be doing barrel rolls - you'll be doing OVEROLLS! Sponsored by OVEROLL.

name: Super Squirt Rifle 500
desc: The terror of summer battlefields is now in your hands! Portable soaking technology has come a long way, so not only can you use this to douse your friends (arid foes), but it'll go further and even put out fires!

name: Men's Board Shorts - Ocean Wave
desc: Hang ten in this bodacious beachwear! These are blue and cool, through and through. You'll be secure in your good looks on land at sea with these waterproof and style-assured shorts!

name: Men's Board Shorts - Checkered
desc: Hang ten in this bodacious beachwear! These are fined and fine, through and through. You'll be secure in your good looks on land and at sea with these waterproof and style-assured shorts!

name: Women's Swimsuit - Deep Ocean Blue
desc: Look great in sun and surf alike! With a helpful UV lining, these smart-fabric swimsuits will not only make you look amazing, but they'll also protect you from harmful sunburns! Looking good never felt so safe!

name: Women's Swimsuit - Coral Pink
desc: Look great in in sun and surf alike! With a helpful UV lining, these smart-fabric swimsuits will not only make you look amazing, bu they'll also protect you from harmful sunburns! Looking good never felt so safe!

name: Wet Hair
desc: The sea was kind to you! Tide-tossed and kissed by the sun, this hair is perfectly wet and wild! Just don't go looking for a towel to dry off! It's amazing exactly the way it is - just like you.

name: Unicorn Floatie
desc: Tired of having to choose between hanging out with a majestic creature of mystery and myth or an awesome pool accessory? Well, worry no more - now you can have both!

name: Jet Ski
desc: Swimming is for suckers! In fact, traveling anywhere without a jet engine is for suckers, but nowhere is that more true than on open water! Crank this baby into overdrive and make friends with salt spray and the horizon, because you're king of the sea now! Vroom!

name: Waterslide Strut
desc: Start building the perfect waterslide with this supporting, yet slippery strut! What, you thought waterslides just came together on their own? No way! Just like the best people, even the best slides need care and support!

name: Waterslide
desc: The summertime backyard favorite is now yours! Build the most wonderful, wettest, waterslide of your dreams and become the envy of everyone in your neighbourhood! You'll have to start charging for rides!

name: Dunking Bucket
desc: Toss someone into the drink with this water-filled bucket! Works like a charm on: Clowns, principals, members of congress, multi-level marketers, telephone sanitizers... anyone, really!

name: Inflatable Ring
desc: Tired of feeling tired all the time? Wish you could just lie down on your bed and rake a quick nap but it's miles away? Well, just inflate this and you can sack out into dreamland whenever sleepiness strikes!

name: Kiddie Pool
desc: Just because you don't have room for an Olympic-sized pool doesn't mean you can't have Olympic-sized fun! Get out the kiddie pool and enjoy a quick summertime splash anywhere - even your living room! WARNING: Do not use in your living room. Or if you do, please don't mention us.

name: Golden Jet Ski
desc: Strapping a jet engine to your feet and flying across the water is already a great idea, but you know what it's missing? SOLID GOLD JET POWER, BABY! What could go wrong?

name: Balloon-Frosting War Glove
desc: Brr! This dangerous glove adds a thickened shell of frost to every balloon its wearer throws, tripling its point on a successful hit! just be careful - its GrowTech freezing circuits are prone to failure and may break! Use with care!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Gold Trophy - Punch
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Silver Trophy - Punch
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Bronze Trophy - Punch
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Gold Trophy - Grow
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Silver Trophy - Grow
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Bronze Trophy - Grow
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Gold Trophy - Build
desc: Awarded for awesome balloon battling! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Silver Trophy - Build
desc: Second place ain't bad! Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter Bronze Trophy - Build
desc: There's no such thing as a loser in Balloon Warz, but... you lost. Ah, well - stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off anyway!

name: Balloon Warz Winter MVP Trophy - Punch
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter MVP Trophy - Grow
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Balloon Warz Winter MVP Trophy - Build
desc: You were MVP in the great Balloon Warz. Stick this in the trophy cabinet and show it off to all your friends!

name: Plunger
desc: From the weird and wacky world of some crazy critters! Fixes toilets and makes a stylish fashion statement!

name: The Brother Hood
desc: This hood once belonged to a member of an ancient brotherhood of Assassins. Ew, wait, has this even been washed?

name: Unicorn
desc: Once ridden by the legendary ninja kitty, this unicorn has stopped stabbing people and only wants to snuzzle you! Man, you're so much luckier than its previous 426 owners...

name: Glowing Shirt
desc: This shirt was fished out of a pool of radioactive chemicals, giving it unnatural brightness (but no spider powers, unfortunately). Wearing it will turn every room around you into the hottest club in town!

name: Foppy 4.0
desc: Forged in honor of the finest kitty in at least twenty worlds, this mask combines their stylish color scheme with even MORE stylish robotic technology! You might be cool, but are you robo-kitty cool? Wear this mask and find out! -- This is the subscriber item for February 2019, and was chosen by DanyRed.

name: Hovernator Drone - White
desc: Gliding silently through the skies on carbon fiber blades, this drone is packed with dangerous GrowTech attack systems and an advanced logic engine preloaded with Amethyst-Generation AI! Luckily, it has to obey the holder of its remote - and that's you! Just don't, like, lose that thing. We've had to put down about eighty drone uprisings already...

name: Hovernator Drone - Black
desc: Gliding silently through the skies on carbon fiber blades, this drone is packed with dangerous GrowTech attack systems and an advanced logic engine preloaded with Amethyst-Generation AI! Luckily, it has to obey the holder of its remote - and that's you! Just don't, like, lose that thing. We've had to put down about eighty drone uprisings already...

name: Hovernator Drone - Red
desc: Gliding silently through the skies on carbon fiber blades, this drone is packed with dangerous GrowTech attack systems and an advanced logic engine preloaded with Amethyst-Generation AI! Luckily, it has to obey the holder of its remote - and that's you! Just don't, like, lose that thing. We've had to put down about eighty drone uprisings already...

name: Hovernator Drone - Golden
desc: Gliding silently through the skies on carbon fiber blades, this drone is packed with dangerous GrowTech attack systems and an advanced logic engine preloaded with Amethyst-Generation AI! Luckily, it has to obey the holder of its remote - and that's you! Just don't, like, lose that thing. We've had to put down about eighty drone uprisings already...

name: Winter Freezer Cuddly Fox Scarf
desc: Celebrate the season with a foxy new addition to the Winter Freezer style! This super-cuddle scarf doesn't just keep you warm - it also makes you cool! Try to find another adorable animal that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Ultra Winter Freezer Cuddly Fox Scarf
desc: Celebrate the season with an ULTRA-FOXY new addition to the Winter Freezer style! This super-cuddle scarf doesn't just keep you ULTRA WARM - it also makes you ULTRA COOL! Try to find another adorable animal that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Doppelganger Projector
desc: Ever wished there were more of you in the world? Well, take a step onto this shimmering platform, and your wish will be granted! Advanced Mimic Engine scanners in this block will project copies of anyone who stands on top of them! Try it out and you'll really start seeing double!

name: Robotic MK.IV Wings
desc: After a great deal of experimentation and only, like, ten major accidents, GrowTech's engineers have worked out all the kinks and produced these fantastically fancy, almost certainly safe wings! Just... don't ask about Wings MK.I-III. They had... problems.

name: Sprite's Robe
desc: Don this beautiful robe to summon the power of a playful sprite! Every jump will transform you into a Sprite for a time and take you bounding above the world!

name: Sonic Buster Sword
desc: Smash the limits with this intensely powerful weapon! Oversized might for oversized heroics, this weapon swirls with spirit energy - a devastating weapon in the right hands, and a gorgeous conversation piece in just about any!

name: Treasure Blast
desc: Enter a world of snow-capped peaks and long-forgotten mysteries! Riddles and secrets - and a ton of treasure - await those who brave this blast's blocks! Remember, when you use this, it'll create a new world by typing in a new name! No sense in searching for clues to great treasures in well-trod worlds, is there?

name: Map Fragment
desc: A piece of a larger mystery! This fragment can't tell you much of its own, but if you manage to patch enough together, well, just imagine the treasures they might reveal...

name: Treasure Map
desc: This map is covered in strange designs and shifting letters!

name: Map of Tyr
desc: This map's letters are hard to see in the light of day, and even those you CAN make out seem to change from moment to moment...

name: Map of Odin
desc: This map's letters are hard to see in the light of day, and even those you CAN make out seem to change from moment to moment...

name: Map of Thor
desc: This map's letters are hard to see in the light of day, and even those you CAN make out seem to change from moment to moment...

name: Map of Frigg
desc: This map's letters are hard to see in the light of day, and even those you CAN make out seem to change from moment to moment...

name: Legendary Map - Untouched
desc: This map is covered in strange designs and shifting letters! They seem to change from moment to moment, and never in a form you can decipher!

name: Legendary Map - Scanned
desc: This map is covered in strange designs and shifting letters! They seem to change from moment to moment, and never in a form you can decipher!

name: Legendary Map - Magnified
desc: This map is covered in strange designs and shifting letters! They seem to change from moment to moment, and never in a form you can decipher!

name: Legendary Map - Deciphered
