desc: The runes of the frozen cliffs match certain ones all over your map! When you put them together, a final message becomes clear, but the letters seem strangely faded to you, as if your eyes just aren't quite evolved - or mutated - enough to make them out...

name: Frozen Stone Cliffs
desc: Clasp these crags with crooked hands, and you'll have the perfect blocks to build a home in lonely lands...

name: Glacier Background
desc: Brr! This background seems to radiate an unearthly chill. It's like standing near the heart of winter...

name: Rune Stone
desc: Etched with ancient knowledge! Could this be code for a mystic spell? A lost technology? Or... hmm... a growcery list?

name: Altar
desc: What strange ceremonies took place here? More importantly, what strange ceremonies will YOU perform here?

name: Hidden Treasure
desc: Glittering secrets! But be careful! Don't tell anyone about it! If you do, it won't be hidden anymore - it'll just be regular treasure, and who wants that

name: Rune Carved Stone Pillar
desc: Holds up the ceiling and looks wonderfully ancient! What do you suppose those runes say?

name: Long Boat
desc: Drive yourself to new lands - and battle treacherous waters - with this hand-hewn craft!

name: Round Shield
desc: Circles are the superior defence setup! This baby deflects 7.8% more blows than all other shield shapes! Invest now!

name: Frigg's Belt
desc: Spun from the finest gold and made with craftsmanship of such surpassing grace, the Aesir themselves will applaud its bearer. Good thing that's you, eh?

name: Meat

func.add: Your appetite has enlarged your body.
func.rem: Your tummy rumbles as you return to your normal size.

desc: A big honkin' hunk of deliciousness! Take a bite and you'll find yourself infused with gigantic meaty might! Time to feast!

name: Battle Boar
desc: Supercharged with porcine fury, its terrible oinks will be the last thing your foes ever hear!

name: Golden Battle Boar
desc: Gleaming in the light of war, this gorgeous boar is the most beautiful - and deadly - of its kind!

name: Weather Machine - Frozen Cliffs
desc: Take your world to new heights with this breathtaking backing of icy mountains and perilous canyons! Whirling lands of snow await - just punch to activate! Oh, and remember, this is delicate machinery we're dealing with her, and it won't function when damaged.

name: Tyr's Spear

func.rem: Go in peace as you put down your spear.

desc: Justice and duty resonate in the heart of this godly weaponn propelling it far beyond its wielder's reach and into the very heart of evil!

name: Huginn and Muninn - Odin's Ravens

func.add: Rise with wings of Thought and Memory!

desc: Rar! Wisdom and memory, perfectly perched on each shoulder to whisper the world's secrets into your ears! Just make sure to feed them, or they might take a chunk out of you in return!

name: Mjolnir
desc: The hammer of the gods! Wreathed in myth and forged with a core of living lightning, this legendary artifact was once lost in the gulf between the stars! Will you succeed on its former owner's cosmic quest? Are you... worthy?

name: Eir's Healing Rune
desc: Infused with the medical might of Eir, a healing goddess, this rune will grant swift recovery and aid to any who hold it! Also grants minty fresh breath, which is especially nice benefit when you consider the standard Viking diet.

name: Thor's Chariot
desc: Looks like Thor misplaced his wheels! Fortunately, his feisty goats, Tanngrisnir and Tanngnjostr, have taken a liking to you and decided to forgo the standard BITE BITE BITE greeting they tend to use on new owners. Let's ride!

name: Growmoji Cake
desc: Celebrate the party by baking some delicious cake for your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: The Amazing Hexagon - 6th Anniversary Block
desc: Six sides for six incredible years! How cool is this hexagon? Almost as cool as you, for being a part of a game that's grown and thrived like none other!

name: Super Party Launcher
desc: Those other ravers laughed at you. They thought you didn't have the moves to dance with them. They thought your game was weak and your accessories were weaker. Well, joke's on them, because now you're ready to party the night away with the ultimate in confetti domination! Who's laughing NOW, foolish ravers?! Kinda hard to make fun of someone when you've got paper confetti and maybe a Mach 5 firework in your face, isn't it??

name: Black Party Table
desc: For the classiest of shindigs. Fine china not included.

name: Party Punch Bowl
desc: A great place to gather drinks for the whole crew... or one uber-mega thirst-quencher for yourself!

name: Balloon Decoration
desc: The most whimsical of interior design choices.

name: Air Horn
desc: Little-known fact: All Growtopia air horns are actually the sound of a very angry camel screaming.

name: Floating Speakers

func.add: Feel the rhythm, feel the beat!

desc: These aren't for pool parties - they're for you! Hit the air on waves of sound with these thumpin' good boomboxes!

name: Golden Party-In-A-Box
desc: Sparkling with luxury and gold-plated fun! You can just barely hear amped-up techno music coming from deep inside this box. Maybe you should open it and see if a truly righteous party comes out?

name: Goat Leash
desc: One of the goats from Thor's chariot. It somehow ate the chains that held it in place!

name: Dragon Warrior's Shield - Crimson
desc: An unyielding defense against claws, fangs, spiky tails, and the blazing breath of even the mightiest drakes! Comes in a variety of colors, all related to ancient customs and knightly orders! Looks like this one is red, for the Crimson Court!

name: Dragon Warrior's Shield - Silver
desc: An unyielding defense against claws, fangs, spiky tails, and the blazing breath of even the mightiest drakes! Comes in a variety of colors, all related to ancient customs and knightly orders! Looks like this one is silver, for the Silver Spire!

name: Dragon Warrior's Shield - Diamond
desc: An unyielding defense against claws, fangs, spiky tails, and the blazing breath of even the mightiest drakes! Comes in a variety of colors, all related to ancient customs and knightly orders! Looks like this one is diamond, for the rarest of all: The Radiant Souls!

name: Growmoji Heart with Arrow
desc: Pin down your lover's heart with an arrow in your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Chinese Temple Pillar
desc: Might not be a pillar of heaven, but these will still do a great job of holding up the foundations of a temple tall enough to reach it!

name: Chinese Prayer Wheel
desc: Painted with lovely colors to please the heavens! Give them a spin for a little extra luck!

name: Chinese Temple Background
desc: Richly-carved and decorated wood, perfect for enclosing a heavenly space!

name: Chinese Temple Awning
desc: These loops and swirls of painted wood have a whimsical flair that's a perfect fit for overlooking any place at peace!

name: Incense Urn
desc: Wisps of aromatic smoke spill from this heavy urn, filling the air with calming scents!

name: Draconic Rocket Parasol
desc: To the heavens! In honor of the original creators of fireworks, this parasol has been loaded up with a dragon's worth! Use them to blast your way into the heavens, and then float gently down to Earth when you're done! There are only 900 in existence!

name: Growmoji Lucky Token
desc: Celebrate the New Year by popping a little luck into your chat! Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Year of the Pig Lucky Token
desc: Legend says these will link your world to the realm of the ancients where great gods of change watch over us. Perhaps if you add this to your world, they will bless you with a small piece of their vast fortunes...

name: Dragon Glass
desc: Forged in pools of molten rock by the unfathomable heat of a dragon's fire, this glass is touched by the mystic qualities of their creators!

name: Toasted Village Wall
desc: This endured the worst heat of a passing firedrake - it's a miracle it's still standing!

name: Toasted Village Background
desc: Covered in ash and soot, this wall is more carbon than wood!

name: Toasted Village Door
desc: Warped by a firedrake's flames, it's hard to believe this door even opens now!

name: Toasted Village Roof
desc: The villagers who took shelter under this roof when a firedrake attacked are lucky it didn't burn all the way through! Things certainly got a little singed, though!

name: Toasted Village Window
desc: The perfect place to look out on devastated crops - and keep an eye out for a returning dragon

name: Toasted Village Fence
desc: This blasted fence won't be corralling too many animals now - it looks like a stiff breeze could knock it over!

name: Toasted Villager Shirt
desc: Toasty! This top took a quick blast of flame from a dragon, and it shows!

name: Toasted Villager Hat
desc: Toasty! Whoever wore this was pretty unlucky when a dragon came to town, though better than this hat that its bearer's head, I suppose...

name: Toasted Villager Pants
desc: Toasty! It's unclear whether these pants were present during a dragon's attack, or their owner simply told a TON of lies...

name: Toasted Villager Shoes
desc: Toasty! Talk about a hotfoot! For a very brief run, these must've felt like the worst case of athlete's foot in history!

name: Toasted Face Smudges
desc: Toasty! Just gotten blitzed by a firedrake with nothing to show for it? Not true! These toasty smudges are proof that you've faced the flame... and survived!

name: Dragon Knight's Helm
desc: Forged in a master blacksmith's furnace and stamped with runes of protection, a Dragon Knight's suit of armor is their last and best line of defense against the horrid flames and claws of their scaly foes! This helm is but one link of many in that chain of defense, a perfect way to keep your noggin safe! Also doubles as a really cool motorcycle helmet.

name: Dragon Knight's Chestplate
desc: Forged in a master blacksmith's furnace and stamped with runes of protection, a Dragon Knight's suit of armor is their last and best line of defense against the horrid flames and claws of their scaly foes! This chestplate is but one link of many in that chain of defense, a perfect way to keep your body safe! And hey, it's got great resale value - even if a dragon burns you out of it, this armor will still be left behind for the next intrepid knight!

name: Dragon Knight's Greaves
desc: Forged in a master blacksmith's furnace and stamped with runes of protection, a Dragon Knight's suit of armor is their last and best line of defense against the horrid flames and claws of their scaly foes! These greaves are but one link of many in that chain of defense, a perfect way to keep your legs safe! Trust me, when you're dealing with dragons, preserving your ability to run away is critical.

name: Dragon Knight's Sabatons
desc: Forged in a master blacksmith's furnace and stamped with runes of protection, a Dragon Knight's suit of armor is their last and best line of defense against the horrid flames and claws of their scaly foes! These shoes are but one link of many in that chain of defense, a perfect way to keep your feet safe! Keep these in mind the next time you want to try walking on coals at a luau, too - I mean, who would do that in bare feet??

name: Legendary Dragon Knight's Wings
desc: Bestowed upon only the bravest, most prestigious, most skilled Dragon Knights, these wings are so rare that in all the centuries since the first Dragon Knights arose, barely a handful have been awarded. Will you be the next to bear their illustrious might? To take to the skies and soar like the very dragons you hunt? If you possess these wings, there's little question you've proven your worth - and dedication.

name: Dragon Knight's Spear
desc: Capable of subduing the mightiest drake! Of course, you need to actually GET the pointy tip of the spear TO the drake, but that's where all the Dragon Knight armor comes in handy!

name: Dragon Throne
desc: Fit for a dragon king! Well, not an ACTUAL dragon - they're much too large - but for a ruler who's really into dragon theming, it's perfect!

name: Dragon Mirror
desc: Reflects your draconic side! The great serpent of fate accents this polished glass - the perfect accessory for a creepy old fortune-teller's shop, or perhaps a Dragon Knight's trophy room!

name: Dragon Lamp
desc: The only safe way to light up a room with a dragon (all other ways involve fire - lots and lots and lots and lots of fire)!

name: Dragon Turtle
desc: A snapping beast of the crushing deep! It's said that the oldest dragon turtles can grow so large, whole islands can grow on their back!

name: Dragon Turtle Charm

func.rem: Your aquatic wisdom is no more.

desc: A snapping beast of the crushing deep! It's said that the oldest dragon turtles can grow so large, whole islands can grow on their backs! Fortunately, this one's still small and feisty, and seems happy to follow you on your adventures!

name: Super-Dragon Mask

func.rem: Your super wisdom is no more.

desc: Look! Up in the sky! It's a bird! It's a plane! It's... SUPER DRA- AIIEEE! RUN! THERE'S FIRE EVERYWHERE!

name: Ghost Dragon Charm

func.rem: Your ghastly wisdom is no more.

desc: A dragon pulled from the Other Side! Top Dragonologists have been debating whether this creature is actually the ghost of a single dragon or a conjoined ectoplasmic hive composed of many smaller ghosts working together, but all of them can agree that it keeps eating anyone who asks about it, so it's best not to worry.

name: Gourmet Dragon Claw

func.rem: Your gastronomic wisdom is no more.

desc: A dragon who appreciates the finer things in life - as long as you can eat them.

name: Emergency Dragon Claw

func.rem: Your medical wisdom is no more.

desc: Not all dragons are here to stomp and burn! Sure, this dragon still causes emergencies, but it also helps to patch people up afterward!

name: Jormungandr

func.add: You have the world serpent's wisdom!

desc: A spiraling serpent of the fathomless deep, this colossal beast once circled all of Midgard with coils the size of warships! Now it's taking a break from causing maelstroms to join you in your adventures!

name: Prehistoric Dragon Claw

func.rem: Your ancient wisdom is no more.

desc: A dragon from a bygone time, what it lacks in modern refinements it more than makes up for in ancient biting power and unintelligible grunts!

name: Star Dragon Claw

func.rem: Your astronomical wisdom is no more.

desc: A living constellation, this beautiful dragon was born in the heart of a brilliant nebula. It's come down to your world to explore, and it's very happy to have you as its guide!

name: Chaos Dragon

func.rem: Your chaotic wisdom is no more.

desc: Don't look at it. Don't think about it. Don't. Even. Move. This... THING isn't a dragon. I don't know what it is - only that it's deadly dangerous and forged from the void itself. Beware, dear Growtopian, because I think it's noticed you...

name: Stone Egg
desc: Unyielding, solid stone, and yet... you think you can hear the faintest pulse of a heartbeat from within!

name: Hatching Stone Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Ghost Egg
desc: A dragon egg, touched by the essence of the Other Side!

name: Hatching Ghost Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Water Egg
desc: A dragon egg, touched by the spirit of the stormy seas!

name: Hatching Water Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Void Egg
desc: A dragon egg, touched by the blackness from between the stars!

name: Hatching Void Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Dragon Soul
desc: The mystic strength of the smallest of dragon is too much for even the afterlife to handle! This bit mindlessly through our world. Perhaps you could give it purpose...?

name: Mentorship Certificate
desc: Help your friends (and kind newbies) discover the worlds and wonders of Growtopia! This certificate allows its bearer to access the Mentor System, add new apprentices, and get rewards for their accomplishments! Note that while an apprentice can only have one mentor, a mentor can have many apprentices!

name: Heartcastle Stone
desc: Mortared with love and affection, these stones aren't just a monument to nobility - they're also the building blocks of romance!

name: Heartcastle Stone Background
desc: These stones practically radiate adoration! As much as they love you, you'll love the way they look even more!

name: Heartcastle Gate
desc: While the ways to a Growtopian's heart are nearly as varied as the things they can accomplish, this portal is just about as clear and direct as you can get! Romance lies beyond!

name: Heartcastle Turret
desc: Stamped with hearts and forged with everlasting care, these turrets will form the top of the loveliest castle yet!

name: Heartcastle Column
desc: Emotional support is often harder to come by than physical, but this column tries to accomplish both! It'll lift your spirits even as it lifts your buildings!

name: Heartking's Crown
desc: Love rules, and who better to embody that than the grandest nobility in all the Heartlands: the King and Queen of Heart! This crown is part of the King's personal wardrobe. and his warmth and affection for his subjects practically spill from it!

name: Heartking's Robes
desc: Love rules, and who better to embody that than the grandest nobility in all the Heartlands: the King and Queen of Hearts! These robes are part of the King's personal wardrobe, and his warmth and affection for his subjects practically spill from them!

name: Heartqueen's Crown
desc: Love rules, and who better to embody that than the grandest nobility in all the Heartlands: the King and Queen of Hearts! This crown is part of the Queen's personal wardrobe, and her delight and care for her subjects practically explode from it!

name: Heartqueen's Robes
desc: Love rules, and who better to embody that than the grandest nobility in all the Heartlands: the King and Queen of Hearts! These robes are part of the Queens's personal wardrobe, and her delight and care for her subjects practically explode from them!

name: Heartstaff
desc: Taken from the personal armory of the King and Queen of Heart, this staff is capable of batting away all but the saddest thoughts and mending even the most melancholy of hearts!

name: Golden Heartstaff
desc: Infused with the golden light of romance, this heartstaff has been enhanced beyond its already-impressive start as a weapon of the heart to become a shining example of the power of love! Careful, though - for love can sometimes hit far harder than any edge!

name: Heartsword
desc: Taken from the personal armory of the King and Queen of Heart, this sword is capable of slicing through all but the saddest thoughts and bringing joy to even the most melancholy of hearts!

name: Golden Heartsword
desc: Infused with the golden light of romance, this heartsword has been enhanced beyond its already-impressive start as a weapon of the heart to become a shining example of the power of love! Careful, though - for love can sometimes cut far deeper than any blade!

name: Stained Glass Heartwings
desc: Shining, radiant, wondrous. These wings aren't powered by magic or science or anything so mundane - they're infused with purest love, capable of uplifting all who wear them into the skies! Touch the heavens and smile, for by wearing these beauties, you have proclaimed yourself a true champions of the heart!

name: Morty the Gray Elephant
desc: Have you ever forgotten how amazing you look? How cool your style is? Well an elephant NEVER forgets, so take a tour in Morty's fashionable gray ears and remember your awesomeness for all time! Wait - what's that? Your friends don't think its all that great? Well, maybe a HAIL OF PEANUTS will make them reconsider! GET 'EM, MORTY!

name: Morty the Orange Elephant
desc: Have you ever forgotten how amazing you look? How cool your style is? Well an elephant NEVER forgets, so take a tour in Morty's fashionable pink ears and remember your awesomeness for all time! Wait - what's that? Your friends don't think it's all that great? Well, maybe a HAIL OF PEANUTS will make them reconsider! GET 'EM, MORTY!

name: Morty the Pink Elephant
desc: Have you ever forgotten how amazing you look? How cool your style is? Well an elephant NEVER forgets, so take a tour in Morty's fashionable pink ears and remember your awesomeness for all time! Wait - what's that? Your friends don't think it's all that great? Well, maybe a HAIL OF PEANUTS will make them reconsider! GET 'EM, MORTY!

name: Morty the Diamond Elephant
desc: Have you ever forgotten how amazing you look? How cool your style is? Well an elephant NEVER forgets, so take a tour in Morty's fashionable pink ears and remember your awesomeness for all time! Wait - what's that? Your friends don't think it's all that great? Well, maybe a HAIL OF PEANUTS will make them reconsider! GET 'EM, MORTY!

name: Spring Token
desc: Access to the wonders of the Spring Season! Collect these to unlock its many rewards!

name: Manor House Sandstone
desc: Carefully shaped by a legion of butlers for maximum snootitude, these sandstones are the building blocks of elegance, grace, and really fancy manors.

name: Manor House Sandstone Background
desc: What's behind those wealthy walls? Wealthy backgrounds, of course.

name: Manor House Door
desc: A door this fancy surely opens onto a realm of opulence and grace! Or, like, a volcano. Hey, it's your door - you can put it wherever you want, really.

name: Manor House Sandstone Steps
desc: Steps to greatness. Carefully crafted to be impossible to climb for those lacking the requisite degree of nobility!

name: Manor House Red Striped Wallpaper
desc: For only the fanciest of manors (the red stripes are actually finely-crushed rubies)!

name: Gilt Inlaid Ceiling
desc: Have you been using cheap, boring ceiling blocks? Well, the Court of Style finds you GILTY! The sentence: You must use these slick new inlaid tiles, instead!

name: Baroque Iron Fence
desc: Keeps the riffraff out, but lets them look inside at all the cool things they're missing!

name: Baroque Iron Gate
desc: The only problem with this gate is the constant repair bills, but you know what they say: If it ain't baroque, don't fix it!

name: Candle Wall Sconce
desc: Practically guaranteed to reveal a hidden passage! If only you knew which way to turn it...

name: Luxurious Wall Clock
desc: Taking the phrase "Time is money" quite literally, this clock makes time-telling a work of art!

name: Topiary Hedge
desc: Almost certainly not going to come to life and attack you. Probably. Okay, it's like 50-50 at this point, but for a hedge this good-looking, it's worth the risk!

name: Statue Pillar
desc: Holds up stuff and looks good doing it - now that's efficient!

name: Sandstone Fireplace
desc: Intended for manor houses with dark secrets, this fireplace is perfect for staring into smoldering ashes and brooding.

name: Garden Trellis Tunnel
desc: When you're rich, you shouldn't have to choose between tunnels or gardens, and with this block, you can finally have both!

name: Hibiscus
desc: A lovely flower for any occasion - it even maks for a nice tea!

name: Lavender
desc: Famously purple flowers, lavender not only looks beautiful just about anywhere, but it has a calming effect as well!

name: Garden Planter
desc: Stop leaving your poor plants in the dirty ground! Use this planter to keep them nice and secure, instead!

name: Armillary Sundial
desc: Shows your place in the heavens and tells the time! Studies show that the more cool-looking devices you have, the smarter and more successful you are, so you should probably load up on these.

name: Baroque Fountain
desc: Finally, something to make water useful! Imagine this fountain sparkling in your manor's gardens on a hot summer day... Just don't dive in - it'd be gauche!

name: Greenhouse
desc: Keep the chill of winter away from your plants and have a blooming garden all year 'round!

name: Garden Bird House
desc: Miss the cheerful tweeting of birds amidst your many manicured hedges? This lovely birdhouse will bring them back and chirpier than ever!

name: Garden Bench
desc: Why build a beautiful garden if youre not going to take the time to enjoy it?  Set this bench in the middle of all that loveliness and unwind.

name: Garden Shears
desc: Keep those unruly hedges in check with a dainty snip-snip from these shears!

name: Country Tweed Waistcoat & Tie
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes. With this fine waistcoat/tie combo, you'll be the last word in rural nobility!

name: Country Tweed Open Jacket
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes. This jacket will make you seem anything but closed - after all, a friend in tweed is a friend indeed!

name: Country Tweed Trousers
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes! These trousers are perfect for a stroll through your gardens or perhaps a vigorous game of croquet!

name: Country Tweed Flat Cap
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes! This cap will keep the sun out of your eyes as you walk your manor's grounds and make you look extra-jaunty as you tip it to your neighbors!

name: Country Tweed Jacket & Yellow Tie
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes! The touch of yellow in this jacket/tie combo would go marvelously with a spring festival - perhaps in your new manor's gardens?

name: Country Riding Breeches
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes! These bonzer breechers will keep you on horseback long after lesser riders have gone home! Try on a pair today - there's nothing wrong with being comfortable AND fashionable, after all.

name: Country Riding Hat
desc: Cor! Part of a smashing new line of country-inspired clothes! This fine hat doesn't make you a better rider, but it DOES make you a more dashing one, and honestly, isn't that what riding animals is all about?

name: Guild Show Horse
desc: Bred and groomed for competition, this flawless horse will have the judges saying anything but 'neigh'!

name: Guild Noble's Carriage
desc: Sure, carriages like this look amazing on the outside, but what their owners won't tell you is that the interior is tricked out with a full surround sound system, flatscreen TVs, the latest gaming consoles, and a well-organized selection of candy!

name: Eagle Spirit
desc: You are one with your spirit animal! The awesome guidance of the Eagle Spirit has given you the gift of double jump! Now go forth and clasp some crags with crooked hands!

name: War Hammers of Darkness
desc: Seething with dark powers and intended for even darker designs, these weapons are for only the most tortured, brooding souls. You'd better have a tragic backstory all lined up before you even THINK of touching one!

name: Condor Wings
desc: Condors are some of the largest flying birds in the world, which makes these wings fit for only the biggest and baddest Growtopians! Will you take on the condor's mantle and soar, or are you more of a... chicken?

name: Airplane Wings
desc: Zoom! You don't need a silly engine, propeller, or any of that other mechanical garbage - not when you have THESE wings! Take to the skies just like the airplanes of old! Note: You may need to drink one or two liters of oil per day to keep them properly floppy.

name: Sturdy Crackfire Fighter
desc: Look! Up in the sky! It's a bird! It's a plane! It's... it's... you?

name: Cardboard Sky Starter
desc: You don't need a roaring engine or a blazing gun to claim the skies- just a bit of cardboard and a strong imagination! This Sky Starter will get you going, but it's up to you to make it soar!

name: Aviator Scarf
desc: There's no point in flying around heroically if you don't have a flappy scarf to keep yourself warm! Nobody trusts a shivering hero, after all.

name: Aviator Jacket
desc: Keeps you warm as you dance with the clouds and comes with all kinds of cool patches to show off your many marvelous accomplishments.

name: Aviator Glasses
desc: Carefully sculpted to shine with a heroic glint as you pilot your battered-but-victorious plane home from battle!

name: Aviator Fighter Pilot Hat
desc: No self-respecting hero of the skies would go out without a dashing hat! Keep your perfectly-slicked hair and brilliant brain warm in even the chilliest clouds with this!

name: Air Force Flight Suit
desc: Time to show everyone you've got the right stuff! Commandeer the fastest jets and set the most dangerous records in this super-sleek flight suit!

name: Growmoji Shamrock
desc: Want to add some shamrock shenanigans in your chat? Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Spring Flinger Frog Mask
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Spring Flinger Style! This mask doesn't just give you the face of a swift and hoppy frog - it also gives you a new style that stays fresh on water AND land! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Frog Mask
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Spring Flinger Style! This mask doesn't just give you the face of an ULTRA swift and hoppy frog - it also gives you a new style that stays ULTRA fresh on water AND land! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in SUCH an Ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Paintball Power Popper
desc: Got tons of paint on your hands but feeling tired of walking ALL THE WAY over to a wall, or friend, or inanimate object to cover them in it? Well, whine no more! This high-powered paintball popper will plaster your pals in premium paint without pause (phew)!

name: Flaming Boxing Gloves

func.rem: Time to hang up the gloves.

desc: These gloves aren't aflame with basic fire - they're alight with the burning heart of BATTLE! Furious ringside magic has been embedded in these gloves, wrapping them in an eternal halo of blazing punch-power! And no, they are very definitely NOT regulation...

name: Up, Up, and Away Block
desc: Look! Up in the sky! It's a bird! It's a plane! It's... it's... you?

name: Spring Flinger Frog Suit
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Spring Flinger Style! This suit doesn't just turn you into a swift and hoppy frog - it also turns you into an amphibiously cool one! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Frog Suit
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Spring Flinger Style! This suit doesn't just turn you into an ULTRA swift and hoppy frog - it also gives you a new style that stays ULTRA fresh on water AND land! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Forged Iron Skin

func.rem: Back to normal and boring human skin!

desc: A gift of the gods, shaped by magic and fused by cosmic heat, this skin makes for the perfect armor. You'll never tire, never fall, never take one step back! ...though you may have to deal with a spot of rust now and then.

name: Ionic Pulse Cannon Tank
desc: The titanium treads, super-heavy armor, and GrowTech hyperfusion reactor alone would make this the most expensive tank in history, and that's before you add an Ionic Pulse Devastator 7777 turret on top! Truly a tank for the most powerful nations - or richest collectors - in all the realms!

name: Slippery Flag Pole
desc: Skip the stairs and get to the ground floor in a flash with this super-slippery pole! A quick trick of firemen everywhere, now yours to use for more than just emergencies!

name: Spring Chest
desc: SPRING CHEST, ICON ONLY! NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY! IF YOU'RE READING THIS, THE POLICE HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED AND YOU'RE IN TROUBLE.

name: Burnished Sword
desc: Shining with the help of GrowTech's extra-strength Sword Wax ("Wax on, slice off!"), this burnished blade is ready to chop your foes! Chosen by GusBhas, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for July, 2019!

name: GrowCon Plaque
desc: If you close your eyes near this block, you can almost feel the warmth of camaraderie and good cheer from many fellow con-goers! A beautiful plaque for a beautiful person, this was specially made for those who attended a live GrowCon event!

name: Spring Event Player Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Player Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Spring Event Player Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Player Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Spring Event Player Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Player Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Spring Event Guild Medal: Bronze
desc: Awarded for achieving THIRD PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Spring Event Guild Medal: Silver
desc: Awarded for achieving SECOND PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Spring Event Guild Medal: Gold
desc: Awarded for achieving FIRST PLACE in the Guild Leaderboards during the Spring season. Show off your victory by placing this medal in your world, and congratulations!

name: Kairos' Apollo
desc: In loving memory of Apollo. Kairos' loyal, loving companion. A special creature that will always be by her side and in her heart.

name: Celtic Cross
desc: Great for marking interesting landmarks as you walk the highlands.

name: Minilith Stone
desc: It might take a lot of miniliths, but pile them all together, and you can have your very own MEGALITH in your back yard!

name: Faerie Lanterns
desc: Light the garden path with these magical faerie lights. Just between you and me, it's probably just bio-luminescent fungi at work, but... let's go with magic!

name: Heather Bush
desc: A lucky highland bush, perfect for decorating pathways, gardens, or avant-garde hairsyles.

name: Lucky Chair
desc: About as lucky as basic wooden chairs can get!

name: Moss-Covered Stone
desc: While this stone may not be rollin', it sure has the moss laying heavy.

name: Money Tree
desc: So apparently money DOES grow on trees. Only problem with this money is that it's actually pretty worthless around here...

name: Four-Leaf Clover Checkpoint
desc: A hundred times luckier than a normal checkpoint! Unfortunately, normal checkpoints have zero natural luck, so mathematically this one is... uh... really nice-looking!

name: Kelpie
desc: A shape-shifting water spirit, this creature normally hangs out in the lochs of Scotland, but it's decided to make an exception to adventure with you! Only found in Blarney 2 and 3.

name: Bagpipes
desc: Ahh, the most calming and gentle of musical instruments. Just listen... *FREEOOOOOOOWWWWWWW HE-ORRRRRRNNNNNN EEEEEEEEEEEEE HOOOOOOOOOOOOO!*

name: Fairy
desc: A mighty magical sprite! You might think it's odd that it took over six years for an actual fairy to show up in Growtopia. but just remember, Fairy Wings were the VERY FIRST wing to be added to the game, and it took the Fairy Union a long time to get over it! Only found in Blarney 1 and 4.

name: Lucky Broach
desc: Absolutely guaranteed to be maybe sorta kinda luckier than the average broach! ...possibly. A little. ... ... ...okay, not really.

name: Money Gun
desc: Ka-ching! This doesn't just make it rain - it's an instant MONEY FLOOD! WOOHOO!

name: Rollback Plaque V
desc: You were there, man. You were THERE when time rolled backwards yet again, the server burned to bits, and all the fruits of your labors turned to dust in your dry, bitter fist. February 2019.

name: Hellfire Horns - Black
desc: Searing bright with the infernal blue blaze of the Underworld, these horns are stronger than tempered growmantium, sharper than a honed growlecular sabre, and more stylish than even the greatest GrowTech tailors could imagine!

name: Hellfire Horns - Blue
desc: Searing bright with the infernal blue blaze of the Underworld, these horns are stronger than tempered growmantium, sharper than a honed growlecular sabre, and more stylish than even the greatest GrowTech tailors could imagine!

name: Hellfire Horns - Orange
desc: Searing bright with the infernal blue blaze of the Underworld, these horns are stronger than tempered growmantium, sharper than a honed growlecular sabre, and more stylish than even the greatest GrowTech tailors could imagine!

name: Hellfire Horns - Ruby
desc: Searing bright with the infernal blue blaze of the Underworld, these horns are stronger than tempered growmantium, sharper than a honed growlecular sabre, and more stylish than even the greatest GrowTech tailors could imagine!

name: Spring Flinger Shoes
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Spring Flinger Style! These shoes won't just put a smile on your face and a spring in your step - they'll also give you a new style that works wonders in both boring boardrooms AND beautiful beaches! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Shoes
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Spring Flinger Style! These shoes won't just put an ULTRA-happy smile on your face and an ULTRA-swift spring in your step - they'll also give you a new style that works wonders in both boring boardrooms AND beautiful beaches! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ultra way! Go on, I'll wait...

name: S.P.I.D.E.R. Legs
desc: At last! The Speedy Palpating Incredibly Deadly Electronic Roamers are the perfect replacement for those pesky human legs everyone seems to have. Seriously, have you noticed how many people have those weak, totally non-metallic and uninteresting NORMAL legs? Why would you want something so... overdone? Use the S.P.I.D.E.R., and get going in wonderfully horrible style!

name: Trickster
desc: A portable cannon, the Trickster will kill your enemies, and you too, so watch out! Wrench it to set the rate of fire! You can place as many Tricksters as you like, but only 10 blasts can exist at a time, so if you have a lot, most of them will just sit there.

name: Junk Cannon
desc: No block stays awesome forever, even if you're firing it out of a recoilless GrowTech-certified gauss chamber with 1.21 growgajoules of force... which is why the Junk Cannon is leagues ahead of all other block-blasting battlegear! What CAN'T it fire? Where does it get all those blocks from? How can it never run out of ammunition? Sorry, the answers to those questions can only be provided if you have GrowTech Security Clearance Level Indigo or higher, but hey - you can still shoot the gun as much as you want! Woohoo!

name: Purple Aura
desc: You are burning with magical, octarine energies!

name: Green Aura
desc: You are burning with earthly, verdant energies!

name: Growmoji Grin
desc: Want to add a big cheesy grin to your chat? Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: NekoRei's Fluffy Micio
desc: So twitchy!

name: NekoRei's Fluffy Tail
desc: So swishy!

name: WOTD Trophy 2019
desc: The best of all possible trophies in 2019.

name: Balloon Bunny
desc: Bunny bunny bunny balloon balloon balloon bunny balloon bunny balloon bunny bunny balloon balloon.

name: Pet Egg
desc: This creature is so friendly, it hasn't even hatched and it already wants to be your friend!

name: Big Goofy Teeth
desc: Do you ever feel like you can never show enough teeth? Well, toss these on and give yourself a grin that'll rival even the rarest rabbits!

name: Claws of Barko
desc: Honed in lightless caves where only the most devious rabbits dare to hop, these claws are used for far deadlier things than digging cute bunny burrows!

name: Bowler Bunny Hat
desc: Perfect for when you need to attend a very stylish event that happens to be hosted by rabbits.

name: Drabbit's Foot
desc: Once upon a time, a dragon and a rabbit loved each other very much. Even the wisest sages aren't sure how this happened, and nobody likes to think about how it worked, but the wondrous drabbit was the result, and now with this talisman, a touch of its provider-enhancing wisdom can be yours!

name: Easter Egg
desc: May or may not be full of chocolate. There's probably something good inside, though! Only time will tell...

name: Hatching Easter Egg
desc: It's... it's hatching! There's something inside this egg, and it's coming out soon! Ooh, what could it be??

name: Psychotic Bunny Mask
desc: Styled after Hannibun Lopter, the notorious psycho-rabbit!

name: Riding Bunny
desc: Takes you to and fro with little hops and a lot of love! There's no cuter way to travel - just look at that cute bunny face and twitchy nose!

name: Easter Egg Cannon
desc: Powered by a Fuel Pack on your back, this gun can launch free easter egg blocks at your fellow Growtopians! Don't waste shots at anything else, though, because they still burn fuel!

name: Easter Island Head
desc: This isn't a REAL Moai - those are much bigger and weigh thousands of pounds - but rather a cunningly-painted and carved chunk of styrofoam. Looks pretty convincing, though!

name: Flower Pinwheel
desc: Enjoy the whirling beauty of this spinny pinwheel.

name: Easter Checkpoint
desc: You are risen! Hop back from the afterlife with the help of this seasonal checkpoint. Remember, if you die, you'll respawn at the last checkpoint you touched!

name: Easter Egg - Growtopia
desc: Fired from the Easter Egg Cannon, this block celebrates the season and Growtopia, all in one go!

name: Easter Egg - Ghost
desc: Fired from the Easter Egg Cannon, this block looks like it belongs on the Other Side!

name: Easter Egg - Pineapple
desc: Fired from the Easter Egg Cannon, this block doesn't look like any egg you've ever heard of!

name: Bunny Balloon Hat 1
desc: Wabbit!

name: Bunny Balloon Hat 2
desc: Here, little Wabbit!

name: Bunny Balloon Hat 3
desc: Hahaha, Wabbit!

name: Keenan GT's Awesome Item-O-Matic
desc: An amazing item producing machine for an amazing pillar of the Growtopia community! This is Keenan GT's personal machine, and a true one-of-a-kind find! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Awesome Item-O-Matic will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Keenan GT's Red Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from Keenan GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: Keenan GT's Green Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from Keenan GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: Keenan GT's Blue Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from Keenan GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: Keenan GT's Yellow Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from Keenan GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: Keenan GT's Ruby Block
desc: Considering the size, this is the most valuable ruby in existence. But it's only a video game. This is from Keenan GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: VenomST's Awesome Item-O-Matic
desc: An amazing item producing machine for an amazing pillar of the Growtopia community! This is VenomST's personal machine, and a true one-of-a-kind find! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Awesome Item-O-Matic will not return to your backpack if broken!

desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from VenomST's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from VenomST's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from VenomST's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: BenBarrage's Blue Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from BenBarrage's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from BenBarrage's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Green Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Blue Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Yellow Block
desc: Blocks are available in a stunning array of colors! This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: MrSongo GT's Ruby Block
desc: Considering the size, this is the most valuable ruby in existence. But it's only a video game. This is from MrSongo GT's personal Awesome Item-O-Matic.

name: OldGertie's Awesome Item-O-Matic
desc: An amazing item producing machine for an amazing pillar of the Growtopia community! This is OldGertie's personal machine, and a true one-of-a-kind find! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Awesome Item-O-Matic will not return to your backpack if broken!

name: Mah-Kah-Ron Hat
desc: The subscriber item for March 2019, chosen by EloraFaline! So good-looking, you'd swear it's a deliciously crispy treat instead of a lovely hat - but don't eat it, because then you wouldn't have a hat, and you'd also have eaten a bunch of fabric, which would probably be bad.

name: 30-Day Premium Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for thirty full days of special treatment! You'll get access to unique skins, a chance of doubling any XP earned, 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 4000 gems every day!

name: 1-Year Subscription Token
desc: Consume this for a full YEAR of special treatment! You'll get 70 season tokens (as long as there's a seasonal clash running), and 9600 gems, and 1 World Lock every day and a chance of doubling any XP earned, growtime reduction on all seeds planted and Exclusive Skins!

name: Holy Jeans
desc: Jam-packed with so much holy might, they're, uh... wait, are these just jeans with lots of holes in them? But... how'd they get so dang POWERFUL, then?

name: Buddy's Block Head

func.rem: Aw, no more bonus blocks from Buddy.

desc: The nicest block around - it's not just your friend... it's your buddy! Equip it and watch your hoard grow:.. Gives you a chance of dropping an additional block when breaking blocks!

name: Glowy Cape
desc: Bringing light to even the darkest places and dimmest worlds, this cape will surround its bearer with an astonishingly pure light!

name: Building Blocks Machine
desc: Eager to add some new building materials to your construction stockpile? Tired of collecting items from random worlds and weirdos? Well, pop this beauty into your world and it'll start cranking out awesome blocks in no time! Careful, though - blocks don't just come from nothing, and this machine will eventually run out of power once it makes a bunch! WARNING! DO NOT BREAK! The Building Blocks Machine will NOT return to your backpack once broken!

name: Used Building Blocks Machine
desc: This mighty machine has run out of fuel, and now lies dormant.

name: Creepy Baby Block
desc: Uh, so this is a block now. A... terrifying block. Whoever suggested this, I hope my nightmares were worth it.

name: Digital Dirt
desc: The most classic block of all, only this time it's made Out of hard light and trillions of lines of code! Whoa.

name: Granite Column
desc: Stately and strong, this column can be the cornerstone of an empire!

name: Clouds Wallpaper
desc: Who can be bothered to go OUTSIDE to look at clouds these days? Put up a few walls of these perfect clouds and enjoy them from the comfort of your own home!

name: Skull Wallpaper
desc: Metal. Show your friends and family it's not just a phase with the help of this highly spooky skull pattern!

name: Dinosaur Wallpaper
desc: Rar! Stay in the past with this prehistoric paper! If you close your eyes, you can almost hear their roars!

name: Lava Falls
desc: The only thing more dangerous than a pool of molten rock is a falling column of it! Watch out for splashes!

name: Clouds Background
desc: Behind every fluffy, beautiful cloud is... another fluffy, beautiful cloud! I mean, what else were you expecting? Weasels?

name: Dark Walnut Block
desc: Smells like mustaches, flannel, and fine watches.

name: Dark Walnut Wall
desc: If you need an interior that reminds you of classic, manly styles and rough-edged elegance, set this background up and get ready for the perfect setting to relax in your favorite overstuffed armchair.

name: Dark Walnut Ladders
desc:
A normal ladder will get you to the same place, sure, but it certainly won't do it with such well-crafted - and extra-safe - rungs. Every handhold will feel like shaking hands with a 
grizzled craftsman!

name: Rickety Ladders
desc: Uh, mind your step on these - these splintery, timeworn rungs don't look like they'll hold much weight!

name: Growmoji Smile Block
desc: Tired of Growmojis only showing UP in chat? Well, now you can use this to add a smile to your world!

name: Growmoji Wow Block
desc: Tired of Growmojis only showing up in chat? Well, now you can use this to add some 'wow' to your world!

name: Dark Aqua Wallpaper
desc: The color of deep ocean waters! Kinda creepy, like you're stuck inside an aquatic tank with no lights on...

name: Dark Yellow Wallpaper
desc: The color of fading beauty! Kinda creepy, like you're in the middle of a decaying field of flowers!

name: Dark Purple Wallpaper
desc: The color of a crumbling empire! Kinda creepy, like you're traveling through a transdimensional vortex!

name: Dark Orange Wallpaper
desc: The color of a forgotten dream! Kinda creepy, like you're trapped inside a rotten orange!

name: Dark Brown Wallpaper
desc: The color of old decay! Kinda creepy, like you're stuck down a toilet!

name: Dark Grey Wallpaper
desc: The color of winter skies! Kinda creepy, like you're traveling through a transdimensional vortex!

name: Water Dispenser
desc: Refreshing! Say, what do you call a water dispenser in a desert? ... ... A thirst-aid kit!

name: Waiting Room Chair
desc: Extremely comfy, which is good, because you're going to be waiting for a while!

name: Ceiling Fan
desc: Dusty with age and kind of creaky, but it still spins after all these years! That's one tough fan!

name: Starship Security Camera
desc: Keep track of invading aliens and lazy crewmembers with this state-of-the-art camera! This device will watch your world and keep a record of everybody who enters! You may have up to 8 of these in a world.

name: Starship Mess Hall Table
desc: The perfect place to eat space food! Try the kanzlok - I hear it's delicious.

name: Starship Mess Hall Stool
desc: The perfect place to sit as you enjoy a nice space lunch with your space friends! Location: Probably in space!

name: Sea Urchin
desc: Aquatic pointiness of the deep-sea variety.

name: Copper Block
desc: Highly conductive, and quite precious - don't leave this laying around at a construction site!

name: Sea Lantern
desc: Cutting through the murky depths with a fragile glow! This little light of mine, I'm gonna let it shine...

name: Bubble Block
desc: Someone managed to get these bubbles to stay in place, which is a neat trick. Very delicate, yet also oddly satisfying to pop!

name: Manhole Cover
desc: Keep dangerous tunnels into the underdark sealed shut with this mega-heavy manhole cover! There won't be any pedestrians falling in on its watch!

name: Dark Castle Stone
desc: A bleak stone for dark lord, this carefully-hewn block is designed to keep heroes from climbing up and foiling your villainous plans!

name: Dark Castle Stone Background
desc: Behind the walls of every impregnable stronghold lie... more stones!

name: Dark Castle Door
desc: Abandon hope, all ye who enter here! The Dark Lord is IN!

name: Dark Castle Turret
desc: The perfect place to send down hails of arrows on unsuspecting heroes!

name: Red Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in red too! What stuff could it be?

name: White Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in white too! This is some pure stuff!

name: Black Stuff
desc: Now stuff comes in black too! It is nothingness

name: Heavy Chains
desc: Perfect for heavy industry! Or, like, tying up giant wolves. It's your chain.

name: Doggy Block
desc: Having a ruff day? This block will be sure to brighten it!

name: Kitty Block
desc: Feeling traumeowtized? This block will be sure to brighten your day!

name: Dumb Billboard
desc: not used, it's just an icon.

name: Thingamabob
desc: I have no idea what this thing does. It's something electronic? Maybe?

name: Da Vinci Wings

func.add: You can jump in mid-air! It's like flying, but less.

desc: Da Vinci actually thought he could fly with these. He was totally wrong - they only let you double jump and glide.

name: Genie's Lamp - Green
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a glorious green genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Yellow
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a youthful yellow genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Red
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a resplendent red genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Genie's Lamp - Blue
desc: Who needs wishes when you can GRANT them? This lamp will transform you into a brilliant blue genie of magic and mirth. Phenomenal cosmic power awaits!

name: Spring Flinger Squirrel Mask
desc: Celebrate the season with the new Spring Flinger Style! This mask doesn't just give you the face of a cheeky squirrel - it also helps you stay twitchy on land AND tree alike! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Ultra Spring Flinger Squirrel Suit
desc: Celebrate the season with the new ULTRA Spring Flinger Style! This suit doesn't just turn you into an ULTRA cheeky squirrel - it also gives you a new style that stays ULTRA twitchy on land AND tree alike! Try to find another piece of clothing that can do both, and in such an ULTRA way! Go on, I'll wait...!

name: Mud Puddle
desc: Ugh, what a mess of a mudhole! Try not to get stuck here - it'll be slow going with all this thick, gloppy mud!

name: Steampunk Wings
desc: Clattering gears and finely-tuned cogs whir and whiz as you don these brass and copper beauties! Thanks to the meticulous magic of steam and jewel precision of luxury mechanists, these wings are at home in the soot-streaked skies of any steampunk world!

name: Magic Magnet
desc: Tired of wading through clouds of items and loading up your inventory with random junk when all you want is a single thing? Just tune this magnet to the proper frequencies and it'll nab exactly what you're missing as you move past!

name: Legendary Comet Hair

func.rem: Your hair, what happened to your hair?

desc: The Night of the Comet is alive... in your HAIR! Roiling with color, every follicle of this otherworldly hair was chipped out of the cosmos, flowing and bubbling with all the energy of the great beyond!

name: Reg4shi's Archangel Wings
desc: He has intervened for the sake of Growtopians time and again, for he sees the potential for heroism, creativity and selflessness in each of us. He has even sacrificed his weekends to fight on our behalf. For that alone, we always have and always will believe in him.

name: Coati Scarf
desc: This little South American raccoon is full of mischief and curiosity, but right now, he needs a soft place to snuzzle up! Will you let him hop onto your shoulders and share some adorable warmth?

name: Fiesta Coati Scarf
desc: This little guy knows how to party! Full of spicy style and fearsome curiosity, there's nothing more rambunctious than a coati out on the town - and around your neck!

name: Riding Llama
desc: Careful! They may look fluffy and weird, but these guys spit. And bite. And talk about you behind your back. Llamas, right?

name: Pueblock
desc: Este es un bloque de construccion muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Window
desc: Este es un bloque de ventana muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Door
desc: Este es un bloque de puerta muy tradicional!

name: Pueblock Wallpaper
desc: Este es un fondo de pantalla muy tradicional!

name: Colored Corn
desc: Little-known fact about colored corn: It tastes nearly exactly like regular corn.

name: Saguaro Cactus
desc: A hardy cactus, these spiky boys can live over a hundred years and grow as tall as you can build them!

name: Scarfy-Scarf
desc: Whether you're rocketing down city streets on an apocalyptic adventure or simply trying to keep warm while looking good, this scarf won't let you down! Chosen by TraxyGT, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for April, 2019!

name: Wriggling Maggots
desc: Maggots are an important part of our ecosystem, helping to break down dead matter and recycle it for... oh, you want me to LOOK at them? No way! I'm out of here!

name: Bed Bugs
desc: Chittering, biting, and seemingly-indestructible, these creepy-crawlies prove that some nightmares are real!

name: Worm
desc: Part of a gigantic worm! How big can you grow it?

name: Brain Block
desc: Think you're smart? Just a single Brain Block has more thinkin' power than TEN normal Growtopians... and that's before you start adding more to it!

name: Insect Glue Wallpaper
desc: The only problem with laying down a sticky trap to catch bugs is that you wind up with a writhing wall of gross bugs. Ew.

name: Hairy Arm
desc: Ever wanted someone to give you a hand? How about a BIG one?

name: Hairy Leg
desc: Ever wanted a leg up on the competition? How about a BIG one?

name: Pillar of the Dead
desc: Y'know, as interior design choices go, there's something organic and wholesome about skulls - I mean, they were just going to waste away in the ground, weren't they? Now they can brighten up your solarium! Or, like, a Bastion of Eternal Evil. Either works.

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Eyed Wall
desc: It's hard to tell if this is a wall of flesh with eyes on it, or a wall of eyes with flesh on it, but either way, it's horrifying!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Eye
desc: When a normal eye Just won't do, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these putrid peepers! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Googly-Woogly Glooberhellifreakilisticexpialigrossness Fleshy Teeth
desc: When normal teeth just aren't terrifying enough, take the freak factor to the next, most googly-woogly power possible with these brutal biters! Just be careful - they aren't your friends!

name: Hairy Legs
desc: Who needs pants when you have all-natural heating for your legs?

name: Eyes on Stalks
desc: Alien eyes for your alien face, with alien lasers to destroy the human race!

name: Riding Poop
desc: Yes, it's real, and it moves just as quickly as you do after one too many fast food meals!

name: The Beast with a Thousand Eyes Mask
desc: Keep your eye on the prize - literally every prize - with this horrific headful of staring alien eyeballs!

name: Puggly
desc: This dogbomination eats everything when your back is turned, and then horks it right back up when it has your attention! How cute! Wait, did I say cute? I meant BLEARGHGHGHGH!

name: The Fly
desc: A buzzing beast, engorged by science and merged with your poor head! How will you ever date again?

name: Horrid Snotty Face
desc: Just dripping with happiness, this is truly a face only a mother could love!

name: Extra Undead Arms
desc: Since when was two arms enough for you to get anything done? Let's stack on a few more and get this party started!

name: Riding 'roach
desc: Just a friendly cockroach you decided to befriend instead of squish! It'll take you wherever you like, provided there's some delicious rotting food for it to snack on along the way!

name: Undead Slippers
desc: Technically, all your shoes are dead. These just happen to be particularly obvious about it.

name: Giant Eye Head
desc: Give your friends an eyeful with this baleful, beady-eyed orb! As an added bonus, you can probably win every last staring contest now!

name: Bob The Gross Blob
desc: Not to be confused with Bob the Handsome Blob!

name: Fatberg Block
desc: Congealed oil, grease, hair, and other squishy unmentionables, pulled out of the nearest sewer and plonked right into your hands! Don't say we never gave you anything!

name: Flaming Pepper Gross Bean
desc: A freakishly spicy snack!

name: Rotten Egg Gross Bean

func.add: AAARGH! Why does it taste of green?

desc: A sulfurous eggy snack!

name: Dirt Gross Bean
desc: A gruesomely grainy snack!

name: Booger Gross Bean
desc: A disgustingly salty snack!

name: Barf Gross Bean
desc: A nauseatingly sweet snack!

name: Disgusting Mess Block
desc: If creating horrible piles of wretched misery was an art form, this would be a five-star effort! Unfortunately, its not, which just makes this an abomination.

name: Strawberry Slime Block
desc: Yuck, this compressed pink stuff is slippery and gross! Smells faintly of strawberries, though. Well... rotten strawberries.

name: Rotting Sea Goo
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of salted stink and deepsea death.

name: Space Poop
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of antigravity vomit and interstellar waste cyclers.

name: Burnt Slime
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of uncleaned fryers and festering grease traps.

name: Putrid Gas
desc: Ugh! A Gross Mixer with the taste of medical mishaps and hospital dumpsters.

name: Festering Urchin & Poop Pie
desc: Gah! A stale crust is the least of your worries. Take a bite of this and you'll simultaneously wish you were drowning in an undersea cave AND suffocating in hard vacuum.

name: Putrid Gas Filled Blood Maggot Crepes
desc: Gah! Rubbery eggs are the least of your worries. Farty fumes welcome you to a bite that's equal parts old blood and bloated maggots.

name: Alien Bloodied Brains Strudel
desc: Gah! Old dough is the least of your worries. Writhing alien brains scream as you bite into them, sending out jets of gray blood.

name: Rotting Fish Guts Club Sandwich
desc: Gah! Expired mayonnaise is the least of your worries. Fetid fish guts flop out between your fingers as you hold this horrific sandwich.

name: Festering Fish Guts Taco
desc: Why. It's like you took all that's awful about fish guts - everything - and then jammed them into a taco to add a little crunch to the squish.

name: Alien Brains Strudel
desc: Why. This strudel is writhing with half-baked alien brains! They're trying to escape!

name: Maggot-Slathered Fish & Sticks
desc: Why. Because undercooked fish and moldy breading isn't awful enough, you've managed to top it with a slithering slurry of fresh maggots.

name: Blood Filled Crepes
desc: Why. These things are practically heaving with decomposing gas, ready to pop in a fountain of dirty blood the second you bite down!

name: Growmoji Ill
desc: Want to add some ill emotions to your chat? Just consume this to add it to your available growmojis!

name: Webbed Hand
desc: A webbed hand for Fish-Squished!

name: Blob of Goop
desc: A blob of goop for Spaced-Faced!

name: Inflamed Nose
desc: Don't get too excited by the name - this nose doesn't shoot fire, unfortunately. It's just the sign of a sick Growtopian!

name: Dirt Grass Hair
desc: Wow, your hair looks like the grass on top of dirt!

name: Easter Crate
desc: Smash it for Easter treats!

name: Galactic Destructor - Green

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in giga-green, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Purple

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in pew-pew-purple, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Red

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in red-alert-red, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Galactic Destructor - Blue

func.add: Galactic Code THX1137... Destruction protocol: initiate!

desc: Stolen from an Imperial shipment and bearing Galactic Danger Code THX1136, this super-weapon has but one purpose: Total destruction! A galactic menace in blaster-blue, this monster of a weapon will take all of your strength to lift, and all of your courage to fire.

name: Doctor's Blingin' Cross
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! It's said that those who wear the Cross of Bling will experience dramatically shorter lives, but they'll be full of adventure, right up to the end!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Cap
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest - and most stylish - doctor in al the worlds! The Cap of Bling is a treasured hallmark of doctorhood, as it protects patients from seeing your mussy bedhead and dandruff! They'll never know!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Mask
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Because doctors encounter all manner of diseases, it's imperative that they keep from infecting their patients. The Mask of Bling is said to reduce the chances of contagion by 110%! Nobody is sure how that's mathematically possible, but they won't question it, either!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Top
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! The Top of Bling is specially-woven to protect its bearer from the slices and dices of errant scalpels and thrashing patients! You can never be too careful when battling the slow creep of entropy!

name: Doctor's Blingin' Pants
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest -and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Fun fact: At least 83% of all infections start from dirty knees! Wearing pants as well-made and sterile as these drops that rate down to NOTHING, which just goes to show that you can be professional and look amazing at the same time.

name: Hands of the Void
desc: Deadly claws of chaos and rage, spun from the essence of haunted realms beyond the stars. Sometimes the void touches you, but with these, yours will be the touch of that darkness.

name: Feet of the Void
desc: Dire darkness wraps your feet, turning every step into footfall of doom. Flowers wither in your wake, small animals run screeching, and your shoes definitely will not fit anymore.

name: Gut Buster
desc: Looks terrifying, but this mess of guts is actually just the results of a stolen medical Train-E, some creative arts and crafts, and a whole lot of duct tape to stick it to your torso!

name: Stitchlips
desc: Tired of all that talking? Take matters into your own hands and slap some stitches on those loquacious lips! You'll be silenced in seconds!

name: Clockwork Fish
desc: A clanking, clattering fish of grumpy gears! Doesn't like much of anything, so this should be a real training challenge, but on the other hand, imagine the prestige of having trained a mecha-fish of your very own!

name: Clockwork Fish Leash
desc: This well-oiled fish has decided its grumpy days are behind it - it's decided to follow you around in all its clankering, over-geared beauty!

name: Clockwork Eyes
desc: Gear yourself up for success and stare down your rivals with these superb spinners! The only downside? They need a lot of oil to keep spinning!

name: Mean Wolf Block
desc: This wolf is none too happy about being stuck as a block, and he's going to take out all his anger on anyone who gets close!

name: Howly Hat
desc: Awooo! Tired of turning your head to the skies to howl at the moon on your own? Now this hat will do all your howling for you! Think of all the time you'll save!

name: Ecto-Lock
desc: A superbly spooky lock that not only locks an entire world, but also attracts other ghosts to join the party!

name: Steppin' Ghost
desc: Ghosts don't make for very reliable platforms, but thankfully it looks like this spirit is going to stick around!

name: Cupcake Hat
desc: Show everyone your love of baked delights by topping yourself with a giant treat of your very own! Looks good enough to eat!

name: Big Belly
desc: Looks like all that fine food has gotten the best of you! You should try to cut down on the caloric blocks and start punching more of them for exercise, but until then, this big 'ol belly is a sign of your sins.

name: Punchy Fist
desc: Produced with concentrated punching power, this block will give everyone who touches it a swift hit into the skies!

name: Gem Hair
desc: Hair spun from twinkling crystals and concentrated gems! It's worth? Incalculable. Its beauty? Inconceivable. Your look? Incredible.

name: Chicken Feet
desc: Ba-kaw! You've been afflicted by the infectious chickenfoot virus! Fortunately, the only real symptoms are having sweet chicken feet and an occasional taste for bugs.

name: Terrifying Toothface
desc: Yikes! This toothy maw has one too many chompers! Can you imagine the dentist bills? And all the toothpaste? Sheesh, this thing is scary in more ways than one!

name: Loving Halo
desc: A sign of a truly gracious and adoring soul. This halo marks you with love and adoration, healing you quickly with the power of the heart! Aww!

name: Chaos Corruption

func.rem: The darkness has left you! ...for now...

desc: Racing lines of chaos have consumed your blood, filling you with fiendish energy. While the corruption feeds on your spirit, you'll be faster, but at what cost?

name: Block o' Barf
desc: Clean up in Aisle 3! Can someone get a mop?

name: Wormtouch

func.rem: Your wormy arms have wiggled away!

desc: Wiggly Worms are the best diggers! So it makes sense replacing your arms with GIANT WORMS would give you impressive digging skills. 100% perfect, unquestionable, sense.

name: Snakewolf

func.rem: No longer slithering with the pack.

desc: Slithering with serpent speed, howling at the moon, and looking like a million world locks, this mythical snakewolf is your newest friend! Notes for care: Snakewolf likes rare steaks, lots of scratches, and destroying your enemies.

name: Ghostking's Glory

func.rem: The dead do not suffer the living to pass!

desc: All ghosts flock to the holder of the Ghostking's crown. Stolen from his empty throne on the Other Side, this spectral crown proclaims you the true ruler of all ghostkind! Unfortunately, that means you're about to make a lot of booful buddies! At least... until the Ghostking finds you...

name: The Fattenator
desc: Dang, you are HUGE. With thickness like this, nobody's going to have much luck pushing YOU around.

name: Med-A-Check
desc: Think you might have malady on your hands? Use the advanced tech of the Med-A-Check to scan your patient! Only has enough for one complete scan, but will tell you exactly what malady your patient has! Note: Will not be consumed if  its target has no malady.

name: Dummy Item for Surgical Maladies
desc: You shouldn't be able to read this, you sneaky person, you.

name: Legendary Clash Key - Series 2
desc: A key to a mysterious treasure! This key is for Clash Series 2, running from Summer Clash 2019 through Spring Clash 2020. After three seasons, those who collect at least 10 of these keys will be able to open a special treasure chest. Make sure you have enough just one won't do it!

name: Darkening Hood
desc: Shrouding its bearer in stylish shadows, this hood is the perfect way to stay awesomely anonymous! Chosen by Placental, this is the Monthly Subscriber's Item for May, 2019!

name: Pineapple Checkpoint Totem
desc: Let the pineapples be your sweet salvation! Remember, if you die, you'll respawn at the last checkpoint you touched!

name: Grumpy Pet Pineapple
desc: This tiny terror hates feeling like the runt of the pineapple litter. He'll follow you around, but don't make jokes about his size! He's very upset about... well... everything!

name: Slippery Pineapple Squishers
desc: As everyone knows, pineapples are the fastest of the fruits. Now, thanks to advanced GrowTech Squishscience, we've managed to imbue the speedy juice of the pineapple into these hyper-advanced shoes. What? You say they're just hollowed-out pineapples? Don't be silly - if that were true, how could they make you move so quickly?

name: Pineapple Skin Shirt
desc: A tough skin for a tough Growtopian, both hiding a sweet, wonderful interior!

name: Howling Pineapple Crown
desc: YEAAAAAAAAAAAAH! This pineapple is down to terrorize the town! Perched on your head, it will scream its fruity head off at anyone who comes near! Why, you ask? What, do pineapples suddenly need REASONS to start yelling at people?

name: Dangerous Pineapple Juice Backpack
desc: This backpack is filled with swirling, deadly dangerous juice from only the most malicious of pineapples! With such feisty energy, you could certainly power something huge... like a Harvester!

name: Dangerous Pineapple

func.rem: The tragedy has come to an end!

desc: An all-new, all-deadly pineapple! Careful how you eat these - many have tried to tame the Dangerous Pineapple, and nearly all have met with a truly tragic fate...

name: Super Pineapple Party Crate
desc: The scent of pineapple is nearly overpowering! Smash this tasty crate for Super Pineapple Party goodies!

name: Pinedelier
desc: Crystal pineapples filled with enchanted pinelights for the classiest possible pineapple experience!

name: Looming Pineapple
desc: A demon-possessed pineapple, out for blood! Or maybe just hugs! Either way, its touch is deadly, so you'd better MOVE!

name: Prickly Pineapple
desc: This pineapple cannot make it clearer: It does NOT like you, or your friends, or anyone really, and it will SPIKE the next person who doesn't get that concept.

name: Vaccine Drop
desc: A piece of a true medical marvel, and perhaps your only hope of curing the deadliest of diseases! Collect enough of these precious drops and combine them into a final, super-effective form.

name: UV Vaccine
desc: This wonder of modern medicine is the Universal Vicious Vaccine, and your only hope against the most dangerous of maladies! Hold onto this as you operate, and be careful, because it'll get used whether you're successful or not!

name: Vile Vial - Chaos Infection
desc: Filled with the swirling essence of the Chaosbearer itself, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with a chaos infection! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Moldy Guts

func.add: You've been infected with moldy guts!
func.rem: You no longer have moldy guts!

desc: Filled with the grumbling grossness of internal ick, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Moldy Guts! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Brainworms
desc: Filled with wriggly parasitic woe, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Brainworms! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Lupus
desc: Filled with the howling madness at the heart of every Wolf World, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Lupus! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Ecto-Bones

func.rem: Your bones are no longer ectoplasmic!

desc: Filled with the chilling despair of the Other Side, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Ecto-Bones! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Vile Vial - Fatty Liver

func.add: You've been infected with fatty liver!
func.rem: You no longer have fatty liver!

desc: Filled with the ultra-caloric output of only the most perfect cooking, this deadly vial will afflict ANYONE it touches with Fatty Liver! (Except if they already have another malady, of course - these diseases are very polite in that regard)

name: Doctor's Blingin' Booties
desc: Gleaming gold to mark its bearer as the finest - and most stylish - doctor in all the worlds! Set with nonslip treads of solid gold, these blingtastic booties will help you keep your footing in even the most slippery of surgical scenarios!

name: Angel of Mercy's Wings
desc: You bear the wings of a true savior, a surgeon without peer who has saved countless lives in their pursuit of the greater good. All who can hear the beat of these magnificently medicinal wings will know that their salvation has arrived.

name: Caduceaxe
desc: Capable of extracting pure medical might from blocks, this caduceaxe is your ticket to vaccination victory! There's a chance it may break on vaccine extraction, but hey - it also has a chance of getting you more than a few fragments!

name: SurgWorld Blast
desc: Your gateway to a world of medical wonders! A SurgWorld is a top place of care and healing, with all kinds of interesting blocks, top chance of getting maladies while you work!

name: Train-E
desc: A prototype variant of the Surg-E, the surgical scenarios(and prizes) you can encounter on Train-E are limited, but it's the perfect way to learn Surgery!

name: Surgical Block
desc: Infused with medical goodness! Mmm! that's some healthy blocks!

name: Surgical Background
desc: A medical wonderland awaits!

name: Surgical Waste
desc: DANGER! No matter how healthy  and medicinal this waste looks, it's STILL LAVA, which means DO NOT TOUCH!

name: Aggregate Concrete
desc: Healthy rocks for a healthful world! I mean, don't EAT them or anything - they're just nice to have around.

name: Rotten Pineapple Block
desc: The problem with pineapple is it gets mushy when left in the sun for too long.

name: Sourloaf Pineapple Block
desc: All the goodness of a sugarloaf pineapple with a hint of sour tang, so many flavors exploding in your mouth.

name: Dangerous Pineapple Block
desc: Pineapples are usually quite spikey, but this one has extra spikes added just in case.

name: Dangerous Pineapple Fan Shirt
desc: Who doesn't pineapple GT even when it's dangerous to do so?

name: Nightking's Cape - Dark Red
desc: To defend the streets of a dark city, you'll need more than wits and skill - criminals need a symbol to fear, a sign of justice and vengeance alike, and without a righteously red cape like this, even the most amazing hero can't look the part. That, and its spring-loaded fabrics provide double-jump, because there's no harm in being practical while building your image!

name: Nightking's Cape - Dark Purple
